33a3('dul ba): pha bdag der song na cir 'gyur/des smras pa/bu de na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'dug pa de'i bus khyod kyi sring mo chung mar blangs pas/khyod der song na srid
33a4('dul ba): mo de khyod la 'kho ba stobs par 'gyur//legs 'ongs kyis smras pa/phra 'gro'o//khyim bdag des legs 'ongs le kAr sha pa na gnyis byin to smras pa/bu kho bo
33a5('dul ba): zong sbyar gyi bar du khyod re shig 'di gnyis za zhing sdod cig/l-iDa 'ongs kyi kAr sha pa na de gnyis gos kyi grwar phur te bzhag pa dang /des las kyi rnam par
33a6('dul ba): sbyin pas de gnyis kyang brjed par gyur to//khyim bdag des zong bsgyur te rin blangs nas legs 'ongs khrid de 'phags pa dang /legs 'ongs kyang de dang lhan cig
33a7('dul ba): 'phag so//ji tsam na ngon 'thun de dag 'thab par brtsams shing /glang dag kyang 'thab par brtsom nas/de dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag bdag cag
33b1('dul ba): sngan chad cig gis cig mthong na snying du sdug na deng bdag cag cig gis cig mthong na 'thab par brtsams shing glang dag kyang cig gis cig mthong na 'thab par rtsom pa
33b2('dul ba): las/ma la 'di nyes 'ongs yin te 'di'i le lan gyis bdag cag 'thab par bzlums shing glang dag kyang 'thab par rtsom mo zhes de dag gis de bsgrud par brnams
33b3('dul ba): pa dang /khyim bdag des smras pa/shes ldan dag la 'di kho bos chung po grogs kyi bu yin gyis ma bskrad cig/de dag gis smras pa/khyim bdage khyod ni don 'thun
33b4('dul ba): la dbang ba yin mod kyis/bdag cag 'di deng lhan cig 'grogs phong de/gal te 'di 'gro na bdag ceg mi 'gro'o//khyim bdag des legs 'ongs la smras pa/
33b5('dul ba): bu khyod phyi bzhin 'brang zhing shog shig/kho bos khyod ci'i phyogs na bzhag par bya'o//legs 'ongs phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'ong ba na khyim bdag des kyang de'i
33b6('dul ba): don du zan 'jog par byed cing kha cig ni sa gzhi lo sas g.yogs te 'jog par byed/kha cig ni shing ljon pa'i yal ga drug la lo mAM dag gis g.yogs te
33b7('dul ba): 'jog par byed do//de'i zin gang dag sa gzhi la sas g.yogs te bzhag pa de dag na wa dag gis zos/gang dag ni shing ljon pa'i yal ga dag la lo ma
34a1('dul ba): dag gis g.yogs te bzhug pa de dag ni bya dang spre'u dag gis zos nas/legs 'ongs kyis cung zad ni thob/phal cher ni ma thob nas//
34a2('dul ba): de shin tu nyam nga bas 'tsho zhing 'gro'o//srid pa tha ma po'i sems can zag po zad pa mi thob par bAr ma dor rgyun chad cing dus byed par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin/skabs ma
34a3('dul ba): yin te/de ni gnas med pas legs 'ongs mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas/mnyan yod kyi phyi rol khron pa'i kha nang lo bso zhing 'dug go/legs 'ongs kyi sring mo khyim
34a4('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mna' ma byed pa de'i bu mo mngagra zhug mchu bum thogs te khron pa de'i drung du chu chur song ba dang /des legs 'ongs bzhin gzugs las ngo shes
34a5('dul ba): nas/des de la smras pa/jo bo khyod chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri bo khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi bu legs 'ongs ma lags sam/sring mo yin no//jo bo khyod kyi yab yum gnyis
34a6('dul ba): gar bzhud/dus la bab bo//dri'i khyim dang bang mdzod kyi rnam pa dang /zhing gri rnam pa dang /nor gyi rnam pa dang /'bru'i rnam pa dge gar mchis/thams cad myemes tshig go/
34a7('dul ba): grong pa'i mi gang dag zong thogs te yul gzhan du mchis pa dag gar mchis/kha cig ni rgya mtsho chen por gru bo che zhig par gyur/kha cig ni zong zong ma yin par
34b1('dul ba): gyur/kha cig ni de nyid du tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur/kha cig ni de nyid du 'khod de tshig kyang mi ster ro//nye du dag gar mchis/kha cig ni dus la bab/kha cig
34b2('dul ba): bros/kha cig ni de nyid ni 'khod de tshig kyang mi ster ro//bran dang bran mo dang /las byed pa dang /zho shas 'tsho ba dag gar mchis kha cig ni dus la bab/kha cig ni bros/kha cig
34b3('dul ba): ni de nyid na 'khod de tshig kyang mi ster ro//bu mo des de thos nas de mchi mas brnangs te 'dug nas/des legs 'ongs la smras pa/jo bo bdag gis khyod kyi lcam mo la sprin gyi bar
34b4('dul ba): du re shig 'di nyid na bzhes cig ces smras te/bu mo de song nas jo mo la smras pa/jo mi khyod kyi dral byon no//des smras pa/zong ji lta bus byon/bu mos smras pa/jo mo mkhar
34b5('dul ba): ba dang /ral rul dang /sbrang phor gyis byod nas/des bu mo de'i lag tu gos dag dang kar sha pe na dag bskur nas smras pa/jo bo la 'di skad ces snga mi 'di tsam je gsol
34b6('dul ba): zhing banobs shig dang /slad kyi gal te dpon po dag dang /dpon mo dag dang /mjal bar gyur na/de dag kar sha pa na ji snyed cig 'bul bar gyur pas khyod nye du dag gis
34b7('dul ba): glo bas bas par mi 'gyu ro zhes gyis shig/bu mo de der song ste legs 'ongs la gos dag dang kar sha pa na dag phul nas smras pa/jo bo l+h+wam gyi mchid nas snga ma 'od tsam je
35a1('dul ba): gsol zhing banobs shig dang /slad kyi gal te dpon po dag dang /dpon mo dag dang 'jal bar gyur na/de dag kar sha pa na ji snyed cig 'bul bar
35a2('dul ba): gyur pas/khyod nye du dag gis blo bas bas par mi 'gyur ro//zhes smras te song ngo //legs 'ongs kyis bsams pa/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni nyi du'i 'khor rgya che ba
35a3('dul ba): yani la bdag kyang sngon nye du'i 'khor rgya che ba yin pas de der song na/de dag bdag la gtam dris pas ring du thogs par 'gyur zhing des bdag ltogs te 'chi bar 'gyur
35a4('dul ba): gyis je g.yar gsum za zhing 'brangs nas der song ste/nye du'i tshogs drag la bde bar sor sor kun dga' bar bya'o snyam nas/de chang ma'i khyim du song ste/des ji tsam gyis
35a5('dul ba): ra ro bar 'gyur ba de tsam gyis tshang sar pa 'thungs nas de ra ro ste bskyed mos tshal du song nas nyal lo//mnyan yod na bskyed mos tshal 'joms pa'i ma dag bskyed mos
35a6('dul ba): tshal nyug par byed cing /de dag gis gal te ma gnyid log pa mthong na de rkang pas skul bar byed cing gal te sad na ni de la 'di skad ces kye nang rje khyod kyis mnyan yod na
35a7('dul ba): bskyed mos tsha lo 'joms pa'i mi dag bskyed mos tshal nyug par byed cing de dag mi gnyid log pa 'joms par byed do zhes ma thos sam/longs la song shig ces ze
35b1('dul ba): gal te masad na ni bcom ste 'dung bar byed pas bskyed mos tshol 'joms pa'i mi dag der lhags ste//legs 'ongs nyal ba mthong nas de dag gis de rkang pas skul nA ma sad nas/
35b2('dul ba): ji tsam nu de dag gis de bcom ste dong ngo //ji tsam no legs 'ongs sad pa dang bdag nyid bcom par mthong nas/des ral rul de dag nyid gyon te 'dug go//de'i sring mos bsams
35b3('dul ba): pa/ci'i phyir bdag gi ming po de yun ring du thogs snyam nas/des bu mo mngag zhug ma mngags te de ltar btang ba dang de der song ste/bltas na ji tsam na bcom pa mthong nas/bu
35b4('dul ba): mo de song ste jo mo la smras pa/jo mo jo bo bcom ste sngun gyi cha lugs nyid kyis bzhugs so//sring mos bsams pa/de ni sems can skal chad cig yin pas/de'i le lan gyis
35b5('dul ba): khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi khyim nor du ma dang ldan pas tshul ma yin pas chud zos par gyur pa se/dgal te bdag gis de 'dir bcug par gyur na/bdag gi gyos po'i khyim
35b6('dul ba): yang de'i le lan gyis tshul mo yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyuraro snyam nas/des de yal bar bor ro//legs 'ongs kyis
35b7('dul ba): kyang las kyi sgrib pas de brjed nas/de mu li to dag gi nang du zhugs pa dang /ji tsam ni mul to ba de dag kyang lag stong pa dang sbrang phor stong par gyur te/phyir lhags nas de dag
36a1('dul ba): gis smras pa/shes ldan dag bdag cag sngon chad gar zhugs pa der log pa gang ba dang /sbrang phor gang bar gyur te phyir 'ong na deng bdag cag
36a2('dul ba): lag pa stong pa dang /sbrang phor stong par gyur te phyir lhags pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/de dag gis smras pa/bdag cag gi nang du sems can skal chad dgo' zhig zhugs pas des na
36a3('dul ba): bdag cag lag pa stong pa dang /sprang phor stong por gyur te phyir lhags so//yang de dag gis smras pa/brtag par bya bdag cag kha gnyisu bcad de 'jug par bya'o zhes de dag
36a4('dul ba): gis kha gnyisu bcad de zhugs pa dang /gang dag gi nang du legs 'ongs zhugs pa de dag log pa stong pa dang /sbyong phor stong par gyur te lhagaso//de dag gis kyang kha gnyis
36a5('dul ba): su bcad de zhugs pa dang gang dag gi nang du legs 'ongs zhugs pa de dag lag pa stong pa dang /sbrang phor stong par gyur te lhagaso//de dag gis kyang kha gnyisu bcad de zhugs
36a6('dul ba): pa dang /yang de ltar gyur to//de dag gis kyang kha gnyis su bcad de zhugs pa dang /de lta de ltar gyur nas/ji tsam na legs 'ongs dang mul to ba gzhan gcig zhugs
36a7('dul ba): pa yang sasar bye ba dang legs pangasan lag po stong ba dang /sprang bar rnying par gyur te 'angs ma/gzhan thams cad lag pa gang ba dang /sbyang bar gang bar gyur te/
36b1('dul ba): 'ongs nas de dag gis smras pa/sems can skal chad 'di bdag cag gi nang du zhugs pas des na bdag cag lag pa stong pa dang /sprang phor stong par gyur te/lhag so zhes de dag gis
36b2('dul ba): legs 'ongs shin tu brdegs te spang phor gyis de'i klad pa bcom nas/nye sa'i ngas khyod par song shig ces smras te bskrad do//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi sangs rgyas la so
36b3('dul ba): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/de'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag ji srid du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
36b4('dul ba): gyis/gdugs tshod ma gsol gyi bar du mul to ba 'ga' yang 'jug tu ma gzhug shig de la phyis sbyin par bya'o//de na mul to bas 'jug por brtsams pa na mi sgo bas de dag byir
36b5('dul ba): zlog pa dang /de dag gis smras pa/kye nang rje khro bo cag gi ming gis khyim bdag bzang sbyin gyi ming mgon med zos sbyin zhes bya bar grags pa yin na ci'i phyir khyod kho bo cag phyir
36b6('dul ba): zlog par byed/yang de dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag bdag cag gis nang du yang nyos 'ongs de zhugs par mo gyur ta mr-i/ltos shig ces de dag gis bltas pa dang /ji
36b7('dul ba): tsam na de dag gis legs 'ongs der zhugs pa mthong nas/de dag gis smras pa/nyes 'ongs de 'di yin no zhes de dag gis legs 'ongs shin tu 'debs te sprang phor gyis de
37a1('dul ba): klang ba btsom nas/de dag gis/lag pad glang pa dag nas bzung ste/spyod nas phyag dar gyi phung ba'i stong du bzhug ste nyes 'ongs khyod 'dir 'dug
37a2('dul ba): 'dug shig ces smras pa dang /legs 'ongs phyag dur gyi phung po'i skyeng na ngu zhing 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs gsol lhung bzed dang chos gos
37a3('dul ba): bsnams te/dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdur te khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bkad sa ga la ba de logs
37a4('dul ba): gshegs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis legs 'ongs phyug drer gyi phung po'i steng na klad pa zhom pa nas khrag 'jug cing ngu zhing 'dug pa gzig so//gzigs nas
37a5('dul ba): kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di ltar srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can yang gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur pas/srid pa dag gis ngoms par
37a6('dul ba): bya zhing srid pa'i yo byad dag gis kyang ngoms par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis legs
37a7('dul ba): 'ongs la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma bzhag par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag mgon med zos sbyin gyi skad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/dge
37b1('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso//de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhu
37b2('dul ba): par rig nas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/stobs por byed do//rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang /bza' ba gtsang zhing
37b3('dul ba): bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing stabs nas bcom ldan 'das gdug so tshod gsol zhing phyag bcabs lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas/stan ches
37b4('dul ba): dma' ba zhig blangs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug glo/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bros legs 'ongs la lhung bzed lhag ma bzhag pa
37b5('dul ba): brjed do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid ce na yin pas/bcom ldan 'das kyis legs 'ongs la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma bzhag pa
37b6('dul ba): mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed kyi pham phabs blangs par brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom
37b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bdag le le gas 'ongs la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zhog shig ces bka' stsal pa/brjed pa dran nas des ngu bar brtsames pa dang /bcom ldan 'ad
38a1('dul ba): kyis ka' sprul pa/kun dag na rlung chu'i nga du/tsun pa bdag gi logs yos la ltung bzad kyi lhag ma bzhag pa bskyed de/
38a2('dul ba): bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' baHgo/kun dga' bo khyod kyi de'i byukri'u bcag pa ma yin gyis 'di ltar legs 'ongs nyid kyis lus kyi pas khyod
38a3('dul ba): kyis de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma bzhag pa brjed par gyur hUM//kun dga' bo khyod song la legs phongs pos shig/de song ste legs 'ongs leg so'i ngos shes kyi
38a4('dul ba): ba dang /dri ma dag gis ang zhes lan btab cid/de dag gis byesems pa/dang bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gam gyi rna mas gang la dgongs snyan mo//tshe dang ldan du kun
38a5('dul ba): dga' bo phyi log ste gsol pa/btsun pa bdag gi legs 'ongs legs 'ongs shes bos na/du ma dag gis a zhes ldan btab na gang mchi bar bgyi/kun dge' the sa /
38a6('dul ba): 'di skad ces chu sbyin byis pa bsod kyi ri li khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi bu legs 'ongs gang yin pa de tshur shog ces bos shig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo song ste de skad pos pa
38a7('dul ba): dang /legs 'angs kyi bdag gi ming dran nas/des tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/lags 'ongs smra 'di'i sgyud gyur na//ga las 'dir ni mi ches par gyur//des par ma
38b1('dul ba): nga gyur cing //legs pa byung bar gyur yang dag/gang dag khyod la skyabs mchis pa//de dag mgon ni kun mkhyen lags//gang dag khyod kyi gsung dga' dang //'phags pa de dag la
38b2('dul ba): 'ongs lags//bdag ni skal dang bral ba ste//rtsa ldag kun gyis spangs gyur cing //brtse gnas drag po'i gnas thos pa//mya ngan zug rngus gzir ba lags//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
38b3('dul ba): bos de khrid de zhugs nas gsol pa/btsun pa legs 'ongs de 'di leg so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bu khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed kyi pha me phabs za ba ma/
38b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das kyis de la lhung bzed kyi pham phabs stsal pa dang ji tsamA na dem+b+ha nyung ngur mthong nas/des bsams pa/bdag la bcom ldan 'das
38b5('dul ba): 'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma rgya lam na dgongs su zin kyang lhung zed kyi pham phabs chung ngu zhig bzhag go snyam mo//bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas bka'
38b6('dul ba): stsal pa/bu lpags 'dis gal te khyod ri rab tsam gyi kham dag dang rgya mtsho chen po tsam gyi ltos za bar byed na yang ji srid de khyod tshim par ma gyur pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs
38b7('dul ba): po'i lhung bzed kyi pham phabs zad par mi 'gyur ro//des bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed kyi pham phabs zos pa dang /de tshim par gyur nas/de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du
39a1('dul ba): blta bar brtsams pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bu legs 'ongs tshim mam/bcom ldan 'das tshim mo//kham tha ma long shig dang
39a2('dul ba): mi snang bar 'gyuraro//des de blangs nas mi snang bar gyur to//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di su legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
39a3('dul ba): pa/khyim bdag chu srin byis pa gsod kyi raM ba khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das 'o na bdag gi chung po grogs kyi bu lagaso//khyim bdag de yi no//de nas bcom
39a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad nas/gdan las bzhengs te gshegs pa dang /srid pa tha ma'i sems can de/bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin rjesu 'brang zhing song nas/
39a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa dang /legs 'ongs kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
39a6('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go//bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i las sbyang bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs 'ongs
39a7('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/legs 'ongs khyod la kar sha pa na dag yod dme/bcom ldan 'das mo mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bu gos kyi grwar ltos
39b1('dul ba): shig/ngas bltas pa dang /ji tsam na kar sha pa na gnyis rtag par mthong nas/des gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mchis//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bu song la kun dga' ra
39b2('dul ba): ba ba rgyal bu dum pa'i gan nas ut+pa la sngon po dag khyer te shog shig/des btsun 'das bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas kun dga' ra ba pa rgyal bu dum pa
39b3('dul ba): ga la ba der seng ba dang /rgyal bu dum pas de dag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthang nas/des bsams pa/nyes ngongs 'di gshed nas 'dir 'ongs pas/bdag la gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur
39b4('dul ba): ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyu ro snyam nas des smras pa/nyes 'ongs kun dga'i ra bar ma 'jug shig/legs 'ongs kyi tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/bdag ni u t+pa lA mi
39b5('dul ba): bsgrub ste//pad+ma bdag la dgos pa med//kho ba kun mkhyen grags ldan pa//thub pa'i dbang po'i pho nya yin//dum pas tshigasu bcad pa smras pa/gal te thub pa bzhi bdag nyid//lha mi
39b6('dul ba): rnams kyi mchod gnas kyi//mchod pa'i gnas kyis chos mchod pa'o//pho nya lags na tshur gshegs byan//dum pas smras pa/khyod sangs rgyas kyi pho nya yin nam/legs 'ongs
39b7('dul ba): kyis smras pa/kho bos sangs rgyas kyi pho nya yin no//don ci'i phyir 'ongs/ut+pa la dag gi phyir 'ongs so//sing la ji snyed 'dod pa de snyed khyor te sang shig/legs 'ongs kyis ut+pa
40a1('dul ba): la sngon po dag gis khung khyer te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang /bcom ldan 'dad kyis bka' stsal pa/legs 'ongs dge
40a2('dul ba): slong rnams la brims shig/legs 'ongs kyis dge slong rnams la u t+pa la sngon po dge brim par brtsams pa dang /dge slong dag mi len nas/bcom ldan 'das
40a3('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dri zhim po thams cad ni mig la phan zhing 'di'i las sbyang bar yang byas long shig/dge slong rnams kyis me tog de dag
40a4('dul ba): blangaso//legs 'ongs kyis sngon zad par sngon po'i skye mched bskyed pas de rgan pa'i mtha' logs na 'dug pas/dge slong rnams kyi lag na ut+pa la sngon po dag
40a5('dul ba): thogs pa de dag mthong ngo //mthong nas zad par sngon po'i skye mchod mngon du gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/legs 'ongs khyod ci'i phyir rab tu
40a6('dul ba): mi 'byung /bcom ldan 'das bdag rab tu 'byung ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis de rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen pa mdzad nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de lo gdam
40a7('dul ba): ngag stsal to//de de ltar rab tu byung nas gcig pu dben pa bge yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir sgra dang
40b1('dul ba): kha spu dregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed/tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de'i tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon
40b2('dul ba): par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do//tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//bya ba byaso//srid pa 'di las gzhan mi sheso zhes zer bar byed cing dgra bcom pa
40b3('dul ba): khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/bong ba dang goser du mnyam pa na mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa tsan+dan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i
40b4('dul ba): sbubs dral bar gyur cing /rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/dbang po
40b5('dul ba): dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /brjed par bya ba dang /mngon sum du smra bar bya bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis dgra
40b6('dul ba): bcom pa nyid thob nas rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong ba na de'i tshe na/tshigasu bcad po dag smras pa/dbang po de nyid gzigs pa yis//thabs kyi
40b7('dul ba): zhags pas bdag bcings te//glang chen rgas pa 'dam phyung ltar//thugs rjes sdug bsngal 'dam nas phyung //bdag ni sngan chad legs 'ongs gyur//de yi 'og tu nyes
41a1('dul ba): 'ongs lags//da ni thugs dbang khyod gsung gis//gsal bar logs 'ongs nyid du gyur//kun mkhyen lcags 'dra bdag gis ni//khyod kyi gsung
41a2('dul ba): mchog thos gyur nas//da ni gser dang 'dra ba yis//zag pa med pa'i lus kyang thob//rin chen la sogs 'thob pa dang //mtho ris thar pa 'tshal ba yis//rtag tu phan pa
41a3('dul ba): bzhed pa yi//dge ba shes ston par bgyi ler bzang ///'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa//bam po re lnga pa/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs legs par
41a4('dul ba): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la gang tu byung ba de'i tshe na gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma nu re nga'i bstan pa ni kun tu mdzes pa yin no zhes zer na/
41a5('dul ba): 'di ltar nyes 'ongs la sogs pa mul to ba dag kyang rab tu 'byin par byed na de'i bstan pa ji ltar kun tu mdzes pa yin zhes smod par byed/phyar kha gtong bar byed/kha zeng
41a6('dul ba): bar byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyan thos tshon po ri rab lta bu la skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag smras pa bskyed par byed pas 'di'i yon tan bsgog par bya na/
41a7('dul ba): gang du bya/gang skyes shing gang du rdib pa de nyid du bya'o snyam du dgongs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo sa
41b1('dul ba): la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ngan spong go bu dag ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyod cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig ngan spong gi bu dag ljongs rgyar
41b2('dul ba): 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos long shig ces bsgo shig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la tshe dang
41b3('dul ba): ldan pa dge bcom ldan 'das ngan spyong gri bu dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig tu ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des
41b4('dul ba): chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/dbugs phyin pa
41b5('dul ba): 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang
41b6('dul ba): ldan pa/mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/glang po che ltar glang po che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/seng ge
41b7('dul ba): ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/dang po'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/na mkha' lding ltar bye'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba
42a1('dul ba): bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/dpa' bo ltar ru ba'i tshogs kyis/
42a2('dul ba): yongs su bskor ba/sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi
42a3('dul ba): tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/khams kyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/'khor lo sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/zla ba
42a4('dul ba): ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/yu la 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/
42a5('dul ba): 'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongasu basbyor ba/mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/gnod sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis
42a6('dul ba): yongs su bskor ba/theg zangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/brgya byin ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/tshangs
42a7('dul ba): paltar tshangasams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba/spyod lam dang spyad pa ma'i khrugs pa/chu gter sbyar ting drig/sbyin
42b1('dul ba): ltar chu dang bcas pa/glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par
42b2('dul ba): mdzes pa/'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba/stobs bcu dang mi 'jig
42b3('dul ba): pa bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum dang /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang rta thul dang bzang ldan dang rlangs pa dang /ming chen
42b4('dul ba): dang /grags pa dang gang po dang /dri med dang ba lang bdag dang /lag bzangs la sogs pa/nyan thos chen po de dag dang /gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos
42b5('dul ba): yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdUr tre/ngan spong gi bu drug tu chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rig la ba de lag su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir byon
42b6('dul ba): nas/chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ra la 'jigs rung gi tshe la ri dregs kyi nags na bzhugaso//chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri bo'i bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis/bcom ldan
42b7('dul ba): 'das ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/chu srin byis pa gsod kyi re re byon nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi tshal ri dgas kyi nags na bzhu Da
43a1('dul ba): shes thos so//thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshog su byings nas byings su 'dus shing lhags te chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das
43a2('dul ba): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu 'khod do//mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas/bcom
43a3('dul ba): ldan 'das chu srin byas pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du
43a4('dul ba): 'jug par mdzad/yang drag par gzeng bstod par mdzod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad//rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par
43a5('dul ba): bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //de nas chu srin byis pa gsod
43a6('dul ba): kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das lo 'di skad ces
43a7('dul ba): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugos tshod gsol par ci gnang /bcom ldan 'das kyis chu
43b1('dul ba): smin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
43b2('dul ba): kyi cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo //de nas chu srin byis pa
43b3('dul ba): gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang bzla ba gtsong zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te/gdan bshoms
43b4('dul ba): shing chur bzhag nas/bco mo ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis/btsun pa gdugs tshod g.yar dgongs 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su
43b5('dul ba): gsol zhes sman drangs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga dro sham thabs gsol/lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor
43b6('dul ba): cing /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bder nas/chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/
43b7('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso//de nas chu srin byis pa gosod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das dang
44a1('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/bca' ba dang /bza' ba gtsang zhing gsod pas rang gi laka nas tshim par byed stobs
44a2('dul ba): bar byed do//rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing gsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/bcom ldan 'das gdugs chod
44a3('dul ba): gsol zhing phyag bca ba lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas/stan ches dma' ba dag blangs te/bcom ldan 'odas kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do//'khod
44a4('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das la chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang /
44a5('dul ba): gnod sbyin gdug pa dang /sig ma med dang /'brog gnas la sogs pa de dang de dag kyang btul nas/btsun pa klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa 'di yun ring po nas bdag
44a6('dul ba): cag mkhon ma mchis pa rnams la mkhon du 'dzin/mi 'gran pa rnams la 'gran du tshol/mi 'khu ba rnams la 'khu bar bgyid cing /lo tog 'khrung so 'tshal ma
44a7('dul ba): rungs par bgyid na/kye me bcom ldan 'das kyis rjesu thugs brtse ba'i slad du kle a mra'i rkangogs pa 'di 'dul du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin
44b1('dul ba): byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin byis pa gsod kyi re pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos
44b2('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyi yang dag par ston par mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzod/yang dag pa re gzeng bstod par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
44b3('dul ba): mdzad do//rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
44b4('dul ba): mdzad nas/gden las bzhengs te/gsheg so//de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams
44b5('dul ba): pa nyid la bzhugaso//bzhugs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bkra' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la/khyed cag las gang klu a mA'i
44b6('dul ba): chu ngogs pa 'dul bar spro ba des tshul shing long shig ces bsgo la/dge 'dun la tshul shing brims shig/tshetshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom
44b7('dul ba): ldan 'das las mnyan nas/dge slong rnams la khyed cag las gang klu a mr-i'i chu ngags pa gdul bar spro ba des/tshul shing long shika ces bsgo ste/dge 'dun la tshul
45a1('dul ba): shing brims shing brtsams pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul shing ma bzhes nas/dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gis bsams pa/bcom ldan/
45a2('dul ba): 'das kyis ci'i slad du/tshul shing ma bzhes snyam du bsams na/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi yon tan bsgrag par bzhed par rig nas/de dag gis kyang tshul bzhin ma blangs
45a3('dul ba): so//tshe dang ldan pa legs 'das kyis bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan dag gis ci'i skad du tshul shing ma bzhes snyam du bsams na/bdag gi yon
45a4('dul ba): tan bsgrag par bzhed nas/ston pa'i thugs la dgongs pa/yongasu rdzogs par bya'o snyam nas/des stan phyed las 'phags te/glang po che'i sna lta bu'i lag pa brkyangs nas
45a5('dul ba): tshul bzhin blangaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dge slong gnas brtan gang gi tshul shing blangs/btsun pa
45a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis blangs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la dge slong legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces de ni klu gdug pa yin gyis
45a7('dul ba): khyod kyis lus kyis dbang po bsrung bar bya'o zhes gyis shig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/tshe
45b1('dul ba): dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ni klu gdug pa yin gyis/khyod kyi lus kyis dbang po bsrung bar bya'o///
45b2('dul ba): zhes gsung ngo //tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis smras pa/btsun pa kun dga' bo ston pa'i bka' mnyan pas bka' bzhin 'tshal/gzhan du na kla a mra'i chu ngogs lta bu sha
45b3('dul ba): stag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di lta ste/dper na bur mi shing gi tshal lam 'dam bu'i tshal lam/'od ma'i tshal bzhin du gang bar gyur kyang de dag gi bdag gi spu'i rtse mo tsam yang g.yo
45b4('dul ba): bar mi nus na/lus kyi dbang po 'gag par lta ga la nus te/'di ltar bdag gis bsngon 'das kyi spyan sngar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po dag kun tu ston cing /goms par byas/
45b5('dul ba): lan mang du byas pa'i phyir ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/snga dro sham thebs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te chu srin byis pa gsod
45b6('dul ba): kyi ri ri bsod snyoms lo zhug so//chu sbyin byis pa gsod kyi rir bsod snyoms brgyus nas klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa'i gnas gi la ba der song ba dang /klu a mra'i chu ngogs pas/tshe dang
45b7('dul ba): ldan pa legs 'ongs thag ring po kho na nos 'ong ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang des bsams pa/dge sbyong 'dis bdag shi bar gtam thos sam ci na/bdag gi gnasu 'ong /
46a1('dul ba): re shig 'di ni/glo zur ba yin gyis/'od tu chug shig sku mo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis chu chags dang lhung bzed mtha' gcig tu bzhag/
46a2('dul ba): skye/snam sbyar sdugs nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus shing /lag pa gnyis bskul to/chu btsags nas/lo ma lhags pa dag blangs te 'dug nas/zas kyi bya ba bye byar brtsam so//
46a3('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis/zas kyi bya ba byas nas/bsams paM/klu gdug pa ni 'khrugs par ma byas na/'dul ba'i gnas su mi rung bso//'di ni klu gdug
46a4('dul ba): pa yin pas/'khrugs par bya'o snyam nas/do lhung bzed bkrus te/lhung bzed kyi khrud ma'i chu de de'i rdzing dor blugs pa dang /klu a mA'i chu ngogs pa de 'khrugs nas/
46a5('dul ba): des bsams pa/bdag gis dge sbyong 'di 'ong ba dang /za ba yang yal bar bor na/bdag la brnyas te/bdag gi gnas su khyed ma'i chu lpags par byed pas/dge
46a6('dul ba): spyong 'di ni nye bur ma zhi ba zhig yin snyom nas/de khros te/steng gi na mkha' la mngon par 'phags nus/'brug sgra chen po phyung ste/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi steng
46a7('dul ba): du rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /'khor lo dang /mda' bo che dang /mtshon rtse gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon cha sna tshigs dbab par brtsams pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa legs
46b1('dul ba): 'ongs byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas/mtshon tshwa de dag lha'i me tog ut+pa la dag pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dag tu gyur te/tshe dang ldan pa legs dngos
46b2('dul ba): kyi lusau la 'bab po//klu a mra'i chu ngogs pas me mdag gi char dbab par brtsams pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas/me
46b3('dul ba): mu dag de dag lnga'i me tog man+da ra ba dag tu gyur te/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi lus la 'bab bo//klu e mra'i chu ngogs pas phyag dar gyi char dbab par brtsams pa dang /
46b4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs/byams pa'o ting 'dzin la zhugs pas/phyag dang de dag lha'i a ka ru'i phye ma dag dang tsan+dan gyi phyi ma dag dang /rgya smos kyi phye mu dag dang /
46b5('dul ba): tA ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dag tu gyur te/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi lus la 'bab po//klu a mra'i chu ngogs pas khro bo'i mthus/du ba gtul ba dang /tshe dang ldan pa
46b6('dul ba): legs 'ongs kyis kyang /rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/de bA ga tu lo//klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa'i khro ba'i mthus me spar ba dang /tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs me'i khams le snyom
46b7('dul ba): par zhugaso//de na klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa'i khro ba'i mthu dang tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus snang ba chen po byung bar gyur nas/chu srin byis pa gsod
47a1('dul ba): kyi ri ba'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag 'di ni bcom ldan 'das klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa gdul bar mdzad pa yino//
47a2('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dra'i nyan thos kyi dge slong yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi
47a3('dul ba): nang na 'di lta ste/dge slong legs 'ongs 'di mchog yino//gang gi tshe klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa mtshon thams cad zad par gyur pa de'i tshe na dris 'brog gnas parnams pa
47a4('dul ba): dang /tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis kun tu me mngon par sprul nas/klu a mri'i chu ngogs pas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi rkang pa'i drung 'ba' shig zhi bar
47a5('dul ba): mthong ba ma gtogs par thams cad kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong nas de tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs ga la ba der
47a6('dul ba): so ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces smraso//btsun pa legs 'ongs ci'i slad du/bdag la mtho 'tsham par mdzad/dga' ba'i chos can
47a7('dul ba): kho ba khyod la mtho 'tsham pa ma yin gyi khyod kho bo la tho 'tsham ste/gal te kho bos yon tan gyi tsho gas 'di lta bu thob par ma gyur du zin na khyod kyis der kho na
47b1('dul ba): ming las lhag ma ma lus par byed par 'gyur//des smras pa/btsun pa legs 'ongs bdag gi ci bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsopa/bzhin bzangs chur shog bcom ldan
47b2('dul ba): 'das kyi spyan sngar song la skyabasu 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag ling shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs legs 'ongs kyis klu a mu'i chu ngogs pa lhung bzed du bcug
47b3('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das go la ba dor song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mthi' gcig tu 'dug/mtha' ga cig
47b4('dul ba): tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa k+Sha amra'i chu ngogs pa de'i 'di lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis
47b5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/bzhin bzangs khyod re shig nyes par spyad pas/da ltar dud 'gro'i skye gnas ngan par skyes shing /drag shul can lag pa dmar bsnun pa dang rab
47b6('dul ba): tu snun pa la zhugs pa gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa gzhan gyi srog gcod du 'jug pa gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed pa yin pas/khyod 'di nas shrI 'phos pa'i 'gro ba ni cir
47b7('dul ba): 'gyur/skye ba ni cir 'gyur/tshe phyi ma ni cir 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/bzhin bzangs khyod tshur shog la nga'i spyan
48a1('dul ba): sngar skyabasu 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag long la chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la mi 'jigs pa byin cig/btsun pa
48a2('dul ba): bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag len cing /deng slan chad nas chu srin byis po gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la mi 'dzi
48a3('dul ba): pa stsol to//de nas chu srin byos pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bya mo lab mang po thogs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi
48a4('dul ba): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu 'khod do//mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rI pa'i bram ze dang /khyim
48a5('dul ba): bdag rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis klu a mA'i chu ngogs pa btul tam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ngas klu a mra'i chu ngogs
48a6('dul ba): ba ma btul te dge slong legs 'ongs kyis/klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa btul to//btsun pa legs 'ongs gang gis/chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi bu
48a7('dul ba): legs 'ongs kyis so//de na kha cig gis smras pa/bdag cag gi bu legs 'angs yin no//kha cig gis smras pa/khe tsog gi tsha bo yin no//kha cig gis smras pa/bdag cag
48b1('dul ba): nang po yin no//kha cig gis smras pa/bdag cag gi chung ba grogs kyi bu yin zhes de dag gis de la bya mo la ba mang po phulo//de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri bra'i bram ze dang
48b2('dul ba): ma bdag rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas
48b3('dul ba): to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas/btsun pa legs 'ongs la brten te/dgung bdun du bdag cag gi mchod pa'i dbang du bgyis pa'i gdugs tshod gsol
48b4('dul ba): bar ci gnang /bcom ldan 'das kyis chu sprin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams le cang mo gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang
48b5('dul ba): khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang der rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas
48b6('dul ba): dring ngo //chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ro la khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi chung po grogs bram ze skal khas sdigs pa zhig 'dug pa de klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa'i 'jigs pas bros te/mnyan yang
48b7('dul ba): du song ba de ka sa lor byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis glang po che'i chang pa'i blar brnyes te bzhi go//de bya ba zhig gi phyir chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir phyin pa dang des ji ltar khyim
49a1('dul ba): dag rtogs ldan gyi bu btsun pa legs 'ongs kyisak+Sha a m+bu'i chu ngogs la 'artul ba thos so//thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs gal ba dUr
49a2('dul ba): song ste phyin nus tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi rkeng pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'du'o//mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs
49a3('dul ba): la bram ze des 'di skad ces smraso//btsun pa lags 'ongs kyis sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /bram ze chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze
49a4('dul ba): dang khyim badrug rnams kyis kho bo las brten nas/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhag bdun du mchod pa'i dbang du byas pa'i gdugs tshod la spyan
49a5('dul ba): drangs kyis mi 'chi lo//bram zes smras pa gal te khyod kyis da mi gnang na gang gi tshe khyod mnyan yod du byon par gyur pa/de'i tshe ni khyod kyis dang po khro nar bdag
49a6('dul ba): bsod snyoms gsol bar mdzod cig/tshe dang ldan po legs 'ongs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/de langs te spong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das chu srin byis pa gsod
49a7('dul ba): kyi ri ra tsi dgyes par bzhugs nas mnyan yod ge la ba der log su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyen yod du byon nas mnyan yod/
49b1('dul ba): du rgyal byed kyi chol mgon mod zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs
49b2('dul ba): pon mnyan yod du byon nas/mnyan yod du rgyal byed kyi tshal bdag gi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shos tho so//thos nas kyang mnyan yod nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das
49b3('dul ba): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug//mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das khyim
49b4('dul ba): bdag mgon med zos sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag por ston par mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng ba stod
49b5('dul ba): par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do//rnam grangs du myur chos dang ldan d+hi dkA'i mchi kyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag
49b6('dul ba): pur gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/cang mi gsung //de nas khyim bdag mgon med bsu sbyin spyan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
49b7('dul ba): log su thal mi sbyar ba btung nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gosol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas seng bdag gi sdum par
50a1('dul ba): gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas khyim bdag
50a2('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang me gsung bas gnang bar rig nAs/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das
50a3('dul ba): kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //bram ze sprul khas sdigs pa des bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod ni rgyal
50a4('dul ba): byed kyi tshil mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shes thos so//thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs gra la ba de song ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa
50a5('dul ba): legs 'ongs kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dugo//mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs bram ze de la chos dang ldan pa'i/
50a6('dul ba): gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par byed/yang dag par gzeng bstod par byed/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed//rnam grangs
50a7('dul ba): du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas
50b1('dul ba): cang mi smra'o//de nas bram ze de stan las langs te/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces
50b2('dul ba): smras//btsun pa legs 'ongs kyis srang bdag gi sbrum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci ga nang bram ze bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
50b3('dul ba): legs 'ongs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bram ze de bdag gi gan du mchis te bdag sang sdom pa gzhan du 'tshal ma la gA yar 'dren na mchid kyis
50b4('dul ba): 'tshal lam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sngar mgron du bos pas bdag gir bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis/bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blang
50b5('dul ba): de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis cang mi skye bas dang du blangs par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te tshe
50b6('dul ba): dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi drung nas song ngo //de nas khyim pa dag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang /bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa sta gon byed
50b7('dul ba): du bcug nas nang par sngar longs te gdan ba shams shong chu ra bzhag nas/bcomo ldan 'das la sbyin 'dren gyis btsun pa gdugs tshod gsol dgongs 'tshal no//
51a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dadwa de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes/spyan drang so//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga drA sham thabs gsol/lhung bzed
51a2('dul ba): da chos gos bsnams te/dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas khyim bdagra mgon med zas sbyin gyi bkad sa ga la
51a3('dul ba): ba der gshegs te byon nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso//bram ze des kyang tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi kha zos bsod pa sta gan
51a4('dul ba): byas//tshe dang ldan pa logs 'ongs kyang snga dro sham thabs bgos/lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas bram ze de'i bkadas ga la ba der song ste byin nas/stan bshams pa nyid
51a5('dul ba): la 'dugo/de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa legs phongs bde bar 'dug par rog nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kha zas bsod pas tshim par byaso//bram ze des bsams pa/
51a6('dul ba): btsun pa legs 'ongs kyis kha zas bsod pa zos pas 'ju ba ri ma nus snyam du reg nas/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces smras//btsun pa legs 'ongs rtsang
51a7('dul ba): gnan gsol lam/des smras pa/'thung ngo //bram ze des glang be che'i chang gi nang du 'dzub mo bcug ste/sgom gyi nang du krog krog dkrugs te/tshe dang ldan pa legs
51b1('dul ba): 'angasal bu//dgra brtsam pa dag nam bsams par shes pa drang mthong ba mi 'jug pas/tshe dang sngon po logs 'ongs kyis de'i thungs te/yon pa shad pa byas nas sman las langs tes
51b2('dul ba): ngo //de mnyan yod kyi srang re rjes g.yogs pa las thal nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dag gis lus la 'ag pa dang /ra rA nas de chang gi myos pa'i shugs kyis de brgyal to//sangs rgyas bcom
51b3('dul ba): ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel mi mnga' ba'i chos nyin rngan yin pas/bcom ldan 'das kyis der lo ma ma yin pa'i sbrul bu zhig sprul pa mdzad de dka go//de nas khyim bdag mgon med
51b4('dul ba): zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi/dge 'dun bde bar bzhug swA de rig nas bca' ba dang /bza' ba gtsang zhing bsad pas rang gi lag namatsham por byed rlabs par byed de/
51b5('dul ba): rnam grangs du mar btsa' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi la gnas sgrim par byas shing bslabs nas/bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol cing phyag btso bas lhung bzod
51b6('dul ba): bzhag par rig nas/spyan ches dpa' ba zhig smra sa te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyi ni la chos
51b7('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i dka' mchid kyis yang dag par sbyin par mdzod/yed dge pa na du 'dzun par mdzad/ya dag par gzeng brnyed par mdzodo/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
52a1('dul ba): mdzad do//rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mched kyis yang dag par bsdum/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/
52a2('dul ba): yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/yon bshad pa mdzad nas/gdan las bzhengs te gshegs nas/phyogs der byon to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon
52a3('dul ba): bar 'du mdzad pa de brtul nas dge sbyong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di ni gang gi klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa btul ba'i dge slong legs 'ongs shes bya ba de yin na/dge
52a4('dul ba): slong dag ji snyam du sems/dge slong legs 'ongs 'dis da ltar sbrul phyug kyang thul bar nus sam/btsun pa rngo mi thog go/dge slong dag de ltar na nyes dmigs 'di dang gzhan dag
52a5('dul ba): kyang myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba las 'byung bas dge slong dag nga la ston pa'o zhes zer ba dag gis myos par 'gyur ba tha na rtsa'i rtse mos kyang ltung ba mi bya zhing /glud par kyang mi bya'o//
52a6('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs sad par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/le gas 'ongs ci'i phyir 'di ltar gyur/bcom ldan 'das ma bsam so//bde bar
52a7('dul ba): gshegs pa ma bsam so//de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs te/byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//bzhun
52b1('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas phan yon ban+d+ha yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi ba
52b2('dul ba): bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyi 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/'bru'i chang dang /bcos po'i chang myos par 'gyur
52b3('dul ba): ba 'thung na ltung byed do//'bru'i chang zhes bya ba ni chan gyi btung ba dang /phebs kyi ltung ba'o//bcos pa'i cheng zhes bya bo ni rtsa ba'i bedUng ba dang /sdang bu'i btung ba dang /'dang mo'i btung ba dang
52b4('dul ba): me tog gi ltung ba dang /'bras bu'i btung po'o//de gnyis ka sres pa ni 'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang zhes bya'o//de 'thung na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o//ltung byed do zhes bya ba
52b5('dul ba): nI sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas dang ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu srab par byed 'tshod par byad lhung bar byed pa'o//go zhan yang rje
52b6('dul ba): smad du ltung ba de mo bshags shing so sor me bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/des na ltung byed do zhes gsung so//de la ltung ba ri ji ltar 'gyur zhe na dge slong
52b7('dul ba): myos par 'gyur ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa dang /myos par 'gyur ba'i dri dang ldan pa da /myos par 'gyur ba'i ro dang ldan pa dang /myos par 'gyur ba'i mang ba dang ldan pa
53a1('dul ba): 'thung na/'thungs na myos par 'gyur na ltung byed du 'gyur la/'thungs na myos par mi 'gyur na nyes byas su 'gyuraro//dge slong myos par 'gyur
53a2('dul ba): ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa dang /myos par 'gyur po'i dri dang ldan pa dang /myos par 'gyur ba'i ro dang ldan pa 'thung na/'thungs na myos par 'gyur na ltung byed du 'gyur la/
53a3('dul ba): 'thungs na myos par mi 'gyur ni nyos byas su 'gyur ro//mos par 'gyur ba'i kha dog 'ba' shig ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa 'thung ba la ni ltung ba med de/de yang tshwa nyid du gyur pa'o//
53a4('dul ba): dge slong 'bru'i chang 'thung na ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsos pa'i chang 'thung na ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'bru'i chang dang btses pa'i chang 'thung na ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong 'bru'i
53a5('dul ba): chang gi nr-i rdzi 'thung na ltung byed du 'ogyu ro//dge slong spang ma za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong tshigs ma za na ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dge slong phebs kyi tshing bu za na nyes byas su
53a6('dul ba): 'gyur ro//dge slong me tog dang 'bras bu myos par 'gyur ba dag zo na nyes byasu 'gyur ro//bskol pa 'thung ba dang /kha'i nang yod pa la sman pa'i lung gis khur bor srel pa
53a7('dul ba): dang /lus dag rgud pa la ltung ba medo//los dang po pa dang smos pa dang se mos 'khrugs pa dang tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/
53b1('dul ba): thetshom thams cad gcad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa lcags 'das kyis/las ci bgyis na/las de'i rnam par smyon pas phyug pa nar /
53b2('dul ba): mngal longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes/las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam por smin pas/mul to ba rnams kyi nang du zhugs shing nyes 'ongs shes bgyi ba'i ming du gyur/las
53b3('dul ba): ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas/bcom ldan 'das kyi ston pa la rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis/bcom
53b4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' spel pa/dge slong dag rigs kyi bu legs 'ongs nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su sbyar ba/'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon men
53b5('dul ba): bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas legs 'ongs nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/dge slong dag las
53b6('dul ba): byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur
53b7('dul ba): gyis/'di ltar las dge bo dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin po'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskal
54a1('dul ba): brgyar yang ni//chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus//rnyed na lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dag sngon byung
54a2('dul ba): ba 'das pa'i dus na/ri brags shig na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod tsha bzhog 'dug pa de/'khor dang bcas te/bskyed mos tshal gyi sa ru byung ngo //sangs
54a3('dul ba): rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe/rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /bkren pa la rje su snying brtse ba/bas mthapa gnas mal la dka' ba/bAse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig
54a4('dul ba): rten gyi yon gnasu gyur pa dag 'jig rten du myongango //rang sangs rgyas na ba zhig ri bregs der bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas de thag ring
54a5('dul ba): po kho na nas mthong nas/de zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag rab tu byung ba 'di skrod cig/de dag las 'ga' lngarang sangs rgyas de skrod par spro ba med nas//
54a6('dul ba): khyim bdag des spyos te/stan las langs te rang nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas de'i gnya'o bo nas bzung ste skud nas smras pa/nyes 'ongs mul to ba rnams kyi nang du zhugs
54a7('dul ba): shing ces phul ba dang /de phyag dar gyi phung po'i nang du skyel to//rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsams pa/khyim bdag nyon mongs pa 'di ha cang smras pa dang/
54b1('dul ba): nyams par gyur na mi rung gi 'di la lug nas drang ba skyon snyam nas/des dang pa'i rgyu la po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi na mkha' la mngon par 'phags nus 'bar ba dang gsul ba/
54b2('dul ba): dang char 'bebs pa dang /glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya ba brtsam so//so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul lo myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas/khyim bdag dri shing ljon pa
54b3('dul ba): rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du skyel nas smras po/yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa/maur gshegasu gsol/mar gshegasu gsol/
54b4('dul ba): nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba bdag gi sug pa nas drang ba stsal du gsol/rlung sangs rgyas de khyim bdag de la rjesu snying brtse ba'i phyir/steng gi na mkha' las shing du bab so/
54b5('dul ba): khyim bdag des de la mchod po byas nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/smon lam 'di skad ces bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa/'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i
54b6('dul ba): lus de'i cha dang 'thun par ma gyur par mchod pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtse ba 'dis bdag phyug pa nor meng pa longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skye zhing 'di pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i
54b7('dul ba): ston pa nanyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig ces smon lom btab bo//dge slong dag de la de'i mode'i dus ni khyim bdag
54'a1('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni legs 'ongs 'di yin te/'dis rang sangs rgyas de la mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa/gang yin pa de'i rnam par smin pas
54'a2('dul ba): ni da ltar phyug la nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes//gnod pa byas pa dang /nyes 'ongs shes brjod pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni bskal par sems
54'a3('dul ba): can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gdungs nas las de nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mul to pa nyid kyis 'phyan par gyur cing nyes 'ongs zhes bya bar gyur te//da ltar gyi bar
54'a4('dul ba): du yang tshul to pa rnams kyi nang du zhugs shing nyes 'ongs shes bya ba'i ming du gyur to//bdag yon gnas yang dog par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i
54'a5('dul ba): las de'i cha dang 'thun par ma gyur par 'dri bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing /thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur
54'a6('dul ba): cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cod spangs pas dag bcom pa nyid mngon du byas
54'a7('dul ba): shing 'dis ring sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byaso//btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs
54'b1('dul ba): kyis las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan/de yang smon lam
54'b2('dul ba): gyi dbang gis te/gang du smon lam btab ce na/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ston pa de bzhin
54'b3('dul ba): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med
54'b4('dul ba): pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste/de bA ra ni sa na drang srong smra ba ri dogs kyo nags ni nye bar brten cing bzhugaso//
54'b5('dul ba): de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas/dge slong gang gis de rab tu byung ba'i dge slong de de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis
54'b6('dul ba): yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to//de na 'dis tshe ji srid par tshad pe spyod pa spyad nas ljon gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas/de
54'b7('dul ba): 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam 'di skad ces bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yong dag rdo n+do&pI sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung
55a1('dul ba): la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste/bdag gi tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
55a2('dul ba): 'dis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus ni skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya
55a3('dul ba): thub par gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten
55a4('dul ba): mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i
55a5('dul ba): bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyo na mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed cing ji ltar mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
55a6('dul ba): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ad srung gis yang dang yid du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bsnyen pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom
55a7('dul ba): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa shAkya seng+ge shAkya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo des yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces gdab
55b1('dul ba): bar brtsams pas smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jugs rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to//dge slong dag de lta
55b2('dul ba): bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa rnams yin la/las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/
55b3('dul ba): las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mi yino//dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren me rnams springs te/las gcig tu dkar ba
55b4('dul ba): rnams la spel bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//myos par gyur pa 'thung ba'i ltung byed de bdun cu dgu pa rdzogs so////bar
55b5('dul ba): sdom la/zhi ba ral bu nor bu dang //sman pa dge 'dun lho dang skas//za dang gnyis gyur gtu mo dang //gzhan nu lhung bzed ste bas rnamaso//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod
55b6('dul ba): ni rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba nA bzhugs so//ri brags shigra na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des mnyan yod pa'i bu mo zhig bag mar blangs nas/de de dang
55b7('dul ba): lhan tsog rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed do//de la bu mo zhig byung nas de bsrings shing bskyed de chen mor gyur to//bram ze de la re zhig mnyan yod du
56a1('dul ba): bya ba zhig byung nas/des shing rta bcas te 'phags pa dang bu mo des mthong nas des smras pa/yab gar bzhud bram zes smras pa/bu mo mnyan yod dos
56a2('dul ba): bu mos smras pa/yab bdag kyang mchi'o//bram zes smras pa/bu mo khyod da mchog 'thob pa yin pas khyod kyi lag pa 'am/rkang pa la 'ga' zhig gis reg par gyur na
56a3('dul ba): bdag cag la mi snyan par 'gyur gyis khyod 'di nyid na 'dug shig/bu mo des ngu bar brtsams pa dang /bram ze mos smras pa/bu mo ci'i phyir du/bu mos smras pa/yab
56a4('dul ba): mnyan yod du bzhud nas bdag der khrod par me bzhad de//bram ze mos smras pa/rje'i sras bu mo yang khrid cig dang /nye du dag mthong bar 'gyur ro//bram zes smras pa/
56a5('dul ba): bu mo da mchog 'thob par 'gyur bas 'di'i lag pa'am/rkang pa la 'ga' zhig gis rag par gyur na bdag cag la mi snyan par 'gyur gyis 'di nyid du zhog shig/
56a6('dul ba): bram ze mos smras pa/rje'i sras dang thabs cig mchi na legs par sbas pa dang /legs par srung bar 'gyur ro//bram ze des bu mo de shing rtar bcug ste/'phags
56a7('dul ba): pa dang /bu mo de ltad mo'i rang bzhin can yin pas/pha la dris pa/yab 'di su'i kun dga' ra ba lags/'di su'i rdzing bu lags/'di sri'i lha khang lags/
56b1('dul ba): 'di su'i bskyed mos tshal lags/'di su'i khron pa lags/'dri su'i gtsug lag khang lags/bram zes smras pa/bu mo 'di ni shAkya'i bu dge sbyong rnams kyi bsti gnas yi no//
56b2('dul ba): bu mos smras pa/yab ltar mchi'o//bram zes smras pa/bu mo bsti gnas 'di na rigs sna tshogs dang /rus sna tshogs las rab tu byung ba dag 'khod pas/khyod kyi lag pa 'am
56b3('dul ba): rkang pa la 'ga' zhig gis reg par gyur na/bdag la mi snyan par 'gyur gyis tshur shog 'dong ngo zhes de 'phags pa dang /ji tsam na grong bar de nyid nas bramo ze dang /khyim
56b4('dul ba): bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po gtsug lag khang lta 'dod pa dag mnyan yod kyi phyi rol du byung ba de dag gis/bram ze de mthong nas/de dag gis smras pa/snum zungs byon po leg so//
56b5('dul ba): byon pa leg so//khyod yun ring me rong mo zhig gis gar bzhud/bram zes smras pa/kho bo khyed cag nyid ltar 'ongs na/khyed cag gar 'dong /rgyal byed kyi tshal du gtsug
56b6('dul ba): log khang ltar mchi'o//sru cag tsha mo 'di yang khrid de deng la/'di la yang gtsug lag khong ston cig/bu mo de yang de dag dang lhan cig rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo //
56b7('dul ba): drug sde dag gis kun tu spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos bstan par bya/rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad
57a1('dul ba): par bya/rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o snyam pas/drug sde dag las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas/
57a2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha nang par sngar longs te/so shing bor nas snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te/rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'drog/drug sde dag gi grong khyer chen po
57a3('dul ba): drug po dag na 'khod pa'i mi rnams 'di lta ste/rigs las sam/rus las sam/rgyud las sa mo/ming las sam/gzugs las sam/bzo las sam/'tsho ba
57a4('dul ba): las mi shes pa'am/ma mthong ba'am/ma thos pa'am/ma rig pa'am/rnam par mi shes pa 'ga' yang med pas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi
57a5('dul ba): chung ma rab tu mang po de dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smraso//che ge mo'i ma/che ge mo'i chung ma/che ge mo'i mna' ma/che ge mo'i bu mo/che ge mo'i
57a6('dul ba): sring mo/'ongs pa legs so//'ongs pa leg so//khyed cag ci'i phyir yun ring mo ri monA zla ba ltar rgyu ba byed/de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa 'char kha bcom ldan 'das kyis mi khom pa
57a7('dul ba): brgyad ni gang zag gis tshang bar spyad pa'i dus ma logs so zhes legs par rab tu gsungs na bdeg tsog ni 'di lta ste khyim gyi 'du 'dzi dang ldan pas mi khom pa dgu pa lad so//'char
57b1('dul ba): khas smras pa/sring mo dag khyer kyi 'ga' zhig 'di skad ce/dug can la sogs rgyal po yis//bya ba dag ni ma byas par//de dag nyid dang bya ba rnams//zhig pa nyid du gyur pa yin//bya ba de dag
57b2('dul ba): nyid kyang ni//yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par//'jig rten dag po 'chi bdag de//'ongs pa nyid du 'gyur ba yo ni//zhes smras pa ma thos sam/de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa 'char kha de'i
57b3('dul ba): slad du bdag cag bskyed mos tshal du mchis te/rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'jug pa dang /gtsug lag khang blta ba dang /bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs
57b4('dul ba): la phyag 'tshal ba'i slad du mchis lag so//'char khos smras pa/sring mo dag gal te khyed cag de'i phyir 'ongs na/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang
57b5('dul ba): ba ra ba'o zhes gsungs pas legaso legaso//sring mo dag de ni 'jal gyis 'di ltar ltad mo ji ltar blta bar dro bir bya'o//sring mo dag khyed cag gang du 'jug par byed/btsun pa 'char kha
57b6('dul ba): bdag cag kun dga'i ra bar 'jug cing gtsug lag khang blta bar 'tsha lo//sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis/mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dang bas//sangs rgyas mchod rten dag la
57b7('dul ba): gom 'dor ni//'dzam+bu chu bo gser ltar srang tshad ni//stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa yin//zhes gsungs pas de yang legaso//sring mo dag khyed kyis gang khyed cag gtsug lag
58a1('dul ba): khang ston par byed pa'i dge slong 'ga' zhig btsal tam/'phags pa ci bdag cag sgron ma sdug pa na thogs bzhin du nugs gzhan du tshol lam/btsun
58a2('dul ba): pa 'char kha sbas te dge slong gzhan gal tshol/khyod pas gzhan khyad par 'phags pa su zhig mchis kyis/khyod nyid kyis bstan du gsol/de nis tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha 'di
58a3('dul ba): snyam du sems te/gal te 'di dag gtsug lag khang bstan par bya na ni bdag gi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par yang 'gyur/gal te bstan par mi bya na ni tshig pa'i bsod
58a4('dul ba): snyoms kyang ster bar mi 'gyur la/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma dad pa rnams dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya btul bar bya gzud par bya rab tu bkod
58a5('dul ba): par bya'o zhes gsungs pas/de'i phyir 'di dag dge ba la dri par sbyar bar byas/rnam pa thams cad du bstan par bya'o snyam du rig nas dros me tog dang /bdug spos la sogs
58a6('dul ba): pa mchod pa sna tshogs thogs te bgo phor lag tu blangs nas/go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par brnams to//sring ma dag 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang ste/
58a7('dul ba): gang du bcom ldan 'das nyin lan gsum mtshan len gsum sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan gyi 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas gang ni nyams par 'gyur/gang ni/
58b1('dul ba): 'phel bar 'gyur/gang ni gnod par 'gyur/gang ni nyams dbyar gyur/gang ni mi bde bar gyur/gang ni gnod pa dang /nyam nga ba dang /mi bde bar gyur/gang ni ngan song la gzhol/
58b2('dul ba): gang ni ngan so la 'bab/gang ni ngan song la bab/gang ni ngan song gi lAm nas bslangs te/mtho ris dang thar pa dang /'bras bu la bzhag par bya/'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba gang
58b3('dul ba): gi lag nas ni drang bar bya/'phags pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral ba gang ni 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la bzhag par bya/gang gi sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten ni
58b4('dul ba): 'bras bu dang bcas par bya/gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dog ma skyes pa ni bskyed par bya/dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa gang ni yongs su smin par bya/yongs su smin pa gang ni rnam par grol
58b5('dul ba): bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa 'jug cing 'di ltar/chu srin gonas kyi dug can pa//dus las 'da'o bar 'gyur srid kyis//sangs rgyas gdul la byams pa ni//dus las 'da'
58b6('dul ba): bar mi 'gyu ro//ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gcig pu la//rtag cing de sogro srung bar byed pa ltar//de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gdul ba'i skye bo lo//rtog par mdzod cing de srog srung bar mdzad//
58b7('dul ba): kun mkhyen rgyud la mnga' ba'i thugs rje yi//gzhon ma gdul ba'i be'u tshel mo skyo ste//srid dang ngan 'gros nyams la byams pa ni//rab nyams be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no//
59a1('dul ba): mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs po mi mnga' ba//khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' ba/'khor gyi nang du sing+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis/
59a2('dul ba): 'di'i zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya'i gtsug lag khang ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten mi shes pa'i mun pa dang 'dren pa
59a3('dul ba): med pa dang /yongs su 'dren pa med na/de'i dang por ye shes kyi mig sman gyi thur mas/gang gi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyangs pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rnams
59a4('dul ba): dang /rgyal tsha ba lta bu rnams dang /yun ring po nas rab tu byung ba rnams dang /tshangs par sprod pa mngon par sbed pa rnams/snum sbar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyi
59a5('dul ba): mchog tu lung bstan pa gang yin pa/gang gi rgyud la de'i dang bar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten du dge slong ngom/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam//tshangs pa'am/
59a6('dul ba): sus kyang chos dang 'thun pa bskor mi nus pa/chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'gro ba mang po'i don dang /skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /bde ba dang /'jig rten la rjes su
59b1('dul ba): thugs rtse ba dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir ldan gsum du bzlas te/rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol
59b2('dul ba): cig/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i gtsug lag khang ste/bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu rmon pa dor stong gcig gis mchog pa spangs te rab tu byung ba/dbyig bye ba
59b3('dul ba): phrag drug cu dang ldan pa gser nas bang chung brgyad cu bdog pa/bran kye grong bco brgyad bdog pa/sbyor ba'i grong bcu drug bdog pa/ser skya bzang mo lus gser bas lhagau pa
59b4('dul ba): dang ldan pa/'chilA ma'i thal ba smin pa ltar spangs te mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la ras sbyar ma'i snom sbyar rin thang 'bum ri ba thogs te/'jig rten na dgra bcom pa gang dag
59b5('dul ba): bzhugs pa de dag gi phyir rab tu byung ba bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge la dzi nI dang /snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed pa'i phyir nags na rtun pa gang yin pa/gang mthong
59b6('dul ba): na spos kyi glang po che dag kyang rgyags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba gang gi bu mangs kyi mchod rten du ston par khas blangs nas dge slong gi sdom pa thob pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge
59b7('dul ba): slong dag nga'i nyin thos kyi dge slong 'dod pa chung ba chog shes pa sbyang ba'i yon tan smra ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di yin te/'di lta ste/dge slong 'od srung chen po'i zhes
60a1('dul ba): gsungs shing /bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bsngags pa gang yin pa/de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig/'di ni tshe dang
60a2('dul ba): ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gtsug lag khang ste/mchog thob pa'i bu gang yin pa gang lo brgyad gnyisu dbang po'i brda sprod pa blags pa/rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa/bcom
60a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab chen po rnams dang /spobs pa chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa/bcom ldan 'das
60a4('dul ba): kyis 'jig rten thams cad gang gi cha bcu drug par bzhag cing /bcom ldan 'das kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa ma rtogs par//'jig rten kun gyi shes rab gang //shA
60a5('dul ba): ri'i bu yi shes rab kyis//bcu drug char yang mi chog go/gal te lha bcas 'jig rten 'di//shA ri'i bu dang mnyam gyur pas//de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi//
60a6('dul ba): bcu drug char yang mi mchog//zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis/'dir yang zhabs la byug tshol cig/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa mo d+gal gyi bu chen po'i gtsug lag
60a7('dul ba): khang ste/mdun na 'don gyi bu cod pan med pa'i rgyal srid spangs te rab tu byung ba gang yin pa gang gis lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed rkang pa g.yas
60b1('dul ba): pa'i mab bos lan gsum du bsgral kun tu bskul/kun tu rab tu bskul ba/gang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du nyin mtshan bdun gyis/
60b2('dul ba): gshegs pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang mabu chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig/
60b3('dul ba): 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i gtsug lag khang ste/mi bskal pa bzang po las rab tu byung ba gang yin pa/bcom ldan 'das kyi yab kyi mched kyi sras gang gi ming yang dag par
60b4('dul ba): bsgrags pas tshang pa dag rgya mtsho chen po nas bzhin pa'i snod legs par grub cing 'ong bar 'gyur pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i
60b5('dul ba): yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag tshol cig/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gtsug lag khang ste/yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen dkur ba gang yin pa sangs rgyas
60b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis zham ridra na nye bar spyod pa/ston pas yang dag par bsngags pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams kyi yang dag par bskur ba gang yin pa/bcom
60b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi yab kyi mched kyi sras la rab tu byung ba/bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams kyis/thos pa 'dzin pa rnams dang /thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog
61a1('dul ba): tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga'i gtsug lag khang ste/bcom ldan 'das
61a2('dul ba): kyi gnung po sru'i sras las rab tu byung ba/gal te rab tu ma byung na stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba/bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung /dbang po dge gi sgo
61a3('dul ba): bsdams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis/'dir yang zha ba sa la phyag dag tshol cig/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyi gtsug lag khang ste//
61a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi sras las rab tu byung ba/gal te rab tu ma byung na mthu dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba gang yin pa gang rab tu byung ba rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi rgyud
61a5('dul ba): cig nas cig tu rgyud pa yang dag par rgyud chad pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa rnams dang /bslab pa la gus pa rnams dang /bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa
61a6('dul ba): thob pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis/'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i gtsug lago khang //'di ni nye
61a7('dul ba): dga'i 'o//'di ni 'dun pa'i 'o//'di ni 'gro 'gyogs kyi'o//'di ni nab so'i 'o//'di ni kho bo'i gtsug lag khang ngo //ci 'di yang blta bar byed dam/'phags pa ci bdag
61b1('dul ba): cag gi gtsug lag khang thams cad bltas nas/gdod 'phags pa 'char kha'i gtsug lag khang blta bar mi bgyi'am/bdag cag gis 'phags pa 'char kha'i gtsug lag
61b2('dul ba): khang 'di da shin tu blta bar bgyi'o//sring mo dag de bzhin gyis shig/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha de 'dod chags spyad pa yin pas de'i gtsug lag khang gi sa gzhi mon sran gre'i
61b3('dul ba): phye mas bskus pa dang /rtsig pa bkra she di nye bar bkra ba dang /mal stan be'u phrug gi snying po can ba shams pa dang /bu ma pa btung bas bkang ba bcu snod dang bcas pa bzhig
61b4('dul ba): pau dang /dkon pa'i nang na bca' ba sna tshogs kyis gang ba dag yod do//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po rang gi gtsug lag khang du
61b5('dul ba): 'ongs pa rnams la smras pa/sring mo dag ci dza khye'u sus bya'am/'on te btung ba 'thung /'phags pa ci chu klung zlog phyogasu 'bab bam/bdag cag gis 'phags pa la
61b6('dul ba): gsol bar bgyi ba gang lags pa de nyid 'phags pas bdog cag la stsol ta ma/'di ltar bdag cag le gang dkon pa de stsol cig/sring mo dag khyed cag la ci zhig dkon//
61b7('dul ba): 'phags pa chos mnyan pa'o//sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas drug po dag 'jig rten du byung ba ni ngo mchir smad du byung ba yin te/drag po de dag gang zhe na/de bzhin
62a1('dul ba): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba dang /mi nyid dang /
62a2('dul ba): dbus pa'i gnas skye ba dang /dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang /dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'o zhes legs par gsungs pas de'i phyir khyed cag dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa skyes pa
62a3('dul ba): 'di ni/sangs rgya so 'byung ba dang 'dra ste/legaso//legaso//sring mo dag 'khod cig dang kho bo khyed la chos bstan par bya'o//de dag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal//
62a4('dul ba): twe/chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod pa dang /des de dag la chos bstan par brtsam so//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa////bam po re drug pa//bu mo
62a5('dul ba): de yang ltad mo'i rang bzhin can yin pas ri mo blta zhing gzhan du song ngo //de dag gis kyang chos mnyan nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal to//
62a6('dul ba): gtsug lag khang nas phyung ngo //bu mo des gzhan dag byung ba cher nas/sgo khang de nyid na ri mo blta zhing 'dugo//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas de dag bskyal na so gtsug lag khang
62a7('dul ba): du bajug par brtsams pa dang /des bu mo de sgo khang na 'dug pa mthong nas des de la smras pa/bu mo khyod ma song ngam des 'dzum byung ba dang /'char khas de lta ngo byas
62b1('dul ba): te yan lag dang nyos lag dag rnams kun tu mnan so//bu mo de ngu zhing phyir byung nas pa'i gan du song ste smras pa/yab bdag dge sbyong 'char khas gzhon nu ma dang bral bar bgyiso//
62b2('dul ba): bram ze des bsams pa/gal te de cung zad smar ni bdag gcig bu yin la 'di dag ni mang bas bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yong bar
62b3('dul ba): 'gyur gyis/gang du grogs rnyed par gyur pa na ra mda' zlog par bya'o snya mo//rgyul byed kyi tshal dang mnyan yod kyi bor na gnas kyi shing ljon pa zhig yod pa de'i drung na bram ze'i
62b4('dul ba): khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug cing 'dug nas/bram ze des/de dag la smras pa/shes ldan dag dge sbyong 'char khes kho bos bu mo gzhon nu ma dang bral
62b5('dul ba): bor byas kyis khyed cig kho bo'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis grogs gyis shig/bram ze dag ni yongasu mi rtog po yin pas de dag dbyug pa dag thogs te der
62b6('dul ba): dong ngo //tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyal byed kyi tshil gyi sgo na 'o chag cing 'dug pa de dag gis bzung zhing bkri bar brtsams pa dang /de dag gis de bskul byar yang ma nus so//
62b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas de'i stobs dbri bar mdzad pa dang /de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha phar drangs tshur drangs te khrid do//tshe dang ldan pa
63a1('dul ba): 'char khrus bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gnod pa dang /nyam nga ba dang mi bde ba byung ba la mi dgong so snyam pa da/bcom ldan 'das
63a2('dul ba): kyis dgongs pa 'di la gdam pa'i tha ma 'di yin pas khrid kyang bla'o snyam du dgongaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang
63a3('dul ba): bzangs kyi gzhir rtogs pa na gnyid log cing 'dug pas gol gyi sgras smad par mdzad nas bka' stsale pa/rgyal po chen po khyed kyis gyo tsam du mi bya bor logs par rtag
63a4('dul ba): par bya'o zhes go bar mdzad//bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir gtogs pa na gnyid log cing 'dug pa lan
63a5('dul ba): gnyis lan gsum du se gol gyi sgras sred par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gya tsom du mi bya bar legs par brtag par bya'o zhes go bar mdzad do//
63a6('dul ba): bram ze de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'tshar ka rgyal po'i pho brang gi skor khrid do//de na rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag bram ze rnams kyis dge sbyong 'char
63a7('dul ba): ka bzung ste rgyal po'i sgor khrid de 'ongs so zhes sgra mthon po dge sgra chen po 'byin te//ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang bzengs kyi gzhir gtogs pa na
