63b1('dul ba): gaspyongad ldog pasgrub la matsa tshogs ngas sa nas des na shes 'tsho ba dag la smras pa/shes rdzun dag na'i phyir ba phal ba tsho tshogs 'ad+mo dag sgra 'thun po durmA ldan pa 'byin par byang /
63b2('dul ba): dedag gis smras pa/lha btsun pa 'char kha dang bram ze'i bu mo zhig dang bram ze zhig dang bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam rgyal po'i pho brang gi chab sgon blag tsor mchi zhing mchis so//
63b3('dul ba): kaM sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di las dgongs nas bdogu la rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gya tsam du mi bya bar legs par brtag
63b4('dul ba): par bya'o zhes bka' stsal to snyam do rigo/mnyan yod na chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe rtsod pa chen po 'byung ba de'i tshe na rdo bo che rdung zhing dod sgrol ma yang 'bred par byed pas/rgyal
63b5('dul ba): gsol rgyal gyis zho shas 'tshe ba dag la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag rnga bo yang rdung zhig/dung skyil ma yang dus shig/de dag glos rnga bo che rdungs shing du sgrol ma bus pa dang /
63b6('dul ba): rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor 'dus par gyur te//rgyal pos smras pa/bram de dang btsun pa'i'achar kha nang du tha~M shig/de gnyis nang du 'ongs pa dang /rgyal pos bram ze'i
63b7('dul ba): smras pa/bram ze khyod ci zer/lha dge sbyong 'tshor kas bdag gi bu mo zhig gnoni nu ma dang bral bar bgyiso//rgyal pos smras pa/btsun pa 'char ka bram ze 'dzin
64a1('dul ba): skad mchi na khyod ci gsung /lha bdag gis de la sdig pa'i las ma bgyis//rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag 'di ji ltar spyad par
64a2('dul ba): bya/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod nyid spobs pa can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags pas lta nyid kyi zhal me chu 'di bgum du gsol/
64a3('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag 'di la ji ltar shes pas ni gzugs dag mthong mod/btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bu mo brtag mod/bu mo de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du thong la
64a4('dul ba): rtog tu chug shig/de dag gi bu mo de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du btang ba dang /bu mo phreng ldan mas bu mo de pang par bskal te/smras pa/bu mo bden par smos shi ka/
64a5('dul ba): gal te khyod btsun pa 'char khas gzho nu ma dang bral bar byas na yang de ni bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba yin pas khyod kyi khyim thab kyi thab rir 'bab par 'gyur//
64a6('dul ba): den te khyod phyugs chung ma smras pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin na ni dge slong la yang dag pa ma yin pas bskur na sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyu ro//bu mo des smras
64a7('dul ba): pa/rje mo bdag des gzhon nu ma dang bral bar ma bgyis te/'di ltar des 'o bgyis shing yan lag dang nying lag dag kun tu mnom so//btsun mo 'phreng ldan mas smras pa
64b1('dul ba): mo khyod kyis don de tsam zhig la rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor kun tu dkrug so//ci pha dag kyang bu mo dag lnga 'o byed cing yan lag dang nying lag dag la min ma/kun tu mi no ma mam//
64b2('dul ba): nas bud med rgan mo rnams kyis bu mo de brtags na ji tsam na phyugs chung ma nyams par gyur nas/de dag gis rgyal po la smras pa/lha bu mo 'di phyugs chung mnyam so//rgyal pos blon
64b3('dul ba): rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag 'di la gang yus/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha btsun pa 'char ku yu so//rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag deng la bram ze 'di rgyu skegs
64b4('dul ba): kyi khang par chug la/mes sregs shig/bu mo de yang d+he'u dmu rgod kyi rkang pa gnyis la thogs shog/bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag kyang lag pa dang rkang pa dag tshod cig/tshe dang ldan
64b5('dul ba): pa 'char kas smras pa/lha gral te bdag la rten te sems can de snyed cig tsha ba stsal bar gyur na/don gyis ltos bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa las phyung lag so//rgyal pos
64b6('dul ba): smras pa/shes ldan dag 'o na deng las bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya pi de dag thong la/bram ze 'di ni rgya skegs kyi khang par chug la mes sregs shig/bu mo de yang rte'u dmu rgod kyi rkang
64b7('dul ba): po gnyis la thogs shig/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kos smras po/lha gal te bdag la brten te tha na grogs sam phra mo 'ga' zhig la gnod par gyur na yang don gyis ltos bdag
65a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa las phyung ba kho na lags so//rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'dod
65a2('dul ba): chag dang ma bral na yang so sor rtogs pa'i stobs la ltos/gal te bram ze dag gis btsun pa 'cha re ka thub par gyur na ni rdo cig kyang bsad par 'gyu ro//shes ldan dag deng la
65a3('dul ba): thams cad khye shig/de dag bkye gnas 'gyes dza brdungs shing yol bas bcad pa dang /skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dge so sor gyeso//rgyal po dang btsun mo phreng ldan mang
65a4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha gsum 'dug pa na/rgyal pos btsun mo phreng ldan ma la smras pa/phreng ldan ma btsun pa 'char kas ji ltar bu'i phan phun byas pas rgyal po dang
65a5('dul ba): bcas pa'i 'khor kun tu dkrugs pa la ltos/btsun mo phreng ldan mes tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/btsun pa 'char ka khyod pas slad kyis rab tu byung ba dge slong
65a6('dul ba): ma ud pa la'i mdog dang dge tshul bskul byed dang dge tshul ma tsi ri ka dang gzhan yang mang po gang lags pa de dag thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas
65a7('dul ba): dag bcom pa nyid mdog du bgyis na/khyod kyis ni rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyi nang du mi mdzes pa 'di lta bu bgyis par gyur kyang da dung skyo ba mi mnga' 'am/
65b1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/phreng ldan mad byin chad 'khor bur 'khor ba na nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun tu spyod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas de stan las langs te
65b2('dul ba): song ngo //de ngo tsha bas bcom ldan 'das dang phrad par ma nus nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso//mkhan po ji
65b3('dul ba): ltar bdag 'khor bar 'khor ba na nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun tu spyod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag la chos bstan tu gsol/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ltung ba
65b4('dul ba): lhag ma med pa byung bar ma gyur tam snyam na/ji tsam na des lhag mo yod par mthong nas/des de bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dge yin pa de dag kyang 'chagasu btsug/
65b5('dul ba): gdam par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang sdom du bcug nas/des de la 'di dang 'di ltar yid la gyis la bag yod pas skabs shig ces gdams ngag byin no//de
65b6('dul ba): nas tshe dang ljon pa 'char ka gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na/rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur
65b7('dul ba): smig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med po de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par
66a1('dul ba): shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas/bdag gi skye ba zad do//tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//bya ba byaso//srid pa 'di las gzhan mi sheso zhes go bar
66a2('dul ba): byed cing /dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/bong ba dang /gser du mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan+dan
66a3('dul ba): bzhag pa lta bu/rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /bkurare
66a4('dul ba): bsti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang rjed par bya ba dang mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dag
66a5('dul ba): bcom pa nyid thob cing rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyam su myong ba na 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das ni bdag la phan pa mdzad pa/bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag
66a6('dul ba): la legs par mdzad pa ste/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi chos mang po dag sel bar mdzad pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi bde ba'i chos mang po dag
66a7('dul ba): sgrub par mdzad pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma dag sel bar mdzad pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma dag
66b1('dul ba): sgrub par mdzad pa lags na/bdag gi ci zhig byas na des bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan byas pa dang /nye bar byas pa dang rab tu byas par 'gyur snyam nas/des yang bsams pa/
66b2('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dka' ba mdzad pa brgya stong du ma dag gis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs pa mdzad nas/bla na med pa'i
66b3('dul ba): mkhyen pa thugasu chud pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni sems can la phan pa'i phyir yin pas/bdag gis kyang sems can la phan pa bya'o snyam nas/des bsams pa/bcom
66b4('dul ba): sngon 'das kyis khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa 'ga' yod dam snyam na/des ji tsam na med par mthong ngo //su la ltos snyom na bdag nyid la ltos par mthong nas/
66b5('dul ba): legs kyis bdag gis ston pa'i thugs la dgongs pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o snyam//gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/mnyan yod na bram ze zhi ba la dad pa zhi ba la bsnyen
66b6('dul ba): bkur byed pa zhig 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bsams pa/bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yino snyam nas de de'i gan du song ba dang /bram ze des kyang zhi ba la bsnyen
66b7('dul ba): bkur byas nas/kyi bram ze bram ze zhes bram ze tshol bar byed do//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/kho bo bram ze yino//des smras pa la/bram ze ni thor tshug can gyi
67a1('dul ba): khyod ni dge sbyong mgo reg yin no//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/'di ltar kho bo bram ze yin zhing kho do'i ston pa yang bram ze'i mchog
67a2('dul ba): yin//khyod ni zhi ba 'di la mngon par dad dam/des smras pa/mngon par dad do//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/kA'e zhi ba smos shig/ji ltar kho bo bram ze srin
67a3('dul ba): zhing kho bo'i ston pa yang bramaza' mchog yin nam/zhi bas smras pa/'phags pa 'char ke de de bzhin te/khyod ni bram ze lags shing khyod kyi ston pa yang bram ze'i
67a4('dul ba): mchog lag ste//bram ze des bsams pa/bdag gis yu ni ring po nas zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byas na/'dis lon 'ga' rmi lam du yang ma bstan ni/btsun po 'char
67a5('dul ba): kas smras pa/tshig smra bar byed pas/kye ma btsun pa 'char kas smras pa/tshig smra bar byed pos/kye ma btsun pa 'char ka ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba yino snyam nas/des
67a6('dul ba): smras pa/btsun pa 'char ko ci'i slad du byon/khyod nyid 'dul ba'i don du'o//btsun po 'char ka de'i skad du 'di nyid du bzhug te zhal zla kyi bya ba mdzod cig/tshe dang ldan
67a7('dul ba): pa 'char ka de nyid du 'dug ste/zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang /bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa'i char ka'i mdun du chos mnyon pa'i phyir 'dug nas/
67b1('dul ba): dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas/'di ltar bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs
67b2('dul ba): la lte ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to//des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/btsun pa
67b3('dul ba): bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'cha re kas bdag lnga gong mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma
67b4('dul ba): bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi pho mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' shes
67b5('dul ba): dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni sems/rus pa'i ri dag ni bska la/ngan song gi sgo dag ni ba Sh+Ta pra/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye
67b6('dul ba): sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro yi dwags dag nA ni rkang pa phyung /lho dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag/'khor ba ni mthar bkyis/thog me mi mchi sde bya'i dus nas bas klas pa ji
67b7('dul ba): 'jig tshogaso la lta ba'i ra'i rtse mo nyi shu ma tho ba ye shes kyis rdo rjes pa tsam ste rmar te zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/btsun pa bdag ni mngon pa re zhug so//btsun pa
68a1('dul ba): /bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/btsun pa bdag bac+doMs dang cho sa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi yis/bdag dge bsnyen
68a2('dul ba): du bzung du gsol/de slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabasu mchi'o//btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod
68a3('dul ba): snyoms dang na bza' dang gnas mal dang srung ba'i rkyen dang sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci ga nang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khrus smras pa/rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pA
68a4('dul ba): rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so zhes smras te/dang du ma blangaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas mnyan yong///
68a5('dul ba): du bram ze'i khyim dang po gnyis ka nas btul cing bzhag go/tsha dang ldan pa 'tshor kas bsams pa/gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na//mnyan yod na bram ze zhi ba
68a6('dul ba): la dad pa zhi po la bsnyen bkur byed pa zhig 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char klas bsams pa/bram ze de gdul ba'i des yin no snyam nas/de de'i gan du song ba
68a7('dul ba): dang /bram ze des kyang zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byas nas/kye bram ze bram ze zhes bram ze tshol bar byed//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras /kho bo brami ze yi no//
68b1('dul ba): des smras pa/mgo reg 'di lta bu bram ze ga la yin/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/bram ze ji lta bu yin/des smras pa/bram ze ni ral pa can yino//tshe dang ldan
68b2('dul ba): pa 'char kas ral pa can du sprul pa dang /ji tsam na bram ze deng mtshur skyes nas/des smras pa/btsun pa 'char ka tsi'i slad du byon/khyod nyid 'dul ba'i don du'o//
68b3('dul ba): btsun pa 'char ka de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod tsog/tshe dang ldan pa 'tshu ra ka der 'dug te/zas kyi byi bo byas po dang bram ze de chung ma dang brnyas
68b4('dul ba): pA/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du ches mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'cha re kas de'i byasam pa dang bag la nyal po dang khoms dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas/
68b5('dul ba): 'di ltar bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho bo ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
68b6('dul ba): 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to//des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshos gnyen btsun pa 'char kha la brten nas/
68b7('dul ba): btsun pa 'char khos bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bo gyes/lha rnams kyis kyang mi bgyis/
69a1('dul ba): sngon gyi pha mos dag gis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' bshos dang rtswa lag dag gis kyang ma bgyis te/
69a2('dul ba): khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skems/rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral ngan song gi sgro dag ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/sems can dmyal ba
69a3('dul ba): dang dud 'gro dang yi dwags dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jog
69a4('dul ba): tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/btsun pa 'char ka bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags/
69a5('dul ba): btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/bdag dge bsnyen du bzung
69a6('dul ba): du gsol/deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabasu mchi'o/btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms
69a7('dul ba): dang na bza' dang gnas mal dang snyung ba'i rkyen dang yo byad dge ba zhes par ci ga nang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rje su 'dzin pa la
69b1('dul ba): zhugs pa yin pas bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so zhes smras te dang du mu blangaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'tshor kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim gnyis pa gnyi ga nas
69b2('dul ba): btul cing bzhago/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/mnyan yod na bram ze ser sna can zhig 'dug pa de'i chung ma nor bu la dga' nas/
69b3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsems pa/bram ze de gdul ba'i dus yino snyam nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nor bu mkhan gyi cha lugasu byas te/de'i khyim du song nas nor bu su nyo/nor
69b4('dul ba): bu su nyo zhes byas pa dang /bram ze mo des thos nas des smras pa/nor bu dag ri ra na ji tsam du 'tshong /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khos smras pa/nor bu 'di dgra rin che mod kyi
69b5('dul ba): 'on kyang rin chung ngu'i phyir sbyin zhes tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas nor bu mkhan gyi cha lugs mi snang bar byas te rang gi cha lugs kyis 'dug pa dang /bram ze de ngo mtshar skyes nas des smras
69b6('dul ba): pa/btsun pa 'cha rau kI tsi'i slad du 'dir byon khyod nyid gdul ba'i don du'o//btsun pa 'char ka de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cag/tshe dang ldan pa 'char
69b7('dul ba): kas der 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang /bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char kI'i mdun du ches mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char
70a1('dul ba): ma pa la du khamasmra da rang bzhin khong du rgyud nas dI sgyur bram chung ma dang byams pas spyan nyid
70a2('dul ba): 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar ches bstan te//des
70a3('dul ba): bden pa mthing nas smras pa/btsun pa bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnye na btsun pa'i tshor ki le brten nas/btsun pa'i tshor gas ba dag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu
70a4('dul ba): ni/dag la ba si klung ma bgyis/mes kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyes/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi ba mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis
70a5('dul ba): dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtswa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/rus pa'i
70a6('dul ba): ri dag las ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo dag ni dgum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /lbu
70a7('dul ba): dang mi rnams kyi ning du ni bzhag/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/thog ma ma mchis po'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba sau
70b1('dul ba): [।]sa saHsama.aHthasaH[।।।।ऽ।।ऽ।]
70b2('dul ba): kyi rdo rjes btsom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lagaso//btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/btsun pa bdag bcom
70b3('dul ba): ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas
70b4('dul ba): skyabasu mchi'o//btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang na bza' dang gnas mal dang snyung ba'i rkyen dang sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par tsi gnang /
70b5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rjesu 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan por bya dgos so zhes smras te/
70b6('dul ba): dang du me blangaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze khyim gsum pa ginyi ga nas btul cing bzhego/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/gang 'dul
70b7('dul ba): ba'i dus yin snyam na/mnyan yod na bram ze nad pa zhig 'dug pa de sman pa dag gis sman khu ba dang tsha ba dang bska ba dag gis yid byung nas/des sgo ba la khyod kyis sman pa 'ga'
70b8('dul ba): yang nang du ma btang shig ces bsgo nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'tsher kas bsams pa/bram ze de gdul ba'i dus yi no snyam nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha sman pa'i cha lu Da
71a1('dul ba): su byas te bram ze'i khyim sgor sman pa 'ongaso zhes byas te bsdad pa dang /sgo bas smras pa/kho bo la bram zes khyod kyis sman pa 'ga' yA nang /
71a2('dul ba): du ma btang shig ces sgo ba kho bo de nyid kyi phyir bzhago/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smos pa/khyod song la bram ze la sman pa 'ongs te de na re sman pa de sman mi sbyin bya 'ga'
71a3('dul ba): yang mi slong bar gsang sngags kyis gsos por bya'o zhes ze ro zhes gyis shig/sgo ba song ste bram ze de la de skad rgyas pari brjod pa dang /des smras pa nang du thong shig/
71a4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'char khe nang du zhugs nas des gsang sngags dag gis de sos par byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas sman pa'i tshe lugs mi snang bar byas te rang gi cha lugs kyis
71a5('dul ba): 'dug pa dang /bram ze de ngo mtshar skyes nas des smras pa/btsun pa 'char ko ci'i slad du 'dir byon/khyod nyid gdul ba'i don du'o//btsun pa 'char ka de'i slad du
71a6('dul ba): 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka der 'dug ste/zos kyi bya ba byas pa dang /bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char
71a7('dul ba): ka mdun du tshes mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyol dong khams dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas/'di ltar bram ze
71b1('dul ba): dri chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa
71b2('dul ba): de ltar chos bstan to//des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdug la
71b3('dul ba): gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/bdag lnga phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang mi bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi pha mes dgra
71b4('dul ba): gis kyang ma bgyis/dge slong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' bshos dang rtswa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni
71b5('dul ba): skams/rus pa'i ri dag/las ni bskal/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas dag nas ni
71b6('dul ba): rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nos bsags pa'i 'jog tshogs la lte ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu
71b7('dul ba): mtho bo ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lagaso//btsun pa bdag ni mngon par
72a1('dul ba): zhugs pa lags te/btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyab su ma ts+tsha yis/bdag dag
72a2('dul ba): bsnyen du bzung du gsol/deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o//btsun pa'i cha ro kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
72a3('dul ba): bdag gi bis snyoms dang na bza' dang gnas mal dang /srung po'i rkyen dang sman gyi yo byad dag bzhis par ci gan/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/rab tu
72a4('dul ba): byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/brami ze gzhan dag la yung phan pa bya dgos so zhes smras te dang du ma blangs so//de nas tshe
72a5('dul ba): deng ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim bzhi pa gnyi gnas btul cing bzhag go/tshe dang ldan po 'char kAs bsams pa/gang du gdul ba'i dus
72a6('dul ba): yin snyam na/mAnyan yod na bram ze phyug pa nor mang ba ljongs spyod che ba yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba ser sna can mig phra ba bya rog la yang gter mi mi ster ba
72a7('dul ba): yo byad kun tu 'dzin pa zhig 'dug pa de sgo drung na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig dag klog tu 'dzud nas/tshe dang ljon pa 'char kas bsams paM/
72b1('dul ba): bram ze gdul ba'i dus yin snyam nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gdul ba la ltos pas yang dang yang du dor bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/des dor lan 'ga' yang bsod
72b2('dul ba): snyoms ma thob nas/de de nas phyir byung ba bram ze des mthong nas/des smras pa/kye dge sbyong khyed yang dang yang du der 'jug na snyed pa chung zad yod dam/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas
72b3('dul ba): de'i dad pa'i nor las bsams te smras pa/bram ze khyod nyid la yang med na ci zhig sbyin por byed/bram ze des spyos te smras pa/dge sbyong khyod khyim mi dang bcas pa thams
72b4('dul ba): cad la sbyin par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa 'cha re khas thabs yin no zhes smras te song ngo //de ni bram ze'i khye'u dge slong gi rgyus shes pa zhig gis bram ze de la smras pa/mkhan
72b5('dul ba): pos de dog gis thabs yin no zhes bgyis pa de'i don ci lags mkhyen ti ma/des smras pa/mi shes so//skol gyis dang du blang ngo zhes smras pa gang lags pa de'i don ni de
72b6('dul ba): dag gi thabs yin no zhes smras pa de lag so//des yang smras pa/mkhan pos de dag gri khyim mi dang bcas pa thams cad ces bgyi ba de'i don ci lags mkhyen tam/des
72b7('dul ba): smras pa/mi shes so//de dag gi khyim mi dang bcas pa thams cad ces bgyi ba ni rgyal rigs dge sbyong gau ta ma 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang bcas pa lags te
73a1('dul ba): de ltar na mkhan pos dron gyi sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs par gyur to//bram ze des smras pa/kho bos bram ze rig
73a2('dul ba): byed gsum pa dang ldan pa dag ma mthong ngam ce na/gang gi phyir dge sbyong mgo reg dag la sbyin par byed/des skyes pa/dge sbyong des deng mkhan po'i mtshan gyis sangs rgyas
73a3('dul ba): la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang mkhan po'i sdum par spyan 'dron par bgyid do//bram zes smras pa/ci'i phyir de de ltar byed/des smras pa/mkhan po gal te
73a4('dul ba): bdag la thugs mi ches na bram ze'i khye'u zhig rtog tu gtang du gsol/des bram ze'i khye'u zhig rtag tu btang ba dang /ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'char khwas sangs rgyas la
73a5('dul ba): sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun tshogs pa na rgan pa'i mtha' log su 'dug ste/bram ze che ge mo zhig sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs
73a6('dul ba): tshod la spyan 'dren to zhes bram ze de'i ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du spyan drangs pa des ma thos so//bram ze'i khye'u des de thos nas phyir
73a7('dul ba): 'ongs te bram ze de la smras pa/mkhan po de bzhin te btsun pa 'char khas mkhan po'i mtshan gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang mkhan po'i
73b1('dul ba): sdum par spyan drangs kyis zhal zas sta gron bgyid du stsol cig/des smras pa/kho bos bram ze'i rig byed gsum dang ldan pa dag ma mthong ngam ci na/gang gi phyir dge sbyong mgo reg
73b2('dul ba): dag la sbyin par byed/de dag khyim bdag migon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du za bar 'gyur grang /ji tsam na de nang brer langs pa dang dge slong chu'i gtsang sbyor dag bram ze de'i khyim
73b3('dul ba): du lhags te smras pa/bram ze chu gang du bzhag par bya/bram ze des smras pa/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi sdum par ro//de bzhin du bshos kyi gtsang sbyor dag lhags
73b4('dul ba): te smras pa/bram ze zhal zas gang du brtag par bya/bram ze des smras pa/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi sdom par ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi ngor mgron
73b5('dul ba): du bos pa des dus sngar 'gro bar bya zhing ma zin pa dag zin par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/tshe dang ldan pa 'cha ra kI nang par sngar langs te/'phags pa dang khyim bdag mgon
73b6('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyis le ma ka rare de mthong nas smras pa/btsun po 'char ka gar bzhud des smras pa/bram ze zhig gis bdag les brten te/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong
73b7('dul ba): gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdug so chod la spyan drangs pas der 'gro'o//khyim bdag gis sbas pa/bram ze de ni ma dad pa lags kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa
74a1('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod bcang par gyur na mi rang gis bdag kyang mchi'o//de gnyis der dong pa dang /ci tsaman bram
74a2('dul ba): ze de snying lus chung ngur 'dug nas/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de la smras pa/bram ze khyod kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du
74a3('dul ba): gdugs chod lnga spyan drangs na ci'i phyir snying las chung ngur 'dug/zhal zas sta gon byed na ci nyes/bram ze des smras pa/kho bo bram ze rig byed gsum dang ldan pa drug
74a4('dul ba): ma mthong ngam ci no/dge sbyong mgo reg dag la sbyin par byed/khyod bdag gi khyim du zan byin cig/khyim bdag gis smras pa/bram ze kho bo la 'byor pa med
74a5('dul ba): snyam mamA/khe bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsod snyoms dang na bza' dang gnas mal dang srung ba'i rkyen dang sman gyi yo
74a6('dul ba): byad dag gis bsnyen bkur byed pa yang spro mod kyi bon kyang kho bo khyod la phan gdags pa'i phyir smres khyod snying las chung ngur me 'dug par zhal zis sta gon gyis shig/'di
74a7('dul ba): ltar sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ni ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang bla mkhyen drang
74b1('dul ba): srong byin dang rnying pa dang kho bo dang gzhan yang bram ze dang khyim bdag rgya che dgu dag gis bkur bstir byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas pa yin pas gal te khyod la brten nas
74b2('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs chod bcad par gyur na/khyod la rgyal po gdon mi za bar gnod pa byed par 'gyur zhing phyag sbal du bcug pas 'chi dgos
74b3('dul ba): par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas kyang yod par 'gyuraro//bram ze de skrag ste/bsams pa/de ltar 'gyu ro snyam nas smras pa/khyimo bdag bdag gis zhal
74b4('dul ba): zas sta gon ma byas na da ji ltar bya/khyim bdag gis smras pa/bram ze mnyan yod na gang nyo bas mi rnyed pa'i rdzas de lta bu med kyis kar sha pa na 'on cig dang kho bos zhal
74b5('dul ba): zas ste gon bya'o//bram zes smras pa/khyim bdag kar sha pa na ji snyed dag gis sangs rgyas la sogs bdage slong gi dge 'dun gyi gdugs tshod 'byor par 'gyur/
74b6('dul ba): khyim bdag gis smras pa/ka ra sha pa na lnga brgyas so//bram ze des khyim bdag la ka ra shu ba na lnga brgya phul nas/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de dag gi steng du
74b7('dul ba): kar sha ba na gzhan dag kyang gnan te nal zas sta gon byas so//bram ze des smras pa/khyim bdag bdag la rtsang sder dag kyang mi bdog go/khyim bdag mgon med
75a1('dul ba): zas sbyin gyis smras pa/bram ze khyod rtsang sder dag gis ma mtsher bar snying las chung ngur 'dug shig dang de dag dang phreng srong gri snod
75a2('dul ba): dang bcas te gshegs par 'gyur ro//der sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gshegs te bzhugs nas dge slong rnams kyis/lhung bzed dge byi dor byas
75a3('dul ba): pa bram ze des mthong nas/des bsams pa/re shig snod dag kyang bdag gis byi dor byas mi dgoso snyam nas dri mngon par dad par gyur te/tshe deng ldan pa 'char kha
75a4('dul ba): la smras pa/btsun pa 'char ka khyod bdag gis dge ba'i ba shes gnyen lags kyis/khyod kyis kyang brim pa mdzod la slad kyis bshos gsal cig/sangs
75a5('dul ba): rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad de gdan las bzhengs te gshig so de nas bram ze des
75a6('dul ba): smos pa/btsun pa 'char ka da khyod bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig/de 'dug pa dang bram ze de zas brims te/des zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang /bram ze de chung
75a7('dul ba): mi dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang kham+ba dang rang bzhin khong du
75b1('dul ba): chud nas/'di ltar bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs
75b2('dul ba): pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to//des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char khaM la brten nas
75b3('dul ba): btsun pa 'char khas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang mi bgyis
75b4('dul ba): sngon gyi pha ces dag gis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' bshes rtswa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrag dang mchi
75b5('dul ba): me'i rgya mtsho ni skams/rus pa'i ri dag las ni besgra le/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/sems can dmyal ba dang dude 'gro dang
75b6('dul ba): yi dwags dag rwas ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag/'khor baM ni mthar gyis/thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lha
75b7('dul ba): ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lag so//btsun pa bdag ni
76a1('dul ba): mngon par zhugs pa lags te/btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi yis/bdag dge bsnyen du bzung du
76a2('dul ba): gsol/deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabasu mchi'o//btsun pa 'char khas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang nu
76a3('dul ba): bza' dang gnas mal dang /srung ba'i rkyen dang sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par tsi ga nang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rjesu
76a4('dul ba): 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgo so zhes smras te dang du ma blangaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim
76a5('dul ba): lnga pa gnyi ka nas btul cing bzhag/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bsams pa/gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de'i chung ma
76a6('dul ba): gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yin pas/de de la shin tu lhag par chags pas khyim du 'ga' yang 'jug tu mi ster nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas
76a7('dul ba): bsams pa/bram ze de gdul ba'i dus yi no snyam nas/de bram ze de'i khyim du song ba dang /ji tsam na bram ze de gcin gci zhing 'dug pas tshe dang ldan pa 'char
76b1('dul ba): kha mthong nas smras pa/dge sbyong ma 'jug par ldog cig/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas 'di ltar bram ze'i gcin gyis rgyun mi 'chad pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/tshe dang
76b2('dul ba): ldan pa 'char kha nang du zhugs te bram ze de'i chung ma de yang 'di ltar de'i lho ni nang grol gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad phyi rol nas snang ba de ltar byen gyis brlabs nas/tshe dang
76b3('dul ba): ldan pa 'char kha phyir byung ba dang /bram ze des smras pa/btsun pa 'chare kha khyod kyis bdag gi mchis brang gzigs sam/des smras pa mthong ngo //ci 'dra khyod kyis
76b4('dul ba): ji ltar mthong bar gyur pa de 'dra'o//de zhugs te bltas na de ltar mi sdug par mthong nas des de la smras pa/bram ze mo khyod kyis btsun pa 'char kha la chung zhig ma smras
76b5('dul ba): sam/des smras pa/chung zad tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/bzod par bya'o//des de sngon ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa dang /bram ze de dad par gyur nas dris smras
76b6('dul ba): pra/btsun pa 'char kho ci'i slad du byon/khyod nyid gdul ba'i don du'o//btsun pa 'cher kha de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bye ba mdzod cig
76b7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha der 'dug ste/zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang /bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'cha raM kha'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug
77a1('dul ba): nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas de'i bsum pa dang /bag la nyal dang kham sna dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas/'di ltar bram ze de chung ma dang /
77a2('dul ba): bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas
77a3('dul ba): pa de ltar chos bstan to//des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'tshor kha la brten nas/btsun pa 'char
77a4('dul ba): khas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma be gyes/
77a5('dul ba): sngon gyi khames dag gis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang /mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma
77a6('dul ba): bgyis te/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/sems
77a7('dul ba): can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni banag/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus
77b1('dul ba): nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa
77b2('dul ba): lag so//btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/btsun pa bdag ni bcom ldani 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi yis/bdag dge
77b3('dul ba): bsnyen du bzung du gsol/deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabasu mchi'o//btsun pa 'char kha ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi
77b4('dul ba): bsod snyoms dang na bza' dang gnas mal dang sbyang ba'i rkyen dang sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnong /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la
77b5('dul ba): phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so zhes smras te dang du ma blangaso//de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim
77b6('dul ba): drug pa gnyi ka nas btul cing bzha 'o/tshe dang ldan pa 'char klas bsams pa/gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam nas/mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de'i chung ma gzugs bzang ba
77b7('dul ba): blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yin te/bram ze des me tog dang yam sreg shing gi bye phyi rol tu byung ba dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bsams pa/bram ze de gdul ba'i
78a1('dul ba): [।]saH/\u0f7fsa aHsama.a maHtha sa maHSha sa[ऽ।।।ऽ।ऽ।]
78a2('dul ba): dus yono snyam nas/de bram ze'i khyim du song ba dang /de'i chung ma des tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha sgo khang du mthong nas de'i nang du zhugs pa dang /
78a3('dul ba): dang ldan pa 'char kha yang khyim gyi nang du bzhug so//de gnas khang du zhugs pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha yang de'i phyi bzhin gnas khang du zhug so//dr-i ga nas khang nas phyir
78a4('dul ba): byung ste/skas las khang steng du 'dzeg par brtsams pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas kyang de'i phyi bzhin skas las khang steng du 'jog par brtsam so//des skas phul ba dang /
78a5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha sa la skyel nas de 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /des bsams pa/ma shi 'am snyam nas de babs te blang bar brtsams na/'gul bar
78a6('dul ba): yang ma nuso//bram ze 'ongs nas dris pa 'di ci yin/bram ze mos rgyas par brjod pa dang /des smras pa/khyod kyi 'di de ltar phul ba ni ma legs pa byas te/'di ni bram
78a7('dul ba): ze mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba/rgyal po gsel rgyal gyi chung po grogs btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i slob dpon yin te/'di dag gis rgyal po las gzhon nu'i yongs
78a8('dul ba): su spangs pa thob pas/bdag cag rgyal pos phyag sbal du bcug pas 'chi bar bya dgos pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro//bram ze mos tshe dang ldan pa
78b1('dul ba): 'char kha'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te 'phags pa khyod kyis mi mkhyen pa dang ma gzigs pa dang ma rig pa dang /rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang ma mchis kyi bzod pa gsol zhes
78b2('dul ba): bzod pa gsol pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khu langs te smras pa bzod par bya'o//bram ze de ngo 'tshar skyes nas des smras pa btsun pa 'char kha ci'i slad du byon/khyod nyid
78b3('dul ba): gdul ba'i don du'o//btsun pa 'char kha de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te/zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas der 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang
78b4('dul ba): bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char khe'i mdun du chos mnyen pa'i phyir 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas de'i bsams pa dang bag le nya la dang khams dang rang
78b5('dul ba): bzhin khong du chud nas/'di ltar bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid lo 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom
78b6('dul ba): ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to//des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun
78b7('dul ba): pa 'char khe la brten nas btsun pa 'char khas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/
79a1('dul ba): sgyurnams kyis /dum brgyas/sngon gyis pa mos dag gos kyung ma bgyiste/dge sbyong drung bram ze dag gis kya ma bgyis/b+h+yam
79a2('dul ba): pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtshon skams/rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgyel/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/
79a3('dul ba): mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni bye/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/
79a4('dul ba): thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes btsam ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/btsun pa
79a5('dul ba): bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lagaso//btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang tshe sa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su ma
79a6('dul ba): yis/bdag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba theg pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabasu mchi'o//btsun pa 'char kha jo srid 'tsho'i
79a7('dul ba): bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang na bza' dang gnas mal dang //ltung ba'i rkyen dang sman gyi yo byad dge bzhis par tso gnang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/
79b1('dul ba): rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rje su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so zhes smras te dang du ma blang so//de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas
79b2('dul ba): mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim bdun pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzha go/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bsams pa/gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam nas/mnyan yod na bram
79b3('dul ba): zhig 'dug pa de'i chung mo gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yin te/bram ze de me tog dang ya ma sreg shing gi phyir phyi rol tu byung ba dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas
79b4('dul ba): bsams pa/bram ze de gdul ba'i dus yino snyam nas/de bram ze de'i khyim du song ba dang /bram ze mo de gzugs kyi rgyags pa dang /lang tse'i rgyags pa dang /rigs kyi rgyags
79b5('dul ba): pa dang dbang phyug gi rgyags pas rgyags nas tshig kyang mi skyer ro//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas de'i sngon gyi las zad pa las bsams nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/srong mo rA
79b6('dul ba): pa'ang byed cing //sor ba cung zad skyed mi byed//bag med brgyan pa mthong nas ni//mchi mas brnangs pa'i bzhin gyi ru//zhes smras te song ngo //bram ze mos de 'das bdag
79b7('dul ba): spyos so zhes gshe zhing de gos dri ma can gyon te/khri zhigs pa'i steng du nyal te 'dug/bram ze de 'ongs pa dang des de mthong nas smras pa/bram ze mo 'di ci nyes/bam
80a1('dul ba): ze mos bshes te smras pa/gal te khyod la gang sgo na 'grong ba'i mi gcig la yang bza' ba dang /bgo ba sbyin pa'i 'byor pa med na khyod la
80a2('dul ba): khyim mi mo blangs par ci bya/dge sbyong 'char kha gang yin pa des kho mo spyos so//bram zes smras pa/bzang mo de ni bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba yin gyis de
80a3('dul ba): la bzod par gyis shig/bram ze mos smras pa/gal te de gson no kho mo mi gson no//bram ze smras pa//bzang mo 'di ni ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal
80a4('dul ba): rgyal gyi chung po grogs btsun mo phreng ldan mi'i slob dpon yin te/de dag gi rgyal po lnga gzhonu'aM yongs su spangs pa thob pas gal te bdag gis de la sdug bsngal cung zad
80a5('dul ba): skyod par gyur na/bdag cag rgyal pos phyag sbal du bcug pas 'chi bar bya dwagos pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyis/bzod par gyis shig bram ze
80a6('dul ba): mos smras pa/bram ze mang du smras te/ci rung gal te de gson na kho mo mi gson no//'dod pa bsten pas ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas/bram ze de
80a7('dul ba): ral gri mtshan du bcug ste 'bigs pa dang tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas thag ring po kho nas/de sems ji lta bus 'ong snyam na/ji tsam na gsod pa'i sems kyos 'ong
80b1('dul ba): par mthong nas/tshe dang ldan pa tshur khas lo ma ma yin pa'i sgrol bu mngon par sprul nas dror zhugs te 'dug bram ze dos smras pa/btsun pa 'char khas b+h+yo shig chu dang
80b2('dul ba): ldan pa 'char khAs smras pa/khyod skyes bzang pos 'ongs par gyur na khengs ni'i phyir sgyu ma dun/ral gri ra cog/brim thos pas mas pa/dgrags te bsad do snyam
80b3('dul ba): nas des ral gyi byor ro//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/sdig pa'i sems de yang 'o ra cig/bram ze des bsams pa/'di ni bdag nyid chen po zhig ste/bdag gi
80b4('dul ba): sems kyang sheso snyam nas de mngoni par dad par gyur pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de'i phyir bsdus nas de bzhin du 'dug/bram ze des
80b5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyen pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug pa dang /tshe dang ljon pa 'chor khas de'i bsam pa dang 'og la nyel dang
80b6('dul ba): khams deng rang bzhin khong du chud nas/'di ltar bram ze spyan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'dzeg tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse ma nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun
80b7('dul ba): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to//des bden pa mthang nas smras pa/btsun pa bdag gis dge bo'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char kho ma
81a1('dul ba): brtan nas/btsun pa 'char wang dgang gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal
81a2('dul ba): pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza'
81a3('dul ba): bshes dang rtsa leg gi tshugs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsha ni skams/rus pa'i ro dag las ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/mtho
81a4('dul ba): ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/thog
81a5('dul ba): ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig chags la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo//nyi shu mtho bo ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste btsun
81a6('dul ba): pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lagaso//bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/banun pa bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mtsha
81a7('dul ba): yis/bdag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/deng slan tshad nas ji srid 'tshe'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dad pas skyabs su mtsho'o//de nas bram ze des smras pa/
81b1('dul ba): btsun pa 'char kha khyod bdag gi sdum par byon tam son to//btsun pa 'char khas bdag gi bram ze mo la ji skad bka' stsal/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/kho bo de la 'di
81b2('dul ba): skad ces//sring mo rnying pa zad byed cing //sar pa cung zad bskyed ma byed//bag med brgyan pa mthong nas ni//mche mas brnangs pa'i bzhin gyi pu zhe smras so btsun pa tshig su bcad pa de'i
81b3('dul ba): don ci lags/bram ze sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ri phrogs shig tu dus ston byung nas/de na khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po dag rang gi rgyan dag gis brgyan te/bskyed
81b4('dul ba): mos tshal gyi ser dong ba de dge grang sprang mo zhig gis mthong nas de bdag nyid rgod pa'i mya ngan byed do//sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /dkon po
81b5('dul ba): la rjes su snying rtse ba/bas mthe'i gnas mal la dga' ba bas ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung //rang sangs rgyas shig de la phan
81b6('dul ba): gdags pa'i phyir phyogs der song ba dang /de'i lus mdzes pa dang /sems mdzes pa grong sbrang mo des mthong nas/des spra ba zan cung zad cig rnyed pa dang /des bsams pa/
81b7('dul ba): bdag gis sbyin gnas 'di lta bu la mchod pa ma byas pas/des na gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur/gor ma chag gis gal te bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag las bsod
82a1('dul ba): snyoms cung zad len par 'gyur na/bdag gis 'di la dbul bar bya'o snyamo//rang sangs rgyas des de la snying rtsa ba'i phyir lhung bzed
82a2('dul ba): bzed pa dang /des de la phu lo//rang sangs rgyas de de la snying rtse bas ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi na mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/'bor ba dang gsal
82a3('dul ba): ba dang /char 'bebs pa dang /glog 'byin pa'i tshe 'phrul dag bya bar brtsam so//so so'i skye bo rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas de shing ljon pa
82a4('dul ba): rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du sgrol nas/des smon lam 'di skad ces bdag las 'di'i rnam par smin pas nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma
82a5('dul ba): gyur cig ces bta'o//bram ze de'i tshe de'i dus na/grong sprang mo gang yin pa de ni khyod kyis chung ma de yin te/des rang sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas pa'i las de'i rnam
82a6('dul ba): par smin pas da ltar 'di lta bur skyes te kho bos de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa de zad pa las bsams nas de skad ce/sring mo snying pa zad byed cing //sar po cung zad skyed mi byed/
82a7('dul ba): bag med brgyan pa mthong nas ni//mchi mas brnangs pa'i bzhin gyis ngu//zhes smras so//btsun pa 'char khas don gyis na bdag gi mchis brang la bskul ba mdzad do//
82b1('dul ba): btsun pa 'char kha sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas/bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blang so//de nas bri ze des tshe dang ldan
82b2('dul ba): ba 'char khas cang mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas song ngo //bram ze mo de yang 'gyed pa skyes te bdag gis bram ze 'charA kha sod cig ces mngags pa ni me legs pa byas te/
82b3('dul ba): bram ze des btsun pa 'char kha bsad par ma gyur tam snya mo//bram ze des 'ongs pa dang chung mos smras pa/rje'i sras khyod kyis btsun pa 'char kha ma krongs sam/bram zes
82b4('dul ba): skyes pa/de ni bdag nyid chen po yin pas su zhig gis dkrongs par nus/chung mas smras pa/'o na khyod kyis sbyin mo drangs samu/bram zes smras pa/kho bos sang khyim
82b5('dul ba): gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyi zhal zas sta gon gyis shig/bram ze mo des zhal zas grang cha gang dag yin pa de dag ni de nyid kyis nyin mo sta gon byas/drod bag
82b6('dul ba): gang dag yin pa de dag ni phyi de nyin par sta gon byaso//tshe dang ldan pa 'tshar kha yang phyi de nyin par sde dro sham thabs bgos chos gos dang lhung bzad thogs te bram ze de'i khyim
82b7('dul ba): ga la ba der song nas phyin po dang /stan bshams pa nyid la 'dugo/de nas dam ze de chung ma dang bcas pas tshe dang ldan pa 'char khe bde bar 'dug par rig nas/
83a1('dul ba): bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/stobs par byed rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang
83a2('dul ba): zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstangs nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas zan zos shing lag pa bsnyal lhung bzed de bzhag par rig nas b+han ches dma'
83a3('dul ba): ba zhig blangs te tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bram ze me de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang khams
83a4('dul ba): dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar bram ze mo de stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhu
83a5('dul ba): pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan te//des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/btsun pa bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char kha la brten nas
83a6('dul ba): btsun pa 'char khas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/bdag la phas kyang mi bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang
83a7('dul ba): ma kyis/sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang mi dpyas/dge slong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' bshes rtsa log gi tshogs kyis
83b1('dul ba): kyang ma bgyis/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/rus pa'i ro dag las ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/sems
83b2('dul ba): can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bas
83b3('dul ba): pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lagaso//
83b4('dul ba): btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/btsun pa bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis bdag dge bsnyen du bzung du
83b5('dul ba): gsol/deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabasu mchi'o//btsun pa 'char khas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang na
83b6('dul ba): bza' dang gnas mal dang /skung pa'i rkyen dang sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su
83b7('dul ba): 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas dem ze gzhan la phan pa bya doko so zhes smras te dang du ma blang so//de na tshe dang ldan pa 'cha kha mnyan yod du bram ze khyim brgyad pa gnyi ga nas
84a1('dul ba): brtul cing banag/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bsnams pa/gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/mnyan yod na bram ze byug pa nir mang
84a2('dul ba): ba longs spyod che ba yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya tsha ba ser ste can mig phra ba bya rog la yang gtor mi mi skyer ba yo byung kun tu 'dzin pa zhig 'dug pa des ri brags
84a3('dul ba): shrIg tu zhing blas kyis mtha' rmor bcug nas/des bang ba dag rgyas btab ste chung ma la lto rgyags tsam byin nas ri brags der song ste rang gi zhal lta byas nas zhing blas
84a4('dul ba): kyi mtha' dge byed du 'dzud//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bsams pa/bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yino snyam nas des bsod snyoms brgyus te/bram ze de'i khyim du
84a5('dul ba): song nas des smras pa/bram ze mo lhung bzed kyi chu blang ngo //des de la 'bras chan phul ba dang /phru ba de de bzhin du grang bar 'dug/bram ze mos smras pa/
84a6('dul ba): 'phags pa bdag gi khyim theb ser sna can mig pra ba bya rog la yang gtor ma mi ster ba yo byad kun du 'dzin pa lags kyi slan chad ma byon cig/tshe dang ldan pa 'char
84a7('dul ba): khas smras pa/thabs yin gyi sing kho bo bdag nyid dang gnyis 'ong ngo //tshe dang ldan pa 'tshir khaM phyi de nyin par bdag nyid dang /gnyis der song ba dang /des de la
84b1('dul ba): de bzhin du 'bras chan phulo//de bzhin du bdag nyid dang /drug cu'i bar du nyin re lan re song ste bram ze'i khyim dror bsod snyoms zos pa dang /ngos kyi sdum tshes dag shes ldan dag
84b2('dul ba): ltos shig/bram ze des lag pa btsal brgya dag gis longs spyod dag bsgrubs na de dag bram ze mo des shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dku dang lhan cig za bar byedado zhes smod par byed/phyar
84b3('dul ba): kha gtong bar byed kha zer bar byed//bram ze'i khye'u zhig bya ba 'go' zhig la mnyan yod nas ri brags der song ba dang /bram ze des bram ze'i khye'u de thag ring po kho na nus mthong
84b4('dul ba): nas des bram ze'i khye'u de la dris pa/bram ze'i khye'u khyod ga las 'dir 'ongs/des smras pa many+dzan yod naso//khyod kyis kho bo'i khyim gyi gtam thos sam/thos te mnyan
84b5('dul ba): yod na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim ni shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim dang po lagasaso//mkhan po'i khyim ni shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim gnyis pa lags
84b6('dul ba): te/shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong drug cu nyin re la ni ro mchis te bsod snyoms 'tshalo//bram ze des bsams pa/'dis kho bo ser sna can la tho 'tsham par byed kyis
84b7('dul ba): gzhan la yid dri bar bya'o snyam nas/de lam kar song ste bsdad pa dang /ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u gzhan zhig bya ba 'ga' zhig la mnyan yod nas ri brags der song ba dang /
85a1('dul ba): bram ze des bram ze'i khye'u de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas/des bram ze'i khye'u de la byis pa bram ze'i khye'u khyod ga las 'dir 'ongs/des
85a2('dul ba): smras pa/mnyan yod nas//khyod kyis kho bo'i khyim gyi gtam thos sam/thos te mnyan yod ni khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim ni shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim
85a3('dul ba): dang po lag so//mkhan po'i khyim ni/shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim gnyis pa lags te/shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong drug cu nyi no re lan re mchis te bsod snyoms 'tshalo//
85a4('dul ba): bram ze des bsams pa/de dang 'di 'thun pas de ltar gyur gyis bram ze mo des longs spyod dag zos par gyur na mi rung gis 'gro'o snyam//de nas bram ze de phyir 'ongs te bram
85a5('dul ba): ze mo de la smras pa/bram ze mo ngan pa kho bos lag pas gzhal be rgya dag gis longs spyod dag bsgrubs nus/khyed de dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag dang lhan cig za ber
85a6('dul ba): byed dam/khyod kyis bram ze rig byed gsum dang ldan pa dag ma mthong ngam ci na/dge sbyong mgo drug de dag la sbyin par byed ces des de brdeg par brtsams pa dang /des
85a7('dul ba): smras pa/bram ze khyod kyis kho mo la gtad pa'i bang ba dag kho mos rgya nyams par byas sam/ci je so sor rtogs shig/bram ze des bang ba dag so sor brtags pa dang
85b1('dul ba): ji tsam na de bzhin du rgya mnyam par 'dug pa dag mthong nas/des chung ma la smras pa/khyod kyis zas de snyed grwa las rnyed des smras pa/bdag gi phru ba 'dir 'bras chan dang sman
85b2('dul ba): tshod bcos na 'bras chen des//dge slong drug cu dang bdag kyang 'drangs par gyur to//bram ze des smras pa/ci'i phyir de ltar du gyur/des smras pa/bdag gis khyod kyis
85b3('dul ba): mngon sum du gyur bar bya'o zhes des phye de nyini par tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha bdag nyid dang drug cu der 'ongs pa la de bzhin du bsod snyoms phul nas des smras pa/bram ze khyod kyis
85b4('dul ba): mthong ngam/bram ze de mngon par dad par gyur nas/des smras pa/btsun pa 'char kha sad bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char
85b5('dul ba): khas smras pa/bram ze ci 'di 'dra bas sam/'on te zas yang dag par mgron du 'bod/bshos yang dag par spyan 'dren to//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bram ze de
85b6('dul ba): la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs te song ngo //de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'chu rwa khas cang mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas/de nyid kyi me tshan mo bca' ba dang bza'
85b7('dul ba): ba gtsang zhing gsod pa dag sta gon byaso//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khe yang phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos/lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bram ze'i khyim
86a1('dul ba): gal ba der song ste byon nas stan pashams pa nyid la 'dug/de nas bram ze de tshe dang ldan pa'acha kha badri bar 'dug par rig nas/bca'
86a2('dul ba): ba dang bza' da gtsang zhing gsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed stobs par byed//rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing gsod pas rang gi lag nas
86a3('dul ba): tshim par byas shing bstabs nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha zan zos shing lag pa bsgyel lhung bzad bzhag par rig nas/stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te tshe dang ldan pa
86a4('dul ba): 'char kha'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas de'i bsams pa dang /bgra la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas/'di
86a5('dul ba): ltar bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas ston de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
86a6('dul ba): 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to//des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char kha la brten nas
86a7('dul ba): btsun pa 'char khas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyisargyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang
86b1('dul ba): ma bgyis/sngon gyi phams dag gis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' bshos dang rtswa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis /
86b2('dul ba): khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/rus pa'i ri drug las nI bsgril/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/mtha ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'phro
86b3('dul ba): dang /yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag/'khro ba ni mthar bgyis/thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta
86b4('dul ba): ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtha ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes pa tsam ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lagaso//btsun pa bdag ni mngon
86b5('dul ba): par zhugs pa lags te/btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi yis/bdag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/deng slan chad nas
86b6('dul ba): ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyab par chi'o//btsun pa 'char khas ji srid 'i tshe'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang na bza' dang gnas mal dang
86b7('dul ba): ltung pa'i rkyen dang sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci go nang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rje su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pa
87a1('dul ba): bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa b+h+rUM dgos so zhes smras te dang du mo rbA so//de nas cha dang ldan pa 'char khas mnyan yang du bram rdo khyim dgu/
87a2('dul ba): pa gnyug nas btul cing bzhag//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/bam po re bdun po//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bsams pa/grong 'dul ba'i
87a3('dul ba): dus yon snyam na/mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa la chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dgra' mgur spyod par
87a4('dul ba): byed//de la bu zhig byung nas de bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to//de'i chung ma da gtum pa rlang pa rtsub pa rgya bre gshe ba spyo ba zhig yin pas rtag tu ngom+ba k+ShiM sdum ches
87a5('dul ba): dag dang lhan cig thab dkrol byed nas/de'i ming gtum mo gtum mo zhes bya bar gyur te//dus gzhan zhig na mnyan yod du dus ston byung nas bram ze des bu la
87a6('dul ba): smras pa/bu khyod kyi ma 'di gautum pas gzhan dag dang lhan cig thab dkrol byed pas bdag cag khri mon du bcu gu pas 'chi bar bya dgos pa gang yin pa de lta bu
87a7('dul ba): gnas yod par 'gyur gyis/re shig dus ston thal gyi bar du ri brags gzhon zhig tu 'dong zhing 'khod la de'i 'og tu phyir 'ongs par byas/khyod song lam la dris
87b1('dul ba): //du mam sa smras//ma ga/ bcung nag gi spyad du ra nags gag mu smyig tus tshul/gtum nas smras smra/klung du lan 'ad smras spyod da da//
87b2('dul ba): bram na kyang smras pa khab yid 'gyu'o//bAt+ta mnas smras pa/gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba dir mang shog/de gnyis dong ba dang /gtum mos bum mdag gzhug rma
87b3('dul ba): la smras pa/bu mo khur glang rmugs shig deng je stog zan bya'o//des khur srung btsugs te/khur ba dag bya bar brtsams pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bsarmas pa/
87b4('dul ba): gaN+DImam dgadul ba'i dus yin snyamA nas/de snga dri sham thabs bags/lhung bzed dang chas gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snrums la zhugal nas/de mthar gyis
87b5('dul ba): sade sums la rgyu ba ni gtum me'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang ri 'jug pa ga tA mA mos mthong nas dris bu ma mngag gzhug mA lA smras pa/bu mo dge sbyong 'di
87b6('dul ba): cig/dris bskrad pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa'i ched khe rgyas dang bar ma du zhugs shing bu mi mdag gzhug ma phyis zhugs/de gaN+DI ma mos skyeng mthong nas des bum
87b7('dul ba): gzhug ma la smras pa/bu mo khyod kyis dge sbyong 'di ma bskrad dam/des smras pa bskrad//'on 'di ga las zhugs yang skrod la skra chod cig/des de snyed dos
88a1('dul ba): bcad nas zhugs pa dang tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha chos dang par zhug so//de gtum mos yang mthong nas des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras/
88a2('dul ba): pa/bu mo khyod kyis dge sbyong 'di bskrad de sgom bcad dam/bcad do 'o na 'di ga nas zhugs/de nas gtum mos smras pa/dge sbyong ce slong /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa//
88a3('dul ba): khur ba'o//gtum mos smras pa/khyod bu thu bor gyur te 'ongs na khyod la khur ba ci'i phyir sbyin/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bu thu bor sprul te 'ongs pa dang /gtum mos smras pa/
88a4('dul ba): gal te lag pa dang rkang pa dag ser por byas kyang khyod la khur ba mi sbyin no//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas lag pa dang /rkang pa dag ser por sprul pa dang /gtum mos smras pa/
88a5('dul ba): gal te mig gnyis khar por lta bur blta na yang khyod la khur bi mo sbyin//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas mig gnyis khar por lta bur sprul pa dang /gtum mos smras pa/gal te
88a6('dul ba): nam mkha' la dril bu bzhin du khro la la 'khrol zhing 'dug na yang khyod la yang khur ba mi sbyi na//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas na mkha' la dril bu bzhin du khra la la khrol zhing 'dug pa
88a7('dul ba): dang /gtum mos smras pa/gal te khyod byed phyed du dum bu gnyi su gas kyang khyod la khur ba mi sbyin//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bdag nyid phyed phyed du dum bu gnyis su
88b1('dul ba): /gas par sprul tres la bsgyel ba dang /bu mo mngag gzhug mas smras pa/jo mo khyod kyis gdung bar bgyid pa mang po dag bsnyungs pa de dag gi nang du 'di ni chos gdung bar bgyid pa lags te/
88b2('dul ba): dge slong 'di ni ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi chung po grogs btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i slob dpon lags pas/bdag ni shin tu thag ring por mchis kyang bran mo nyid du
88b3('dul ba): bas kyi/jo mos ni gser gyi chu bum gyis rgyal po'i pho brang du chub bcu 'tshal bar 'gyur ro//gtum mo skrag te bsams pa/de ltar 'gyuraro snyam nas des smras pa/bu mo dang
88b4('dul ba): rkos shig dang sba'o zhes des dong bkas ste sba bar brtsams pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs nas nges bskul bar yang ma nuso//de nas gtum mos
88b5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i rkang pa d+ma nyid la gtugs te smras pa/'bags pa khyod kyis mi mkhyen pa dang mi gzigs pa dang ma rig pa dang rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang ma mchis kyis
88b6('dul ba): bdag la bzod pa mdzod cig dang khyod la khur ba gsol lo//tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha langs te cha lugs tha ma la bstan pa dang /gtum mos bsams pa 'di la khur ba sbyino zhes
88b7('dul ba): khas drangs na/khur ba 'di dag ni ha cang che ches pas phangs kyi 'di'i phyir khur ba chu ngu gzhan zhig bya'o snyam nas/des khur ba chung ngu zhig sreg par brtsams pa dang /khur
89a1('dul ba): ba des khur blangs thams cad yog par gyur nas/gtum mos bsams pa/bdag gi khur ba 'di mi sbyin par khur ba snga ma las gcig
89a2('dul ba): sbyi no snyam nas/des khur ba gcig drang bar brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na khur ba thams cad 'ongs nas gtum mos smras pa/ci 'phags pa khur ba thams cad bzhad dam/
89a3('dul ba): che dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/'dod do//gtum mos smras pa/bzhes su gsol/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/sring mo gal te yongasu gtang na/khyim
89a4('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis deng sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshed la spyan drangs kyis der dong la/rang gi lag nas rims shig/
89a5('dul ba): gtum mos smras pa/'phags pa bdag gtu mo zhes thams cad du rig pas/bdag der 'jug tu ga la chudado/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/sring mo kha bas
89a6('dul ba): khyod 'jug tu gzhugo/de nas gtum mos khur ba de dag thogs te/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /sba ba des smras pa/
89a7('dul ba): gtum mo don ci'i phyir 'dir 'ongs ma 'jug shig tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/bzhin bzang 'jug tu chug shig/sgo bas btu me nang du btang ba dang /des
89b1('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po mthong nas/khur ba de dag btub par brtsams pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/ma btub par rangs par rims
89b2('dul ba): shig/gtum mos smras pa khyed par mi 'gyu ro//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/rims shig dang khyed par 'gyur zhes des 'di ltar sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
89b3('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad la khyed pa'i phyi na lhag kyang byung ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs//gtum mos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la khur bas khyed par brims te
89b4('dul ba): gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad nas/gdan las gzhengs te gshegs te gshegaso//gtum mos smras pa/btsun pa 'char kha khyod bdag gi
89b5('dul ba): dge ba'i ba shes gnyen lags kyi tshur gshegs bdag gi sdum par bzhud la khyod der gdugs tshod gsol cig/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha gtum mo'i khyim du song ba dang
89b6('dul ba): gtum mos tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha la zan byin nas/gtum mo tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas de'i bsam
89b7('dul ba): pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar gtu mi mos stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lte ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes
90a1('dul ba): bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to//des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/btsun pa bdag gi dge ba
90a2('dul ba): bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char kha la brten nas/btsun pa 'cher khas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis//mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang
90a3('dul ba): ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang
90a4('dul ba): rgya lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/drag pa mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/ngan song ga sgo dag ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i
90a5('dul ba): sgo dag ni phye/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/thog ma ma
90a6('dul ba): mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/btsun pa
90a7('dul ba): bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lag so//btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pi lags te/btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs
90b1('dul ba): sum tsho yis/bdag dge bsnyen mang bzung du gsol/deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas de la
90b2('dul ba): chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas/stan las langs
90b3('dul ba): te song ngo //de nas gtum mos rang gi khyim phyag dar legs par byas chag chag legs par btab/byug pas legs par byug te me tog dag dgram po byas nas spyod lam zhi bas
90b4('dul ba): 'dugo/bram ze de yang dus ston thal nas/phyir 'ongs te bskyed mos tshal du bsdad nas des bu la smras pa/bu khyod song la khyod kyi ma khri mo na gang du bcug ci ngo 'dug pa ltos
90b5('dul ba): shig dang dbyung bar bya'o//buM de khyim du song ba dang /gtum mos thag ring po kho na nas bu mthong nas des smras pa/mu 'ongs pa leg so'angs pa leg so//tshur shog ngal seMs
90b6('dul ba): shig/khyod kyi pha de 'ongs sam/dus smras pa/mtshos te bskyed mos tshal na sdod cing mchis so//buM de zan zos nas pha'i gan du song ba dang /phas dris pa bu khyim
90b7('dul ba): bde 'am/bus smras pa yab yum gyi spyod lam de lta bu ni sngon lon 'ga' yang ma mthong ste 'di ltar spyod lam zhi bas mchiso//bram ze de khyim du zhugs pa dang /
91a1('dul ba): gtum mos thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas des smras pa/rje'i sras byon pa legasaso//byon pa leg so//bzhugasu gsol/de 'dug nas bsams
91a2('dul ba): pa/bye brag 'di lta bu ni sngon ma byung na ci las gyur snyam nas/des tshig su bcad pa de smras pa/'di ltar sngon dang mi 'dra bar//log pa nyid du khyod snang na//
91a3('dul ba): khyod ni smyo byed ldan gyur ta me//'on te myos par gyur ta ma ci//gtum mos tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/jo bo bdag ni smyos pa min//myos par gyur pa'ang ma la
91a4('dul ba): to//bdag gi sangs rgyas bstan pa la//'phags pa'i bden pa mthong bar bgyis//rje'i sras bdag la 'phags pa 'char khas 'di ltar bdag slan chad 'khor ba na
91a5('dul ba): 'khor ba'i tshe nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun tu spyod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan pa mdzadado//bram ze de ngo mtshar skyes te bsams pa/bdag gis brdeg pa dang smad
91a6('dul ba): bas thul bar ma nus pa gang yin pa de btsun pa 'chir khas chos bstan pas 'dul bas gang gi phyir ches bstan pas 'di btul ba ni 'phags pa 'char khas bdag la
91a7('dul ba): phan pa mang du mdzad do//'phags pa 'char khas bdag la legs pa mang du mdzod kyi/bdag song la 'phags pa 'char kha sang khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan
91b1('dul ba): drang ngo snyam nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha ga la ba dar song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu 'dugo/mtha'
91b2('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha bram ze de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par byed/yang dag par
91b3('dul ba): gzeng bstod par byed/yang dag par rab tu dge' bar byed//rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dge par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par
91b4('dul ba): bzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi sla'o//de nas bram ze de stan las langs te/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud
91b5('dul ba): nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha la 'di skad ces smraso//btsun pa 'chir khas sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bram ze de
91b6('dul ba): la cang mi sme bas dang du blangaso//de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas cang mi smra bos dang du blangs par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos
91b7('dul ba): phyag 'tshal te song ngo //de nas bram ze des de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pra dag sta gon byaso//tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha yang phyi de nyin par snga dro
92a1('dul ba): sham thabs bgos/lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bram ze de'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dugo//
92a2('dul ba): nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha bde bar 'dag par ri gnas bca' ba dang bza' ba gcing zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed stobs par byed//rnam grangs du
92a3('dul ba): mar bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha zan zos shing log pa bskal lhung bzed bzhag par
92a4('dul ba): rig nas/stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dugo/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams
92a5('dul ba): dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas/'di ltar bram ze des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhu
92a6('dul ba): pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bsten to//des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/btsun pa bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char kha la brten nas//btsun
92a7('dul ba): pa 'chare khas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi pha mes
92b1('dul ba): dag gis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni
92b2('dul ba): skams/rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa
92b3('dul ba): byung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag 'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye
92b4('dul ba): shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lagaso//btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/
92b5('dul ba): btsun pa bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skabasu mchi yis/bdag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i ber du
92b6('dul ba): glo ba zag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabasu mchi'o//btsun pa 'char khas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang na bza' dang sbyang ba'i rkyen dang sman gyi yo byad dag
92b7('dul ba): bzhes par cig nang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rjesu 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan par bya/
93a1('dul ba): dgos so zhes smras te dang du b+hu sau//bram ze des smras pa/gal te btsun pa 'char khas dang du mi bzhos na/bdag gis drang srong gi gdan
93a2('dul ba): bshams par bgyi yis/btsun pa 'char kha ga shogs te longs spyod par gsol/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangaso//de nas tshe dang
93a3('dul ba): ldan pa'i char khas de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
93a4('dul ba): byas nas stan las langs te spong ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim bcu pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas
93a5('dul ba): bsams pa/gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/mnyen yod na bram ze gzhon nu khye'u lnga brgya tsam chung ma dang bcas pa dag bca' ba dang bza' ba dri dang phreng ba rgyu mang ba
93a6('dul ba): thogs te rtse ba'i phyir bskyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'tshur khAs bsams pa/'di dag ni gdul ba'i dus yin snyam nas de de dag gi gan du song ba
93a7('dul ba): dang /de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa 'char kha khyod bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu yin na ci'i phyir shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag thams cad za ba dag gi nang du rab tu
93b1('dul ba): byung /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas 'di ltar de dag gi phreng ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni snyun dong gi phreng bar gyur/khur ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni ba lang gi kau bar gyur/
93b2('dul ba): sha gang dag yin pa de dag ni ba lang gi shar gyur/btung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni chang du gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas de dag la
93b3('dul ba): lhung bzed bstan te smras pa/shes ldan dag ltos shig/kho bo'i lhung bzed na skun dong dang ba lang gi rko ba dang ba lang gshi dang chang yod snyam ci/khyed cag ni mgo la yang skun
93b4('dul ba): deng gi phreng ba thigs/zasu yang ba lang gi rko ba dang /ba lang gi sha/btung bar yang chang 'thung bas/khyed cag thams cad za ba yi no//de dag gis cig la cig bltas na ji tsam
93b5('dul ba): na bdag cag thams cad kyi mgo la snyun dong gi phreng ba thogs pa dang /khur ba thams cad ba lang gi rko bar gyur pa dang /sha thams cad ba lang gi shar gyur pa dang /btung ba
93b6('dul ba): thams cad chang du gyur par mthong nas/de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa 'char kha khyod kyis bdag cag la dmod pa bor gyi bdag cag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/tshe dang
93b7('dul ba): ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/bzod par bya'o//de nas de dag snga ma kho bzhin du gyur pa dang /de dag ngo mtshar skyes nas de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa 'char kha ci'i slad du
94a1('dul ba): byon/khyod cag nyid gdul ba'i don du 'ongs kyis 'khod cig dang /chos bstan par bya'o//de dag tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i mdun du chos
94a2('dul ba): mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas de dag chung ma dang brkus pa'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas/'di
94a3('dul ba): ltar bram ze de dag chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhu
94a4('dul ba): pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to//de dag gis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/btsun pa bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa
94a5('dul ba): 'char kha la brten nas/btsun pa 'char khas bdag cag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma
94a6('dul ba): bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtswa
94a7('dul ba): lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrig dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/rus pa'i ro dag las ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i
94b1('dul ba): rmo dag ni byo/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung //lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus
94b2('dul ba): nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/btsun pa bdag cag ni mngon bzhugs pa
94b3('dul ba): lag so//btsun pa bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/btsun pa bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi yis/bdag cag
