94b4('dul ba): dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsha'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabasu mchi yis/btsun pa 'char khas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag
94b5('dul ba): cag gis bsod snyoms dang na bza' dang gnas mal dang srung ba'i rkyen dang sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes pa ro tso ga nang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/rab tu byung ba
94b6('dul ba): ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/bra mo ze gzhan la yang phan pa bya dgo so zhes smras te dang du ma blangs//bram ze de dag gis smras pa/gal te
94b7('dul ba): btsun pa 'char khas dang du mi bzhes na bdag cag gi drang srong gi gdan bshams pa bgyis/btsun pa 'char kha gshegs te longs spyod par gsol/tshe dang ldan pa
95a1('dul ba): 'chur khas bram ze de dag ma cing mi smra bas dang du blangs//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas de dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par
95a2('dul ba): bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcuge/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song ngo //de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas
95a3('dul ba): mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim lnga brgya lhag tsam gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhago/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag nga'i nyan
95a4('dul ba): thos kyi dge slong khyim po dad par byed pa rnams kyi nang na/mchog ni 'di lta ste/dge slong 'cher kha nag po 'di yino//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bsams pa/
95a5('dul ba): gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gsang sngags dag gi mi ma yin pa dbang du byas nas shing rta bcas te 'dren du 'jug par byed nas/
95a6('dul ba): dang ldan pa 'char khas bsams pa/bram ze de dag gdul ba'i dus yino snyam nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bram ze gdul ba'i phyir 'phags pa dang /ji tsam na
95a7('dul ba): bram ze gsang sngags dag gi mi ma yin pa dbang du byas nas shing rta bcas te 'dren du bcug nas mnyan yod kyi phyi rol du song ba na/bram ze de shing rta las babs nas/
95b1('dul ba): gAcan gtso bar bsams pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas 'di ltar bram ze de'i gcan rgyanu mo 'chad pad+mo ltar byin gyi brlabs nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khrus glusang sngags
95b2('dul ba): kyi phung bu byung ba dang /mi ma yin pa de bros te song ngo //ji tsam ni bram ze de langs pa dang mo ma yin pa de bros par mthong nas/des smras pa/sus kho bo'i mi ma yin pa'i phur
95b3('dul ba): phyung /tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa kho bos so//ci'i phyir khyod bram zer gyur nas/mi ma yin par spyod dam/des smras pa/su zhig bdag gi bsnyen bkur byed par
95b4('dul ba): 'gyur/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas de la lhung bzed bstan nas smos pa 'di khyod kyi bstan bkur byed par 'gyuraro//des smras pa/'di ci 'grub par 'gyur/tshe dang ldan pa
95b5('dul ba): 'char khas smras pa/gang sems pa dang /gang 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//ji tsam na bram ze de gang sems pa dang /gang 'dod pa de dag thams cad
95b6('dul ba): lhung bzed de las grub par gyur pa dang /bram ze de ngo mtshar skyes te/des smras pa/btsun pa 'char kha ci'i slad du 'di ltar 'gyur/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras
95b7('dul ba): pa/kho bos lhung bzed kyi rig pa shaso//des smras pa/btsun pa 'char kha lhung bzed kyi reg pa de bdag la stsol cig/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas tshigasu bcad pa
96a1('dul ba): smras pa/rig pa su la'ang sbyin mi bya//rig dang bcas te 'chi bar bya//rig pa rig dang gus pa dang //nor gyi phyir ni sbyin par bya//bram zes smras pa
96a2('dul ba): bdag khyod la gus par bgyid do//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khos smras pa/kho bo khyim pa las bsnyen bkur bdag gir mi byed kyi kho bo ni rab tu byung ba la bsnyen bkur bdag gir
96a3('dul ba): byed//des smras pa/bdag rab tu byung //tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/rab tu byung zhig ces/des de rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas te/gdam ngag byino//
96a4('dul ba): de de ltar rab tu byung nas gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid ngatang bar gnaso//gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa brtun pa dang ldan pa ma bdag nyid btang
96a5('dul ba): bar gnas pa na/rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas/yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed pa
96a6('dul ba): tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de'i tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas/bdag gi skye ba zad do//tshangs par spyod pa spyod//bya ba
96a7('dul ba): byas so//srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes zhes go bar byed cing dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod tshigs dang bral ba/bong ba dang gser du mnyam po/namakha' dang lag
96b1('dul ba): mthal du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan+dan bzhug pa lta bu rig pas sgra nga'i sbungs dral bar gyur cing /rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang /
96b2('dul ba): srid pa dang /'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /bku re bsti la rgyab kyi sgo/la dbang po dang nyi dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /rjes par bya ba dang /mngon du smra bar bya
96b3('dul ba): bar gyur to//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bsams pa/gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/yul mi'i gyed zhig gis yul dag tu gyad rnams brdabs nas/mnyan yod du
96b4('dul ba): 'ongs nas/mnyan yod na sgo khar rkang pa brkyang ste 'dug cing /de gang la la 'ong ba de la 'di skad ces yang na ni kho bo la stobs rgol cig/yang na ni kho bo'i rlig bar du song shig/
96b5('dul ba): ces zer ro//don skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'du ba dag las 'ga' yang de la stobs kyang mi rgol de'i rlig ber du yang mi 'gro'o//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bsams pa/gyang
96b6('dul ba): de gdul ba'i dus yon snyam nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas phyogs der song ste smras pa/'di su zhig yin skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis smras pa/gyad 'di mchid nas 'di skad
96b7('dul ba): ces yang ne ni kho bo laM stobs rgol yang na ni kho bo'i rlig bar du song shig ces mchi'o//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas de la smras pa/tsau rje kho bo dang lhan cig stabs bye 'am
97a1('dul ba): 'on to/kho mas brdungs pa'i bud gsum pa gang dag yin pa de dag dang lhan cig stongs 'gyed/des smras pa/khyod kyi brdabs par
97a2('dul ba): gyad gsum po gang dag yin pa de dag dang lhan cig skyobs bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas smras pa/kho bos 'dod chags kyi gyad brdibs/zhe slong gi gyad brngungs//
97a3('dul ba): gti mug gi gyad brdabs kyis khyed de drag dang lhan cig stobs khye shig ces tshe dang ldan pa 'tshir khas de btul nas des rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas te gdam
97a4('dul ba): ngad byin//de de ltar rab tu byung nas gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid btang bar gnas//gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa
97a5('dul ba): bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na rigs kyi bu dgra gang gi phyir sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu
97a6('dul ba): byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla ni med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas/bdag gi skye ba zad do//tshangs par spyod
97a7('dul ba): bi spyad do//bya ba byaso//srid pa 'di las gzhan mi sheso zhes ga bar byed cing /dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/bong ba dang gser du
97b1('dul ba): mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag mthil du ma tshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa tsan+dan bzhug pa lta bu rig byas sgra nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang
97b2('dul ba): dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /bku re bsti la rgyu ba kyi phyogs pa dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas paN+Di lha rnams kyis mchod pa bye ba dang /brjed par bya ba dang
97b3('dul ba): mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur te/gtum mo des bu'i chung ma blangs nas dus gzhan nog nA gtum mo yang dus la bab/de'i khyi mo theb kyang dus la bab bo//gtum mo'i bu de kha ton
97b4('dul ba): gyi zhal la yul gzhan du song ngo //gtum ma'i mna' ma de gos dang zas za zhing zhim pa la longs spyod pas nyon mongs pa dag gis gdungs par gyur nas/des bu mo mngag
97b5('dul ba): gzhug ma la smras pa/bu mo song pa skyes bu lus rtun pa khrung ba dam pa dam pa 'ga' ci snang tshol cig da dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o//bu mo mengag gAzhug
97b6('dul ba): mas smras pa/jo mo khyod kyi gyos po dang skyug mo gnyis ni bden pa mthong ba lags na/khyod drang srong gi khyim 'di lta bur byon na nyes por spyod pa de lta bu ji ltar bgyir rung /
97b7('dul ba): drang srong gi khyim gyi mi snyan pa bskyed par mdzad dam ci/des smras pa/kwa'e khyod bsam pa des ci bya/je song lo khrod de shog shig/gal te khrid de ma 'ongs na khyod la
98a1('dul ba): 'tshams chen po bcad par bya'o//bu mos bsams pa/bu zan ma'i bu mo 'dis drang srong gi khyim brtsog gi dgang bar chad de bdag la dka' med kyis dgug go//
98a2('dul ba): snyam nas/de srang du song ba dang //des de na chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon lus brtan pa mkhrang ba dam pa zhig mthong nas/des de la smras pa/kye btsun pa khyod kho mo'i jo mo dang
98a3('dul ba): lhan cig dga' dgur spyod phod dam/des smras pa phod do//des ni khrid de jo mo dang sprad nas/de dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par byed//tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha der
98a4('dul ba): dus dang dus su 'gro bas de mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bsams pa/bud med kyi yul 'di ni 'dod chags spyad pa zhig yino snyam nas/des de la 'dod chags kyi
98a5('dul ba): bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod do//des bsams pa 'phags pa 'char kha ni gzhan gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa yin pas/des bdag 'phrigs kyi gal te de ma bsad
98a6('dul ba): na bdag gi khyim tha ba la byas shing de bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur du 'ong gi bdag gis de bsad do snyam nas/des chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon la smras pa/'phar
98a7('dul ba): pa 'char kha ni gzhan gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa yin pas/des bdag cag 'phrigs kyis gal te de ma bsad na bdag gi khyim thab la byas shing de bdag
98b1('dul ba): cag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis khyod kyis dro bsod cig/rlom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyis smras pa/kho bo de mi gsod do/de ni kau sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po
98b2('dul ba): gsal rgyal gyi chung po grogs btsun mo phreng ljon ma'i slob dpon yin gyis/kho bos de bsad par gyur na/kho bo rgyal pos rgya skyegs kyi khang par bcug ste bsregs pas
98b3('dul ba): 'chi bar bya dgos pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro//des smras pa gral te khyod de gsod na de lta na legs/gal te mi gsod na khyod phyin chad kho mi'i khyim
98b4('dul ba): du 'jug par mi bya'o//'dod pa bsten pa dag gis ni sdig pa'i chos mi bya ba ci yang med pas/chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon des smras pa/gal te de bzhin gyi sems shes pa
98b5('dul ba): lnga mkhas pa yin na kho bos ji ltar gsad par bya/des smras pa/thabs kyi rnam pa shig bya'o zhes des dus ma yin par tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i gan du mngag pa btang
98b6('dul ba): ste/btsun pa 'char kha bdag bro 'tshal bar gyur na/khyod kyis bdag la gzigs par ci gnang zhes spring ngo //dgra bcom pa dag ni ma bsags par shes pa dang /
98b7('dul ba): mthong ba myi 'jug pas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha yang du ma yin par zhugs te de la chos bstan par byas nas de phyi byung bar brtsams pa dang /des smras pa/'phags pa
99a1('dul ba): bdag khyod mthong na glo ba thag pa nas sud tsam zhig bzhug su gsol zhes des tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas ji srid kyi shin tu nam smos par
99a2('dul ba): gyur pa de srid du bzung nas/tshom rkun pa'i dmag dpon yang ral gri shubs nas phyung ste sgo na sdod do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha phyir phyung ba dang chom rkun
99a3('dul ba): pa'i dmag dpon snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'jig rten pha rol btang ba des/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i mgo dreng pa nas bcad dos la bsgyel to//de'i pha
99a4('dul ba): pa gsod cing 'dug pa bud med rgan mo zhig gis mthong nas/des smras pa/gzu lum byed pa 'di su yin/chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyis smras pa/su la yang
99a5('dul ba): ma zer cig/kho bos kyang 'di'i gnas skabs lta bur byas par gyur tA re/de skrag nas 'phral du smra ma phod do//bdag nyid chen po 'di'i rjes gcod pa 'ga' zhig
99a6('dul ba): phyis 'od grang snyam nas/de nyid na cang mi smra bar 'dug/snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'jig rten pha rol btang ba de gnyis kyi tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i lus
99a7('dul ba): do phyag dar gyi phung po zhig tu skyes te bzhi go/de'i nyin mo gso sbyong gi zhal ta pa rgan pa'i mtha' logasu 'dug ste smras pa/'ga' zhig gis btsun pa
99b1('dul ba): 'char kha'i 'dun bablangs sam/btsun pa 'char kha mad//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyu mchog
99b2('dul ba): byasad kyis/chos gos dag long shig dang /de'i lus la mchod par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa dang ji tsam na mnyan yod kyi sgo tshod nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi gser gyi
99b3('dul ba): 'od lta bu'i 'di gtong ba mdzad pa dang /des mnyan yod thams cad gser gtso ma'i 'od lta bus snang bar gyur to//ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsam pa/
99b4('dul ba): ci'i phyir mnyan yod thams cad gser btso ma'i 'di lta bus snang bar gyur snyam nas/des yang bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das gshogs par bzhod gor ma chag snyam nus
99b5('dul ba): de btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mnyan yod kyi lde mig khyer te sgo phye ba dang /bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshig so//ko sA lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis
99b6('dul ba): bsams pa/ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das dus ma yin par mnyan yod du gshegs snyam na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyen par dka' ba dang /bzod par
99b7('dul ba): dga' ba yin pas ngos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar ma nu si//bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun deng bcas pa mdun du gshegs nas ko sa lar byung ba
100a1('dul ba): rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin slad bzhin du rjesu 'brang zhing song ba dang /ji tsam na phyag dar
100a2('dul ba): gyi phung po'i phyogs der byon to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog de 'drir sbas kyi chung
100a3('dul ba): shig/de phyung ba dang de na gang dag tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha la brten nas/'phags pa'i bden pa dge mthong ba de dag gis gsol pa/bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshis
100a4('dul ba): gnyen lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag 'di'i lus la mchod pa bgyid par ci gnang /bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo //ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po
100a5('dul ba): gsal rgyal gyis gsol pa/'di bdag gi chung pa grogs lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 'di'i lus la mchod pa bgyid par ci ga nang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
100a6('dul ba): ma gnang ngo //btsun mo phreng ldan mas gsal ba/'di bdag gi slob dpon lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 'di'i lus la mchod pa bgyid par ci gnang /bcom
100a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis gnang ngo //de nas btsun mo deng ldan mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i lus dese dkar gyis dril phye byed du bcug nas spos chus 'khrur bcug ste/ras
100b1('dul ba): kha dog sna tshogs dag gi khyogs sbrul brgyan nas dor bcug ste byazhago//de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mdun du gshegs nAs rgyal po btsun ma
100b2('dul ba): 'khor dang bcas pa de'i phyi bzhin phye bzhin du rje su 'brang zhing song ste/sa phyogs go slebs yangs pa zhig tu bzhag nas/btsun mo phreng ldan mas smos kyi shing thams cad kyis
100b3('dul ba): phung por bcer te/bsregs nas phung po de 'o mas zhi bar byas te rus pa de dag gser gyi bum par bcug nas lam po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten rtsig tu bcug ste/
100b4('dul ba): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag bskyed zhing dri dang phreng ba rgyu dang gdug spos dang phye ma dang sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan
100b5('dul ba): 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad gshegaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs///
100b6('dul ba): bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag nyes dmigs 'di dang gzhan dag kyang dge slong dus ma yin par grong du 'jug pa las
100b7('dul ba): gyur pas dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi btsa' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa kya
101a1('dul ba): mthun no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyi 'dul ba la du sgru du'i gzhi 'di ltar dadon pa ste/yang dge sbyong gang su ma yin par glod du 'jug
101a2('dul ba): na ltung byed do zhes/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad//dge slong na ngan cu dgul/ pa dag gis yun ring du 'jug par
101a3('dul ba): mi nus pa na dge slong nad g.yig dag gis kyang nad pa dag gi bya ba nyams par byed dge slong zhal ta byed pa dag gis kyang dge 'dun gyi bya ba nyams par byed pa'i skabs de dge
101a4('dul ba): slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na dge slong 'dug pa la smos te 'gro bar bya'o//bcom ldan
101a5('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong 'dug pa la smra bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na dge slong zhig gis khyim gzhan du lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nis dzA tsam na der mi shor nas dge slong
101a6('dul ba): des der 'gro bar brtsams te/de lam gyi phyed du so pa dang /bdag gis dge slong 'dug pa la mi skyes snyam pa'i dran pa skyes nas/dri phyir log ste ji srid du dge slong 'dreg
101a7('dul ba): pa la smra bar byed pa de srid du de'i lhung bzed dong ches gos chog nas/de der song ba dang /khyim bdag gis smras pa/'phogs pa ni khyod ci'i slad du 'chi sa te b+h+yon de shi ni/
101b1('dul ba): khyod kyis lhung bzod dang chos gos tshig gis gal te khyad myur du byon par gyur na/khyod kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig par mi 'gyuro zhes zer zhing dge sbyong du yang phongs par
101b2('dul ba): gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas ni de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtog so//de nas bcom
101b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang bslab pa la gus pa dang /bslab pa la yo byad bsrung ba'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang 'thun pa dang /de'i shes che ba dang
101b4('dul ba): de deng 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsa le pA/dge slong dag de lta bas na/snga ma ni bcos pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba/
101b5('dul ba): yin te/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyi 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/yang dge slong gang dus ma yin par grang du 'jug cing dge slong 'dug pa la mi smran de
101b6('dul ba): 'a rgyun ma gtogs te ltung byed ngo do//yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'ong pa'am/gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o//dus ma yin par zhes bya ba ni dus rgya
101b7('dul ba): nyi suM ste/skya rong ma shar ba dong phyed yol bar ro//grong du zhes bya ba ni ge ni srang nga bzhi mdo dang /sum mdo dag yod par ro//'jug kyi zhes bya ba ni 'gro
102a1('dul ba): dge slong 'dug pa la mi sman zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang 'dug pa la'o//de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba'i rkyen bzhag ste'o//ltung byed
102a2('dul ba): zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dwags ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed 'tshod par byed ltung bar byed pa'o//gzhan yang ji srid du
102a3('dul ba): ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/des na ltung byed do zhes gsung so//de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong gis
102a4('dul ba): dus ma yin pa la dus ma yin par 'du shes pas grong du 'jug na ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dus ma yin pa la yid gnyis za bas grong du 'jug na ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dus la dus ma yin
102a5('dul ba): par 'du shes pas grong du 'jug na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//dus la yid gnyis za bas grong du 'jug na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//las dang po pa dang smos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang tshor
102a6('dul ba): bdag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med//btsun mo phreng ldan mas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa/lhas dge slong rnams la ni gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba stsal/
102a7('dul ba): dge slong ma rnam la ni betsun mo'i 'khor gyi yongs su spang ba stsal cing /'phags pa 'char kha lha'i ni chung po grogs legs/bdag gi ni slob dpon lags te dge slong
102b1('dul ba): rab tu grags pa de lta bu yang bcan mthong du dkum na dge slong rab tu ma grags pa gzhan dag lha la bka' mchod kyang su rmod par 'gyur/lhas 'phags pa 'char kha dro sus
102b2('dul ba): 'gum su stsal pa dang /sus bkum po bkas rma bar ci gnang /kau s+ya lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zho shas 'tsho ba drag la bgo ba/shes ldan dag deng la
102b3('dul ba): 'phags pa 'char kha sus gsod du bcug pa dang /sus bsad pa de dag rmos shig de dag rmed cing phyogaso der dong ba dang /de dag gis de na bud med rgan mo de mthong zhing des
102b4('dul ba): ni de dag ma mthong ba na/bud med rgani mo des byung rgyal du smras pa/phyogs 'dir khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog de sbas pa ni de dang de dag gis bsad do//de dag gi
102b5('dul ba): de thos nas smras pa/rgan mo ci zer/rgan mo des rmas pa/cang mi ze ro//de dag gis de bzung ste bsdigs nas de sus bsad de smros shig/ces byas pa dang /des smras pa
102b6('dul ba): bram ze'i bu mo 'dis gsod du bcu go/chom rkun pa'i dumag dpon 'dis gsad do//de dag gis yang bsdigs te ci de gnyis kho nar zad dam zhes rmos pa dang des smras pa
102b7('dul ba): gzhan yang g.yon can lnga brgya yod do//rgyal po mi de dag gis bram ze'i bu mo de dang chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon de dang /g.yon can lnga brgya po de dag bzung ste
103a1('dul ba): rgyal po la phul nas smras pa/lha 'phags pa 'char kha ni bram ze'i bu mo 'dis 'gum su brtsal te/chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon 'dis
103a2('dul ba): bku mo//g.yon can lnga brgya po 'di dag gi dmag dpon ni 'di lagaso//rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag deng la bram ze'i bu mo 'di ni rte'u dmu rgod kyi rkang pa gnyis la
103a3('dul ba): thogs shig/chom rkun po'i dmag dpon 'di ni rgyu skyegs kyi khang par chug la sregs shig/g.yon can lnga brgya po 'di dag ni lag pa dang rkang pa dag chod cig/de dag
103a4('dul ba): gis bram ze'i bu mo de ni rte'u dmu rgod kyi rkang pa gnyis la brtagaso//chom rkun po'i dmag dpon de ni rgya skyegs kyi khang par bcug ste/bsregaso//g.yon can lnga brgya
103a5('dul ba): po de dag ni lag pa dang rkang pa dag bcad do//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun po che
103a6('dul ba): dang ldan pa 'char khas las ci bgyis na/las de'i rnam par smin paso sdang ba ma mchis pa dang /gnod pa ma bgyis bzhin du de gnyis kyis bkum par gyur cing de gnyis
103a7('dul ba): kyang bkum par gyur/g.yon can lnga brgya po dag kyang lag pa dang /rkang pa dag bkum par gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de dag nyid kyi
103b1('dul ba): las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba/'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/de dag nyid kyi las byas shing bas
103b2('dul ba): pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sau ra myong bar 'gyur/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la mi
103b3('dul ba): 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur/'di ltar las dge ba dang /mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung pa dang khams dang skye mched
103b4('dul ba): dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskal pa bad+mar yang ni//chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus//rnyed na lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//
103b5('dul ba): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bA ra na si na rgyal po tshang byin zhes bya bas rgyal srid byed du bcug pa'i tshe/nyam nga ba dang bcas pa'i dus byung ba na mu stegs can dag
103b6('dul ba): gis lo bcu gnyis su than pa 'byung ngo zhes lung bston nas/rgyal po ched byin gyis dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste glang la lo bcu gnyis kyi zin yod pa dri ni 'dug shig/
103b7('dul ba): gang la med pa de ni song shig ces bsgo'o//de'i mdun na 'doni de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'dzud pa de la bram ze'i khye'u dag gis
104a1('dul ba): smras pa/mkhan po bdag cag lnga lo bcu gnyis kyi 'tshal ma ma mchi kyis bdag cag 'chi'o//des smras pa/bu dag 'khod cig dang /kho bos
104a2('dul ba): khyod la 'kho ba bstabs par bya'o//rgyal po tshang byin gyi rmi lam na bdag gi sgyu ma dag gis grong khyer thams cad dkris par mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de gzhi 'dis bdag rgyal
104a3('dul ba): srid las nyams pa 'am/tshe'i bar chad 'byung ba 'am/gcig tu mi 'gyur grangs snyam du 'jigs pa skyes par gyur nas/des rmi lam de mdun na 'don de la bzlas pa dang
104a4('dul ba): mdun na 'don des bsams pa/lhas rmang lam bzang ba zhig gzigs med kyi 'on kyang bram ze'i khye'u dog gi rnyed pa'i bar chad du gyur na mi rung gi ngan par bsnyad par bya'o/
104a5('dul ba): snyam nas des rgyal po la smras pa/lha rmang lam ngan pa zhig gzigs pas gzhi 'dis lha rgyal sed los nyams pa'am/sku tshe'i bar chad 'byung ba'am gcig tu 'gyur ro//
104a6('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa 'di la ci zhig bya/des smras pa/lba ba lang gi mchod sbyin sul bar bgyi'o//rgyal pos smras pa/de ltar bya'o//des pa lang stong phrag du ma dag bsogs pa
104a7('dul ba): dang rgyal po phyir byung nas rgyal pos ba lang de dag mthong ba dang ba lang de dag yu lang gi 'bu sgra chen po byung //rgyal pos de dag mthong zhing thos nas snying rje skyes te des mdun na 'don la
104b1('dul ba): smras pa/'di dag thams cad bsad par bya'am/mdun na 'don gyis bsams pa/rgyal po 'di dag thams cad bsad par mi 'dod do snyam nas/des smras pa/lha thams cad 'bum/
104b2('dul ba): par mi bgyi'o//de'i tshe rnga bran zhig rnga bran mo zhig la rgyab rgal byed nas/mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/lha rnga bran dang rnga bran mo 'di gnyis dgum par bgyi'o//bram ze'i khye'u de dag
104b3('dul ba): gis kyang lag pa rkyang ste 'di gnyis legs so zhes bstan nas/de gnyis ba shes pa na sems pa g.yos pa/bdag cag gnyis sdang ba med pa dang /gnod pa ma byas bzhin du
104b4('dul ba): bsad pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni mdun na 'don 'di dang bram ze'i bu lnga brgya po 'di dag gi le lan yin gyis/bdag cag gnyis gang du skyes pa na bdag tsog nyid kyis
104b5('dul ba): mdun na 'don 'di sdang ba med pa dang /gnod pa ma byas bzhin du gsod pa dang /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po 'di dag kyang lag pa dang rkang pa dag gcod du 'jud par gyur cig snyam
104b6('dul ba): du dam bcaso//dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang yin pa de ni da ltar ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yino//de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po tshangs
104b7('dul ba): sbyin gyi btsun mo gang yin pa de ni da ltar btsu na mo phreng ldan mo yino//de'i tshe de'i dus na mdun na 'di na gang yin pa de ni da ltar dge slong 'char kha yino//de'i tshe de'i dus
105a1('dul ba): na zlum ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni da ltar g.yon can lnga brgya po 'di dag yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus na rnga bran gang yin pa de ni da ltar tshom
105a2('dul ba): rkun pa'i dmag dpon yino//de'i tshe de'i dus na rje bran mo gang yin pa de ni da ltar bram ze'i bu mo yin te/mdun na 'don da dang bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po dag gis/rnga bran dang rnga bran
105a3('dul ba): me de gnyis sdang ba med pa dang /gnod pa ma byas bzhin du bsod du bcug/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas/phyeg pa nor mang
105a4('dul ba): b.longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes/las ci zhig bgyis na des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
105a5('dul ba): bgyis/las ci zhig bgyis na des dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyang mtshon gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag rigs kyi bu
105a6('dul ba): 'char kha nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/rkyen yongasu bsgyur pa/'od pa bzhin nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas 'char kha
105a7('dul ba): nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par
105b1('dul ba): smin par mi 'gyur chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba las byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin
105b2('dul ba): pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni//chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus//rnyed na lus can rnams la
105b3('dul ba): ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang bkren pa la rje su snying brtse
105b4('dul ba): ba/bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du 'byung //ji tsam na ri brags shig na rngon pa shig
105b5('dul ba): 'dug ste ri brags de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na ri dgos dang bya mang po dag gi rten du gyur pa/mtshe du zhig yod pa der rngon pa de nyi ma re re zhing ri dgas dang bya mang po dag drangs
105b6('dul ba): dbyungs pa'i phyir dang /nyams par bya ba'i phyir dang /tshul mo yin pas sdug bsngal bar bya ba'i phyir rngon spyad dang rnyi dang rnyong mang po dag 'dzugs par byed do//de'i sngon spyad dang
105b7('dul ba): snyi dang rnyod de dag kyang don yod pa yino//ji tsa mo dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba ni ri brags der phyin nas lha'i gnas shig tu mtshan mo gnos par
106a1('dul ba): /bas blangs nas/de snod sham thab sa pags byung ba dang /rgyas dus thogs te blugs der bsod snyoms la zhug so//dar byas goms rgyus
106a2('dul ba): rgas pas mas pa/lha'i gnas 'di nyin mi rgyun lugs mang ba yin gyis ri brags kyi phyi rol gyi gnas zhi ba zhig tu bsad stems bza'o snyam nas/de ri brags nas nga
106a3('dul ba): /'di ni zhi ba'o 'di mi zhi ba'o zhes mtshe'u deg la bder so skye phyin nas/rlung ba dang chu chags mtha' gcig tu bzhig sta rkang pa gnyis dkrus nas/lag
106a4('dul ba): gnyis bsgral rgyu bstsags nas/lo ma lhags pa dgu blangs te gi nas/zas kyi bye ba b+h+yas te/lhag pa gnyis bsgral nasaM/kha bkrus tAM lgang ba dang chu chugs
106a5('dul ba): gnas ji lta bo bzhin du bzhug nas rkang pa gnyis dkyus te shing drung zhig tu brtan nas/bring 'gro'i rgyal po nyal ba'i lus bsgril ba ltar skyil mo krung bcas te spyod lam
106a6('dul ba): zhi bar 'dug pa dang /de'i nyin mo mi'i dris ri dgas gcig kyang mazin to//de na mdzin pa de nang par sngar langs te/mtshe'u de ga la ba der song nas ris rngon spyad dang ste dang
106a7('dul ba): rnying de dge byung bar brtsams pa dang /ri dgas gcig kyang ma mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi rngon spyad dang ste dang rnyod 'di dag don yod pa yin no//gangag/
106b1('dul ba): sbyor dang ri dgas gcig kyang mthon pa 'di'i rgyu gang yin snyam nas/des mtsho'u de'i thon kor byul bung bsnams pa dang /mi'i rjes mthong nas da rdzas deng phyi bzhin du srung
106b2('dul ba): baM dang /rang sangs rgyas steng lam zhu bas 'dug pa de mthong nas/des bsams pa/rab tu byung ba sems zhi ba 'di dag gnas 'di lta bu dag tu mngon par dga' bar byeng
106b3('dul ba): bAs gal te bdag gis 'di'i srog gcad pa ma byas na 'di dag gis nges par bdag gi 'tshe ba gcod par byed kyis rnam pa thams cad du 'di bsad par bya'o snyam na so/
106b4('dul ba): snying med pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'jig rten pa rol btong ba des mdu' dug can gyi gzhu ba'i dbyibs 'dra bar na drung du zlog byer klu ste/rang sings rgyu su 'o gan du bsnun /
106b5('dul ba): ring sengs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsams pa/rngon pa nyon monges pa 'ad ha cing sdes pa da nyams par gyur ni mi rung gi 'di la laganas dang ba sbyin na snyamachis/
106b6('dul ba): ngang pa'i rgyal po 'ad ma btung ba lhung steng gi na mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/'bar ba dang gsal ba dang char 'bebs pa dang /glog 'byin pa'i tshe 'phrul dag
106b7('dul ba): bya bar brtsams//so sor skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas/rngon pa de shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du ngang sangs rgyas de'i rkang
107a1('dul ba): gnyis kyi drung du 'gyel nas/smras pa/yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mar gshegs su gsol/mar gshegs su gsol/nyon mongs
107a2('dul ba): pa'i 'dam du bying ba bdag gi sug pa nas drang ba stsal du gsol/rang sangs rgyas de rngon pa de la rjesu snying rtse ba'i phyir steng gi nA mkha' las shod du bab so//de nas rngon pa des zug rngu
107a3('dul ba): med par byas te/rma lhan gyis klan nas smras pa/'phags pa sdum par gshegs su gsol/gal te 'dir gser gyi lhan pas klan par mdzad na/de yang bdag gis
107a4('dul ba): sbyar bar bgyi'o//rang sangs rgyas kyis bsams pa/bdag gi rnag gi lus 'dis thob par bya ba gang yin pa thob zin pas/de'i phyir da ni phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las
107a5('dul ba): 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/de rngon pa de nyid kyi mdun du yang na mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te/cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag rnam par bston nas/
107a6('dul ba): phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so//rngon pa de nor dang ldan pa yin pas des spos kyi shing thams cad kyi phung por bcer
107a7('dul ba): sregs nas phung po de'o mos zhi bar byas te/rus pa de dag gser gyi bum par bcug nas/lam po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten rtsig tu bcug ste/gdugs dang
107b1('dul ba): rgyal mtshon dang ba dan dag bsgreng zhing dri dang phreng ba rgyu dang /bdug spos dang /phye ma dang /sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byas nas/rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/smon ldam
107b2('dul ba): 'di skad ces bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i chu dang 'thun par ma gyur par mchod par byas pa gang yin pa'i
107b3('dul ba): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skye bar gyur cig ces gang bo//dge slong dag de la de'i tshe de'i dus na rngon pa gang yin pa de ni 'char
107b4('dul ba): kha 'di yin te/des rang sangs rgyas kyi gan du mnga'o dug can gyi bsnun pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med
107b5('dul ba): par gdungs nas las de nyid kyi lkog mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar 'tshe'u 'gram de nyid du ri dgas su skyes shing mtshan gyi dus la bab ste/da ltar gyi bar du yang dgra bcom
107b6('dul ba): pa thob kyang de mtshon gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'daso//me chod pa byas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni dra ltar phyug pa nor ma kha longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skye so//
107b7('dul ba): btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char khaso las ci bgyis na/las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di'i dus la bab pa'i lus phyag dar gyi phung po ro sbas pa dang /'dis
108a1('dul ba): ston pa mnyes par bgyis shing thugs byung bar ma bgyis pa dang /'di dus la bab pa'i lus la ston pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang ngacas
108a2('dul ba): pa dang /rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas lus kyi mched pa bgyis pa de lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs thob par gyur/dge slong dag 'char kha nyid kyi las tshogs
108a3('dul ba): rnyed pa na yongs su bsgyur ba/'dra ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsngags pas 'char kha nyid kyi las byas
108a4('dul ba): shing bsags pa drug gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/dge slong dag las byis shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par
108a5('dul ba): mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur/'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag
108a6('dul ba): ni zin po'i phung po dang /khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni//chud mi zla ba 'ang tshogs dang dus//rnyed na
108a7('dul ba): lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe/rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /
108b1('dul ba): bkren pa la rjesu snying rtse ba/bas mtha' gnas mal la dga' ba/bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byungango //grangs kyi sul zhig na
108b2('dul ba): rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas te de na rang sangs rgyas cig cig na bar gyur nas gzhan dag gis de la smras pa/khyed bzhud la sman pa ma smos te chos mdzod cig/de ri brags
108b3('dul ba): gzhan zhig tu song nas mtshan mo rdza mkhan gyi ra ba zhig tu gnas par khas blangs pa dang /de mtshan mo na bar gyur nas dus la bab po//rdza mkhan des de mthong nas des
108b4('dul ba): bsams pa/rab tu byung ba 'di rdza ma so btang ba dang ma btang ba dag gi nang du dus la bab pas/'jig rten ni gtsang sbra 'dod pa yin pas gal te skye bo dag gi tshor bar
108b5('dul ba): gyur na 'ga' yang snod nye bar mi 'gyu ro snyam nas/des rang sangs rgyas de'i lus de phyag dar gyi phung po zhig tu sbas te bzhago/rang sangs rgyas gzhan dag gis bsams pa/
108b6('dul ba): bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod par de gar song snyam nas bltas pa dang /ji tsam na yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong nas/de dag gis de nyid nas spos kyi
108b7('dul ba): shing dag steng gi nam mkha' las khyer te 'ongs nas rdza mkhan gyi ra bar babs pa dang /rdza mkhan gyi de dag mthong nas des smras pa/'phags pa dag gar gshegs/de dag
109a1('dul ba): gos smras pa/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la mchod pa byed du'o//rdzu mkhan gyis smras pa/'dis kyang khyud kyi yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu
109a2('dul ba): thob bam/de dag gis smras pa thob bo//rdza mkhan gyis smras pa/bdog gis 'di la bkur sti mI legs pa bgyis pas da bkur sti bgyi ba'i bar du yud tsam zhig bzhi su
109a3('dul ba): gsol/de sang ste rgyal po la smras pa/lte bdag gir bar rab tu byung ba brtul zhugs grub pa zhig dus la bab kyis lhas de la bkur sti mdzad du gsol/rgyal po'i
109a4('dul ba): btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa phyir byung nas des rang sangs rgyas kyi lus de spos kyi shing thams cad kyi phung por bcer te bsregs nis phung po de mas zhi bar byas te rus
109a5('dul ba): pa de dag gser gyi bum par btsug nas lam po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten cig tu bcug ste gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag bsgreng zhing dri dang phreng po
109a6('dul ba): rgyu dang 'dug spyos dang phyi ma dang sil snyan dag gis mchod par bya'o//rdza mkhan des rkang pa gnyis lnga phyag 'tshol te smon lam 'di spyad ces bdag yon gnas yang dang /
109a7('dul ba): zer gyur pa 'di ste tshul gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de tshe dang 'thun par ma gyur par mchong po byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'dri bas khyad bang
109b1('dul ba): du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar byed par mi 'gyur ba dang /bdag dus la bab pa'i lus la yang ston pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /rgyal po
109b2('dul ba): tsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa mchod pa mdzad par gyur cig ces btab 'o//dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rdza mkhan gang yin pa de ni da ltar dge slong 'char khwa 'di yon te/
109b3('dul ba): 'dis de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas de dus la bab pa'i lus phyag dar gyi phung por sbas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni de ltar 'di dus la bab pa'i lus phyag dar gyi phung por smoso//
109b4('dul ba): 'dis de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas kyi lus de la mchod pa byas te smon lam de skad btab pa'i wa de'i rnam par smin pas ni/de ltar 'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad
109b5('dul ba): par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas te 'di dus la bab pa'i lus la ston pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang btsos pa dang /rgyal po btsun mo'i
109b6('dul ba): 'khor dang bcas pas lus kyi mchod pa byas par gyur to//btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi khyim pa
109b7('dul ba): dad par bgyid pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan/da ni smon lam gyi dbang gis te/gang du smon lam btab ce na/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bsgral pa chen po
110a1('dul ba): bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
110a2('dul ba): pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na mod pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom
110a3('dul ba): ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste/de bA ra na sin drang srong smra bo'i ri dgas kyi nags na nye bar bsten cing bzhugs so//de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas dge
110a4('dul ba): slong gang gis de rib tu phyung ba'i dge slong de de bzhin gshogs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchos
110a5('dul ba): tu bstan to//de na 'dis ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam 'di skad ces/bdag gis bcom
110a6('dul ba): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'odi srungs la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon
110a7('dul ba): tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma tho ba ste/bdag gi tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag
110b1('dul ba): lam pa yang byung rdzogs sa rgyas da srung nas dang rnam la ng+gA rgya da ma 'os pa dus su ma bsgrusgrub par//de bzhin ga shegs drug cwan/
110b2('dul ba): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rog pa dang zhab su ldan pa dade bor gshegs pa 'jog rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu'i dul ba'i kho la bsgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams
110b3('dul ba): kyi smyon pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyuraro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dgra bcom
110b4('dul ba): pa nyid mngon du byed cing /ji ltar mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis khyim pa dang par byed pa
110b5('dul ba): rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa shAkya sedr-i shAkya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo des khyim pa dang por byed pa rnams kyo mchog tu bston par
110b6('dul ba): gyur cig ces btub par brtsams pa dang /smon lam do'i dbang gis de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to//dge slong dag de
110b7('dul ba): ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag pa yin la gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang dkar ba yin la/las
111a1('dul ba): 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yino//dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang /'dren ma rnams spangs te//
111a2('dul ba): las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la bskul bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyi de ltar bslab par bya'o//dus ma yin par 'gro ba'i ltung byed de brgyad bcu pa rdzogaso//
111a3('dul ba): 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/bam po re brgyad pa/sdom la/zas bcas skye reng du gdod dang //khab ral dang ni khri rkang dang //bdal dang 'di dag yin pa dang //ras
111a4('dul ba): chen bde gshegs chos gos so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod no rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//mnyan yod na
111a5('dul ba): khyim bdag zhig 'dug pa de'i khyim du nye dga' dus dang dus su 'gro zhing des de skabasu 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzho dag la bzhago/dus gzhan zhig na des de la rdzas
111a6('dul ba): los byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po dag gi bsngags pa brgya cher brjod pa dang /des smras pa 'phags pa bdag gis kyang rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams
111a7('dul ba): bya ba'i gzhi cung zad bgyi'o//nye dgas smras pa/legs kyis de bzhin gyis shig/ci zhig byed/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs
111b1('dul ba): rgod gsaso//khyim bdag khyod kyis sems rgya chen po bskyed kyis gdugs tshod gsal cig/'phags pa khyod kyis bdag gi ming gis sangs rgyas la so gas pa dge slong na
111b2('dul ba): dge 'dun sang bdog gi sdom por gdugs tshod la spyan pa sa pa'i rigs//des dang du blang po//de nas tshe dang ljon pa nye dgas khyim bdag de la/oM rog gya zhes byas ste song nas
111b3('dul ba): dregadug lag khang du song ste/des khyim bdag de'i ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan dras pa dang /dge slong rnam
111b4('dul ba): skyes pa/tshe dang ldan pa te dga' khyim bdag de ma dad pa sbyin no khyud kyis ji ltar rjes su 'jug par gyis/nye dgas skyes ng+ge/tshe dang ldan pa dag nye dga' la de tsam yi
111b5('dul ba): mA~M gnas sam/rje su 'jug par byas po 'ba' shig tu mazad kyis skye bsu 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dgo la yang bzhag/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/legs pa byas
111b6('dul ba): kyi 'dod la bza' bar bye'o//chos nyid kyis nA gang gi d+mor dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs pa de dus sgyur 'gro ba yin pasna tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dus der song nas des
111b7('dul ba): khyim bdag de la smras pa khyim bdag khro bo'i khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim dag lta ba'i bar du khyod re shig zhel zas sta gan gyis shig/kho bas me 'ongs kyi bar du yang
112a1('dul ba): khyod kyi re shig brim pa ni bya'o zhes smras te song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo
112a2('dul ba): song la dge slong rnams la khyim bdag de rgyus mi shes pa yin pas/des sman 'dren gtong bar mi byed kyis/dus sngar shed shig dang /'dong ngo zhes sgo shig/tshe dang ldan
112a3('dul ba): pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la bsgo ba dang /dge slong rnams chas te lhags//de nas bcom ldan
112a4('dul ba): 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te sgo drung na gzheso//de nas
112a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la khyim bdag de la sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sgo drung na ba zhes
112a6('dul ba): kyis ci bder gyis shig ces bsgo shig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas nang du song ste/khyim
112a7('dul ba): bdag de la khyim bdag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sgo drung na gzhes kyi ci bder gyis shig/khyim bdag gis smras pa/'phags pa bdag gis khyed
112b1('dul ba): cagaci 'dir ci lags ni mi 'tshal kya 'di ltar khyed cag kho na'i slad du gdan dag bshams kyi bzhugs su gas so/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/
112b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag de'i mchid nas/bdag gis khyed cig gi ci bde ci lags ni ma 'tshal gyi/'di ltar khyed cag kho na'i slad du gdan bshams kyi bzhugasu gsol
112b3('dul ba): zhes mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gal te de skad zer na khyed cag kho na'i phyir stan dge ba shams pas ci bde byas par brjod par bya ste/'dug par bya
112b4('dul ba): gling 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs pa dang /ji tsam na gdugs tshod la bab tu nye nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das
112b5('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la khyim bdag la gdugs tshod bab tu nyes/zhal zas rims shig/zas 'dis khyod la ci bya zhes
112b6('dul ba): gyis shig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bak+Sha bzhir 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas khyim bdag la sgo ba dang /des smras pa/'phagam pa nye dga'
112b7('dul ba): mchis sam/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/khyim bdag ma 'ongs//des smras pa/'phags pa da mchi'i bar du yud tsam zhig bzhi su gsol/bcom ldan 'das
113a1('dul ba): la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag de'i mchid nas nye dga' mchis sam zhes mchi nas/bdag gi ma
113a2('dul ba): mchi so zhes bgyis pa dang /de'i mchid nas de mchi'i bar du yud tsam zhig bzhes su gsol zhes mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis yud tsam zhig bzhes nas yang tshe
113a3('dul ba): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la khyim bdag la gdugs chod la bab kyi zhal zas rims shig/zas rul par gyur pa 'dis khyod la ci
113a4('dul ba): zhig bya zhes gyi zhig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas khyim bdag la bsgo ba dang /des smras pa/
113a5('dul ba): 'phags pa nye dga' mchis sam/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/khyim bdag ma 'ongs so//des smras pa/'phags pa de mchi'i bar du yud tsam zhig pa zhes
113a6('dul ba): su gsol/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag de'i mchid nas nye dga' mchis sam zhes mchi nas
113a7('dul ba): bdag gis ma mchi so zhes bgyis pa dang /de mchid nas de mchi'i bar du yud tsam zhig bzhes su gsol zhes mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
113b1('dul ba): kun dga' bo song la khyim bdag la nye dga' 'ongs par ma gyur na zan sbyin par mi byed dam zhes gyis shig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
113b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/khyim bdag la de skad smras pa dang /des smras pa/'phags pa mi gsol lo//bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol
113b3('dul ba): pa/bcom ldan 'das mi gsol lo zhes mchi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa bka' stsal pa/gzhan dbang thams cad sdug bsngal te//bdag
113b4('dul ba): dbang thams cad bde ba yin//thun mong dag gis gnod byed de//'brel pa shin tu 'da' bar dka'//ji tsam na gdugs tshod kyi mtha' la bab pa na/nye dka'i 'ongs nas
113b5('dul ba): des smras pa/khyim bdag mi 'drim pa ci snod des smras pa/'phags pa khyod kyi zhal nas kho bo ma 'ongs kyi bar du re shig brim par mi bya'o zhes byung la da 'di skad ces gsung
113b6('dul ba): ngam/nye dga' shags med nas cang mi smra bar 'dug/de nas khyim bdag des brim par brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na gdugs tshod yol nas/dge slong kha cig gis
113b7('dul ba): ni zan thob nas zan bcad pa byas/kha cig gis ni zan ma thob pa kho nar zan me thob pa zan bcad pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad de bsheg
114a1('dul ba): nya dga' ngo tsha bar gyur pa'i snying gis de nyid du 'dug/de'i nyin mo gso sbyong gi zhal ta pa rgan pa'i mtha' log su 'dug ste/dge slong rnams la
114a2('dul ba): yang dag par sgo zhing smras pa/btsun pa nye dga' ma mchis sam/'ga' zhig gos de'i mdun pa blangs sa mo/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/de ma 'ongs te sus kyang de'i 'dun pa
114a3('dul ba): yang ma blangaso//dge slong gzhan dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag nye dgas bdag cag snga dro ni zang zing gi byed la thob brtsams la da ni chos kyi phyed la tho 'tsham por byed//
114a4('dul ba): dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag zas dang bcas pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas snga dro dang phyi dro khyim dag tu rgyu bar byed ces smod par byed/phyor kha gtong bar byed kho zer
114a5('dul ba): bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skab so 'di la dge slong gi dag 'don bsdu ba
114a6('dul ba): mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs
114a7('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/nye dga' khyod zas dang bcas pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas snga dro dang byi dro khyim dag tu rgyu bar byed pa bden nam/btsun pa
114b1('dul ba): mad//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa/rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa//tshul dang 'thun pa ma
114b2('dul ba): yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge
114b3('dul ba): slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhi no//nga'i
114b4('dul ba): nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/yang dge slong gang zas dang bcas pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas snga dro dang phye dro khyim dag tu
114b5('dul ba): rgyu na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bar mdzad//dge slong na ngan can dag 'khod pa dag gis yun ring du
114b6('dul ba): 'dug mi nus nas/dge slong nad g.yog rnams kyis nad pa'i bya ba nyams par byed cing /dge slong zhal ta byed pa dag gis kyang dge 'dun gyi bya ba nyams par byed nas bcom
114b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim pa 'dug pa la bsgo bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim po 'dug pa la bsgo bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong zhig
115a1('dul ba): gis khyim gzhan du lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig nas/ji tsam na der me shor nas/dge slong des der 'gro bar brtsams te/de lam gyi phyed du son
115a2('dul ba): pa dang /bdag gi khyim pa 'dug pa la ma bsgo'i snyam pa'i dran pa skyes nas de phyir log ste ji srid du khyim pa 'dug pa la bsgo bar byed pa de srid du de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig
115a3('dul ba): nas de der song ba dang /khyim bdag gis smras pa/'phags pa khyod ci'i slad du mchis te byon khyod kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig gi/gal te khyod myur du byon par gyur
115a4('dul ba): na khyod kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig par mi 'gyuraro zhes zer zhing dge slong de yang phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol po dang /bcom
115a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtog so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /bslab pa la gus pa dang /bslab pa la yo
115a6('dul ba): byad bsnyung ba'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang 'thun pa dang /de'i shas che ba dang de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mched mdzad nas dge slong rnams la
115a7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin te/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya
115b1('dul ba): ste/yang dge slong gang zas dang bcas pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas snga dro dang byi dro khyim dag tu rgyu zhing /khyim pa 'dug pa la mi sgo na/de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed//yang
115b2('dul ba): dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o//zas dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba ni/'gren du bos pa dang bcas pa'o//khyim zhes bya ba ni byem
115b3('dul ba): ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim du'o//'gron du bos nas shes bya ba ni bsod snyoms kyi phyiraro//snga dro zhes bya ba ni snga dro nyid de khyim gnyis las lhag par rgyu na'o//phyi dro zhes bya ba ni phyi dro de
115b4('dul ba): nyid khyim gsu lnga lhag par rgyu na'o//khyim dag tu zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gi khyim+bu dag tu'o//rgyu zhing zhes bya ba ni 'gro zhing ngo //khyim po 'dug po la mi sgo na
115b5('dul ba): zhes bya ba ni da ni khyim pa gang 'dug pa la'o//de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba'i rkyen bzhag ste'i//ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang
115b6('dul ba): yi dgos ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed 'tshed par byed/ltung bar byed pa'o//gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so so rim be sha
115b7('dul ba): na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/des na ltung byed do zhes gsungaso//de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong ji tsam cung zad zas dang bcas pa'i khyim du
116a1('dul ba): mgron du bos na snga dro khyim gnyis las lhag par rgyu zhing phyi dro yang khyim gsum las lhag par rgyun thams cad ltung byed du 'gyur ro//de'i ngor
116a2('dul ba): mgon du bos pa ma yin no//ltung ba med//las dang po pa dang smras pa dang sems 'khregs pa dang tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do//grong rgyu ba'i ltung byed de brgyud cu gcig
116a3('dul ba): pa rdzogaso////sgo gtan gyi bslab pa'i gzhi'i bor sdom la/dga' ba nye dga' zhag bdun dang //bzang sbyin sdum byed tshul khrim sa dang //nag po'i tshig bcad
116a4('dul ba): 'char kha dang //bcu dang bslab bzhi'i rim pa dang //grong khyer gnyis dang g.yul gzhi dang //lha mo khar phar 'phyang ba dang //sngo sangs rgyal srid bog ka na//ma la khar ba byin pa
116a5('dul ba): dang //lham gyi dbang phyug mnyan yod dang //sngon gyi tshul dang nor bzang dang //drang srong rnams dang gtsug lag khang //mgu byed dang ni bzung byed dang //skyong thub dang ni 'brog
116a6('dul ba): gnas dang //lag brgyud dang ni sngo bsangs can//mig gdung rnams su skyes pa dang //dpa' chen dang ni skyer mchog dang //dpe med ma dang lcags mgar dang 'brog sid ga la dang
116a7('dul ba): shar ba dang //snyan smre dang ni tshig pa dang //sgur dang thos pa 'dzin pa dong //bran mo dang ni bram ze mo//mgu byed dpal ldan gyur pa dang //shA ri'i bu ne bzhugs pa/
116b1('dul ba): dag/sgo bstan yang dag bsdus pa yin//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshul mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de nas bcom
116b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dgon pa dang shing drung dang khyim gyis stong pa dang ri sul dang ro phug dang rtsa sbrel dang bla gab med pa dang /dur khrod
116b3('dul ba): dang nags khrod dang ri drung dang bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di drug tu bsam gtan gyis shig/dge slong dag bag yod par bsgrub so la phyis 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar
116b4('dul ba): gyis shig/'di ni de'i gdam drug dang rje su bstan pa yin//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal nas/dge slong rnams dgon pa dang shing drung dang
116b5('dul ba): khyim gyis stong pa dang ri sul dang ri phug dang rtswa spyil dang /bla gab med pa deng dur khrod dang nags khrod dang /ri drung dang bas mtha'i gnas me lnga dag tu zhugs te/kha tsog ni
116b6('dul ba): ri rab kyi bang rim na bsam gtan byed/kha cig no gser gyi ri bdun po dag la/khe cig ni mtsho chen po ma dros pa na/kha cig ni rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab na/kha cig ni rnal
116b7('dul ba): 'byor pa'i skye bo dang rje su 'thun po'i grong dang grong rdal dang yul dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi phyogs de dang de dag na bsam gtan byed do//ri'i rgyal po re rab
117a1('dul ba): dpag tshad brgyud khri na chu'i nang du 'dug/dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu lus mngon par 'phags te de la dpag chud 'bum drug khri yod//re'i rgyal
117a2('dul ba): po ri rab kyi ngos re re la dpag tshad brgyad khri brgyad khri yod do//de dag la dpag tshad sumi 'bum nyi khri yod do//ri'i rgyal po ri rab rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa gzugs
117a3('dul ba): bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yin//der klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis skyes nas de gnyis lus kyis de lan gsum dkris te 'khod cing bskal par gnas
117a4('dul ba): pas sa 'dzin pa/'dab chags kyi rgyal po 'dab bzangs kyis dbyungs par mi nus pa yin//de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te bdag cag gnyis kyi bsod nams la
117a5('dul ba): gnas 'di byung ngo snyam nas de gnyis ser snas kun nas dkris pas nyin mo la ni gsum mi mthun pa'i rlung gtong ste/des ri rab kyi bang rim la gnas pa'i ri dgas dang
117a6('dul ba): bya mang po dag tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to//de na dge slong gang dag ri rab kyi bang rim na bsam gtan byed pa de dag kyang mi mthun pa'i rlung des skya bo bseng bsad
117a7('dul ba): por gyur cing rid pa dang nyam chung ba dang /rke ba dang lus ma thob par gyur nas/de dag dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
117b1('dul ba): phyag 'tshal du mnyan yod du lhags pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis de dag mthong nas smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs 'ongs pa legaso//khyed drug gA wa ring
117b2('dul ba): khyed cag dbyar gang du gnas par khas blangs/de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cig ri rad kyi bang rim nas 'drir 'ongaso//bdag cag ri rab kyi dang rim
117b3('dul ba): du dbyar gnas par khas blangs so//dge slong rnams la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag ca'i phyir skya bo bseng ba seng por gyur cing /rid pa dang nyam chung ba dang /rke ba dang
117b4('dul ba): lus ma thob par gyur/de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag/ri rab kyi bang rim du klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dgu' gnyis skyes nas/de gnyis kyi lus kyis de lan gsum
117b5('dul ba): dkyus te 'khod cing /bsgral par gnas pas sa 'dzin pa 'deb chags kyi rgyal po 'dab bzengs kyis dbyung bar mi nus pa yin//de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/bdag cag gnyis
117b6('dul ba): kyi bsod nams kyi gnas 'di byung //snyam nas de gnyis ser snas kun nas dkris pas nyin mo lan gsum mi mthun pa'i rlung gtong ste des ri rab kyi bang rim la gnas pa'i ri dgas dang
117b7('dul ba): bya mang po dag tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to//bdag cag kyang mi mthun pa'i rlung des skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing /rid pa dang /nyam chung ba dang /rke ba dang lus ma
118a1('dul ba): thob par gyur to//dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed gnyis kyis 'dul bar mi nus sam/de dag gis smras pa/
118a2('dul ba): dang ldan pa dag re shig de gnyis bdag cag gis gdul ba ma yin//'o na sus gdul ba yin/nyan thos chen pos gdul ba yin zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
118a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgangs pa de gnyis gang gis gdul ba yin snyam nas/dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos gdul ba yin
118a4('dul ba): bar gzigs shing mkhyen nas/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu ri rab kyi dang rim na klu'i rgyal po dga' ba dang nye dga' bo gnyis
118a5('dul ba): la sems shig/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
118a6('dul ba): bar zhugs te/ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag nas mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur cing /ri rab kyi bang rim du son par gyur pa da lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
118a7('dul ba): zhugs//de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis gnyid log par gyur nas/des se gol gyis sad par bya bar brtsams na de gnyis ma sad do//des
118b1('dul ba): gnyis kyi steng du bcag par brtsams na de lta na yang de gnyis ma sad do//des de gnyid kyi ltor zhugs te/sprin chen po bzhin du 'brug skrag par brtsams na de lta na yang de gnyis ma
118b2('dul ba): sad do//des klu chen po'i lus kyi ri'i rgyal por rab la lan bdun bkres te steng du gdengs ka chen po byas te bdug pa dang /de gnyis khur lci bas mnan pas sad do//ji tsam na klu
118b3('dul ba): chen po zhig gis bdag cag gnyis mnon par mthong nas/de gnyis kyis bsams pa/klu rdzu 'phrul chen po zhig byung ste bdag cag gnyis gnas 'di nas nyams pa gyur gyis
118b4('dul ba): bros te 'dong ngo snyam du rig nas skrag ste bram ze'i khye'u'i kha dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas 'bros par brtsamaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul
118b5('dul ba): mngon par 'du bya ba de phyir bsdus nas de gnyis kyi mdun du 'dug ste smras pa/klu'i dbang po gnyis ger 'dod /de gnyis kyi smras pa/klu rdzu 'phrul chen po zhig byung ste/bdeg
118b6('dul ba): cag gnyis go nas 'di nas nyams par gyur gyis 'gros su 'gro'o//des smras pa/chur gshegs klu de ci 'dra ba blta'o//de gnyis de dang lhan cig phyir leg pa dang /
118b7('dul ba): tsam na mi snang nas de gnyis kyis smras pa/'bags pas bdag cag gnyis la datu re me bgyim sam/des smras pa/de yin no//'o na bdag cig gnyis kyis nongs pa
119a1('dul ba): bgyis/rga ba'i chos can khyed gnyis kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya 'ongs pa la ma bsam so//'phags pa khyod sangs rgyas kyi pho nya lags sam/sangs rgyas
119a2('dul ba): kyi pho nya yi no//'phags pa gal te khyad sangs rgyas kyi pho nya lags na bdag cag gnyis kyi ci bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga kho
119a3('dul ba): nar 'dong ngo //'phags pa ma nongs te de bzhin bgyi yi bzhud do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis khrid nas bcom ldan
119a4('dul ba): 'das ga la ba der song ste/phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan
119a5('dul ba): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa ma'u dgal gyi ba chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi slad du bdag la bka' stsal pa'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang
119a6('dul ba): nye dga' de gnyis ni 'di lags//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal pa dga' bo dang nyi dga' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//klu dbang po khyed gnyis sngon gyi nyes
119a7('dul ba): par spyad pas klu'i skye gnas ngan par skyes shing khyed gnyis da ltar drag shul can lag pa khrag gi gos pa/nyams pa dang rab tu nyams pa la zhon pa/gzhan gyi srog
119b1('dul ba): 'phrog pa/gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed de/'di nas shi 'phos na khyed gnyis kyi 'gro ba cir 'gyur/skye ba ni cir 'gyur/tshe phyi ma ni cir 'gyur/de gnyis kyis
119b2('dul ba): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis kyis ci zhig bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/klu'i dbang po gnyis tshur shegs
119b3('dul ba): nga'i drung du skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi drag long la/ri rab kyi bang rim la gnas pa'i ri dgas deng bya rnams la mi 'jigs pa byin cig/de gnyis kyis gsol pa/
119b4('dul ba): btsun po bdag cag gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyab su mtsho ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi drag ldan cing ri rab kyi bang rim la gnas pa'i ri dgas drang byi rnams la mi
119b5('dul ba): 'jigs pa stsol to//de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi skyon sngar skyab su 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo ngos
119b6('dul ba): byug 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sde nas drong ngo //dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa stengs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
119b7('dul ba): botsun pa klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nyi dga' gnyis kyis las ci bgyis na de'i rnam par smin pas klu'i nang du skyes na//las ci bgyis ni des rin po che sna bzhi las bgyis
120a1('dul ba): pa'i gnas mngon par grub cing /lha'i bdud rtsi'i zas dang sbrang rtsi chang gi btung ba dang /re re la yang 'khor nyis stong lnga brgya dang ldan par gyur
120a2('dul ba): las ci bgyis na/des bskul par gnas pas 'dzin pa/'dab chags kyi rgyal po 'dab bzangs kyi dbyung bar rngo mi thog par gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
120a3('dul ba): pa/dge slong dag 'di gnyis kyi las tshogs rnyed pa/rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba/'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing
120a4('dul ba): bsags pas/'di gnyis kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzha na su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol
120a5('dul ba): gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/'di ltar las dge ba
120a6('dul ba): dang /mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskal pa brgyur yang ni//
120a7('dul ba): chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus//rnyed na lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di nyid la skye
120b1('dul ba): dgu'i tshe lo nyi khro thub pa na/ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig
120b2('dul ba): rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de dge
120b3('dul ba): slong nyi khris bskor tsong grong khyer bA ra na se na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhug so//de'i tshe na grong khyer bA ra na sau na/rgyal po kr-i kr-i zhes bya bas/
120b4('dul ba): rgyal srid 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa/skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/'u thab mo dang 'thab pa dang /phyi dgra dang /nang 'ikhrug rab tu zhi ba/tshim rkun dang /mu
120b5('dul ba): glo dang bral po/sa lu dang bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste/chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rgyal pos/chos kyi rgyal srid
120b6('dul ba): byed du bcu go/rgyal po kri kri de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen
120b7('dul ba): pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i khe lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste/de dge slong nyi khris bskor cing
121a1('dul ba): grong khyer bA ra Na son drang srong smra ba dwags kyi nags na nye bar gartan cing bzhugs zhes thos s+ho//thos nas kyang rgyal pa'i 'byor pa chen po dang
121a2('dul ba): rgyal po'i mthu chen pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi la ba der song ste/rgyal po kri kris yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
121a3('dul ba): cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par mdzes pa/'od 'dom gang gis gzun can brgyan pa nyi ma stong pa lhag bI 'od dang ldan pa/rin po che'i ri bo kun
121a4('dul ba): tu 'gro ba ltor bzang ba mthong mthong ma thag tu rgyal po kr-i kr-i/bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la shin tu dad pa skyes nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der song ste phyi
121a5('dul ba): nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to mtha' gcig tu 'dug//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis
121a6('dul ba): rgyal po kri kri'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/gang thos na rgyal po kri kr-is stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri
121a7('dul ba): rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed
121b1('dul ba): pa'i chos bstan pa mdzod//des bden pa mthong nas/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma
121b2('dul ba): bgyis/l-I lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/snron gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang mu bkyis/byams pa dang mdza' ba shes dang rtsa lag gi
121b3('dul ba): tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/rus pa'i ri dgas los ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bku mo/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/sems
121b4('dul ba): can du myal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhago zhes lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do//yang smras pa/khyod mthos rab
121b5('dul ba): drag nyos pa mang ldan pa'i//ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i//mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni//mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur//shin tu
121b6('dul ba): rnam dag khyod brteni bdag gis ni//de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing //go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal bar gyur/'gro ba lha
121b7('dul ba): min mi dang lhas mchod pa//skye dang rga dang no 'chi ba bab po//srid pa steng du mthong ba rab dkon pa//thub pa da ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis//shes smras te ston las langs nas//
122a1('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la lan gsum bskor ba byas te zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas song ngo //grang gi tshe rgyal po/
122a2('dul ba): kri kris yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar bden pa dag mthong ba de'i tshe na de don gyi gnasu 'dug ste/blon po dang grong khyer ba dang yul mi rnams la smras
122a3('dul ba): pe/kwa'e blon po dang grong khyer ba dang yul mi dag nyon cig/ngas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar bden pa dag mthong bas da ngas chos
122a4('dul ba): dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug mi nus kyi/de'i phyir khyod kyis gzhon nu legs skyes rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag por zhig shig dang /nga yang dag par rdzogs
122a5('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas/yang dge ba kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //de la blon
122a6('dul ba): po'i mcho go dga' ba dang nye dga' zhes bya ba gnyis shig yod pa de gnyis kyis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/lhas mtshan ma tsam 'bo'i shig mdzad cig
122a7('dul ba): dang bdag cag gnyis kyis chos kyis lha'i rgyal srid bgyid du bstsal to//rgyal pos smras pa/gal te de ltar ni byed du chug shig/de gnyis kyis ji srid pa de srid du chos
122b1('dul ba): kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug nas yang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du gzhug par bsams pa dang /de gnyis kyi nye du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab
122b2('dul ba): tu byung ba de dag de gnyis kyi gan du 'ongs te smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gnyis chos kyi rgyal srid byed du chug shig/chos dang chos ma yin pas byed du ma gzhug shig/sems can dmyal
122b3('dul ba): ba la gzhol bar 'gyur bar ma byed cig/de gnyis kyis de dag las thos nas ji srid du chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug nas yang chos dang chos ma yin pas/rgyal srid byed du
122b4('dul ba): gzhug par brtsams pa dang /de dag yang de gnyis kyi gan du 'ong ste smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gnyis chos kyi rgyal srid byed du chug shig chos dang chos ma yin pas byed du ma
122b5('dul ba): gzhug shig/sems can dmyal ba la gzhol bar 'gyur bar mi byed cig/de gnyis kyis smras pa/'phags pa dge bdag cag blon po dag ni rgyal srid bgyid du stsol ba
122b6('dul ba): gsung tshig 'thun pas 'tsho ba logs pas gcig tu chos kyi rgyal srid bgyid du rtsol ba'i rngo mi thig ste/nges pa kho nar khyad par can me lags pa dog ni tsher gcad par
122b7('dul ba): bgyis shing khyad par can dag ni yongs su bskyang bar bgyi 'tshalo//de dag gis smras pa/gal te de lta na yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i gtsug lag khang byed du
123a1('dul ba): bcug la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la dul la/dge slong rnams la ni gzhon nu'i yong
123a2('dul ba): su spang ba byin cig/dge slong ma rnams la ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi yongs su spangs pa byin cig dang /des khyed gnyis la yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro//
123a3('dul ba): de gnyis kyis smras pa/'phags pa dag mnongs kyi de bzhin bgyi'o//zhes de gnyis kyi yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i gtsug lag khang byed du bcug ste/yang
123a4('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul zhing /dge slong rnams la ni gzhon nu'i yongasu spong ba byin/dge slong ma rnams la ni
123a5('dul ba): btsun mo'i 'khor gyi yongasu spang ba byin no//dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po kri kri'i blon po'i mchog dga' bo dang nye dga' zhes bya ba de gnyis ni da ltar klu'i rgyal po
123a6('dul ba): dga' bo dang nye dga' 'di gnyis yin te/de gnyis kyis chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug pa gang yin pa des ni klu rnams kyi nang du skyes so//yo byad thams
123a7('dul ba): cad phun sum tshogs pa'i gtsug lag khang byed du bcug ste/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa l-i phul ba gang yin pa des
123b1('dul ba): norin pa chis ban las byas pa'i gnas mngon par grub cid lta'u dadud rtsi ba zis dang klung ci'i chang gyi gA dbu dang /re re gA yang 'khor nyis spyod lnga brgya dang ldan par gyur to//dge slong
123b2('dul ba): rnams la gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba byin pa dang /dge slong ma rnams la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi yongs su spang ba byin pa gang yin pa de ni bskal par gnas pos sa 'dzin pa//
123b3('dul ba): 'dab chags kyi rgyal po 'dab bzangs kyi dbyung bar mi nus par gyur to//dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnog pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin
123b4('dul ba): la/las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin la/las 'dra na ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'drin ma yino//dge slong dag de lta
123b5('dul ba): bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te/las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal par bya ste dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//
123b6('dul ba): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /nye dga' gnyis skya ba su 'gro ba dang /bslatra pa'i gzhi dag la bkod pa de'i tshe na de gnyis ches brgyad dang
123b7('dul ba): tshes ngacu bzhi dang tshe bco lnga la ri rab kyi bang rim du 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das lo bsnyen bkur byed do//de gnyis gang gi tshe mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen
124a1('dul ba): kur byed pa de'i rgyun ni gzhal med khang pa'i cha lugs kyis bskyon bkur byed cing gang gi tshe nyin mo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang
124a2('dul ba): tshen ni khyim bdag gi cha lun kyis bsnyen bkur byed do//dus gzhan zhig na de gnyis nyin mo khyim bdag gi cha lugs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo // tsam na
124a3('dul ba): ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba der song ngo //rgyal srid ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yin pas/rgyal po de gang gi tshe bcom ldan
124a4('dul ba): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro ba de'i tshe na bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba na 'ga' zhig bdag la mngon du lhung bar mi 'gyur ba med grang snyam nas mi dag pa'i mtha'
124a5('dul ba): can gtong bar byed pa yin pas/de nas ko sa lngar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgor bsdad de mi dag pa'i mtha' can zhig la smras pa/
124a6('dul ba): ka'e na rje song lo/bcom ldan 'das la su dag bsnyen bkur byed pa la ltos shig/mi dag pa'i mtha' can des lci dka'e'i bzhin 'tshal zhes ko sa ltar byung ba'i rgyal ba
124a7('dul ba): gsal rgyal las mnyan nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dor song ba dang /ji tsam na khyim bdag gnyis shig bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa mthong ngo //
124b1('dul ba): mthong nas yang kos lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces smra so//lha khyim bdag gnyis shig bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen
124b2('dul ba): dkur bgyid de de gnyis lha'i yul na gnas pa dag lags gor ma dku mo rgyal pos bsams pa/khyim bdag de gnyis bdag gi yul na gnas pa yin pas de gnyis kyis bdag mthong
124b3('dul ba): na mngon du ldang bar 'gyur grang snyan nas de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo //klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis ko sa lngar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal thag ring po kho na
124b4('dul ba): nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to btsun pa ci lags re shig dam pa'i chos la bsnyen bkur bgyi 'am 'on te rgyal po la bsnyen bkur
124b5('dul ba): bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/klu'i dbang po gnyis re shig dam pa'i chos la bsnyen bkur gyis shig/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dam pa'i chos la
124b6('dul ba): gus par mdzad de dgra bcom pa dag kyang chos bla mar byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba 'di la tshigasu bsdu ba dag ga' sprul pa/sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang /
124b7('dul ba): sangs rgyas gang dag ma byon dang //sangs rgyas mya ngan sel mdzad pa//da ltar mang po gang bzhugs dag/thams cad dam pa'i chos la ni//gus par gnas gyur gnas 'byung
125a1('dul ba): zhing //de bzhin gus par gnas mdzad de//de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin//de phyir bdag la legs 'dod cing //bdag nyid chen po mngon 'dod pas//
125a2('dul ba): sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byed na//'di la dam tshis gus par bya//de gnyis kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsol rgyal la mngon du ldang ba ma byas pa dang /rgyal po khros te bsams
125a3('dul ba): pa/khyim bdag 'di gnyis bdag gi yul na gnas pa dag yin na bdag la mngon du ldang ba mi byed do snyam nas de khros pas kun nas dkris bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
125a4('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di khro bos kun nas dkris snyam nas/bka' mchid gzhan dag mdzad par brtsams
125a5('dul ba): te chos ston par mi mdzad pa dang des gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos bstan du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa chos bstan du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom
125a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/rab tu dang sems med pa dang //zhe sdang can dang 'khrugs pa yis//yang dag rdzogs spangs bstan pa yi//dam chos kun
125a7('dul ba): shes bya mi nus//gang gis nyes rtsom brtsam byas shing //rab dang med pa'i sems bsal te//kun nas mnar sems 'di spong ba//des ni legs gsungs shes par 'gyur//
125b1('dul ba): rgyal po rgya tshor de gnyis la khros te bsams pa/'di gnyis la brten nas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos mnyan pa yang rgyun bkum mo snyam du rig nas sdod cig ces byas te/bcom ldan 'das/
125b2('dul ba): kyi zhangs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te song ngo //gang gi tshe klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nyo dga' gnyis nyin mo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa de'i tshe/
125b3('dul ba): nade gnyis kyi zho shas 'tshe ba dag gis ri rab kyi bang rim nas mnyan yod kyi bar gyi la mo ji srid pa'i lam gyi ngos gnyisu rtsi bar pa dang rangad te 'khod par byed do//ko sa l+r-ir byung ba'i
