125b4('dul ba): rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag gang gi tshe khyim bdag 'di gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe na 'di gnyis
125b5('dul ba): kyi mgo drung nas tshod las la skyel bar gyis shig/tshig de skad ces smras pa/klu'i rgyal po dga' bog nyi dga' gnyis kyis zho shos 'tsho bdag gis the so//thos nas kyang
125b6('dul ba): dag 'khrugs nas ko sa lor byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi steng du rdo rje rtse gcig dang 'khor lo dang mda' bo che dang /mtshon rtse gcig la sogs pa'i mtshon dag 'phang bar
125b7('dul ba): brtsams so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' bo'i chos can yin pas/de na bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'i dgal gyi bu chen po la bka'
126a1('dul ba): stsal pa/mo'u dag pa gyi bu ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa dang /mnyan yo na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la soms
126a2('dul ba): shig/tshe dang ldan pa no'u dgal gyi bu chen pos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las bka' mnyan nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhu
126a3('dul ba): so//de la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bye brag gi rdo rje rtse gcig dang 'khor lo dang mda' bo che dang mtshe na rtse gcig la sogs pa'i mtshon de dag lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad+ma dang
126a4('dul ba): ku mu ta dang pad+ma dkar po dang man+da ra bi dag tu gyur te/kro sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi steng du 'bab par brtsams so//de lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang pad+ma dang ku mu ta
126a5('dul ba): dang /pad+ma dkar pa dang /men+da ra ba dag gis gang bzhin du khyim du zhugs nas des btsun mo'i 'kho na gzhon nu dang /blon po dang khrom gyi ru sna dang /grong bidal gyi ma
126a6('dul ba): dang yul mi dang bram ze dag la smras pa/shes ldan dag nga rgyal byed kyi tshal tshun chad nas lha'i me te ge ut+pa la dang ku mu ti dang /pad+me dkar po dang man+da ra be dag gis
126a7('dul ba): gang bzhin du khyim du zhugs pa 'di ci yin su'i mthu yin/don gang dag snyan pa dang /'jam par smra ba la mkhas pa/de dag gis smras pa/lha gzhan su zhig
126b1('dul ba): gis 'di 'chal bar 'gyur 'di gzhan su zhig gis mthu 'grus 'di ltar lha nyid chos kyi rgyal srid bgyid du bsnol bas 'di lta nyid kyi mthu lagaso//rgyal pos smras pa/shes
126b2('dul ba): ldan dag de badren te de chos kyi rgyal srid byed du 'jug pas 'di gor ma chags par nga'i mthu yin no//btsun mo'i 'khor gyis smras pa/bdag cag lha las gzhan pa'i skyes
126b3('dul ba): ba'i gan du mi mchi zhing bdag po las mi 'phyo bas 'di ni bdag cag gi mthu lagaso//gzhon nu rnams kyis smras pa/bdag cag yab yum la gus shing sri zhu che bas 'di ni bongag/
126b4('dul ba): cag gi mthu lag so//blon po rnams kyis smras pa/bdag cag chos kyis lha'i rgyal srid ba skyed du bsnol bar 'di ni bdag cag gi mthu la gos//khrim gyi ru sna dag gis
126b5('dul ba): smras pa/bdag cag lha'i bka' chos dang ldan pa bsgrub par bgyid pas 'di ni bdag cag gi mthu lags so//grong brdal gyi mi dang yul ma dag gis smras pa/yidag cag lta
126b6('dul ba): le chos dang ldan par dpya 'bul bas 'di ni bdeg gi mthu lag so//rgyal pos bsams pa/'di dag so so nas bdag gi mthu'//bdag gi mthu'i zhes zar na su'i mthu
126b7('dul ba): yin zhing shes kyis 'od ltar/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa mkhyen pa deng shes bya la bla na med pa'i mnga' brnyes pa yin
127a1('dul ba): chos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhur 'gra'o snyam du rig nas/lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang pad+ma dang /ku mu tA dang pad+ma dkar
127a2('dul ba): dang mnur ba de dag gis thub dkang nas bcom ldan 'das ga le ba der song ste byin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig
127a3('dul ba): tu 'dug/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/kau s+ya lcer byung ba'i rgyal po gosal rgyal gyis skyebs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gyis lnga pa dang /bcom ldan
127a4('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po de ni khyod kyi mthu 'angam smin/btsun mo'i 'khor gyi'ang ma yin/gzhon nu rnams kyi ma yin+da/blon po rnams kyi
127a5('dul ba): 'ang ma yin/khrom gyi ru sna'i yang ma yin/gleng rdul gyi mi dang ljongs kyi me rnams kyis kyang ma yin/bram ze rnams kyi 'di ma yin te/'di ltar de ni dge slong
127a6('dul ba): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i mthu yin te/gal te dge slong mo'u dgrel gyi bu chen pos khyod btsun mo'i 'khor dang gzhon nu dang blon po dang /grong rdal gyi mi dang bcas
127a7('dul ba): ba la ma bsams su zin na/deng nyid du mnyan yod na spyod yul du mi 'gyur ba zhig na de ni dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu rjes kyi de btsun mo'i 'khor dang gzhon nu dang rnon po
127b1('dul ba): drung /spyong rdul rgya mo dang sum gyi mo dang bcas pa la bsams pa'o mthu smin gyi de la sems mngon par dang bar gyis shig/rgyal pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltang
127b2('dul ba): de dge slong ni 'u dgal gyi bu'i mthu lags shing /bcom ldan 'das kyi lang ma lags/nyan thos chen po gzhan dag gi/'jam la klas par ji ltar 'tshal bar ba
127b3('dul ba): rgyal po chen po de ni nga'i mthu 'ang ma yin/nyan thos chen po gzhan dag gi 'ang ma yin te/'di ltar de ni mo'u dbul gyi bu'i mthu yi no//gal ti khyod som nyi dang yid
127b4('dul ba): gnyis zan lce'i me tog ut+pal dang pad+ma dang /ku mU ta dang pad dkar po dang /man+dA ra bya 'di dag sal bar cig/des de dag sa la bor ba dang /rdo rje rje gcig pa dang /'kho
127b5('dul ba): lo dang mda'a'i tshwa dang /mtshon+da rtse gcig la sogs pa'i mtshan sha stag tu gyur to//des de dag mthong nas nyam dra bar gyur te/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di
127b6('dul ba): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang haM dga' phranyis la rab tu sdang ba'i sems bskyed pas de las 'di
127b7('dul ba): byung ngo //rgyal pos gsol pa/btsun pa bdag gis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dge' gnyis mngon par yang mi dran na rab tu sdang ba'i sems bskyod par lha ga la gyur/
128a1('dul ba): rgyal po chen po ngas khyod la dran par bya'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dran par mdzad du gsol/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis nga
128a2('dul ba): mdun na khyim bdag gnyis shig chos nyan pa gang yin pa de gnyis kyis khyod la mngon du ldang ba ma byas pa de dran nam/bcom ldan 'das dran no//rgyal po chen po khyim bdag
128a3('dul ba): de gnyis ni klu'i rgyal po druga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis yin no//des gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de gnyis 'khrugs par ma gyu re tam/rgyal po chen po de gnyis 'khregs
128a4('dul ba): par ma gyur te de gnyis kyi zhe shas 'tsho ba dag 'khrugs par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de gnyis ma ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/rgyal po chen po bzod par gsol pa
128a5('dul ba): bya'o//bcom ldan 'das de gnyis ni ri rab kyi bderi min mchis la/bdag ni 'dri na mchis na bdag gis ji ltar de gnyis bzod par gsol bar bAn+ti/bcom ldan 'das
128a6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po de gnyis chos brgyad dang tshes bcu bzhi dang tshes bco lnga la nga'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal du 'dir 'ong gi khyod kyang ches brgyad dang
128a7('dul ba): dang chos bcu po ni dang chos bco lnga la 'dir shog cig pa ngas khyod la de gnyis bstan par byas/khyod kyis bzod par gsol TIg/des gsol pa/btsun bci lags
128b1('dul ba): bdag gis de gnyis kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par bgyi'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de gnyis kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtug par mi bya
128b2('dul ba): ste/'di ltar mi ma rabs dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal pa gang yin pa de ni mi gtso bo dag gis lag pa nas bzung ba yin gyis khyod kyis lag pa g.yas pa rkyong la klu'i dbang po
128b3('dul ba): gnyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces bzod pa gsol cag dang /de gnyis bzod par 'gyur ro//des gsol pa/btsun pa ma nongs te de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas bcom
128b4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song ngo //ji tsam dus gzhan zhig nu klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /nye dga' gnyis ri rab kyi bang rim nas 'ongs nas
128b5('dul ba): bdag nyid khyim bdag gi cha lugs su mngon par sprul te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
128b6('dul ba): 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do//ko sa lar byung po'i rgyal po gsel rgyal yang bcom ldan 'das gA la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
128b7('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la brde' mdzad do//de nas ko sa lor byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs
129a1('dul ba): te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas lag pa g.ya ba dad+ya/smras bklu'i dbang po gnyis bzod par mdzod cig/de gnyis kyis smras pa/rgyal po
129a2('dul ba): chen po bzod par bgyi'o//de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsol rgyal gyis/klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis la bzod par gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das
129a3('dul ba): gra la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te//bdag gi 'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po mchod pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das
129a4('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang btsos pas bdag gi sdum par dgung bdun gyi bar du gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po
129a5('dul ba): gsal rgyal la/cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas kaM sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/
129a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas des blon po rnams lha bsgo ba/shes ldan dag ngas 'phags pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po mchod
129a7('dul ba): pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhag bdun du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyis khyed kyis grong khyer mdzes par gyis la gdugs tshad
129b1('dul ba): gon gyis shig/rgyal po rnams ni tshig gis 'grub par yin la/lha rnams ni sems kyis 'grub pa yin/rnal 'byor pa rnams ni sems bskyud pa tsam gyis thams cad
129b2('dul ba): 'grub pa yin pas/blon po rnams kyi lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kau sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las mnyan nas rgyal byed kyi tshal dang mnyan yod kyi bar gyi lam dza srid
129b3('dul ba): pa dag mchog tu mdzes par byas shing mnyan yod kyang rdo ba dang gseg ma dang gyo mo med par rnam par gnas par byas te/tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab cing bdug spos dri zhim
129b4('dul ba): po'i snod nye bar bzhag ste dar gyi chun po'i tshogs sbyangs shing rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgrengs te me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing lce rnam kyi lha'i mdu nas chos bzas ltar nyam dga' bar
129b5('dul ba): byas//zhal zas kyang kha dog dang dri dang /ro phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa skyu rum sna tshogs dang bcas pa spyan gzigs sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa bshams nas 'byor pa
129b6('dul ba): do lta bu 'dis nyi ma re re zheng sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol to//des ni mtshan mo khur ba chod pa dag tu me shor nas des ko sa
129b7('dul ba): lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi glang po che yan lag mchog dang ldan pa mang po dag tshig par gyur to//de nas gdugs tshod zhag bdun thal nas ko sa lar byung ba'i
130a1('dul ba): rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mnyan yod du dril bsgrags par byed du bcug nas mnyan yod du sus kyang mtshan mo me sbar bar mi bya'o//gang me
130a2('dul ba): sbyar bar byed na de kar sha pa na drug cu'i chad pas gcad par bya ba 'am/phyag sbal bcug skye 'tshe bar bya dgos so zhes bsgo'o//de'i tshe mnyan yod na khyim bdag bzang
130a3('dul ba): sbyin zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongasu bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug ste/des
130a4('dul ba): rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed do//de dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das ge la ba der
130a5('dul ba): song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gats+tshag tu 'dug/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag
130a6('dul ba): bzang sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mched kyis yang dag par ston po mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/yang dag
130a7('dul ba): par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do//rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' ma chad kyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod
130b1('dul ba): yang dag parab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //de nas khyim bdag bzang sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su
130b2('dul ba): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol
130b3('dul ba): bar NI gnang /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdug bzang sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas khyim bdag bzung sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang
130b4('dul ba): bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas khyim bdag bzang sbyin gyis de nyid kyi mtshan
130b5('dul ba): mo bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa sta gon byas te nang par sngar langs nas gdan dag be shams te tshur bzhag nas/bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis gdugs tshod
130b6('dul ba): g.yar dgongs 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das kyis dade'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan drangaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro shra mA~M thabs gsol lhung bzed
130b7('dul ba): dang chos gos bsnams te/dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas/khyim bdag bzeng sbyin gyi khyim ga la ba dir gshe
131a1('dul ba): te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gang du bshams pa nyid la bzhug so//de nas khyim bdag bzang sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa
131a2('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par bad stobs par byed de//rnam grangs du mar bca'
131a3('dul ba): ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol cing phyag btso bas lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas
131a4('dul ba): stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug/bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang khams dang /
131a5('dul ba): rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'di ltar khyim bdag bzang sbyin chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dag bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lte ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes
131a6('dul ba): kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyan tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan par mdzad
131a7('dul ba): do//des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pad+ma 'di lta bu ni bdag la pas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma
131b1('dul ba): dgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' shes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs
131b2('dul ba): kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho dag ni skams/rus pa'i ri dag las nr-i bsgral ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/sems
131b3('dul ba): can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dgras dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhi go zhes lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do//yang smras pa/khyod
131b4('dul ba): mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i//ngan song shul bka ga bsod nams rab ldan pa'i//mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni//mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par 'gyur//
131b5('dul ba): shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni//de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing //go phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal bar gyur//'gro
131b6('dul ba): bar lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa//skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba'o//srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dkon pa//thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis//bcom ldan 'das kyis chos
131b7('dul ba): bstan pa mdzad nas gshegaso//khyim bdag bzang sbyin chung ma dang bcas pas gang gi nyin mo bden pa mthong bar byas pa de'i nyin mo de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur
132a1('dul ba): /to//khyim bdag bzang sbyin gyis yang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gzhan du spyan dras te bshos gsol nas/bcom
132a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag bzang sbyin chung ma dang bcas pa la gang thos nas de gnyis kyis phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas shing rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bslabs par
132a3('dul ba): gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad de//gang gi nyin mo khyim bdag bzang sbyin chung ma dang bcas pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas shing rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par
132a4('dul ba): sbusgrubs pa da'i nyin mo de'i chung ma la bu bcas pa las khye'u gzugs bzang ba lho ni sdug pa mdzes pa gsol ba gser gyi khe dog 'dra ba mgo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa lag pa ring ba
132a5('dul ba): ridul ba'i dbyes che ba smin ma mdzar bsna'i bzangs mtho ba zhig byung //de'i nywa du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bcas pa'i bcas ston rgya
132a6('dul ba): cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed//nyi de dag gis smras pa/gang gi phyirakhye'u 'di'i ming pha ma gnyis kyi nyi ma gang la phyir mi 'dra ba'i
132a7('dul ba): 'bras bu mngangon sum du byas shing rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs por gyur pa'i nyi ma de la bi tsas pa de'i phyir khyo'u'i mi rdzu 'phrul len ces bya'o zhes de'i ming rdzu 'phrul len
132b1('dul ba): ces bya bar btAg so//khye'u rdzu 'phrul lon ma ma brgyad po dbang na 'tsho ba'o ma ma gnyis dang /num snun pa'i mA ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rnyed phyogs kyi ma
132b2('dul ba): ma gnyis la rjes su gtod//de ma ma brgyad po de dag gis 'o ma dang /zho dang mar dang zhun ma rI dang /myur gyi snying ku dang /gzhan yod yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag

139b4('dul ba): gtsug lag khang rtsig du bcug pa dang /gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid gnas mal 'di lta ste/khri dang khri'u dang stan nang tshang can dang la ba dang sngas dang gor bu dag

139b6('dul ba): su 'gro ba dang /dge 'dun la skyabasu 'gro ba dang /bslabs pa'i gzhi dag len pa gang yin pa ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di che so 'bras bu che'o//bram ze shing sA la tshon
139b7('dul ba): po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu byin pa dang /gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /
140a1('dul ba): gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan phyin pa dang /gang gis rgyun tu zhugs pa brgya dran
140a2('dul ba): byin pa dang /gang gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zin byin pa dang /gang gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba brgya dran byon pa
140a3('dul ba): dang /gang gis phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zin byin pa dang /gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /gang gis dgra
140a4('dul ba): bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /gang gis dgra bcom pa brgya zan byin pa dang /gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi
140a5('dul ba): dge 'dun la kun dga'i ra ba phul ba dang /gang gis kun dga'i ro ba de nyid du gtsug lag khang rtsig du btsug pa dang /gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gnas
140a6('dul ba): mal 'di lta ste/khri dang dri'u dang stan dang stan nang tshang can dang la ba dang sngas dang /gor bu dag phul ba dang /gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gtan gyi rkyen ris dang
140a7('dul ba): 'thun pa'i mchod sbyin phul ba dang /gang sangs rgyas la skyabasu 'gro ba dang /chos la skyabasu 'gro ba dang /dge 'dun la rgyabasu 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i rgan
140b1('dul ba): dwadrug len pa dang /gang dag gis sems can srog chags 'byung po thams cad lnga byams pa'i sems bsgom pa gang yin pa ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o//
140b2('dul ba): khyim bdag bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu de byin pa dang /gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags
140b3('dul ba): dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /gang gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sbom du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /gang gis rgyun tu zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa
140b4('dul ba): dang /gang gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bye ba'i phyir zhugs po brgya zin byin pa dang /gang gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /gang
140b5('dul ba): gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zin byin pa dang /gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba brgyu zan byin pa dang /gang gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu
140b6('dul ba): mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zo ni byin po dang /gang gis dge bcom pa brgya zan byin pa dang /gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga'i
140b7('dul ba): rab phul ba dang /gong gis kun dga'i ri ba de nyid du gtsug las khang cig rtsig du bcug pa dang /gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gnas mal 'di lta ste/
141a1('dul ba): khri dang khri'u dang /stan dang stan nang tshang can dang /la ba dung sngas dang khri'u dag phul ba dang /gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du stan gyi
141a2('dul ba): rkyen ris dang 'thun pa'i mchod sbyin phul ba dang /gang sangs rgyas la skyabasu 'gro ba dang /chos la skyabasu 'gro ba dang /dge 'dun la skyabasu 'gro ba dang /
141a3('dul ba): bslab pa'i gzhi dag len pa dang /gang gis sems can srog tshogs 'byung po thams cad la byams pa'i sems sgom pa dang /gang 'du byed thams cad la mi
141a4('dul ba): rtag pa rje su lta zhing gnas pa dang /zad par rje su lta/'dod chags dang bral bar rje su lta/'gog par rje su lta/spong bar rje su lta zhing gnas pa gang yin pa
141a5('dul ba): ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o//khyim bdag de lta bas nu khyed kyis 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag par rje su lta zhing gnas par bya ba dang /
141a6('dul ba): zad par rje su lta/'dod chags dang bral bar rje su lta/'gog par rje suM lta/spong bar rje su lto zhing gnas par bya zhes bslab par bya ste/khyim bdag khyod
141a7('dul ba): kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//de nas khyim bdag ngan pa bzang sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod pa dang rje su yi ring ba byas nas/
141b1('dul ba): com ldan 'das kyi zhangs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas sang ngo //de dus gzhan zhig na rang gi khyim na mtshun mo mar mo sbyad te sangs
141b2('dul ba): rgyas kyi dka' klog pa na/rgyal po'i zho shas 'tshe ba grong khyer nyul ba dge gis sgo gton gyi 'u gu nas de mthong nas de dag gis de la smras pa/khyim bdag rgyal pos dril
141b3('dul ba): sgrog pa byed du bcug ste mnyan yod du sus kyang mtshan mo me sbyor bar mi bya'o//gang sbyar bar byed pa dri kar sha pa na drug cu'i chad pas gcad par bya ba 'am/phyagu sbal du
141b4('dul ba): bcug ste'ichi bar bya'o zhes bka'i btags nas/khyod kyis ci'i phyir mtshan mo me swA r-I/des smras pa/shes ldan dag 'di ni me ma yin te mar me yin no//khyim
141b5('dul ba): bdage ci 'dis me'i bya ba byed mi nus sam yang na ni kar sha pA na drug cu phul cig/yang na ni phyag sbrul du 'dug cig/shes ldan dag kho bo la kAr shu pa na dragra cu
141b6('dul ba): 'byor pa ga la yong phyag sbal du 'dug/ko sa lngar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis phyag sbal ni rim po gsum yod do//mi gtso bo gang dag yin pa de dag rje skye
141b7('dul ba): rim du 'jog par byed/mi bar ma gang dag yin pa de dag ni bar du 'jog par byed/mi ngan pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni gting du 'jog par byed pas/de mi ga tso
142a1('dul ba): yin pa'i phyir de dag gis steng rim du bzhag/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi mtshan mo'i thun dang po la khyim bdag dran pa bzang
142a2('dul ba): sbyin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas khyim bdag ngan pa bzang sbyin la 'di skad ces smras//khyim bdag khyod phyag sbal na 'dug pa tshul dang 'thun pa mi yin na/ci'i phyir
142a3('dul ba): khyod phyag sbal na 'dug/des smras pa/nye dbang dag kho bo rang dbang gis phyag skal na 'dug pa ma yin te/'di ltar rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis phyag
142a4('dul ba): sbrul du bcugo/ci'i phyir kar shra pa nu drug cu'i phyir te kho bo la de dag gis 'byor pa med pas/de'i phyir phyag sbal na 'dug/khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod sems
142a5('dul ba): bskyed la tshig brjod cigo/khyod kyi khyim mam chu'i gnas gang dag dbyig dadong gser gyis dgang bar bya/nye dbang dag khyod snying las chu ngur gyis shig dang /
142a6('dul ba): bdog la rgyal po dad pas dad pa'i dbang du bya ba byed par 'gyur ro//gal te 'dod na 'dug cig dang khyed la chos bstan par bya'o//de dag tshes mnyan pa'i phyir de'i
142a7('dul ba): mdun du 'dug pa na/de dag gi lus 'di 'dra 'di lta ste/dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhi 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig
142b1('dul ba): tu gyur cing sreg pa dang 'dran/ka~M sa lAr byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mtshan ma'i thun dang ba la phyug sprul na ma'i phung pa tshun pa bzhi 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun
142b2('dul ba): tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa drug mthong ngo //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin mtshan mo'i gung thun la/khyim bdag dran pa bza byin ga la ba der
142b3('dul ba): song ste phyin nas khyim bdag ngan pa bzung byin la 'di skad ces smras//khyim bdag khyod phyag sbal na 'dug pa tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin na ci'i phyir khyed phyag sprul
142b4('dul ba): nA 'dug/des smras pa/ko'u shi ka kho bo rang dbang gi phyag sbrul ni 'dug pa mo yin te 'di ltar/rgyal po'i zho shus 'tsho ba dag gis phyug sbal du bcug
142b5('dul ba): ci'i phyi kuru sha bin drug cu'i phyir te kho bo la de dag gis 'byor ba med pas/de'i phyir phyag sbrul na 'dug/khyim bdag de'i phyir sems bskyed la tshig brjod
142b6('dul ba): cig/khyod kyi khyim mam chu'i gnas gang dag dbyig dang gser gyis dgang bar bya/ko'u shau ka khyod snying las chu ngur gyis shig dang bdag la rgyal po dad pas dad pa'i

143a1('dul ba): 'du ste 'drem+b+ha m+b+ha/dper na n+ya'i phung po chen po sngam pani 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar du me lce gcig tu gyur cing sregs pa dag pas
143a2('dul ba): ches 'phags pa dang ches gya nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lho gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa 'dra'o//ko sa lar byung ba'i
143a3('dul ba): rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mtshan mo'i gung thun la phyag sbal na me'i phung po snga ma bzhi 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg
143a4('dul ba): pa dag pas ches 'phags pa dang chos kye nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba/rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa mthong ngo //
143a5('dul ba): de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin la 'di skad
143a6('dul ba): ces smraso//khyim bdag khyod phyag sbal na 'dug pa tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin na/ci'i phyir khyod phyag sbal na 'dug/des smras pa/tshangs pa kho bo rang dbang gis phyag
143a7('dul ba): sbal ni 'dug pa ma yin te/'di ltar rgyal po zhe shas 'tshe ba dag gis phyag sbal du bcu po/ci'i phyir ka sha pa na drug cu'i phyir te/kho bo la de dag gi 'byor po med
143b1('dul ba): pas de'i phyir phyag sbal na 'dugo//khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod sems bskyed la tshig brjod cig/khyod kyi khyim mam chu'i gnas gang dag dbyig dang gser gyi dgang bar bya//

143b3('dul ba): par bya'o//des chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug pa na de'i lus 'di 'dra ba 'di lto ste/dper na me'i phung po chen po snga ma bzhi 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu

143b5('dul ba): gyur cing sreg pa bas kyang ches 'phags pa dang chos gya nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa 'dra'o//
143b6('dul ba): ko sa lar byeng ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la phyag sbal na me'i phung po chen po snga me bzhi 'bar pa rab tu 'bar ba/kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce
143b7('dul ba): gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag pas 'phags pa dang ches gya nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur cing
144a1('dul ba): sreg pa bas kyang ches 'phags pa dang ches gya nom pa rje'i phung po chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur cing
144a2('dul ba): sreg pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang phyag sbal na srung ba'i mi mngag pas bkug ste smras pa/kA'i'e nang rje nang dus dril bsgrag pa byad du bcug ste mnyan yod du sus kyang
144a3('dul ba): mtshan mo me sbar bar mi bya'o zhes bsgo na/dri nyid kyi phyag sbal na ma dang mtshan thigs tagra me'i phung po chen po sbarare ba de ci'i phyir/des smras pa/lha sus kyang mtshan ma
144a4('dul ba): phyag stsal du zhugs ma sbyor te/lhas der ci zhig gzigs ma 'tshal to//rgyal pos zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan dag deng la ci bden nam rdzun pa phyag
144a5('dul ba): sbal rtogs shog/de dag dong ste phyag sbal brtags na thal ba yang me snang nas/de dag phyir log ste rgyal po la smras pa/lce bdag cag gis phyag sbal brtags
144a6('dul ba): na thul ba yang mi gda'o//rgyal pos phyag sbal na srung ba'i mi la smras pa/kwa'e nang rje de ni mi gtso bo gang 'dug/lha khyim bdag ngan pa bzang sbyin mchi so//de bos
144a7('dul ba): shig/des lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de bos pa dang /rgyal pos de la smras pa/khyim bdag ngas dril bsgrag pararo byed du bcug ste sus kyang mnyan yod du mtshan
144b1('dul ba): mom sbyar bar mi bya'o zhes bskon khyod kyis ci'i phyir phyug sbrul du mtshan zlog thag ma sbyar/des smras pa/lha bdag gi yud tsam yang zhugs ma ta ma nas mtshan theg tug
144b2('dul ba): lta ci smos/khyim bdag nga nyid kyis mtshan mo'i thun dang po la mo'i phung po chen po bzhi 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa
144b3('dul ba): dag dang /mtshon mo'i gung thun la me'i phung po chen po snga ma bzhi 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba/kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag pas ches 'a
144b4('dul ba): pa dang ches gya nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dang /mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la me'i phung po

144b6('dul ba): phung po chen po 'ber ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'ber ba me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag pas kyang ches 'phags pa drang ches gya nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po
144b7('dul ba): dbang ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba mi lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa mthong bzhin du khyod na ri de skad ces bdag gis yud tsam yang me ma spar na mtshan
145a1('dul ba): thog tag lta ci smos shes zer na de ci yin/lha de ni mad de bdag gis ni mtshan mo zhugs ma sbar mod kyi 'di ltar mdangs mtshan
145a2('dul ba): mithun dang po la rgyal po chen po bzhi bdag ga la ba der mchis te phyin nas/bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag khyod phyag sbal na 'dug pa tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin na ci'i
145a3('dul ba): phyir khyod phyag sbal na 'dug ces mchis nas/bdag gis de dog la 'di skad ces nye dbang dag kho bo rang dbang gi phyog sbal na 'dug pa ma yin te 'di ltar rgyal po'i zho
145a4('dul ba): shas 'tsho ba dag gis phyag sbal na bcu go zhes bgyis pa dang /de dag bdag la 'di skad ces ci'i phyir zhes mchi nas/bdag gis de dag la 'di skad ces kar sha
145a5('dul ba): pa na drug cu'i phyir te kho bo la de dag gi 'byor pa med pas de'i phyir phyag sbal na 'dug zhes bgyis na de dag bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod sems
145a6('dul ba): bskyed la tshig brjod cig/khyod kyi khyim mam/chu'i gnas gang dag dbyig dang gser gyis gang bar bya zhes mchi na/bdag gis de dag la 'di skad ces te
145a7('dul ba): dbong dag snying las chu ngur gyis shig/bdag la rgyal po dad pas dad pa'i dbang du bya ba byed par 'gyuraro//gal te 'dod na 'dug cig dang /khyod la chos
145b1('dul ba): bstan par bya'o zhes bgyis pa dang /de dag chos snyan pa'i slad du bdug gi mdun du ma chis pa na/de dag gi lus 'di 'dra ste 'dri lta ste dper bak+Shi na zhugs kyi phung po ban
145b2('dul ba): 'bar ba rlob tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dge 'dra'o//de nas mtshan mo'i gung thun la lha'i dbang po brgya byin bzlog ga la ba der
145b3('dul ba): mchis te phyin nas bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag khyod phyag sbal na 'dug pa tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin na ci'i phyir khyod phyag sbal na 'dug ces mchi nas bdag gis de la 'di
145b4('dul ba): skad ces/ko'u shri ka kho bo rang dbang gi phyag sbal na 'dug pa ma yin te/'di ltar rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag gisau phyag skal du bcu go zhes bgyis pa dang /de bdag
145b5('dul ba): la 'di skad ces ci'i phyir zhes mchi nas/bdag gis de la 'di skad ces kar sha pa na drug cu'i phyir te kho bo la de dag go 'byor pa med pas de'i phyir phyag sbal du bcu go
145b6('dul ba): zhes bgyis na/de dog badrag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod sems bskyed la tshig brjod cig dang /khyod kyi khyim mam chu'i gnas gang dag dbyig dang gser
145b7('dul ba): gyis dgang bar bya zhes mchi na/bdag gis de la 'di skad ces ko'u shi ka khyod stong las chung ngur gyis shig dang /bdag la rgyal po dad pas dad pa'i dbang du bya ba
146a1('dul ba): byed par 'gyur//gal te 'dod na 'dug cig dang khyod la chos ston par bya'o zhes bgyis pa dang de chos mnyan pa'i slad du bdag
146a2('dul ba): gi mdun du mchis pa na/de'i lus 'di 'dra ste 'di lta ste/dper bgyi ni zhugs kyi phung po chen po snga ma bzhi 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lA
146a3('dul ba): gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag pas ches 'phags pa dang chos gya nom pa'i zhugs kyi phung po chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur cing
146a4('dul ba): sreg pa 'dra'o//de nas mtshan me'i thun tha ma la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bdag ga la ba der mchis te byin nas/bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag khyod phyag sbal
146a5('dul ba): na 'dug pa tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin na/ci'i phyir khyod phyag sbal na 'dug ces mchi nas/bdag gis de la 'di skad ces tshangs pa kho bo rang dbang gis phyag sbal
146a6('dul ba): na 'dug pa ma yin te/'di ltar rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis phyag sbal du bcu go/zhes bgyis pa dang /de bdag la 'di skad ces ci'i phyir zhes mche
146a7('dul ba): nas/bdag gis de la 'di skad ces kar sha pa na drug cu'i phyir te kho bo la de dag gi 'byor pa med pas de'i phyir phyag sbal du 'dugo zhe bgyi na de bdag la 'di skad
146b1('dul ba): ces de'i phyir khyod sems bskyed la tshig brjod cig khyod kyi khyim mam/chu'i gnas gang dag dbyig dang gser gyi sa dgang bar bya zhes mchi nas bdag gis de la 'di skad ces/
146b2('dul ba): tshangs pa khyod skying las chung ngur gyis shig dang /bdag la rgyal po dad pas dad pa'i dngang du byed byed par 'gyur ro//gal te 'dod na 'dug zhig dang /khyod la chos
146b3('dul ba): bstan par bya'o zhes bgyis pa dang /de chos mnyan pa'i slad du bdag gi mdun du mchis pa ni/de'i lus 'di 'draste 'di lta ste/dper bgyi na zhugs kyi phung po chen
146b4('dul ba): po snga ma bzhi 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag pas ches 'pha pa dang ches gyi nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba
146b5('dul ba): rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa bas kyang ches 'phags pa dang ches gya nom pa'i zhugs kyi phung po chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'bar
146b6('dul ba): ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa 'dra'o//rgyal pos smras pa/khyim bdag gal te de ltar na nges kyang khyod la dam pa sbyin gyis ci 'dod pa
146b7('dul ba): smros shig/des smras pa/lha gal te khyod bdeg la thugs dang na bdag dgung la zhugs mar gyi 'od la sangs rgyas kyi bka'i klog par 'tsho lo//rgyal pos smras pa/
147a1('dul ba): khyi ma bdag khyod 'ba' zhig la gnang bar ma zad kyi 'di ltar khyod nyid la brten nas gzhan gang dag mtshan me me mar gyi 'od la sangs
147a2('dul ba): rgyas kyi bka' klog par 'dod pa thams cad la yang gan //de nas khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin rgyal pos btang bas dga' mgu rab tu dga' ste/rgyal po'i drung nas
147a3('dul ba): song nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dugo/ko sa lar byung ba'i
147a4('dul ba): rgyal po gsal rgyal yang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis le mgo bos phyag 'tshal du rgyal byed kyi tshol du song ngo //rgyal rigs ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yin
147a5('dul ba): ngas/des rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgor bsdad de/mi dag pa'i mtha' can zhig la smras pa/kwa'e nang rje song la bcom ldan 'das la su zhig bsnyen bkur byed pa ltos
147a6('dul ba): shig/mi dag pa'i mtha' can des lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ko sA lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang ji
147a7('dul ba): tsam na khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste
147b1('dul ba): phyin nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smraso//lha khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchi so//rgyal pos bas
147b2('dul ba): pa/khyim bdag de bdag gi yul na gnas pa yin pas des bdag mthong na mngon du ldang bar 'gyur grang snyam nas/des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo //khyim
147b3('dul ba): bdag ngan pa bzang byin gyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun
147b4('dul ba): pa ci lags/re shig dam pa'i chos la bsnyen bkur bgyi'amau/'on te rgyal po la bsnyen bkur bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag re zhig
147b5('dul ba): dam pa'i chos la bsnyen bkur gyis shig/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dam pa'i chos la gus pa mdzad de/dag bcom pa dag kyang chos bla mar byeda'o//de
147b6('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba 'di la tshigasu bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang //sangs rgyas gang dag ma byon dang //sangs rgyas
147b7('dul ba): mya ngan sel mdzad pa//da ltar glang po gang bzhugs dag/thams cad dam pa'i chos la ni//gus par gnas gyur gnas 'gyur zhing //de bzhin gus par gnas//
148a1('dul ba): mdzad de//de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin//de phyir bdag la legs 'dod cing //bdag nyid chen po mngon 'dod pas//sangs rgyas bstan pa
148a2('dul ba): dran byed na//'di la dam chos gus par bya//khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin gyis/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la mngon du ldang ba ma byas pa dang rgyal po
148a3('dul ba): khres te bsams pa/khyim bdug 'di bdag gi yul na gnas pa yin na bdag la mngon du ldang ba mi byed do snyam nas/do khro bas kun nas dkris bzhin du bcom ldan

148a5('dul ba): gzhan dag mdzad par brtsams te chos ston par mi mdzad pa dang /des gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos bstan du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa chos bstan du
148a6('dul ba): gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la tshig su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/rab tu dang sems med pa dang //zhe sdang can dang
148a7('dul ba): 'khrug pa yis//yang dag rdzogs sangs bstan pa yi//dam chos kun shes bya mi nus//gang gis nyes brtsom btul byas shing //rab dang med pa'i sems
148b1('dul ba): brtsal te/kun nas mnar sems 'dir spong ba//des ni legs gsungs shes par 'gyur//rgyal pos bsams pa/khyim bdag 'di la brten nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
148b2('dul ba): chos mnyan pa yang rgyun bku mo snyam nas/de la rgya cher khro ba'i sems skyes te sdod cig ces byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal

148b5('dul ba): dod pa des srog chags tre mo bu ke dang /tre la ta ka mang po dag bton nas de dag gis rgyal po kun nas//bskor te zin pa ni de nyam nga bas rang gi khyim du phyin cing der
148b6('dul ba): btsun mo'i 'khor dang gzhon nu dang /blon po dang /khrom gyi ru sna dang glang po che dang rta dag kyang kun nas bskor cing zin par gyur mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs
148b7('dul ba): thams cad kyang kun nas bskor zin par gyur to//de nas rgyal po skrag ste myur ba myur bar glang po che la zhon nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nos/bcom

149b2('dul ba): ma rabs dag gis rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ba gang yin pa de ni mi gtso bo dag gi lag pa nas bzung ba yin gyis/khyod kyi lag pa g.yas pa rkyongs lo khyim bdag bzod

149b5('dul ba): sdums byed dang tshul khrims tshong dpon zhes bya ba gnyis shig yod de/de na gtams pa srung ba rnams la ni sdums byed drang bo yin/gcig pus tshe bzhi'i byed pa rnams
149b6('dul ba): la ni tshul khrims tshong dpon drang po yin la de yang ngo tsha dang ldan pas bshad pa'i sar thag ring du 'gro ba yin no//mnyan yod na sten zla tha chungs kyi g.yo can zhes bya ba
149b7('dul ba): chom rkun pa dag 'khod pa de dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni dga' dbye byas ma thag tu 'dus nas shes ldan drug bdag cag gi las ci zhig byas ni des brtsal mi dgos por
150a1('dul ba): lo bskor du longs spyod cing bde bar 'khod par 'gyur zhes phan tshun gros byed do//de dag las gcig gis smras pa/shes ldan dag khyim bdag
150a2('dul ba): sdums byed 'di bltams pa 'dzin pa yin pos 'di la brgal zhing brtag par bya'o//gzhan dag gis smras pa mnyes kyis de bzhin bya ste/'di ltar khyim bdag tshul
150a3('dul ba): khrims tshong dpon 'di gcig pus che bzhi ba byed pa rnams la drang ba yin la de la yang ngo tshe dang ldan pas bshang ba'i sar thag ring du 'gro bas de bzung ste sdigs na des
150a4('dul ba): che bzhi 'byed par 'gyu ro zhes de dag gis de'i byar byas te bshang ba'i sar song ba bzung nas/bsdigs te smras pa khyim bdag ci khyod gson nam 'chi/des smras pa/

150a6('dul ba): rgol zhig rtog gi khyod kyis che bzhi phye zhig das smras pa/shes ldan dge tso yang dag pas bas bsam/yang dag pa ma yin pas/khyim bdag yang dag pa
150a7('dul ba): ma yin pas so//shes ldan dag kho bo yang dag pa ma yin pas che bzhi mi 'byed do//kho bos tshe gcig gi sdug bsngal las thar bar bya ba'i don du tshe rabs
150b1('dul ba): mang po'i sdug bsngal bskyed par mi nuso//de dag gis smras pa/khyim bdag gal te re zhig che bzhi 'byed na/de lta na legs/gal te mi 'byed na kho bo cag gis khyod

150b5('dul ba): rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te drong ngo //mnyan yod na ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi no bo rgyal bu nag po zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba lta na sdug pa mdzes pa
150b6('dul ba): dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can/sangs rgyas la skyabasu song /chos la skyabs su song /dge 'dun la skyabasu song ba zhig 'dug pa de yan lag
150b7('dul ba): brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa'i gan du bdud kyi ris kyi lha mo zhig 'ongs te rig pas bskyed pa ma yin pos mgron du gnyer ba na des de dang du ma blangaso//

151b3('dul ba): zong 'jal cing btsongs nas de las kar sha pa na bzhi grub cing de dag las gcig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dri ga tsang khang du spos kyi byug pas byugs/gnyis pas ni dge
151b4('dul ba): 'dun gyi slad du dge slong mchod ston stsal/gsum pas ni g.yog 'khor gyi 'tsho ba sbyar/bzhi pa ni zong gi rim du bzhag ste/btsun pa bdag gi nor ma mchis

151b7('dul ba): nas bsdigs te/de dag bdeg la 'di skad ces khyim bdag ci khyod gson nam 'tsho zhes mtsho nas bdag gis de dag la 'di skad ces/shes ldan dag khyed kyis
152a1('dul ba): ji ltar bsams pa'o//zhes bgyis pa dang de dag bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag gal te lta na kho bo cag khyim bdag sdums byed la nor
152a2('dul ba): brgya 'am stong gis rgol cing rtog gis khyed kyi che bzhi phye zhig ces mchi nas/bdag gis de dag la 'di skad ces shes ldan dag ci yang dag pas sam/yang dag
152a3('dul ba): pa ma yin pas shes bgyis na/de dag bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag yang dag pa ma yin pas so zhes mchi nas/bdag gis de dag la 'di skad ces shes ldan
152a4('dul ba): dag kho bo yang dag pa ma yin pas che bzhi mi 'byed de kho bos tshe gcig gis sdug bsngal las thar bar bya ba'i don du tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal bskyed par mi nus

152b2('dul ba): skad ces byin no zhes bgyis te btsun pa bdag phongs par gyur pas kyang chos yongs su ma btAng ste bdag gis phongs par gyur pa na chos spyad pa de ngo mtshar mi che 'am/bcom

153a7('dul ba): nas langs te song ngo //breng ldan mas smras pa/lha khyod kyis kyang ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la ma zhus/phreng ldan ma nga ni thos pa nyung ba yin la/de dag
153b1('dul ba): ni thos pa mang ba yin pas/ngas ci zhig zhur yod/lha khyod kyang ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog par mi mdzad/phreng ldan ma nga rgyal po'i bya ba dang rgyal po'i byed pa

153b3('dul ba): rgyal pos btsun mo rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma la smras pa/khyod su las klog/des smras pa/lha 'phags pa shA ri'i bu las so//btsun mo phreng ldan ma la smras

153b7('dul ba): ljon pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug//
154a1('dul ba): mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das lnga tshe dang ldan pA sh+tsa ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal ba
154a2('dul ba): gsal rgyal 'di skad ces rgyal rigs dbyar tshul mo klog tu stsol cig ces mchi na/bdag gis de la ji skad brjod par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
154a3('dul ba): shA ri'i bu klog tu tshug cig/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i dus kau sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la/lha bka' klog tu srul to zhes khas blangaso//rgyal pos
154a4('dul ba): de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/e/tshe dang ldan pa 'tshor kha ga la ba des gos ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i rkang pa gnyis la sago bos
154a5('dul ba): phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha la 'di skad ces smras//
154a6('dul ba): 'phags pa phong ldan ma 'phags pa las sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog par 'tshal na klog tu stsal bar gsol/des smras pa/lha bcom ldan 'das la su'o zhes
154a7('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu
154b1('dul ba): 'dug/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa ko sa las byung ba'i rgyal po gsal
154b2('dul ba): rgyal 'di skad ces phreng ldan ma klog tu gsol cig ces mchi nas/bdag gi de la ji skad brjod par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'char kha
154b3('dul ba): klog tu chug cig/tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la/lha klog tu stsal to//zhes khas blangs nas/rgyal po de'i rkang pa
154b4('dul ba): gnyis la phyag 'tshal te song ngo //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa//bam po bdun cu pa//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni dus shes pa dang /
154b5('dul ba): dus rig po yin pas/de dus su song nas/rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma klog tu 'jug gris dus ma yin par mi 'gro'o//tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha ni dus mi shes
154b6('dul ba): pa dang dus mi rig pa yin pas dus su yang song ste/phreng ldan mi klog tu 'jug la dus ma yin par yang 'gro'o//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ko sa lar byung ba'i
154b7('dul ba): rgyal po gsal rgyal ri brags gzhan zhig tu bya ba cung zhig byung nas de'i mtshan mo nyid du langs teH/der 'phags pa dang tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha glang po che'i sgra
155a1('dul ba): dang rta'i sgra dang dung gi sgras sad nas des bsams pa/btsun mo phreng ldan ma la bzlas pa sbyin du 'gro'o snyam nas de rgyal ba pho brang gi

155a4('dul ba): rkun pa dag 'jug par 'gyur zhing 'di mi gtsang ba'i re ba dang brtson rA dang wa lam can du 'gyur ro//spro ba skrag nas cad mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa

155b7('dul ba): gzhan yang phog ste/tse byos bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhu ngo bzed gang ba 'di yang thob bo//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i buso smras pa
156a1('dul ba): de'i phyir khyod drug snga yin//dge slong don nyung ngu dag gis thos nas ci'i phyir dge slong dag nam ma langs/skya rengs ma shwa ra rin po che dag gam
156a2('dul ba): rin po cher smod pa dag ma bsdus por rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi ba ri dang bskur ba'i sgo gtan nam sgo gtan gyi nye 'khor las 'da' bar byed ces smod par byed/phyung

156b1('dul ba): ci'i phyir zhe na dge slong dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba la nyes dmigs bcu po 'di dag yod pa'i phyir te/bcu gong zhe na dge slong dag 'di la rgyal po btsun mo dang lhan cig 'dug
156b2('dul ba): cing dge slong yang rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro la de ni btsun mos dge slong mthong nas 'dzum 'byin par byed na de la rgyal po 'di snyam du/'di ltar btsun mos dge slong mthong nas
156b3('dul ba): 'dzum 'byin par byed pa las ni dge slong gi dbyen par sdig pa'i las byas pa'am/sdig pa'i las 'ga' zhig bya bar sems par mi 'gyur ram snyam du sems par

157b1('dul ba): 'gron na gang dag yod mi dga' ba de dag 'di snyam du dge slong rgyal ba'i pho byung 'dir 'gro ba las na de'i los ma yin nam snyam du sems par 'gyur te/de ni rgyal pa

157b3('dul ba): 'byi na de na gang dag yid mi dga' ba de dag 'dra snyam du dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'gro ba las na de'i las ma yin nam snyam du sems par 'gyur te/de ni rgyal po'i
157b4('dul ba): pho brang du 'gro ba'i nyes dmigs brgyad pa yin no//gzhan yang rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/glang ngo che'i tshigs dang /rta'i tshogs dang /shing

159a7('dul ba): cad dang ldan pa dang /bu rgyal tshab ma skyes dgra zhes bya ba dang blon po'i mchog ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar tshul zhes byad yod do//ji tsam dus
159b1('dul ba): gzhan zhig na rgyal po'i khab na tshong ba dag zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'phags nas de dag mthar gyis grong khyer dang grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang dag

160a1('dul ba): gad ba bgyid du stsol ba de na yang shing ljon pa dag kyang rtag tu me tog dang 'bras bu 'chags shing ltas kyang dus dang dus su char gyi rgyun

160a6('dul ba): khyer sgra sgrogs su khyod la bgyi ba chung zad mchis na bdag la phrin yig bskur cig dang thams cad sgrub bo zhes bris te bsku ro//de nas tshong ba de dag gis skyes dang
160a7('dul ba): drin yog dang zong rin khyer te rgyal po'i khab tu 'phags nas mthar gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin te//de nas lam gyi dub pa'i ngal bsos nas rin po che'i sgrom da
160b1('dul ba): drin ga de dag khyer te/rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i gan du drang nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te sgros dang bran sreg dag phul nas smras pa/lha grong khyer sgra sgrogs na rgya

160b3('dul ba): yul na ci zhig dkon/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha ni gos kyi mnga' bdag lags/rgyal po de ni rin po che'i bdag pa lags pas de la gos dge dkon no//de nas
160b4('dul ba): rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gos rin po che dag gis sgom bkang ste skyes su bkur phrin yig kyang /shed 'thun dgyes pa khyod kyis phrin spangs pa des 'jal te khyod kyang
160b5('dul ba): bdag gis ma mthong pa'i grogs lags kyis rgyal pa'i khab tu khyod lo yang bgyis cung zad mchis na bdag la phrin yig springs shig dang thams cad sgrub bo zhes bris te blon
160b6('dul ba): po rnams la bsgo ba skyes dang drin yig 'di khyer las pho nya dag la oM bskur cig/blon po rnams kyis pho nya dag las bskur ba dang nga /de dag gis skyes dang phrin yig de

161a1('dul ba): ya nA ri gan du song ste/rkang pa gnyis lnga gtugs nas sgrom dang phrin yig dag phul te smras pa/lha rgyal po gzugs can snying po

161a3('dul ba): ci 'dra ba kho na lta bu'o//blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha de lta bu lags mod kyi 'on kyang rgyal po de rang gi mtshon 'debs po nye 'khor gyi mkhar gyi rgyal po rnams
161a4('dul ba): dang lhan cig rang gi sa g.yul 'gyed cing g.yul 'gyed du stsal ba lag so//rgyal po u dr-i yan la nor bu'i khrab yan lag lnga po dus tshog su reg pa bde ba dang

161a6('dul ba): shes ldan dag rgyal po gal te rang gi mtshon 'debs pa nye 'khor gyi mkhar gyi rgyal po rna dang lhan cig yul 'gyed cing g.yul 'gyi du 'jug pa yin na de la nir bu'i khrab
161a7('dul ba): 'di bskor gyis pho nya dag sta gon gyis shig/de dag gis pho nya dag sta gon byas nas rgyal po u dra ya nas rin po che'i khro ba de dang phrin yig kyang 'di skad ces//
161b1('dul ba): shed 'thun dgyes pa khyod la bdag gis nor bu'i khrab 'di skyes su bkur te 'di yang yon tan lnga po dus tshig su reg pa bde ba dang bcang dka' ba dang dbug dka' ba dang dug
161b2('dul ba): 'jal ba dang snang ba'i bdag nyid dang ldan pa lags kyis khyod 'di bdag dang rkyen pas rang nyid kyis bcang bar bgyi zhing su la yang sprul bar mi bgyi'o zhes bris te bskuro//
161b3('dul ba): pho nya rnams kyis skyes de dang phrin yig khyer te rgyal po'i khab tu 'phags nas mthar gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to//de nas lam kyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas nor bu'i khrab
161b4('dul ba): de dang phrin yig khyor te/rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i gan du dong nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te nor bu'i khrab dang phrin yig phul nas smras pa/lha rgyal po u
161b5('dul ba): dra ya nas lha la skyes 'di dang phrin yig 'di bskuro//rgyal po gzugs can snying pos phrin yig klags te nor bu'i khrab de mthong nas mchog tu yi mtshan skyes te/blon pa
161b6('dul ba): rnams la smras po/shas ldan dag rin po che rtog pa dag bos shig/de dag gis rin po che rtog pa dag bos nas rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag rin po che 'di rin
161b7('dul ba): thang tshed cig/rin po che rtog pa dag gis nor bu'i khra ba dang ldan pa'i rin po che re re nas brtag par brtsams ni rin po che re re yang rin thang med par mthong nas/de dag
162a1('dul ba): rgyam sa smras na/dul na na ra yang na nams pa lags//sa na na phyug na du
162a2('dul ba): thang gdab par mi nus pa de'i rin thang byed par 'deb so//rgyal po gzugs can snying pos rin po che dag 'grus nas bdag gi de la skyes lan ci zhig bskur bar bya
162a3('dul ba): snyam du nyamang bar gyur nas/lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khongasu chud cing 'dug 'dug nas blon po rnams la smras la/shes ldan dag rgyal po unga?
162a4('dul ba): yinas ngal skyes 'di lta bu bskur na/ngas de la skyes lan ci zhig bsgyur bar bya/mu ge d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar tshul gyis smras pa ni
162a5('dul ba): khyod kyi yul du yang 'jig rten gsuMl ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i rin po che byung ba 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dge bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
162a6('dul ba): sangs rgyas lags kyi/khyod kyis kyang ros la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs 'drir stsol la smyos lan du bskur bar gsol/rgyal po gal te de lta na bcom
162a7('dul ba): ldan 'das la zhu'o zhes de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po/bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song spyi phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la rma
162b1('dul ba): bas phyug 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug/mthu' gcig tu 'dug nas bcoMs ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsal to//btsun bla gr-ih+Na
162b2('dul ba): khyur sgra sgrogs na/rgyal po mA r+tha yin zhes bgyi ba bdag gi ma mthong ba'i grogs zhig mchis po des/bdag la nor bu'i khri ba yan lag lnga dang ldan po zhi go skyes
162b3('dul ba): bskur te/de'i slad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/bdag gis kyang ras la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs 'drir stsal te de la skyes lan du
162b4('dul ba): shAr gyus ldan dus kyis largyul chen po gnang gas pasu khyod kyis sems pa ba ts+tsha/rgyal gyi smi
162b5('dul ba): ya nas mthong ma thag kho nar dad pa skye bar 'gyur zhing bden pa mthong por byed par 'gyur//rgyal po gzugs tson snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
162b6('dul ba): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //des yul thams nad na gnas pa'i ri ma mkhan dag bkug ste smras pa/shes ldan dag bcom
162b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ras la bris shig/de dag gis smras pa lha bri bar 'tsholo//de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma bzung bar brtsams pa dang /
163a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta bas mchog ma shes pa yin pasna/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma
163a2('dul ba): bzung bar ma nus nas de dag yi tshad de rgyal po'i gan du song ste smras pa/lha bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma bzung bar rngo ma theg ste gal te lhas
163a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das pho brang gzhan du spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol na/de lta na bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma bzung bar rnga thig go//rgyal po
163a4('dul ba): gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das pho brang gzhan du spyan drangs kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta bas mchog mi shes pa yin pas 'di ltar de dag
163a5('dul ba): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mthong ba na de dang de la blta blos mi ngoms par gyur nas/de lta na yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma bzung bar ma nus nas btsam
163a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po ri mo mkhan rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan me bzung bar mi nus kyis yi chod par ma byed par ras
163a7('dul ba): de 'on cig dang ngas grib ma btang bar bya'o//rgyal pos ras phul ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dor grib ma btang ste ri mo mkhan rnams la bka' stsal po//zhes
163b1('dul ba): ldan dgra grib ma 'dir tshan sna tshogs kyis khongs shig/rgyal po la yang bka' stsal pa/rgyal ba chen po sku gzugs byas nas 'og tu skyab su 'gro ba dang bsgyur
163b2('dul ba): ba'i gzhi dag dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba dang lugs las bzlog pa dag bri bar bya'o//stong du tshigs su bcad pa
163b3('dul ba): gnyis pa/brtsams par bya zhing 'byung bar bya//sangs rgyas bsten la 'jug par bya/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sngon gnom par
163b4('dul ba): bya//gang zhig rab tu bag yod par//chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs naso//sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur//zhes bya ba
163b5('dul ba): dog bri bar bya'o//pho nya dag la phrin dus phyogs go skabs yongs par bkur sti chen pos sku gzugs 'di dbye bar bya ste/gal te 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na 'di ni 'jig
163b6('dul ba): rten gsum las ches khyad par 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs yin no zhes brjod par bya'o//gal te 'og tu bris pa 'di ci yin zhes 'drin
163b7('dul ba): 'di ni khas len pa'o//'di ni bslab pa'i gzhi dog go//'di ni 'jig rten gyi 'byung ba dang ldog pa zhes brjod par bya'o//gal te steng du bris bu 'di ci yin
164a1('dul ba): zhes 'drin 'di ni mngon par spro bar byu zhes brjid pa du coM zhes bsgo zhag/sbrul dum thams cad rlo nga rlung gcug nas d+hA
164a2('dul ba): tshogs kyis bsgos te legs par dril nas gser gyi dong bur bcug ste/gser gyi dong bu yang dngul gyi dong pur bcug/dngul gyi dong bu yang zangs
164a3('dul ba): dong bur bcug/zangs kyi dong bu yang dri sna tshogs kyi bsgos pa'i gos dag gis dkris te/glang po che'i rgyab du bkral nas grong khyer mdzes pa dang lam mdzes pa chen pos
164a4('dul ba): grong khyer nas byung ste/rgyal po u dr-i ya na la phrin yig 'di skad ces shed 'thun du gyes pa khyod la bdag gis 'jig rten gsum las ches khyad par du 'phags
164a5('dul ba): pa'i skyes te 'di bkur gyis khyod kyis 'di dpag ched phyed dang gsum du gong khyer mdzes pa dang lam mdzes par bya zhing bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang
164a6('dul ba): ldan pos bsu bar bya ste sa phyogs go skabs yangs par mchod pa dang bkur bsti chen po byas ste dbye bar bya'o//de nas khyod kyis bsod nams chen po 'thob par
164a7('dul ba): 'gyu ro zhes dris te bskuro//pho nya rnams la yang khyod kyis 'di dang 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o zhes bsgo nas de dag giso sku gzugs dang phrin de khyer te sgra sgrogs
164b1('dul ba): 'phag so//de dag mthar gyis sgra sgrogs kyi 'dab kyi phyin nas de dag gis lam kar sdad de/rgyal po u dra yA na la phrin yig bskur ro//rgyal po u dra ya nas phrin yig
164b2('dul ba): klags nas/khro bas kun nas dkris par gyur te blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag des nga la phrin yig 'di skad spring pa la nyon cig/des nga la skyes ji lta bu
164b3('dul ba): zhig bskur na de'i phyir dus dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du grong khyer mdzes pa dang lam mdzes pa bya zhing bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pas bsro bar bya'o/
164b4('dul ba): zhes zer/dpung gi tshogs yan log bzhi pa sta gon gyis shig dang /nga song la de'i yul 'khor gzhom par bya'o//blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha rgyal po de
164b5('dul ba): ni bdag nyid chen po zhig lags shes gda' bas des lha'i zhal sngar skyes ngan ngon zhig bskur bar rngo mi thogs pas dzo brtag par bgyis te/gal te lha'i thugs
164b6('dul ba): mnyas na de lta nu legs bdag cag gi de la dus 'tshal bar bgyi'o//de dag gis dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun chad du lam mdzes par byed du bcug ste grong khyer
164b7('dul ba): sgra sgrogs kyang rdo ba dang gseg ma dang gyo mo med par rnam par bzhag nas can dan gyi chus chag cho ga btab cing 'dug spos kyi dri zhim po'i snod dag dang rad taM der gyi chun
165a1('dul ba): ba'i phrong ba sgyus shing bdug dang rgyas mtshan spyod rjes tog sna /sa 'aM skyed mas tshal dga' ba tshul nas bya ba ltar dgar/
165a2('dul ba): bar 'gyur bar byas nas rgyal po bdug nyid dpung gi tsho gas yan lag bzhi dang ldan pas bsu nas grang khyer gyi nang du 'jug du bcu go/de nas srog cha/du ma dag
165a3('dul ba): kyang der 'dus par gyur/na mkha'i dkyil 'khor du yang lha 'bum phrag du ma dag 'dus par gyur nas sa phyogs go skabs yangs par de dag gi nang du mchod
165a4('dul ba): pa chen po byis te sku gzugs de phye ba dang yul dbus nas tshong ba mang po zong thogs te grong khyer sgra skyugs su lhagos pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs de mthong
165a5('dul ba): nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha lo zhes thams cad kyis skad cig tu sgra byung ngo //rgyal po u dra ya nas sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma
165a6('dul ba): thos pa thos nas spu'i khung bu thams cad zing zhes byed par gyur nas ya mtshan skyes te yun ring mo zhig tu mig tshugs su brtags nas smos pa/shes ldan dag
165a7('dul ba): sangs rgyas shes bya ba de su yin/de dag gis smras pa/lha yul dbus na gangs kyi ri ngos dang nye ba chu klung skal ldan shing rnga'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i ba
165b1('dul ba): gnas dang ha cang mi ring bar shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu byung ste/de bram ze bltas pa dang mtshon mkhan dag gis gal te gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang na bzhugs par gyur na 'khor
165b2('dul ba): lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa'i rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te de'i rin po che sna bdun po de dag ni 'di lta bur 'gyur
165b3('dul ba): te/'di lta ste/'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po dang /rta rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin pa che dang /khyim bdag rin po
165b4('dul ba): che dang /dmag dpon rin po che nyid ni bdun pa yin no//'di la bu dpa' brtul phod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa
165b5('dul ba): stong tshang ba yod par 'gyuraro//de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis gdab pa med
165b6('dul ba): pa/chos dang 'thun zhing snyoms par legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro//gal te ske dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad
165b7('dul ba): pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du rnam par grags pa'i sgra dang ldan par
166a1('dul ba): 'gyu//nus lung bstan te/skya 'dan de'i sku gzugs lags//rgyum po rgyu tshur yod dga' nas smras pa/shes ldan dag da
166a2('dul ba): ni shes kyis 'di 'dri'o//'og tu bris pa 'di ci yin/lnga 'di ni khas len pa lags so//'di ni bslob pa'i gzhi dag lags//'do ni 'jig rten gyi 'byung
166a3('dul ba): ba dang ldog pa lags//shes ldan dag de yang shes kyis 'dri'o//steng du bris pa 'di ci yin/b+ha 'di ni mngon par spro ba bgyi ba lagaso//rgyal po u dA yan
166a4('dul ba): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugasu 'byung ba dang lugs las bzlog pa yang bzlas nas legs par bzung bar byas te des mtshan mo num mi nangs
166a5('dul ba): pa'i tshe don thams cad bag yang su byas te 'dug nas skyil mo krung bcas te lus drang por babring nas dran pa phyogs par bzhag ste rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yun
166a6('dul ba): lag bcu gnyis lug pu 'byung ba dang lugs las bzlog po las rnam par blta bar byed de/dri lta ste/'di med pas 'di 'byu la 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di
166a7('dul ba): skye ba na/'di lta ste/mi rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/rnam par rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/
166b1('dul ba): ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyi skye mched drug/skye mchod drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/chos pa'i rkyen gyis sred pa/sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/
166b2('dul ba): len pa'i rkyen gyis sred pa/srid dri'i rkyen gyis skye ba/skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang
166b3('dul ba): 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/de lta na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhog pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'di lta ste 'di med na 'di mi 'byung la/'di ma
166b4('dul ba): skyes pa'i phyir 'di mi skye ba ste/'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gab/'du byed 'grogs pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/rnam par shes pa
166b5('dul ba): 'og gas pos ming dang gzugs 'gago/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/skye mched drug 'gegs pas reg pa 'gag/reg pa 'gags
166b6('dul ba): bas tshor ba 'gag/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/sred pa 'grogs pas len pa 'ag go/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/srid pa 'gags
166b7('dul ba): bas skye ba 'gag/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/
167a1('dul ba): de lta na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'gag par 'gyu ro//zhes rnam par blta bar byedado//des rten cing
167a2('dul ba): 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba dang lugs las zlog pa la rnam par lta ba na/'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho
167a3('dul ba): ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas//des bden pa mthong nas tshig su bcad pa smras pa/ring na bzhugs pa'i
167a4('dul ba): sangs rgyas kyis//shes rab mig ni rnam par sbyangs//gang la de 'dra'i gso mnga' ga/sman pa'i mchog la phyag 'tsha lo//des shes nas dang
167a5('dul ba): ba dang ldan pas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la phrin yig 'di skad ces/shed 'thun dgyes pa khyod la brten nas/bdag gi sems can dmyal ba
167a6('dul ba): dang dud 'gro dang yi dwags dag nas ni rkang pa phyung //lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag/'khor ba ni mthar byas//khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni
167a7('dul ba): skams/rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral//ngan song gi sgo dag ni gcad/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dog ni phye/thog ma med pa'i dus nas
167b1('dul ba): bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni mngon sum du byas twa/bdag dge
167b2('dul ba): slong mthong bar 'dod kyis khyod kyis dge slong 'ga' zhig btang ba'i rig so zhes bris te spring ngo //rgyal po gzugs can snying pos phrin yig de klags nas/
167b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu 'dug/mtha' gcig
167b4('dul ba): tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa u drA ya nas bden pa dag mthong nas des bdag
167b5('dul ba): la phrin yig bskur te/dge slong mthong bar 'tshal gyis dge slong 'ga' zhig btang ba'i rigs zhes mtsho na/de'i slad du 'di la ji ltar bsgrub
167b6('dul ba): bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgodra ba rgyal po u dran 'khor dang bcas pa dang grong khyor sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dge slong gang gi gdul
167b7('dul ba): ba yin snyam du dgengs na/dge slong ka t+ya ya na chen po'i gdul ba yin par gzigs naso/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen popa la
168a1('dul ba): ka' stsal pa/kat+tha yan g+h+r-i stobs na rgyal ba s+yA d+ha yan 'khor dang bcas pa dang //srog sun gnas pa'i spyan /
168a2('dul ba): la srams shig/tshe dang ldan pa ka d+ha yAn chen pos btsun pa ka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan naste/bcom ldan 'das kyi nangs
168a3('dul ba): gnyis la myig bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pre kA t+yA yan chen po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dr-i shAm
168a4('dul ba): thAngs pago sa snang brjid dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khyab tu bsod snyoms la zhugaso//rgyal blo'i khab tu bskyed snyoms b+hA rgyus nas mas kyi bya sa/
168a5('dul ba): phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar longs spyod pa'i gnas mal mkhosu phyu ste/lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas 'khor lnga brgya
168a6('dul ba): dong grong khyer sgra sgrogs ga la ba der drong //rgyal po gzugs tsan+de sbring byis kyang /rgyal po yanas phrin mig shed 'thun dgyes pa khyod kyi
168a7('dul ba): dge do ni blo'i sbyin pa dang 'dra ba 'di 'khor lnga brgya pa dang btang gis khyod na dpag tshad phyed dang gsum su lo ma mdzes pa dang grong khyer mdzes po bye zhing bdag
168b1('dul ba): nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pas bsu bar bya ste/grong khyer rgya phyi rol tu gtsug lag khang lnga brgya byed du gzhug cing khri dang khri'u dang stan nang tshangs
168b2('dul ba): can dang la ba dang sbrus dang gor bu lce brgya yang sbyin par bya 'o sad snyoms lnga brgya yong sbyor du gzhug par bya ste/des ni khyod kyi bsod nams chen po 'thob par 'gyur
168b3('dul ba): zhes bris te bskuro//rgyal po u dra yA na sa phrin yog klogs nas dge' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te des dpag tshod phyi dang gsum du lam dang grong khyer mdzes
168b4('dul ba): par byed du bcug nas bdag nyid dpung gi tshigs yan lag bzhi pa dang skye bo 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pas bsu nas bkur bsti chen pos grong khyer sgra sgrogs
168b5('dul ba): su 'jog tu bcug cing grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu gtsug lag khang lnga brgya yong byed du bcug/khri dang khri'u dang stan nang tshangs can dngal ba dang sngas dang gor buM
168b6('dul ba): ng+gA yid 'bul du bah+ma /bsod snyoms lnga brgya yang sbyor du betsug ste so phyogs gi skabs yangs par sbyin sham du bcugo/tshe dang ldan bA ka tI yan chen po dag
168b7('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du stan bshams pa nyid lo 'dug/sreg chags 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig ni ljid ma skyes pa na/kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i
169a1('dul ba): rtsa ba dag gis bskul ba na der 'dus par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya yan chen ngos 'khor de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams
169a2('dul ba): dang rang bzhin khongasu chud nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis gang thos nas khyad par chen po rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan par byas te/kha cig gis
169a3('dul ba): ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/kha tsog gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/kha cag gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon
169a4('dul ba): sum du byas/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bya'o//kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems
169a5('dul ba): bskyed kho cig gis ni rang byang chub tu sems bskyed/kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//'khor phal cherwa ni sangs
169a6('dul ba): rgyas la gzhol ba dang ches la 'bab pa dang dge 'dun la bab par bkod do//grong khyer sgra sgrogs na khyim bdag rgyal dang sgyur rgyal zhes bya ba gnyis shig 'khod
169a7('dul ba): pa de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen po ga la ba der song ste phyen nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ye yau na chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshalo te mtha' gcig tu
169b1('dul ba): 'khod do//mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas khyim bdag rgyal dang skar rgyal gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po la 'di skad ces smra so//'phags pa ka t+ya yan chen po bdag
169b2('dul ba): cag gnyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa'i dge slong gi dngos po dang /bdag cag gnyis kyis 'phags pa ka t+ya ya
169b3('dul ba): na chen po'i drung du tshangs par spyad pa spyad pa mthob bam/tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen pos de gnyis rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas te gdam ngag dang rjesu bstan pa
169b4('dul ba): byin nas de gnyis kyis spro ba dang 'bad pa dang brtsal ba byas pas gong nas gong du yid la byed pa'i khyad par thob nas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba de nyid yin te/
169b5('dul ba): 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa rnam pa thams cad spangs pas
169b6('dul ba): rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu breg ste gros ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par
169b7('dul ba): spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de'i tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te//bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do//tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//
170a1('dul ba): bya ba byas so//srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgo bar byed cing dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/
170a2('dul ba): bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa na mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa can da nr-i bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang
170a3('dul ba): mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob po srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur bsti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
170a4('dul ba): kyis mchod pa bya ba dang rjed par bya ba dang mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to//de gnyis kyis 'bar ba dang gsal po dang char 'bab pa dang klog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dge byas
170a5('dul ba): nus phung po'i lkog ma med pa'i myi dun+da las 'dis pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//de gnyis kyis nye du drag gisu lus kyi mchod pa byas nas mchod
170a6('dul ba): rten gnyis byed du bcug ste go cig ni rgyal gyi'o//gitsog shos ni skar rgyal gyi'o//rgyal po u da ya na nyin re nyi ni re zhing tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA yin chen po'i drung
170a7('dul ba): nas chos mnyan te btsun mo'i 'khor la 'phags pa ka t+ya ya na chen po'i chos mngar pa dang mngar bstan par byed de sbrang bu sbrang rtsi 'byin pa bzhin no zhes brjod par
170b1('dul ba): byedado//de dag gis smras pa lha sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa lagaso//ji ltar gang gi slad du khyod chos gsan pas so//gal te de lta na khyed cag/
170b2('dul ba): kyang ci'i phyir chos mi ny+dza ni/lha bdag cig ni ngo tsha dang ldan pa lags pas ji ltar der mchis te chos mnyen por bgyi/gal te 'phags pa ka t+ya ya na chen po 'di
170b3('dul ba): nyid du mchis te/chos ston par bgyi na/de lta na bdag cag kyang chos nyan to//rgyal po u dA ya nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen po la smras pa/'phags
170b4('dul ba): pa btsun mo'i 'khor chos nyin par 'che lo//des smras pa/rgyal po chen po dge slong dag ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs shing chos mi ston te/bcom

170b6('dul ba): me'o//rgyal po u dra ya nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la phrin yig 'di skad ces/shed 'thun dgyes pa bdag go btsun mo'i 'khor chos nyan par 'tshal
170b7('dul ba): na de'i slad du dge slong ma 'ga' zhig btang ba'i rigaso zhes bris te bsku ro//rgyal po gzugs can snying pos phrin yig de klags nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
171a1('dul ba): der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu 'dug/mtha'
171a2('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa rgyal po u dra ya nas phrin yog spring ste btsun mo'i
171a3('dul ba): 'khor chos nyan par 'tshal gyis de'i slad du dge slong ma 'ga' zhig gtang ba'i rig so zhes mchi na de'i slad du 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/bcom ldan
171a4('dul ba): 'das kyis dgongs pa kra/rgyal po u dra ya na'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med dang grong khyer sgra sgrogs ni gnas pa'i bud med rnams dge slong ma gang gis gdul
171a5('dul ba): ba yin snyam du dgongs na dge slong me re ma'i gdul ba yin par gzigs nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mA re ma la bka' stsal pa/raM
171a6('dul ba): ma grong khyer sgra sgrogs na rgyal po u dra ya na'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med dang sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i bud med rnams la soms shig/dge slong mar mas btsun
171a7('dul ba): pa bka'o bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi
171b1('dul ba): spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas dge slong ma re ma de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyom/
171b2('dul ba): lo zhugaso//rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phye ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las byir log pas ji ltar long spyod pa'i gnas mal
171b3('dul ba): mkho su phab ste/lhung bzed dang chos gos thog sa nas 'khor lnga brgya dang gong khyer sgra sgrogs ga la ba der song ngo //rgyal po gzugs can snying pos kyang /
171b4('dul ba): rgyal po u drA ya na la phrin yig 'di skad ces shed 'thun degyes pa khyod kyi phyir bdag gis nyan thos ma chen mo ston pas bgags pa 'di 'khor lnga brgya
171b5('dul ba): dang gtang gis khyed kyis kyang dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du lam dang grong khyer mdzes par bya zhing bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pas bsre bar
171b6('dul ba): bya ste grong khyer gyi nang du dbyar khang lnga brgya yang byed du gzhug par bya/khri dang khri'u dang stan nang tshangs can dang lA ba dang sngas dang yang bu lnga brgya yang dbul bar bya
171b7('dul ba): bsod snyomaso lnga brgya yang sbyor du gzhug par byas de des na khyod kyis bsod nams chen po 'thob par 'gyu ro zhes bris te bskuro//rgyal po oM dra ya nas phrin
172a1('dul ba): yig de klags nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te des dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du lam dang grong khyer mdzes par byed du

172a3('dul ba): grong khyer gyi nang du dbyar khang lnga brgya byed du bcug ste/khri dang khri'u dang stan nang tshangs can dang la ba dang sngas dang gor bu lnga brgya yang 'bul du bcug/bsod
