172a6('dul ba): zhig na rgyal po u dra ya nas pi wang bsgrengs te btsun mo zla 'od gar byed do//des de gar byed pa ni chud za ba'i mtshan ma mthong nas des de la mgo 'jug tu brtags te
172a7('dul ba): bsams nas zhag bdun 'das na 'di dus byed par 'gyuraro snyam nas de'i lag na gnas pa'i pi wang shir te sa la lhung ba dang /btsun mo zla 'od kyi smras pa/lha bdag
172b1('dul ba): glogar ma 'ogasasam can du/zla 'od khyod kyis gang ma logs pa pa yon to di ltang ngas spyod kar byed pa na rgyud napa'i mtshan ma mthong bsan m+b+ha bdun pa la khyod dus/
172b2('dul ba): byud par 'gyuraro//btsun mo zla 'od kyis rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/skyogal te de ltan de dag gis lha la bsnyen bkur ni bgyis legs na/gal
172b3('dul ba): te lhas gnang na bdag rab tu 'byung //rgyal pos smras pa/zla 'di dus yin gyis gnang ngo //gal te khyod rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas
172b4('dul ba): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed non de khyod kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin//gal te kun tu sbyor ba lkog ma dang bcas pas dus byas te b+ha rnams kyi nang du skyes par
172b5('dul ba): gyur na ni khyod lhur gyur pasau dra la blta bar bya'o//dris smras pa lha bka' bzhin 'tshal/rgyul po u drA ya nas btsun mo zla 'od dge slong ma ra~M mA la gtad de smos pa/
172b6('dul ba): 'phags ma btsun yo b+hU 'od legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong ma'i dang po pa 'tshal gyis de'i slad du 'pha
172b7('dul ba): mas 'di rab tu'i byung ba dang rdzogs par basbyin par mdzad pa'i rigaso//dge slong ma rims smras pa/de ltar bgyi'o zhes des rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par
173a1('dul ba): bsnyen par byaso//dge slong ma rems bsams nas de la 'chi ba'i 'du shes sgoms shig ces gdam ngag byi no//btsun mo
173a2('dul ba): zla 'od kyis 'chi ba'i 'du shes bsgom par brtsams nas de nyi ma bdun pa la dus la bab nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so//lha'i bu 'am lha'i
173a3('dul ba): bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /gang du skyes pa dang /las gong gis skyes pa'o//lha'i bu ma
173a4('dul ba): zla 'od kyis bsams pa bdag gang nas shi 'phos snyam na//mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang gang du skyes snyam na rgyal chen bzhi po'i lha rnams kyi
173a5('dul ba): nang du skyes pa dang /las gang gis skyes snyam na bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa nyid kyis skyes par mthong ngo //de nas lha'i bu mo
173a6('dul ba): zla 'od 'di snyam du sems te gang gis phyir bdag yongs su gnas pa brten te bcom ldan 'das la blto ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gi
173a7('dul ba): tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin gyis bdag yongasu gnas pa ma brten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/
173b1('dul ba): de nas lha'i bu mo zla 'od rna cha dang gdub 'khor g.yo zhing dri ma med pa thogs te do shal dang se mo dos brgyan te lus kyis/lha'i ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /
173b2('dul ba): pad+ma dkar po dag gis thu ba bkang ste kha dog shin tu 'das pas mtshan mo la bab pa dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la mai tog dag
173b3('dul ba): gis mngon par gtor te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /'di ltar lha'i bu me zla 'od kyi kha dog gi
173b4('dul ba): mthus 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo DA 'od kyi bsam pa dang bag la
173b5('dul ba): nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/gang thos na lha'i 'o mo zla 'od kyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba
173b6('dul ba): ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtog par byed pa'i chos
173b7('dul ba): bstan pa mdzad do//des bden pa mthong nas/btsun po bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas
174a1('dul ba): kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong
174a2('dul ba): dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/sum

174a6('dul ba): dag khyod brten bdag gis ni//de ring skyen bral dag pa'i mig thob cing //go 'phang zhi bu 'phags pa dgyes thob ste//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol

174b6('dul ba): snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par byas te se gol gyi sgras bslang ba dang de gnyid kyis non pa'i mig dang rnam par shes pa mi gsal bas smras pa/khyod su des smras pa/

175a1('dul ba): rnams kyi nang du skyes te gal te bdag dang lhan cig 'jal bzhod na bAts+tsham+bu ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu byung zhog dang /ga turgyu 'di nyid pa
175a2('dul ba): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du mdzad na ni de nyid khyod kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtha' lags so//gal te kun tu sbyor ba lhag ma
175a3('dul ba): dang bcas pas dus bgyis te rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis nang du skyes par gyur na ni khyod bdag dang 'jal bar 'gyuraro zhes smras te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//

175a6('dul ba): po u drA ya nas bsems pa/gang gi phyir bdag la lha mos bskul nas/bdag khyim pa khyim gyi nang na gnas shing sogs 'jog gi longs spyod dang 'dod
175a7('dul ba): ba la yongs su spyod pa ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin gyis/bdag gis gzhon nu gtsug phud can rgyal srid la dbang bskur te/bdag sgo dang kha spu
175b1('dul ba): bregs nas/gos ngur smrig dag bgos te/yang dag pa khro nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung snyam nas/des blon po'i mchog hUM ru ka dang b+hi ru ka
175b2('dul ba): ga nyis mngag pas bos te smras pa/shes ldan gnyis bu gzhon nu gtsu glo phud can ngal ci 'dra ba de kho na bzhin du khyed gnyis la yang de 'dra ba yin gyis/khyed
175b3('dul ba): gnyis kyis de gnod pa las bzlog par bya zhing phan pa la nges par sbyar bar gyis shig/nga ni legs par gsung po'i tshes 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ngo //de gnyis
175b4('dul ba): kyis thos nas mchi mas brnangs te 'khod do//rgyal pos gzhon nu gtsug phud can la smras pa/bu khyod ji ltar nga'i tshig mnyan pa dang /bya bar sems pa de

175b6('dul ba): pA la rab tu 'byung ngo //des kyang thos nas mchi mas brnangs te 'dug/de nas rgyal po u dra ya na grong khyer sgra sgrog su dril bsgrag pa byed du bcug ste/grong
175b7('dul ba): khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa dag dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi dag dang /yul tha na dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams la/shes ldan dag nyon
176a1('dul ba): cig/nga ni sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas/yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung gis//
176a2('dul ba): ngas rgyal sing byed du bcug pa na/gang la gnod pa cung zad ci byas pa/de bzod par gyis shig ces bsge'o//grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa rnams dang /pho
176a3('dul ba): dang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams rgyal po la rjesu chags pa yin pos de dag gis thos nas thams cad mchi/

176a5('dul ba): te/dge sbyong dang bram ze dang /bkren pa dang /sdug 'phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa dag byin/bsod nams dag byas te/mi bsnyen bkur ba cig dang /rgyal
176a6('dul ba): po'i khab log su phyogs der 'phagaso//de nas rgyal po gtsug phud can btsun mo'i 'khor dang /gzhon nu dang blon po dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcos pa
176a7('dul ba): dang /gzhan yang yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du 'brangs te/srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bskal bzhin
176b1('dul ba): du/grong khyer sgra sgrogs nas phyir byung ste bskyed mos tshal shing ljon pa'i tshal sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/me tog dang 'bras bu dang /chu rgyun sna tshogs dang ldan pa/dang pa
176b2('dul ba): de khrung khrung dang /rma bya dang /nai tsa dang /re skags dang /khu byugs dang /shang shang to'u sgra 'byin pa zhig tu yud tsam zhig sdod na sa grong khyer skya sgrogs log su
176b3('dul ba): rni ra bltas te/rgyal po gtsug phud can la smras pa/bu ngas chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug pas/de'i phyirare srog chags 'bum phrag 'di snyod nga'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar
176b4('dul ba): gyur gyis/khyod kyis kyang chos kyi rgyal srid byed du gzhug par bya'o//skyo ba'i tshigs de la yang bag pho ba ste smras pa/shes ldan dag ngas khyod kyi rgyal por 'di
176b5('dul ba): beskos kyi phyir deng l-i bde bar bsgrubs shig ces smras te sang ngo //rgyal po gtsug phud can btsun mo'i 'khor dang gzhon nu dang /blon po dang /pho blong 'khor gyi mi dang
176b6('dul ba): bcas pa dang /gzhan yang yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchi mes dkrugs pa'i mig gis yud tsam phyi bzhin rtog cing grong khyer sgra sgrogs
176b7('dul ba): su phyir log go//de nas rgyal po u dra ya nas mthar gyi grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas des bskyed mos tshal du bsdad de/mi de la smras pa/kwa'e nang rnga rgyal po
177a1('dul ba): gzugs can snying po'i gan du song la/rgyal po u dra ya na bskyed mos tshal na sdod do zhes sbron cig/mi de song ste rgyal po gzugs can snying pa
177a2('dul ba): la/lha rgyal po udramra bskyed mos tshal na sdod do zhes sbyin to//des thos nas bral kho na lo langs te/zhe shes 'tsho ba rnams la smras pa shes ldan dag rgyal po de
177a3('dul ba): dpung chen po dang ldan pa yin/des ma sbran pa kha nar 'ongs pa khyad cag sus kyang ma sheso//des smras pa lha de la dpung ga la mchis te/dpon g.yog gnyis su zhig
177a4('dul ba): mchis so//rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bsams pa/gang gi phyir bdag gi rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bar dbang bskur ba bgyi no de bzhin du grong khyer du 'jug
177a5('dul ba): tu zhugs pa ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin gyis bdag gi bkur bsti chen pos 'jug tu gzhugo snyam du rig nas la me mdzes pa dang grong khyer mdzes par byed du
177a6('dul ba): bcug nus dpung gi tshags yan lag bzhi pas bsu'o//de nas gnya' ba sprad de glang po che'i rgyab tu zhon nas/grong khyer rgyal po'i khag tu 'jug tu btsug /
177a7('dul ba): spos sna tshogs dang sbyar ba'i chus khras byed du bcug nasargyal po la 'os pa'i gos dag dang /spos dang /phreng po rgyu dang byug pa sna tshogs dag gis legs
177b1('dul ba): brgyan nas/zan byin te lam gyis drub pa'i ngal bsngos nas sbrus pA/shed 'thun da gyes pas rgyul snyed rgyus pa dang //ban+dan mo'i 'khor dang /gzhon nu
177b2('dul ba): da blon po dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams spangs te/'dir ci la byon sa gzhan gyi rgyal po 'ga' zhig gis yul 'khor gzhom par bgyis pa 'am/gzhin
177b3('dul ba): nu rgyu la srid pa mngon par dga' ba blon po skyon chags pas bslus pa/'ga' zhig gis bslus pa'am/gcig tu ma gyur tam/des smras pa/shed 'thun
177b4('dul ba): dgyes pa de ltar ma gyur te/bdagi legaso bar gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /rdzogs par bstan par dge slong gi dngos por 'tsha lo//
177b5('dul ba): rgyal po gzugs ce na skyong pos thos nas yid dga' zhing yid dga' ste/ro stod srong nas lag pa g.yA pa brkyang ste/kye ma sangs rgyas/kye ma chos/kye ma dge
177b6('dul ba): 'dun/kye ma chos kyi legs par gsungs pa nyid/'di ltar skyes bu gtso bo 'di lta bu dag gis rgyal srid rgyas pa dang /btsun me'i 'khor rgyas pa dang /
177b7('dul ba): mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs chen po dang /mdzod dang bang po dang /khyim rgya chen po dag spangs te/legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung
178a1('dul ba): pa dang /rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa smraso//
178a2('dul ba): rgyal po u dra ya na khrid de/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo //de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du ma'i gong ni bzhu shing chos ston pa mdzadado///
178a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi me ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po gzo spyangs gzugs can snying po thag ring po kho na nas gzig so//gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
178a4('dul ba): dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin te/de skyes dang bcas pas nga'i gan du 'ong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ni 'di lta ste/gdul ba'i
178a5('dul ba): skyes lta bu gzhan med do zhes bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhug so//rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
178a6('dul ba): 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa rgyal
178a7('dul ba): bo u dra yan 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dug pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang /rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das kyis
178b1('dul ba): thugs skye ba'i slad du 'di rab tu 'byung du gsol/rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dge slong chur ru shog ces pas rab tu byung zhing /
178b2('dul ba): dge slong chur shog/tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /de bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i mjug nir sgra byi ba dang /snam sbyar sbyin par
178b3('dul ba): gyur te/skra dang kha spu dag bdun skyes pa tsamo dang /lag pa lhung bzed dang /bya ma bum gyis brel ba dang /dge slong rdzogs par bsnyen nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod
178b4('dul ba): lam lta bung gnas par gyur to//yang smras pa/de bzhin gshegs pas chur shogadaka'i stsal pas//sgra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing //mod la dang
178b5('dul ba): por bzhir gnas gyur te//sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/de nas tshe dang ldan pa oM dra ye na/snga dro sham thubs bgos lhung bzed dang /
178b6('dul ba): gos thogs te/rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugaso//de skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis mthong nas/grong khyer rgyal po'i khab thams cad du/bcom
178b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi rgyal po u dra yan rab tu phyung rje pang bsnyen par mdzad nas/de bsod snyoms la rgyal po'i khab tu zhugaso zhes de lta bu'i sgra sgrags par gyur to//de
179a1('dul ba): skad thos nas srog chags 'dum phrag du ma druka/'dus par gyur cing /khyim g+ni nA na gnas pa'i bud med dag kyang skar khrung dang /
179a2('dul ba): skar khung dra ba can dang /lan kan dag gi drung du 'khod de de blta bar byed do//rgyal po gzugs rgyun snying po la blon po rnams kyi smras pa/lha rgyul po u
179a3('dul ba): dra ya na rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs te/srog chags 'bum phrag du mya dag gis bskor cing mchi so//rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de thos
179a4('dul ba): nas/dge slong u dra ya na ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/dge slong oM dra yAM na li tshigasu bcad pa 'di skad ces smras//mi dbang grong khyer stong dang ni//sgra sgro
179a5('dul ba): kyang ni spyad byas nas//bor ba'i bsod snyoms tshol byed pa//ji ltar yongasu mi gdung ngam//gser dang de bzhin dngul gyi snod//srasred tshod brgya pa spyad byas nas/
179a6('dul ba): sa yi lhung bzad spyod byed pa//ji ltar yongasu mi gdung ngam//sa lu'i 'bras can gcing ma dag/sha yi brlan pa spyad byas nas/zan dron 'khyengs pa spyod byed pa/
179a7('dul ba): ji ltar yongasu mi gdung ngam//srin ba la ras bal zar ma dang //ko ta ma ka shi'i gos spangs nas//phyag dar khrod dag srel byed pa//ji ltar yongasu mi gdung
179b1('dul ba): ngam//rlung med sgo gtan bsdams pa yi//khang pa brtsegs par khyod nyal nas//shing ljon drung du gnas gyur pa//ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam//'jam zhing ras
179b2('dul ba): bal 'dra ba yi//rgyalnga khri dag la khyod nyal nas//rtswa yI bstan mnyal byung ba//ji ltar yongasu mi gdung ngamo//btsun mo mtshungs pa yid 'ongs pa//gus par nyal cing
179b3('dul ba): stan smra ge/du ma khyod kyi rnam spangs pa//rnga ltar yongasu mi ga drung ngamo//glang chen gnya' dang shing rta dang //rta yi zhon pas khyod song nas//rkang pas sa la rgyu byed pa//ji
179b4('dul ba): ltar yongasu mi gdung ngam//nor mang ldan pa'i mdzod dang ni//khang ba dag kyang rnam spangs te//ci yang med pa thob gyur pa//ji ltar yongasu me gdung ngam//u drA ya
179b5('dul ba): nas smras pa/rgyal po gal te gdul dka' ba//gzhan gyi zas kyi 'tsho byed na//ma grub pas ni de 'dul te//gnya' shing ba lang 'dul ba bzhin//rgyal po
179b6('dul ba): gzugs can snying blom+b+ha smras pa/rgyal po khyod yid mi bde zlum//ci'i phyir dmun pa bzhin du sgra//rgyu la srid byed ni sbyin bya yis//khyod ni sngon bzhin longs spyod
179b7('dul ba): kyis//rgyal po khyod yid mi bde 'am//ci'i phyir dman pa bzhin du smra//yid kyis gang dang ging 'dod pa'o'i//longs spyod rabo mchog sbyin par bya//u dra ya nas
180a1('dul ba): sgras p+ta/rgyal po gang zhig 'jig rten na//lus kyi chos reg brten pa min//de ni nges par lta nyid dang //yang na mya ngan 'da' ba
180a2('dul ba): 'gyur//mi dbang gang zhig chos spong zhing //'di la chos min dga' byed pa//rgyal po de bkren shes par bya//mun nas mun par 'gro bar 'gyur//khyod la
180a3('dul ba): ches ni bstan bya yi//rgyal po chen po bdag la dz+nyAn//chos thos 'og tu rgyal ba ni//gang du 'dod par 'gro bar 'gyur//yon tan med pa'i lus la na/
180a4('dul ba): gcig nyid yon tan chen po ste/dzi lta ji ltar gzung byas pa//de lta de lta ro zhes 'jug 'gyur//rgyal po bcu pa'i bcu pa 'di//skyes bu'i tshe re nI brjod par
180a5('dul ba): bya//bu dang chung ma nor de la//rtsed mo dga' bo ci zhig yod//bu yis dga' ba sngon byed de//chung mas khengs pa brjod par byed//chom rkun nor ni bskyo
180a6('dul ba): byed de//rgyal po bdag ni bcings las grol//mthar byed pa las sman dag pa de dag ni ro dang nye dus skyob mi nus//rigs sngags kun dang dpung dag dang /
180a7('dul ba): dpa' brtul gyis kyang skyo nus min//'di na mthu che gnos mtho la//gnas pa'i lha tshe ring po yod//de yang tshe zad nyams 'gyur bas//'chi las de
180b1('dul ba): sa /byung //mthu tshunA nar snun grags 'byung ba/rgal spyong sgyungs sgyu 'drub dag//rgyun byu spya na sgyu bsong du// rgya cang chugs myu//rgyu zad+d+haH/
180b2('dul ba): na pa/'thu dang //las dang dzin 'grus 'artul dang // tshogs rgya rgyun ner dge hU~M sa de'i tshul po dbye so//ba sna nang de ni/
180b3('dul ba): sul du gagis de //gdu gnas ni 'chi dag gis//mi tshugs 'byung ba'i gas med//byar sbyang rgya mtsho nang de ni//ma sul du zhugs pa'i ma//
180b4('dul ba): sma ga na n-i las rnams kyis ga 'gyur n+d+ha swA blugs med/ ba'i mang 'dramadu ston na nas ma'a'ajug/gleng dang gang man da
180b5('dul ba): na 'dis su nig dag//da nga gi ga 'dug/ sa dgyu /gang drang gA da /skye na su dgag
180b6('dul ba): sbyin po'o//de sa rang gi shes bya'o//gzhan gro bar 'gyuraro//mas rkun pas po don sa dang//gzhan dang rdzud mongs ma yin pa'o//te na rgya
181a1('dul ba): 'am yang nA ni//legs byas gzhan gyi sba bar bya//stag gis ri dgas bsad 'gron ltar//na rga 'chi bas khyod myur 'dren//mdza' bshed/
181a2('dul ba): blon tshogs kun 'dus pas//khyod kyi nang ni sel mi nus//de la spyad lhag nor 'bru dang //gser dngul gang dag yod pa la//bu dang chung ma 'khor bcas dag sgo skal nyid
181a3('dul ba): du sems par byed//gal te pha shi bu lon chags//bu sdug de la ma mi khyer//shi na phyi bzhin mi ngu zhing //bdag gi pha 'am rjer mi smra//phyug shes bdag gi
181a4('dul ba): pha zer zhing //sgrub shig mchi ma'i bzhin gyi ngu//me yang 'dun du khyer byed cing // ma 'di ni ltar gyur zer//gos kyi bkab bzhin khyer byed cing //me btang
181a5('dul ba): de nas sreg par byed//nya du ngu zhing gos gcig gis//de bsregs spangs te longs spyod byed//de gcig skye zhing skye tshe gcig de bzhin gcig 'chi 'chi tshe gcig
181a6('dul ba): skye 'dir gcig pus sdug bsngal myong //'khor bar 'gyur la grogs med do//de mthong 'di la dam pa rnams//ro ba byung khyim na 'dug mi byed//de dag chags pa
181a7('dul ba): kun bral nas//phyin cid mdel nas 'jug mi 'gyur//de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying ngo po//dge slong u dra ye nas gong nas gong du spobs pas lan blan pas
181b1('dul ba): cang mi smra zhing spobs pa med par gyur te song ngo //de nas rgyal po gtsug pung can gyis re shig ji srid du chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug nas/chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du/
181b2('dul ba): gzhug par brtsams pa dang /de la blon po'i mchog he ru ki dang /b+hi ru ka gnyis kyis smras pa/lha chos kyi rgyal srid bgyid du stsol la/chos ma lags pas
181b3('dul ba): bgyid du ma stsal cig/de ci'i slad du zhe na/lha yul gyi me dag ni me tog gi shing ljon pa dang /'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dag dang 'dra ba'i slad du ste/'di
181b4('dul ba): lta ste/dper bgyi na/me tog gi shing ljon pa dang /'bras pa'i shing ljon pa dag ni/dus dang dus su legs par yongs su bskyang ba ni bar chad ma mchis pa'i
181b5('dul ba): sbyor bas dus ji lta bu bzhin du me tog dang 'bras bu dag 'byin par bgyid//lha de bzhin du yul gyi mi dag kyang /dus dang dus su legs par yongasu bskyangs pa na/
181b6('dul ba): bor chad ma mchis pa'i sbyor bas dus ji lta ba bzhin du dpya dang lo thang dge 'bul bar bgyid do//de de gnyis kyis bzlog pa na/re shig ji srid du chos kyi rgyal srid byed
181b7('dul ba): du bcug nas yang chos mo yin pas rgyal srid byed du gzhug par brtsams pa dang /de la de gnyis kyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang smras pa ni/srid pa 'phros pa deng
182a1('dul ba): ldan pas bzlog kyang mi sdod de/de khros nas blon po gzhan dkra la smras pa/shes ldan dag gang gi rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur
182a2('dul ba): ba'i bka' lan gsum gyi bar du yang gcig pa de'i ched pa ji lta bu yin/de na blon po skyon chags pa kha cig gos smras pa/lha 'di la rma ci 'tshal te de'i cha
182a3('dul ba): pa ni dgum pa lagaso//tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras pa/blon po skyon ni chags pa dang //'gul bar gyur pa'i so dang ni//zas la skyon ni chags pa dag/
182a4('dul ba): byung ba'i ba' shig bde bar 'gyur//blon po de dang ldan gyur cing //shes rab dang ni 'dul la mkhas//mdzod nas glo 'phang gnas po ni//gang gis mi
182a5('dul ba): gsod des gsod gyur//rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis smras pa/shes ldan dag 'di gnyis nga'i yab kyis bskos pa yin pas/da 'di gnyis gsod par
182a6('dul ba): mi byed do//'di ltar 'di gnyis kyis nga'i mig sngar 'dug par mi bya'o zhes de gnyis kyi sgo bzlog nas/skyon chags pa gzhan gnyis shig blon por bskos pa
182a7('dul ba): dang /de gnyis kyis smras pa/lha rtil ma rdungs pa dang /ma brtsol ba dang /ma sros pa dang /ma bi tsor ba dag gis rnyil mar mi 'byin te//mi'i dbang po skye/
182b1('dul ba): bo dag kyang de dang 'dra'o//rgyal pos smras pa/khyed gnyis kyis byas pa gang yin pa de ni mchog tu brtsan pa yin no//de gnyis kyis yul gyi mi rnams la gnod pa bya
182b2('dul ba): bar brtsamaso//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshong po zhig bong thogs te/grong khyer sgra sgrogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa u dra ya nA de mthong rlung she
182b3('dul ba): te smras pa/ji ltar sgra sgregs dag na gtsug pud can/'khor dang tshogs bca'i stobs ldan nad med dam/de la phas kyi sngo ba 'ga' med cing //rang gi rgyal srid
182b4('dul ba): chos kyi byed 'jug gam/des smras pa/lha de bzhin sgra sgrogs dag na gtsug bud cani//'khor dang tshogs bcas stobs ldan bro ma 'tshal//de la phas kyi sngo ba
182b5('dul ba): ma mchis te//rgyal srid rtag tu chos ma lags pas bgyid//de nas tshe dang ldan pa u dra ya nas mthar gyis dri bar brtsams pa/de na blon po gang ni gtso bo yin
182b6('dul ba): guda? nI ga tso bo mya yin//gang gi dbang gi gu tsug pud can yul gyi mi dag la gnod par byed/des smras pa /lha blon po'i mcho ga he ru ka dang b+he ru ka gnyis kyi sgo
182b7('dul ba): ni bzlog/skyon chags pa gzhan gnyis shig no//blon bair bskos te/de gnyis kyis dbang gis gtsug bud can yul gyi mi dag la gnod par bgyid do//
183a1('dul ba): ud+yA ya nas smras pa/kA'e nang rje khyod srong la/sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i smra ba'i tshogs legs par dbugs phyung shig dang //nga yang
183a2('dul ba): der zlog tu 'ong ste/nga nyid kyi gtsug phud can ci nas kyang yul gyi mi rnams la gnod par mi byed pa de ltar na gnod pa las bzlog par bya zhing phan pa la nges par
183a3('dul ba): sbyar bar bya'o//tshong pa des zong sgyur te/zong rin khyar nas 'phags te mthar gyi sgra sgrog suM phyin nas/ngas nye du rnams la bsang ste smras pa/shes ldan
183a4('dul ba): dog kho bo zong thogs te/rgyal po'i khab tu song nas/kho bos der rgyal po sgros po mthong nas de'i zhal nas/kA'e nang rje khyod song la/sgra sgrogs
183a5('dul ba): na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs logs par dbugs phyung shig dang /nga yang der zlog tu 'ong ste/nga nyid kyis gtsug can ci nas kyang yul gyi mi rnams la
183a6('dul ba): gnod par mi byed pa de ltar gnod pa las bzlog par bya zhing /phan pa la nges par sbyar bar bya'o zhes phyung ngo //de dag gis kyang gzhan dag la brjod cing de
183a7('dul ba): dag gis kyang gzhan dag la brjod pas/de ltar sgo de rna gcig nas gcig tu brgyud paso//blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyi rna bar sen nas/de gnyis
183b1('dul ba): kyis bsams pa gas te rgyal byinan pa 'ang byar gyur na das gdang sa za ba draka dang / rug sa nyas ya sman pa mchog tu nang bdag cag gnyis la gang
183b2('dul ba): pa byed par 'gyur gyi/de'i phyir gang gis de lam kar gsod du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam nas de gnyis kyis rgyal ba gtsug pu
183b3('dul ba): con la smras pa/lha rgyal po skyes po 'byon par 'gyur zhes gda'o//des smras pa/de rab tu byung bas de ci'i phyir 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur/de gnyis kyis
183b4('dul ba): smras pa/lha gang gis gdugs cig rgyal srid bgyid du bstsal ba de ni lha rgyal srid ma mchis pas dga' bar gA la 'gyur te/de yang rgyal srid ba kyad du
183b5('dul ba): stsol bar 'tshu lo//gtsug pad can gyi smras pa/gal te de rgyal por gyur na/ngu nyid kyi gzhon nu byas te 'dri la 'gal bya ci yod/de gnyis kyis smras
183b6('dul ba): pa/lha de ni tshul dang 'thun pa me lags te gzhon nu dang blon po dang /pho brang 'khor gyi myi dang /yul gyi myi drog gis thal mo stong dag gis phyag bgyis pas
183b7('dul ba): rgyal srid bgyid du stsal nas yang ji ltar gzhon nu'i gnas su gnas par mdzad/yul yongasu gtang ba ni mo dngo'i//gzhon nu gnas pa ni mo rung ste/'di lta ste/
184a1('dul ba): dper bgyi na/mi zhig glang po che'i gnya' bar mchis nas/rta'i rgyab tu 'chi ba dang /rta'i rgyab tu mchis na shing rtas mtsha
184a2('dul ba): ba dang /shing rgyas mchi nas rkang pa gnyis kho nas mchi ba bzhin du/rgyal srid bgyid du sprul nas/yang gzhon nu'i gnas na gnas pa yang /de dang
184a3('dul ba): 'dra'o//de gnyis kyis bslus nas des smras pa/'o na 'di la gang rigs/'di la ji ltar sgrub par bya/de gnyis kyis smras pa/lha de 'gum su
184a4('dul ba): sul bar bgyi'o//gal te 'gum su ma bstsal ni/gor ma bkum par blon po skyon chags pa dag dang bsdongs te/lha nyid 'grongs par bgyid do//de skad ces
184a5('dul ba): smras pa dang /de bzhin gzhan du gyur cing /nyams te yud tsam zhig cing mi smra bar 'dug nas mchi mes brnangs pa'i snying gis snying rje ba dang /zhum pa dang
184a6('dul ba): thigs pa'i yi ge dag gis smras pa/shes ldan gnyis ji ltar yab dgongs su rung /de gnyis kyis smras pa/lhas pa'am/yang na spun dag gam/
184a7('dul ba): rang las skyes pa'i bu yang rung /gal te dag khrod zhugs gyur na/sa phung 'phel ba nyid du bya//zhes bya ba ma gsan tam//yang smras pa/lhas gang la bu pho
184b1('dul ba): stong bdog cing //thams cad grub cing zhugs gyur pa//der ni dgra bo gcig byung na//de'i don du de nub pa//zhes bgyi pa yang ma gsan tam/lhas gzhan dag
184b2('dul ba): gam/khyim gyi phyir ni gcig gtang bya//gong phyir khyim ni gtang bar bya//ljongs phyir grong ni gtang byi ste//bdag nyid phyar ni sa btang bya//zhes 'byung ba
184b3('dul ba): yang ma gson tamau/lha 'di la dgongs par bgyi ba ci yang ma mchis te de ni dgum par bgyi ba lags 'gumasu stsal bar bgyi'o//gal te lha 'di la
184b4('dul ba): phyi gshol mdzad na lha la rje su chags pa'i gzhon nu dang /blon po dang /pho bra 'khor gyi me dang yul gyi mi gang legs pa de dag 'khrugs par gyur na gor
184b5('dul ba): ma bkum par lha la gnod par bgyid par 'gyur ro//'dod pa dag la brten pas ni//sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas des de ltar gyis shig ces khas
184b6('dul ba): blangs//de nas blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis dga' ba dang mgu ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas/mi gshed ma pa dag la smras pa/shes ldan dag deng
184b7('dul ba): la rgyal po rgan pa gsod cig dang /khyed cag la longs spyod dag gi bgo sha bya'o//rgyal po de la pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul gyi mi thams cad rje su chags pas
185a1('dul ba): de bsod par spro ba 'ga' yang med do//de gnyis kyis de dag la lan gsum gyi bar du yang /dbyig dang gser dang grong sbyin
185a2('dul ba): pa la sogs pas spro bar byas nas/spro ba 'ga' yang ma byung nas/de nas de gnyis khro bas kun nas dkris pas phyag sbal bsrung ba rnams la bsgrib
185a3('dul ba): shes ldan dag deng la mi de dag bu dang chung ma dang rtsa lag mdza' bshes dang nyi du'i tshogs dang bcas pa chings la phyag sgrol du chug shug/de dag gis thos
185a4('dul ba): nas skrag par gyur te smras pa/lha nyag mi bzhes su gsol/bdag cag ni phyag rjed bka' nyan pa dag logs kyis mchi'o zhes de dag gis ral gI
185a5('dul ba): rnon po mtshan du bcug ste/'phags so//tshe dang ldan pa u dra ya na dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan pas/lhung bzed dang chos
185a6('dul ba): gos thogs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la
185a7('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag gong khyer sgra sgrogs su ljongs rgyu zhing mchi bar 'che lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/u mu dra ya na song la
185b1('dul ba): khyod kyi las du dag gir bya ba yid la bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa u dra ya nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas song
185b2('dul ba): ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa u dra yau na de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugaso//
185b3('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms rgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas/ji ltar longs spyod pa'i gnas mal mkhros su phab ste/lhung
185b4('dul ba): bzed dang chos gos thogs nas las kyis bdas ste song ngo //las kyis ring du 'dren byed do//ring nas las kyis 'dron par byed//gang du las rnams smin 'gyur ba//der
185b5('dul ba): ni las kyis rab tu 'dren//de grong khyer sgra sgrogs grwa la ba der song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/lam ka ra ri brags shig yod pa der bsod snyoms la zhugs nas dri de
185b6('dul ba): nas bsod snyoms brgyus te song ba dang /mi gshed ma pa de dag dang phrad nas de dag gis de mthong ngo //des kyang de dag ngo shes nas de de dag dang /lhan cig bskyed mos tshal zhig
185b7('dul ba): tum chen ma gnas par khas blangs nas/des de dag la dri bar brtsams pa/ji ltar sgra sgrogs dag na gtsug pud can//'khor dang tshogs bcas stobs ldan nad med
186a1('dul ba): dam/de la phas kyi sngo ba 'ga' med cing /rang gi rgyal srid chos kyis byed 'jug gama?/de dag gis smras pa/lha de bzhin sgra
186a2('dul ba): sgrog dag na gtsug pud can//'khor dang tshogs bcas stobs ldan bro ma 'tshal//de la phas kyi sngob ma mchis te//rgyal srid rtag tu chos ma lags bas
186a3('dul ba): bgyid//mi mchog khyod kyi tshul dang 'thun pa yi//'phags dngos mngon rtags gang lags khyod kyis mngade//zhi ba de yi tshul 'thun gang lags pa/de ni de
186a4('dul ba): ring nye bar gzigs par gyur//tshe dang ldan pa u dra ya nas smras pa/shes ldan dag ci deng der 'ongs pa la mngon par mi dga' 'am/de dag gis smras pa/
186a5('dul ba): lha mngon par mi dga'o//des smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te de lta na mi 'gros phyir ma ldog par bya'o//de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/skyes bu pa
186a6('dul ba): khyod slar ni gang du gshegs//sras ni khyod gsan mngon par mi dka' ste//bde ga tsog byur ngan rgyal pos bsgos rnams kyis//'dir ni khyod dkongs slad du mched
186a7('dul ba): kyis 'tshal//tshe dang ldan pa u dra ya nas smras pa/shes ldan dag khyed cag nga gsod pa'i gshed ma pa dag yin nam/lha bdag cag khyod dkangs pa'i
186b1('dul ba): gshed ma bdag lagaso//tshe dang ldan pa u dra ya nas bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la u drA ya na song la khyod kyis las dag gir bya ba yid la bya'o//zhes
186b2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa gang yin pa de ni 'di yin pa lta ste/'khor ba ni rnam pa thams cad du ngan pa snying po med pa 'jigs pa'i chos can yino snyam du rig nas de dag l-i smras pa/
186b3('dul ba): bzhin bzangs dag don gang gi phyir rab tu byung ba'i don de ngas da dung ma thob kyis re shig du rang gi don rjesu skud kyi bar du yud tsam zhig spyod cig/de dag gis phran tshun
186b4('dul ba): gros byas te smras pa/lha de ltar mdzad cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa u dra ya nas shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du brten nas/brang 'gro'i rgyal po gnyid log pa'i lus
186b5('dul ba): bskyil ba ltar skyil mo dkrung btsas te spyod lam zhi bas 'dug/bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa la phan yon lnga yod de/phung po la mkhas pa dang /
186b6('dul ba): khrims la mkhas pa dang /skye mched la mkhas pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang de'i gdam ngag dang rjesu bstan pa gzhan la rag ma las pa
186b7('dul ba): yi no zhes gsungs pas des brtson 'grus brtsams pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ma lnga bdag yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang
187a1('dul ba): ltung ba dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyi zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas//
187a2('dul ba): rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir ska dang kha spu pre te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i
187a3('dul ba): mtha' bla na med pa de/tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te sgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do//tshangs par spyod pa skyed do//bya bo byaso//
187a4('dul ba): srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes//zhes go bar byed cing /dgra bcom pa khamamos gsum pa las 'dod cha gos dang bral ba/bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/nam
187a5('dul ba): mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/tsen+dan bzhag pa lta bu reg pas sgo de'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /rig pa dang mngon par shes
187a6('dul ba): ba dang /sa so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid da dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur dasti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha
187a7('dul ba): rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /rjed par bya ba dang /mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa u dra ya nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas rnam par

187b2('dul ba): grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba so sor yang dag par rig pa na/de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa smras pa/dge slong u drA ya na ni//mdud pa'i sbyor ba zug rngu dang //de bzhin sgrib las

187b4('dul ba): da ni khyed cag don gang gi phyir 'ongs pa'i don de thob par bya'o//de dag gis smras pa/lha gal te rgyal po gtsug bud can bdag cag la rgyal po rgad pos 'chi
187b5('dul ba): ba'i dus kyi tshe zhig smras shes rmed na/bdag cag gis de la ji skad brjod par bgyi/bzhin bzangs dag de la 'di skad ces/rgyal srid phyir ni pha bsad pas//
187b6('dul ba): bsod nams ma yin mang po bskyed//da ni yongs su mya ngan 'da'//khyod ni nanAr med 'gro bar 'gyur//zhes brjod par bya'o//gzhan yang 'di skad ces
187b7('dul ba): khyod kyis mtshams med pa gnyis byas te/pha srog dang bral ba gang yin pa dang dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa srog dang bral ba gang yin pa de gnyis kyis khyod
187b8('dul ba): yun ring po sems can dmyal ba tshon po mnar med par gnas par bya dgos kyi sdig pa las shogs shig dang de ltar na las srabs pa nyid dang yongasu mthar thug par 'gyur//

188a2('dul ba): mi rung gis rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro'o snyam nas des rdzu 'phrul gyi thabs gang dang gang yin pa brtsams na de'i las kyis non pas rdzu 'phrul zhes bya ba tsam yang snang bar ma
188a3('dul ba): gyur na rdzu 'phrul lo lta smos kyang ci dgos/de nas ma gushed ma pa de dag las mi snying rje med pi sems dang ldan pa 'jig rten pha rol btong ba gcig gis ra lag
188a4('dul ba): shubs nas phyung ste de'i mgo drung ba nas bcad nas sa la bsgyel to//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad de//chos nyid kyis na gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan
188a5('dul ba): ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /btsod kha dang /shol dang /dngul
188a6('dul ba): gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/kha cig ni 'og log su 'dong /kha cig ni steng log su 'dong bas/gang dag 'og log su 'dong ba de dag ni sems can dmyal

188b3('dul ba): gyur te 'bab par byed do//des sems can de dag phyi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun gcod par byed cing /de dag 'di snyam du shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi bos
188b4('dul ba): sam/'on to gzhan du skyes snyam du semaso//de dag dad pa bskyod par bye ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong b.re mdzad de/de dag gis sprul pa mthong
188b5('dul ba): nas 'di snyam du/shes ldan dag dag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin la/gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin to/'di ltar sems can ston ma mthong ba
188b6('dul ba): 'di'i mthus bdag cag gis gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to sgyum du sems so//de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas sems can dumya la
188b7('dul ba): ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byos nas/gang du bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byedado//
189a1('dul ba): gang dag steng log su 'dong ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /'thab bral dang 'phrul dga' dang /gzhan

189a3('dul ba): chung dang /tshod med dge dang /dge rgyas dang /sprin med dang /bsod nams skyes dang /'bras bu tshe dang /mi che dang /mi gdung dang /gya nom snang dang /

189a6('dul ba): ni gzhom par bya//gang zhig rab tu bag yod par//chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba//skye bo'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal tha mar byed par
189a7('dul ba): 'gyur//zhes bya ba yang smra so//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi slod bzhin slad
189b1('dul ba): bzhin du rjes su 'dong ste/de la gal te bcom ldan 'das/'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam log su nub par 'gyur ro//ma 'ong ba'i//

190a1('dul ba): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil du nub bo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos

190b1('dul ba): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/kun dga' bo 'di ltar/dge slong u dra ya na ni//mdud pa sbyor ba zug

190b6('dul ba): ldan pa u dra ya na'i lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang kha ra sil khyer te grong khyer sgra sgrog su phyin nas/de dag gis blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis la smras pa/rgyal

192a1('dul ba): gi mchod rten la bskor ba bgyis te/rang rang gi khung du zhugs shig ces slob par byed do//gang gi tshe de gnyis legs par longs

192a6('dul ba): gnyis kyis bsang bar bgyi'o//des smras pa/gal te de lta na leg so zhes/de'i gan du song ste smras pa/sras ci'i skyed du khyod skya bo bseng bseng po ring

192b5('dul ba): ji ltar lags pa gsungs shig/sras de ni khyod kyi yab ma lags te/ji ltar bdag gri zla mtshan bkru ba'i slad du skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig draga' dgur
192b6('dul ba): spyad pa de las khyod 'khrungaso//des bresams po/de lta na pha bsad par ma gyur to snyam du rig nus smras pa/yum gol te de lta na pa bsad pa ni ma mchis na/
192b7('dul ba): dgra bcom pa bsad par mchis pa de ji ltar mthar thug par bgyi/de skad ces/sras 'di la shes pa la mkhas pa dag rma bar bgyi ste/de dag gis de
193a1('dul ba): mthar thug par bgyid par 'gyur zhes smras te song nas/des blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis bos te smras pa/kho mos de'i pha
193a2('dul ba): bsad pa ni bsal zin gyis da khyed gnyis kyis dgra bcom pa bsad pa sol cig/rgyal po gtsug bud can gyis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/blon po gang dag shes pa
193a3('dul ba): la mkhas pa thams cad sdus shig/de dag gis blon po skyon chags pa gang dag shes pa la mkhas pa thams cad bsdus pa dang /blon po skyon chags pa de
193a4('dul ba): gnyis kyang der 'dus par gyur to//de nas rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis de dag la smras pa/shes ldan dag ngas dgra bcom pa bsad pa ga yin pa de ji ltar
193a5('dul ba): mthar thug par bya/de ni rgyal pos nye bar 'tsho ba'i mi thams cad kyis ni mi mthun par smra bar brtsams te de na kha cig gis smras pa/lha des dgra bcom
193a6('dul ba): pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis par sus mthong /kha cig gis smras pa/lha dgra bcom po dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa dang 'dra ste na mkha' la mchi'o//
193a7('dul ba): blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/lha 'di la thugs ngan bgyir ci mchis/des smras pa/khyed gnyis kyang de skad ces 'di la mya ngan bya
193b1('dul ba): yod ces zer ram khyed gnyis nyid na re dgra bcom pa bsod du bcu go zhes mi zer ram/de gnyis kyis smras pa/lha dgra bcom pa dag ma mchis na dgra bcom pa dag bskum
193b2('dul ba): par mchis re skan/des smras pa/ngas mngon sum kho nar dgra bcom pa rgyal dang skar rgyal gnyis kyis 'bar ba dang gsal ba dang char 'bab pa dang klog 'byin pa'i cho
193b3('dul ba): 'phrul dag byas te phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong bzhin du khyed gnyis kyis de skad ces dag bcom pa dag
193b4('dul ba): med na dag bcom pa bsad pa yod re skan zhes zer ram de gnyis kyis smras pa/lha ji ltar de gnyis kyis sgyu mas 'jig rten bslus te dad pas sbyin par bgyi pa chud gzan/
193b5('dul ba): pas bye lo'i skye gnas ngan par skyes te/deng sang nyid du yang rang rang gi mchod rten na mchis pa/lha'i mngon sum du bgyi'o//rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/
193b6('dul ba): shes ldan dgo gal te de lta na tshu ri shig dang /ci yang dag pa'am yang dag pa ma yin pa ltar 'dong ngo //grong khyer sgra sgrogs thams cad du ji ltar rgyal dang skar rgyal
193b7('dul ba): gnyis byi la'i skye gnas su skyes te rang rang gi mchod rten na 'dug nas/rgyal po ltar song ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra des khyab par gyur nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag
194a1('dul ba): stad mo skyes nas rgyal po'i phyi bzhin 'bra //de nas blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor 'bum phrag du
194a2('dul ba): ma'i mdun du smras pa/rgyal dang skar rgyal gnyis nyon cig bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis khyed gnyis sgyu mas 'jig rten bslus te/dad pas sbyin par bya ba
194a3('dul ba): chung gsan pas byi la'i skye gnas ngan par skye te rang rang gi mchod rten 'dug pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des sha sri 'di long la rang rang gi mchod rten la skor ba
194a4('dul ba): bgyis te rang rang gi khung du zhugs shig de skad smras pa dang de gnyis kyis rang rang gi khungs nas byung ste/sha sri blangs nas rang rang gi mchod rten la bskor ba byas
194a5('dul ba): nas rang rang gi khung du zhugs pa/srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gris mthong nas/blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/lha gzigs sam//
194a6('dul ba): des smras pa/mthong ngo de gnyis kyis smras pa//lha de ltar na 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa dag mo mchis te de ni skye bo'i bka' mchid 'ba' shig bso//de nas
194a7('dul ba): rgyal po de la 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa dag yod do snyam pa'i lta ba yod pa gang yin pa de sde par gyur to//de nas gong dag ma dad pa de dag la ni med par lta ba skyes
194b1('dul ba): par gyur to//gang dag bar mar gnas pa de dag ni yid gnyis za bar gyur to//gang dag dad pa de dag ni mnong zhing mi dga' ba dang mi 'jin pa med pa gyur to//de nas
194b2('dul ba): rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis bsams pa/gal te 'jig rten na dgra ba tsam pa dag med na bdag gis ci'i phyir 'phags pa ka t+yA ya na chen po'i 'khor lnga brgya
194b3('dul ba): dang ldan pa dge slong ma re ma 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa la bsod snyoms dbul snyam nas des dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma rnams kyi bsod snyoms bcas nas dge slong
194b4('dul ba): rnams dang dge slong ma rnams kyang grong khyer sgra sgrogs nas dong ngo //tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya nu chen po dang dge slong ma re ma ni gdul ba la ltos pas de nyid na 'khod do//
194b5('dul ba): ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gtsug phud can grong khyer sgra sgrogs nas phyir byung ba na tshe dang ldan pA ka t+ya ye nA chen po grong khyer sgra sgrogasu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa
194b6('dul ba): dang /des rgyal po mthong nas 'di mi dga' bar sems par gyur na mi rungo snyam nas mtha'i gcig tu song ste sdod do//rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis de mtha'
194b7('dul ba): gcig na sdod pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'phags pa ke t+ya ya na chen po 'di nga mthong nas mtha' gcig
195a1('dul ba): sa /tu song nas sdod/de'i phyi bzhin blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang b+hi ru ka gnyis 'gro ba de gnyis kyis smras pa/lha 'phags pa ka t+yA
195a2('dul ba): ya na chen po'i thugs lam na lha gshed du gzigs mo dang dge mtshan la gshegs pas mi dgyes par dgongs par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pa dang /mtshon gyi
195a3('dul ba): las bgyi ba dka' byas chos gos dag rdul gyis phog par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam du dgongaso//rgyal po cang mi smra bar song ngo //tshe dang ldan pa ka d+ya yA na chen
195a4('dul ba): pos grong khyer sgra sgrogs su bsod snyoms brgyus te/phyer byung ba na/rgyal po gtsug pud can nang du 'jug nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen po de bzhin du
195a5('dul ba): mtha' gcig tu song ste sdod do/6/rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis de mtha' gcig ni sdod pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan
195a6('dul ba): dag 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po 'dis sngar nga mthong nas mtha' gcig tu song ste sdod pa'i rgyu ni de yin na/da ltar yang mtha' gcig tu song ste sdod pa'i
195a7('dul ba): rgyu ci yin/de'i phyi bzhin blon po skyon chags pa gnyis 'gro ba de gnyis kyis smras palha 'di'i mchid nas kho bo pha bsod pa 'di'i rdul gyis mi reg
195b1('dul ba): par bya'o zhes mchi'o//rgyal po de ni yongs su mi rtog pa yin pas/de skad thos nas khro bas kun nus bkris par gyur te/'khor thams cad la smras pa/shes/
195b2('dul ba): lda na dag khyed cag las gang dang gang du la dga' ba de dang des dge sbyong mgo reg 'di'o steng du sa spang mo re res gtor cig/skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis sa spang
195b3('dul ba): mo re res gtor to//rgyal po de dpung che ba yin pas re res sa sbyar mo re tshe dang ldan paM kA t+yA ya na chen po'i steng du gtong ba dang de'i steng du sa phung po chen po rnam/
195b4('dul ba): par gnas par gyur to//tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen pos kyang de'i dbus su tho ma ma yin pa'i spyil bu mngon par sprul te 'dug/de dag de las mthong bya ni
195b5('dul ba): lang rdza dang phyugs rdzi dag gis mthong nas de dge slod bzhin du mtha' 'khor zhing sdod pa na blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang b+hi ru ka gnyis phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing 'ong ba
195b6('dul ba): phyogs der phyin nas de gnyis kyis dris pa shes ldan dag 'di ci yin/de dag gis smras pa/rgyal po thab krol can pa bsod pa des 'phags pa ka t+ya ya na chen
195b7('dul ba): po nyes pa med pa gnod pa ma byed pasas bkab//de gnyis mchi mas brnangs te ngu ba'i bzhin gyis ba lang rdzi dang phyugs rdzi dag dang lhan cig sa phyag par brtsams pa dang
196a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kat+yA yan chen po byung nas de gnyis kyis rkang gnyis la gtugs te dris pa/'phags pa bdi ci lags//des smras pa
196a2('dul ba): las dag yin mod gzhan ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur////'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa//bam po don gnyis pa//de gnyis kyis
196a3('dul ba): smras pa/'phags pa gtsug pud can skye bo phal po che dang bcas pas las 'di lta bu bi byis pa gang lags pa de'i rnam par smin pa cir 'gyur/des smras pa/
196a4('dul ba): deng nas nyi ma bdun na grong khyer sgra sgrogs sa so non par 'gyuraro//'phags pa rims pa ji lta bur 'gyur/tshe dang ldan pa gnyis re shig nyi ma dang po la rlung mo che
196a5('dul ba): byung nas grong khyer sgra sgrogs rdo ba dang gseg ma dang gyo mo med par rnam par 'jog par 'gyur/nyi ma gnyis pa la me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro//
196a6('dul ba): nyi ma gsum po la gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyuraro//nyi ma bzhi pa la dngul gyi char 'bab par 'gyuraro//nyi ma lnga pa la gser gyi char 'bab par 'gyur//
196a7('dul ba): ro//de'i 'og tu grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi nye 'khor na gnas pa gang dag gi las 'thun par byas pa de dag grong khyer sgra sgrogs su 'jug par 'gyur
196b1('dul ba): zhing /de dag zhugs pa na nyi ma drug pa la rin po che'i char 'bab par gyu ro//de gnyis kyis smras pa/'phags pa ci lags bdag cag gnyis kyang las de'i
196b2('dul ba): cha can lags sam/bzhin bzang gnyis khyed gnyis ni las de'i chu can ma yino//'phags pa gal te de lta na bdag cag gnyis kyis grong khyer 'di nas ji
196b3('dul ba): ltar 'byung bar bgyi/des smras pa/bzhin bzangs gnyis khyed gnyis kyis rang gi khyim nas chu klung gi bar du rkor chug la khyim drung du gre bozhag ste sdod la
196b4('dul ba): gang gi tshe rin po che'i char 'bab pa de'i tshe na rin po che dag gi gru 'gong su tshug la bros shig/de gnyis kyis de'i rkang pa gnyis lo gtugs te grong khyer sgra sgro
196b5('dul ba): su zhugs nas de gnyis kyis rgyal po'i gan du song ste smras pa lhas 'phags pa ka t+ya ya na chen po la cung zhig bgyis sam ci na dog sas bko ba/des
196b6('dul ba): smras pa/shes ldan gnyis de gson nam/lha gson no//ci zer lha de 'di skad ces deng nas gdugs bdun na grong khyer sgra sgrogs dog sas non
196b7('dul ba): par 'gyur zhes mchi'o//rim pa ji ltar 'gyur/de gnyis kyis smras pa/lha de 'di skad ces re shig nyi ma dang po la rlung mo che byung des/grong khyer
197a1('dul ba): sgrogs rdo ba dang //gseg ma dang gyo mo med par rnam par gzhol bar 'gyuraro//nyi ma gnyis pa la me tog gi char
197a2('dul ba): 'bab par 'gyu ro//nyi ma gsum pa la gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro//nyi ma bzhi pa la dngul gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro//nyi ma lnga pa la
197a3('dul ba): gser gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu gong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi nye 'khor na gnas pa gang dag gis las 'thun par byas pa de dag grong khyer sgra sgrogasu
197a4('dul ba): 'jug par 'gyur zhing de dag zhugs pa na nyi ma drug po la rin po che'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro//nyi ma bdun pa la se'i chur 'bab par 'gyu ro zhes mtsho'o//
197a5('dul ba): blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/lha bram ze gang la slong mo stsal nas/yang bcad na de legs pa ci zhig sems te/lhas de 'khor lnga
197a6('dul ba): brgya dang ldan pa la bsod snyoms su la nas/bcad cing sas kyang g.yogs pas de 'di skad mchi ba las gzhan pa ches shis pa'i tshig smra bar ga la 'gyur
197a7('dul ba): rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis bsams pa/de bad no snyam pa dang /dablon po'i mchog he ru ka dang b+hI ru ka gnyis kyis bzhin bsgyur ci lag pa gnyis
197b1('dul ba): yongasu dril te dong ngo //de na he ru ka la bu sngo bsangs shes bya ba khye'u zhig yod la/b+hi ru ka la yang bu mo sngo bsangs can zhes bya ba bu mo zhig yod nas/he ru kas
197b2('dul ba): khye'u sngo bsangs tshe dang ldan pa ka tA ya na chen po la phul te spros pa/'phags pa gal te 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba 'ga' zhig mchis na rab tu dbyung du gsol/gal te
197b3('dul ba): mi mchis na 'di khyod nyid kyi zham ring ba lagaso//b+hi ru kas kyang bu mo sngo bsangs can dge slong ma re ma la phul te/smras pa/'phags ma gal te 'dri la dge ba'i
197b4('dul ba): rtsa ba 'ga' zhig mi chis na rab tu dbyung du gsol/gal te ma mchis na ko'u sham bi nA khyim bdag gdangs can zhes bgyi ba bdag gi chung po grogs shig mchis
197b5('dul ba): pa de la gtad du gsol/des khas blangaso//de nas dge slong ma re ma bu mo sde bsangs can khrid de rdzu 'phrul gyis grong khyer sgra sgrogs nas song nas/des bu mo de ko'u
197b6('dul ba): sham bi ra khyim bdag gdangs can la gtad nas phrin ji skad spring pa yang bzlas//tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen po ni de nyid du 'dug go/blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /
197b7('dul ba): ru ka gnyis kyis khyim nas chu klung gi bar du/phug rkor bcug ste/khyim drung du gru bzhag nas bsdad do//ji tsam na nyi ma de la rlung mo tshe byung nas nges grong khyer
198a1('dul ba): sgra sgrogs de rdo ba dang /gseg ma dang /gyo mo med par rnam par bzhag/nyi ma gnyis pa la me tog gi char bab pa dang /blon po
198a2('dul ba): skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/lha rgyal po nga las nu la/dgung bdun du dbyig gi char bab ces gda' bas lha la yang me tog gi char bab pas/ring po
198a3('dul ba): mi thogs par gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyuraro//nyi ma gsum pa la gos kyi tsher 'bob pa dang /blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/lha la gos kyi
198a4('dul ba): char 'di bab pas/ring po mi thogs par dngul gyi char bab par 'gyuraro//nyi ma bzhi pa la dngul gyi char bab pa dang /blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis
198a5('dul ba): kyis smras pa/lha la dngul gyi char bab pas/ring po mi thogs par gser gyi char 'bab par 'gyuraro//nyi ma lnga pa li gsor gyi char bab pa dang /
198a6('dul ba): blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/lha gser gyi char 'dri bab pas ring po mi thogs par rin po che'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu grong khyer
198a7('dul ba): sgra sgrogs kyi nye 'khor na gnas pa gang dag gis las 'thun par byas pa de dag grong khyer sgra sgrogs su zhugs shing de dag zhugs pa na/nyam drug pa la rin po
198b1('dul ba): che'i chang dbab pa dang /smyon pa'i mchog te ru ka dang /b+hI ru kA g+han+d+has kyis rlan po che dag gis glu 'aglengs bcug ste sa so//denA hUM ru kas ni phyogs gzhan zhig tu
198b2('dul ba): he ru ka'i tshul zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rtsig tu bcug nas/de'i ming ni he ru ka'i tsha la/he ru ka'i tshol ces bya bar gyur to//b+hai ru kas kyang phyogs gzhan zhig
198b3('dul ba): tuSh+NI ru ka'i tshal ces bya ba'i grong khyer rtsig tu bcug nas de'i ming b+hi ru ka'i tshal/b+hi ru ka'i tshal ces bya bar gyur to//nyi ma bdun pa la sa'i char 'ab
198b4('dul ba): pUr brtsams pa dang /grong khyer sgra sgrog su sgra mthon po dang /sgra chen po byung nasargyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag sgra mthon po dang /sgra chen po de
198b5('dul ba): ci/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha so'i char bab borgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te de lta na/blun pa'i mchogu he ru ka dang /b+hI ru
198b6('dul ba): galnga 'dug/tshal cig/de dag gi btsal bar brtsams pa dang /ji tsa mon de gnyis bros par tshor nas/de dag gis rgyal po la skyes pa/lha de gnyis bris te m+b+ha
198b7('dul ba): mchis//de nas rgyal po gtsug pud can 'bros par brtsams pa dang /ma ma yin dag gis sgo bcad do//khye'u sngo bsangs kyis smras pa/'phags pa grong
199a1('dul ba): khyer du sgyu mthon po dang /sgra chen po byung ba 'di ci lags/tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen pos smras pa/bu skar khung nas kham phor phyir/
199a2('dul ba): phyung shig/de skar khung nas khar por phyir byung ba dang /sas phyed tsam gang bar gyur nas/tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen pos bsams pa/da dung spyod yul-i la
199a3('dul ba): lhag ma dang bcas pa yin lha mo//ji tsom na yang khar por phyi rol tu phyung ba dang /byur bur gang bar gyur nas/tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen pos bsams pa/
199a4('dul ba): da ni spyod yul med par gyur gyis 'gro'o snyamo//de nas grong khyer sgra sgrogs nas gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen po ga la ba der
199a5('dul ba): song ste phyin nas/rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/'phags pa bdag kyang mchi ste/'phags pa'i bsnyen bkur bgyi'o//des dang du blangaso//
199a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen pos sngo bsangs la smras pa/bu chos gos kyi grwa nas zung shog dang 'drang ngo //des chos gos kyis gr-i nas bzung ba dang /des khye'u sa
199a7('dul ba): bsangs khrid de rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi na mkha' la song ngo //sgra sgrogs na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo yang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis de'i phyi bzhin song ba dong /
199b1('dul ba): grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyang sas non par gyur to//de dag mthar gyis kha ra baM na zhes bya ba'i ri brag su phyin nas/de dag de na g.yul gyi gzhi na 'khod do//tshe dang ldan pa kra t+ya yA na
199b2('dul ba): chen pos khye'u sngo bsangs g.yul gyi bzhir bzhag ste/bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /lha mo de'i mthus g.yul gyi gzhi der 'bru 'brel bar gyur nas/de na mi gang
199b3('dul ba): 'dug pa des khye'u de mthong nas de'i gan du song ste smras pa/kye khye'u khyod kyis mthus g.yul gyi gzhir 'bru 'phel bar gyur to//des smras pa/kho bo'i mthus
199b4('dul ba): g.yul gyi gzhor 'bru 'phel bar gyur pa ma yin te/'di ltar grong khyer sgra sgrogs na/gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo 'dir 'ongs te/phyogs ga ge mo zhig na
199b5('dul ba): 'dug pa de'i mthus ga yul gyi gzhir 'bru 'phel bar gyur to//de de'i gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/lha mo bdag grong du mchi ba'i bAr du re
199b6('dul ba): shig lde mig kyog po 'di bzung zhing khyed kyis bdag ma lags pa gzhan su la yang mi stsal par gsol//des blangs pa dang /mi de yang ri breg su srong nas ri brag
199b7('dul ba): na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs bsdus te smras pa/shes ldan dag grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo 'dir 'ongs te/g.yul gyi gzhin/'dug les
200a1('dul ba): de'i mthus g.yul gyi gzhir 'bru 'phel bar gyur nas/bdag gis de'i lag tu lde mig dang /lde mig kyog po byin te/bdag gi
200a2('dul ba): de grong du mchis te/slar mchi ba'i bar du lde mig kyog po 'di bzung zhing khyod kyis bdag ma gtogs pa gzhan su la yang stsal bar mi bgyi'o zhes smras kyis/de'i
200a3('dul ba): phyir grong mi rnams la gal te bdag gi bu gtso bor dbang bskur na/kho bo bdag nyid srog dang bral bar gsol ba 'debs te/de lta na lha mo bdag cag gi gnas
200a4('dul ba): gor yeng 'gro bar mi 'gyur bas/khyed cag longs spyod dag gis mngon par 'dal bar 'gyur zhing yams kyi nad thams cad kyang nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro//de dag gis
200a5('dul ba): de'i bu gtsor por dbang bskur nas des kyang bdag nyid srog dong bral bar byaso//de nas de dag gis gnas de thams cad spos dang me tog gis mdzes par byas shing /gdu
200a6('dul ba): dang rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan te/gtor ma thogs nas/lha mo de dag ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/lha mo khyod 'ang
200a7('dul ba): nyid la bzhugs par gsol/des smras pa/kho mo re 'phags pa ka d+ya ya na chen po la bstan bkur byed pa yin pas/'di na kho mo'i gnas med do//tshe dang ldan pa
200b1('dul ba): ka d+ya ya na chen pos/lha mo khyod kyis gang las lde mig dang /lnga mag kyog po blang nga soms shig/des bsams pa la zhus pa dang /ji tsam na mi de dus la bab par mthong
200b2('dul ba): nas/des gnas de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa/shes ldan dag kho mo'i dam tshig gis gnas par bya ste/gal te kho mo'i gnas gzhi ji lta bu byed du bcug pa de lta bur
200b3('dul ba): 'phags pa'i gnas gzhi yang byed du bcug na/kho mo 'dug/de dag gis khas blangs nas/de dag gis lha mo de'i gnas ji lta bu byed du bcug pa de lta bu tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya yA na
200b4('dul ba): chen po'i gnas kyang byed du bcu go/lha mo de'i gnasu mar me gtsugs pa gang yin pa de/des khyer te/tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen po'i gnas su 'dzugs par byed do//de mar me
200b5('dul ba): khyer te 'gro ba rtsig drung ni 'dug pa'i mi zhig gis mthong nas/des bsams pa/lha mo 'di 'phags pa ka t+ya ya/da chen po'i gan du 'dod pas 'ga'o snyam pa dang /des de'i sems shes
200b6('dul ba): nos khros te ri brag 'di na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di ni sdig pa'i sems kun tu spyod pa yin te/'phags pa ka t+ya ya na chen po 'dod pa'i dri nga ba med pa la/brdzun gyi
200b7('dul ba): bskur pa 'debs par byed do snyam nas deso ri brags der mi ngas phyung ste/skye bo phal po che shi bar gyur nas/skye bo shi ba'i ro phyir 'byin pa na khri dang khri'u dag 'dom par gyur to//
201a1('dul ba): gnas don gnas pa'i sgo ba'i tshogs kyis bsdus pa dag 'dug sto ngas pa 'dis sas gyur/de dag gis smras pa/lham ladun ga/
201a2('dul ba): de dag gis de la bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa dang /des smras pa/khyed cag 'phags pa ka t+yA yan chen po 'dod pa'i rnying ba med pa li brdzun gyi skur pa'i nga
201a3('dul ba): par byed do//de dag gis yang smras pa//lha mo bzod pa mdzod cig dang /'ga' yang bsnyen bkur ma lags pa bgyid par mi 'gyur//des smos pa/dam
201a4('dul ba): tshig gis bzod par bya ste/gal te khyed cag kho mo lnga ji ltar bsnyen bkur byed pa de ltar 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la yang byed na bzod par bya'o//de dag gris
201a5('dul ba): smras pa/lha mo chos khyad par du 'phags par bgyi yis bzod par mdzod tsog/des de dag la bzod par byas//de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen po
201a6('dul ba): mi ches khyad par du 'phagos pa'i bstan bkur byaso//tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya yan chen pos de nyid du dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas/khye'u sde bsangs khrid de lta blo
201a7('dul ba): la smras nos//'phags pa dang /lha mos smras pa/'phags pa bdag la mtshan ma chung zhig stsol cig dang /bdag de la mchod pa bgyid cing mchis//
201b1('dul ba): des de la khar por byin nas/des de khas phub ste mchod rten du byas nas/dus ston byed du bcug nas khar bor gyis dus ston zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur te/deng sang yang dge
201b2('dul ba): slong mchod rten lo phyal ba dag phyag 'tshal ba byed//khye'u sngo bsangs tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya~M na chen po'i chos gos kyi grwa nas 'jus te/de 'phyang zhing 'gro ba na/ba lang rdzi dang
201b3('dul ba): phyugs rdzi dag gis mthong nas de dag gis 'byung 'phya'o zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po byung bas/yul de'i mi rnams kyis ming 'phyang ba pa 'phyang ba pa zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to//
201b4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen po ri brags shig tu phyin nas/der khyeru sngo bsangs shing ljon pa'i drung du bzhag ste/bsod snyoms la zhugaso//ri bragos de na rgyal po bu med
201b5('dul ba): pa dus la bab nas/pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang blon po dang /yul gyi mi dag 'dus te smras pa/shes ldan dag gang zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/do na kha cig gi
201b6('dul ba): smras pa/gang bsod nams dang dbang che bar grags pa'o//kha cig gis smras pa/de ji ltar shes par bya/kha cig gis smras pa/rtog pa dag sgo bar bya'o//
201b7('dul ba): de dag gis rtog pa dag bsgos nas/de dag gis phan tshun brtsal bar brtsams pa dang de dag gis khye'u de shing ljon pa'i drung na/gnyid log par mthong nas de dag
202a1('dul ba): gis de'i mtshan ma bzung bar brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na shing ljon pa gzhan dag gis grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol ba dang /shar phyogs
202a2('dul ba): su 'bab pa dang /shar phyogs su 'bab par gyur na/shing ljon pa da'i grib mas/khye'u de'i lus mi gtong bar mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang
202a3('dul ba): gos bya bar brtsams pa/shes ldan dag khye'u 'di bsod nams dang dbang che bar grags pa yin gyis 'di dbang bskur bar bya'o//de dag gis de sad par byas te smras pa/
202a4('dul ba): khye'u rgyal srid ldong zhig/khye'us smras pa/kho bo rgyal srid don du gnyer ba ma yin te/kho bo ni 'phags pa ka t+ya yon chen po'i bsnyen bkur ba yin no//tshe dang
202a5('dul ba): sngon pa ka t+ya ye na chen pos thos nas/ci khye'u 'di la rgyal srid du 'gyur ba'i las dgra yod dam/meng snyam du bsams nas/yod par mthong nas des smras pa/du
202a6('dul ba): rgyal srid long la 'di ltar khyod kyis byed du bcug cig/nges mnos te de dag gis de dbang bskur nas khye'u sngo bsangs kyis der rgyal srid byed du bcug pas/sngo bsang
202a7('dul ba): kyi rgyal srid sngo bsangs kyi rgyal srid tsos bya ba'i ming du gyur to//tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen po yul bog ka ner phyin nas/tshe dang ldan paM ka t+ya yaM na chen po'i me bog
202b1('dul ba): ka nar skyes pa des/tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na chen po mthong nas smras pa/bu khyod yun ring zhig nas mthong ngo //de'i nu mu gnyis las kyang 'o ma'i rgyun 'dzad//che dang
202b2('dul ba): ldan pa ko t+ya ya na chen pos de la yum yum zhes bag phab pa dang /des tshe dang ljon pa ka t+ya yA na chen po zan byin nas/tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya ya na che ni pos de'i bsam pa
202b3('dul ba): drang /bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas/gang thos nas des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/'jig tsho Da ba lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba
202b4('dul ba): ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtog par byed pa'i chos bstan
202b5('dul ba): par byaso//des bden pa mthang na sa/btsun pas bdagu la gang mdzad pa 'od lta bu ni/bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma
202b6('dul ba): bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang mya bgyis/byams pa dang /mdza' shes dang
202b7('dul ba): tsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/rus pa'i ro dag las ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum//mtho ris dang thar
203a1('dul ba): pa'i sgra dag ni b+he/sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'bru dang /yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa byung /lha dang mi rnams sbyin dudu na panan/
203a2('dul ba): zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do//yang smras pa/dga' ba byed pa'i ma la ni//phung po bzang pos gang bya ba//de ni khyod kyis bdag la bgyis//sems
203a3('dul ba): ni mtho ris gzhol bar 'gyur//ngan song dag nas legs phyung zhing /khyod kyi mtho ris thar pa la//rab tu 'bang pos bdag bzhig ste//khyod kyis bka' ba
203a4('dul ba): legs par mdzad//tshong pas khe spogs rnyed pa ltar//mtho ris rnyed pa bdag gis rnyed//dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la ni//nye bar brten
203a5('dul ba): ba bzang ba lags/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+ya ya na chen pos bu mo bzang mo dade bden pa dag la bzhag nas smras pa/yum bltas lags kyis bdag mchi'o//des smras pa/
203a6('dul ba): bu gal te de lta na bdag la mtshan ma cung zhig stsol cig dang /bdag de la mchod pa bgyid cing mchis//des de la khar ba byin nas des mchod rten byas te/der de
203a7('dul ba): gcugs nas/khar ba'i mchod rten khar ba'i mchod rten zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur te/deng sang yang dge slong mcho de rton la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag 'tshal bar
203b1('dul ba): byed do//tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya yA na chen po yul dbus su 'gro 'dod nas/yul sin du phyin pa dang /de nas byang lam na gnas pa'i lha mo gang yin pa das/tshe dang ldan pa
203b2('dul ba): kau t+ya yan chen po la 'di skad ces smroso//'phags pa bdag lnga yang mtshan ma cung zhig stso lo cig dang /bdag de la mchod pa bgyid cing mchi so//des bsams pa/bcom
203b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis yul dbus su lham sgrog gu can bcang bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/'di de la sbyin snyam nas/des lam sgrog gu can de de la byin pa dang /des
203b4('dul ba): gnas gzhi byed du bcug ste/der bzhag pa dang /kha cig gis ni lham gyi dbang phyug ces bya bar sheso//kha cig gis ni lham gyi gzhi zhes bya bar sheso//tshe dang
203b5('dul ba): ldan pa ka t+yaM ya ni chen po mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas/dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legaso 'ongs pa legaso//ji ltar
203b6('dul ba): bde bar brgyus sam/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag cung zad kyang bde bar yang brgyus/cung zid sdug bsngal bar yang brgya so//dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ji ltar
203b7('dul ba): bde bar brgyus/ji ltar sdug bsngal bar brgyus des smras pa/sems can gyi bya ba byis pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde bar brgyus pa yino//rgyal po gtsug pud can
204a1('dul ba): dang /grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pI skye bo tshig kyis bdag sas mnan pa gang yin pa dang /blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /b+hi ru ka gnyis
204a2('dul ba): tshegs chen pos bros pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal bar brgyus po yino//dge slong don nyung ngu dag gis smad de smras pa/de ni pha gsod pa yin te/des tshe dang ldan pa
204a3('dul ba): u dra ya na dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa nyes pa med pa gnod pa mi byed pa bsad te 'di ni/de'i me tog tsam yin gyi 'bras bu ni gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dge slong rnams the
204a4('dul ba): tsom skyes nas/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa u dra ya nas las ci bgyis na/des phyug pa
204a5('dul ba): nor mong ba longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes shing /bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/nyin mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid
204a6('dul ba): mngon sum du bgyis nas mtshon gyis bkum par gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong u dra ya na nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/
204a7('dul ba): rkyen yongasu bsgyur la/'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gden mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas u dra ya na nyid kyis las byas shing
204b1('dul ba): bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur//dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/
204b2('dul ba): chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur/'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni/zin pa'i phung
204b3('dul ba): pa dang /khams dang /skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni//chud mi za bo'i tshogs dang dus//rnyed na lus can rnams
204b4('dul ba): la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na//sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe//rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /bkren pa la
204b5('dul ba): rje su snying brtse ba bas mthi' gnas mal la dga' ba/bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnasu gyur pa dag/'jig rten du byung ngo //ji tsam na ri brags shig
204b6('dul ba): na rngon pa zhig 'dug ste/ri brags de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na/ri dwags dang bya mang po dag gi rten du gyur pa/mtshe'u zhig yod pa der rngon pa de nyid de nyi ma re re zhing ri
204b7('dul ba): dgas dang bya mang po dag drung dbyung ba'i phyir dang /nyams par bya ba'i phyir dang /tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar bya ba'i phyir/rngon spyad dang /snyi dang rnyong mang po
205a1('dul ba): drug 'jugs par byed//de'i rnon spud dang /spyi dang rnyong de dag kyang don yod pa na'o//ji tsamadus gzhan zhig ni rang sangs rgyas
205a2('dul ba): shig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na ri brags der phyin nosalha'i gnas shig tu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs nas/de ste na thangs d+mo lhung bzed dang chos
205a3('dul ba): gros thigs te/ri brags der bsod snyoms la zhug so//der bsod snyoms brgyus nas bsams pa/lha'i gnas 'di nyin mo rgyun lugs mang ba yin gyis
205a4('dul ba): ri dwags kyi phyi rol gyi gnas zhi ba zhig tu bsod snyoms bza'o snyam nas/der brags nas byung ste/'di ni zhi ba'o//'di ni zhi ba'o zhes/mtshe'u deg la ba der
205a5('dul ba): song ste phyin nos/lhung bzed dang chu tshugs mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/rkang pa gnyis dkris nas lag pa gnyis bskul te/chu btsags nas/lo ma lhags
205a6('dul ba): bdag blangs te/'dug nas zas kyi bye ba byas te/lag gnyis bsnyil nas kha bkrus te lhung bzed dang /chu tshags gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas/
205a7('dul ba): rkang pa gnyis dkrus te/shing drung zhig tu brten nas/brang 'gro'i rgyal po nyal ba'i lus bskyil ba ltar skyil ma bkrung bcas te/spyod lam zhi bar 'dug pa dang /
205b1('dul ba): de nyin mo mi'i dris ri dgas gcig kyang mazin to//de nas sngon pa de nang par sngar ldangs te/mtshe'u de ga la ba der song nas/de sngon spyad dang //rnyi dang rnyod de dag byul ba//
205b2('dul ba): brnams pa dang /ri dgas gcig kyang ma mthong nasad 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi don spyad dang /snyi drung rgod 'di dge don yod pa yin na/glang ra
205b3('dul ba): der ri dgas gcig kyang mazin pa 'di'i rgyu klung yin snyam nus/des mtshe'u de'i than kor byul bar brtsams pa dang /mi'i rjes mthong nas/de rjes de'i phyi bzhin du
205b4('dul ba): song ba dang /rang sangs rgyas spyod lam zhi bar 'dug pa de mthong nas/des bsams pa/rab tu byung ba sems zhi ba 'di dgra gnas 'di lta bu dag tu mngon par dga'
205b5('dul ba): bar byed pas/gal te bdag gis 'di'i srog gcad pa ma byas na/'di dag gis nges par bdag gi 'tsho ba gcod par byed kyis rnam pa thams cad du 'di gsang
205b6('dul ba): par bya'o snyam nus/snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/'jig rten pha rol btang ba des mnga' dug can gyis gzhuna'i dbyibs 'dra ba rna drung du thug par bkang ste/rang
205b7('dul ba): sangs rgyas de'i gan du bsnun to//rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsams pa/ngan pa nyon mongs pa 'di ha tsong smras pa dang /nyams par gyur na mi rung gis
206a1('dul ba): /'di la lug nas drung basbyin na sgyum nam+b+ha/sa dang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma g+hA shAk+Shu b+he gi na mkha' la mngon par 'phags nan/
206a2('dul ba): 'byung ba dang gsupa ba dang /char 'babs pa dang /glog 'byin pa 'jo 'dul dag bya bar brtsams//tsa ma myi ba ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtad par byed
206a3('dul ba): bayin pas/don pa de shing ljon pargya banas paca ba bzhin du du songs rgyas de'i ting pa gnyis kyi drung du skyel nas smras po/yin gnas yang dge bar gyur
206a4('dul ba): 'i phy-i sted sbyin mdza' ltas shing du babs//de nas rngon pa de drug rje med par byas /rgyu rgyun gyis glan nas m+b+ha ts+tsha pa/baphags pa snum pa ga shin
206a5('dul ba): /kaukyi 'di ga ser gyi spyan pa mun par mdzu na/de meng di ga ga sbyor bar bgyi'o//rang sa sur+g+ha kyis bsams te/bdag gis
206a6('dul ba): par bya ba zhing /de byer thung ba sbyin ma 'a pa'i byangan las 'das pa'i rgya su 'jug pa bya stsa //
206b1('dul ba): nyid kyi mdun du'ang na mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te/cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag rnam par bstan nas/phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu
206b2('dul ba): yongasu mya ngan las 'daso//rngon pa de nor dang ldan pa yin pas/des spris kyi shing thams cad kyis phung por gcer te bsregs nas/phung po de 'o mas zhi bar byas te/
206b3('dul ba): drus po de dag gser gyi bum par bcug nas/lam po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten rtsig tu bdug ste/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bo dran dag
206b4('dul ba): bsgreng zhing /dra dang phreng ba rgyu dang /'dud spros dang /phye ma dang /sil spyan dag gis ma chad pa byas nas/rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/smon lam 'di skad ces
206b5('dul ba): bdag yon gnas su yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang 'othun par mi 'gyur bar/miched pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i
206b6('dul ba): rtsa ba 'dis/bdag phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che bar skyes zhing /'di lngas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing /thugs byung bar mi byed
206b7('dul ba): ba'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig ces btago//dge slong dag de la de'i tshe de'i dus ni/rngon pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ud ya na yin te/desor
207a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas kyi gnad du mda' dug can gyis bsnun pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po
207a2('dul ba): mnar med par gdungs nas/las de nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mtshe'u de nyid du ri dag su gyur nas/mda' dug can gyis gnad du bstan tsong dus la bab ste/
207a3('dul ba): daltar gyi bar du 'di dag bcom pa thob kyang /de mtshon gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das so//mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni/dralta
207a4('dul ba): byuphyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che bar skyes shing nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing /
207a5('dul ba): 'dis rang sangs rgyas bye bo phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byaso//dge slong dag de ltar na lus
207a6('dul ba): gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par ston pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin la/
207a7('dul ba): las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa 'ang 'dren ma yin//dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te/las gcig
207b1('dul ba): tsud/ra ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bsgrub par bya'o//dge slong rnams ts+tsham+ba skyes nas/the tsom+ba thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom
207b2('dul ba): ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa rgyal po gtsug bud can dang grong khyer sgro sgrogs nA gnas pa'i skye ba'i tshigs dang /tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA yan chen pos las
207b3('dul ba): begyis na/des dog sas non par gyur nas/blon pa'i mchog he ru ka dang /b+hai ru ka gnyis kyis las ci zhig bgyis na bros par gyur/bcom ldan 'das
207b4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba/'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur
207b5('dul ba): bdag byas shing bsngags pas/de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/dge slong dag las byas shing bsngags pa
207b6('dul ba): dgani phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mo 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi 'di ltar
207b7('dul ba): las dge ba dang /mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni//zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskal pa brgyad
208a1('dul ba): yang ni//chud min pa'ang tshogs dang dus//rnyed na lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dag/
208a2('dul ba): sngon byung ba ri brags shig na/khyim bdag zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyams las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig rtsa bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga'
208a3('dul ba): dgur spyod par byed do//rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa de la bu khye'u zhig byung //yang rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga'
208a4('dul ba): dgur spyod par byed pa de la bu mo zhig byung nas/do ga nyes bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to//bu mo de dang na mnyam pa'i bu mo dge slong ba 'ongs na/bu
208a5('dul ba): mo de la slong ba 'ga' yang ma 'ongs//sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe/rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /bkren pa la rjesu snying brtse ba bas mtha'i gnas
208a6('dul ba): mal la dga' ba/bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gan su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung //je tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na//
208a7('dul ba): ri brags der phyin nas/bu mo des khyim phyags nas phyag dar rib ma'i steng nas bor ba de/rang sangs rgyas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba de'i mgor phog/bu mo des der
208b1('dul ba): phog pa mthong nas/'gyod pa'i sems kyang ma skyes la/ste dbang gis de nyid kyi nyin mo de slong ba 'ongs nas/ming pos de la dris pa/dang khyod kyis ci byas na/des
208b2('dul ba): na khyod slong ba 'ongaso//des smras pa/bdag gis deng rab tu byung ba'i steng du phyag dang bor ro//des 'dzum phyung ba dang /bu mo des bu mo gzhan dag la sbran cing nges
208b3('dul ba): kyang gzhan dag la sbran nas/'jig rten la bu mo gang dang gang slong ba mi 'ongadra ba des/rang sangs rgyas kyi steng du phyag dar bor na de la slong ba 'ong ngo zhes sdig pa can gyi
208b4('dul ba): lta ba'i rnam pa de lta bu byung //bdag nyid chen po rnams ni bsnyen bkur ma yin pas 'jigs pas/rang sangs rgyas de ri brags de nas song ba dang /drang srong mngon
208b5('dul ba): par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyi steng du dor bar brtsams nas/de dag kyang dong pha dang pha ma dag gis steng du dong bar brtsam so//ri brag de na khyim bdag dge ba'i
208b6('dul ba): chos can gnyis sho gro 'khod pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag dam pa byed pa ma yin pa'i chos 'phel ba 'di bzlog par bya'o zhes de gnyis kyis bzlog cing
208b7('dul ba): spangaso//dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/bu mo gang gis rang sangs rgyas kyi stang du phyag dar bor ba de ni rgyal po gtsug pud can 'di yi no//ri brags de na gnas pa'i
209a1('dul ba): skye bo'i tshogs gang yin pa de ni grod khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag yin te/'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas dang /
209a2('dul ba): drang srong dang /pha ma dag gi steng du phyag dar bor ba gang yin po de'i las kyi rnam par smin pos sas non par gyur to//khyim bdag gnyis kyis bzlog pa gang yin pa/
209a3('dul ba): donablon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /b+hi ru ka gnyis yin te las de'i rnam par smin pas bros par gyur to//bu mo'i ming pa gang gis 'dzum phyung ba de ni dge
209a4('dul ba): skyong ka t+ya yi na chen po yin te/des 'dzum phyung ba gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin byas su g.yogs te/gal te dge slong ka t+ya ya na chen pos yon tan gyi
209a5('dul ba): tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs par ma gyur du zin na/dge slong ka t+ya ya na chen po sas non cing tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro//dge slong dag de lta na las
209a6('dul ba): gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar pa yin//
209a7('dul ba): las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yino//dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /'dren ma rnams spangs te/las gcig tu
209b1('dul ba): kar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin/
209b2('dul ba): gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//ko'u sham bin khyi mo bdag nor bzang zhes bya'o/phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba ni gi 'dug pa de'i khyim rgyal po shar pa'i drung na
209b3('dul ba): 'dug cing /de nang par sngar langs te las kyi mtha' dag la rtog tu 'gro'o//de dbyig gi gdangs can yin pas/rgyal po shar pas sgra'i gdongs las de la gser
209b4('dul ba): bzhag pa 'bum yod par sheso//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/rgyal po shar pa don gyi gnas na/'dug pas blon po rnams la skyes pa/shes ldan dag khyim bdag nor
209b5('dul ba): bzangs nyi ma re re zhing nang par sngar langs te/rang nyid las kyi mtha' dag la rtog tu 'phro ste/'di gser bzhag pa 'bum yod ces grag ni ci'i phyir na bdag nyid ngal bar byed/blon
