209b6('dul ba): po rnams kyis smras pa/lha 'di la gser bzhag pa 'bum ga la mchis te/gal te 'di la gser bzhag pa 'bum mchis na ci'i slad du bdag nyid ngal bar bgyid/rgyal pos smras
209b7('dul ba): pa/shes ldan dag gal te khyed cag yid ma ches na/khyim bdag nor bzangs pos shig dang dri'o//de dag gis khyim bdag nor bzangs bos nas/rgyal pos dris po/khyim
210a1('dul ba): bdag khyod la ga skyed ba dag pa 'dum spyod dun/mchis /gal te bzhid na pa nasags pa/khyim bdag blan gsod don N+Di du
210a2('dul ba): ma yin gyi 'di ltar ngas khyod la ci yod dmo med ces dri bar zad do//lha mchis te lhas ji ltar mkhyen mkhyen pa de zhu'o//rgyal pos smras pa/khyim bdag khyod de byig gi
210a3('dul ba): gdas can yin pas ngas sgra'i gdangs las shes//khyim bdag nar bzangs rgyal pos gdangs las shes pas/de'i ming khyim bdag gdangs can khyim bdag gdangs
210a4('dul ba): can zhes bya bar gyur to//rgyal pos de la smras pa/khyimI bdag khyod phyug par gyur pa yin na/ci'i phyir khyod rang kyis lo ta byas te las kyi mtha' dag byed du 'jug
210a5('dul ba): des smras pa/lho gal te bodag gis rang gi zhal ta bgyis te/lam kyi mtha' dag bgyid du ma sku lo na/bdag gi longaso spod dag 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang /ya
210a6('dul ba): par yang mi 'gyur la/lhas kyang bdag dbyig gi gdangs can lags par mkhyen par mi 'gyur ro//rgyal pos smras pa/khyim bdag khyod ci'o phyir glang po che
210a7('dul ba): dang /sta dag gis mi 'gro/lha bdag khyim khol lags pas/glang po che dang rta dag gis mchi ba bdag gi tshul dang 'thun po ma la gso so//rgyal pos bsams
210b1('dul ba): pa grogs 'di lta bus rgyal srid byed du gzhug par nus kyis/'di blon pa kho nar gzhugo snyam du rig nas smras pa/khyim bdag blon po gyis shig dang /lhan cig tu rgyal
210b2('dul ba): srid byed du gzhug/des smras pa/lha de skad ces bka' stsa la pa mi rigs te/bdag ni khyim khol lags pas bdag zhing las kyi mtha' rje su sgrub par rigs kyi//
210b3('dul ba): blon por mi rigaso//rgyal pos de lta de ltar nan gyis mnan na/ci nas kyang gdon mi za bar khas len par shes te/nan gyis mnan nas des kyang khas blangaso//de nas
210b4('dul ba): rgyal pos de blon por bcug nas/khyim bdag gdangs can gyis chos dang rigs pas/rgyal po'i bya ba dang rgyal po'i byed pa dag bya bar brtsams nas/des blon pa
210b5('dul ba): thams cad zil gyis mnon pa dang /de dag phra dog skyes te yid mi bde bar gyur nas/'dus te smras po/shes ldan dag bdag tsog 'di ltar khyim bdag gdangs can
210b6('dul ba): gyi zil gyi mnan par gyur na/'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya//de na kha cig gis smras pa/'di la ci phyir bsgrub du med 'di ji srid du gtan du rtong tshugs par ma gyur
210b7('dul ba): pa de srid du 'di la rgyal pos chad pas gcod du gzhug par bya'o//kha cig gi smras pa/mnyes kyi de ltar bya'o zhes de dag thams cad 'dus te/rgyal pos gan du dong nas
211a1('dul ba): smras pa/lha rgyal po su lags//des smras pa/khyed cag ga las the tshom za/rgyal po nga yin mod gzhan su zhig yin/de dag
211a2('dul ba): gis smras pa/lha gdangs can rgyal po lags kyi khyod ni me lags te/gal te de 'chal bar gyur na/lha bkrongs te rang nyid cod pan bcings nas/rgyal srid kyi dbang
211a3('dul ba): phyug gi bdag po bgyid du rtsol bar 'gyur ro//rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag ci'i phyir de de ltar 'gyur te/de ni chos rtsol bar byed pa yin pas/ji ltar de ltar byed
211a4('dul ba): par 'gyur/de dag gis smras pa/bdag cag gi lha'i mngon sum du 'gyur bar bgyi'o//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag gdangs can rgyal pos nye bar 'tsho ba'o
211a5('dul ba): rgol ba dang /phyir rgol ba dag gis/yongasu bskor cing rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs nas/rgyal po'i pho brang de thams cad skye bo'i tshogs kyi gang bar des rgyal po bya ba dang /
211a6('dul ba): rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas nas//rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ba dang /rgyal pos nye bar 'tsho ba sngon 'khod pa dag kyang de dang lhan cig phyir byung ste/rgyal po tshogs
211a7('dul ba): med par 'dug pa dang /blon po de dag gis rgyal po la smras pa/lha gzigs sam/bdag cag gis gsol pa/gang lags pa de ni 'di lags to//gal te 'di
211b1('dul ba): 'tshal bar gyur na/lha bkrongs te rang nyid cod pan bcings nas/rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis bdag po bgyid du stsal bar 'gyur ro//rgyal pos bsams pa/re zhig 'di brtag par bya'o//
211b2('dul ba): snyam nas/des de rgyu ba dang gnas pa las brtag par brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na byang lam nas ded dpon gyis/zong rta ded de ko'u sham bir phyin nas/rgyal pos gdangs can la
211b3('dul ba): bsgo ba/gser 'bum gyi rta dganyos shig des gser 'bum gyi rta dag nyos pa dang /rgyal pos gdangs can la bsgo bo/'bum gyi phyed byin lo/'di skad ces bdag gi 'bum tshang ba
211b4('dul ba): byin zin to zhes byos shig des smras pa/lha'i de mi rigs te/gal te de ltar bgyis na slan chad 'dir chi bas rta 'tshong ba dang /gzhan 'ga' yang 'chi bar mi 'gyur gyis/'di
211b5('dul ba): ltar lha'i bkor las 'bum phyed rtsol cig dang /bdag gis 'bum phyed stsal to//rgyal pos smras pa/khyim bdag nga'i tshig de bzhin smras na 'di la ci 'gal/des smras pa/lha
211b6('dul ba): bdag gis tshe gcig gis sdug bsngal gyi don du tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par rngo mi thog go/rgyal pos de la lan gsum gyi bar du smras na yang de ma btub nas/de nas
211b7('dul ba): rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag gang gis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i bka' lan gsum gyi bar du bcag po de'i chad pa ci yin/blon po rnams
212a1('dul ba): kyis smras pa/lha de'i chad pa ni dgum pa lags//des smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te de lta na ngas khyim bdag gangs can yongasu ga//
212a2('dul ba): blon po rnams kyis mi gshed ma dag la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag lhas bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag gdangs can sod cig ces byung ngo //rgyal pos mi gshed ma pa de dag
212a3('dul ba): la gsang ste bsgo ba/khyed kyis khyim bdag gdang ldan gsad par mi bya bar 'dri ltar sdigs par bya'o//de dag gis de'i mgrin par ka ra bi ra'i phreng ba btags te/gong khyer
212a4('dul ba): gyi dbus nas gsad par khrid pa dang /de'i nye du dag dong te smras pa/khyim bdag 'di la ltos bka' ci stsal ba de ltar gyis la bdag nyid gsod du ma gzhug shig de smras pa
212a5('dul ba): kho bo'i lha'i bka' chos dang ldan pa cag gam/tso gal te lhas kho bo nyes pa med pa gnod pa mi byed pa gsod na gsad du zad/kho bos tsha gcig gi sdug bsngal gyi phyir
212a6('dul ba): tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par mi nuso//mi gshod ma pa de dag gis de gsad sar khrid de smras pa/khyim bdag lhas bka' ci stsal ba de ltar gyis la bdag
212a7('dul ba): nyid gsod du ma gzhug shig/des smras pa/kho bos lha'i bka' chos dang ldan pa bcag gam ci/gal te lhas kho bo nyes pa med pa gnod pa mi byed pa gsod na
212b1('dul ba): gsod du zad/kha bos che gcig gi sdug bsngal gyi phyir/tshe rabs mang ba'i sdug bsngal bskyed par mi nus//mi gshed ma pa de dag gis de la rgyal po'i gan du khrid de smras
212b2('dul ba): pa/g+hi khyim bdag glang s+ya can 'di skad ces mtsho'o//rgyal pos smras pa/khyim badreg po byed bsod par 'dod pa ma yin te/'di ltar brtag par 'dod de//des smras pa
212b3('dul ba): lhas bdag brtag pa'i dgongs pas gnas skabs 'di lta bu stsa la na/gal te skyon ni ji ltar bgyis par 'gyur/'di ltar gral te lce bdag la dgyes ni bdag sbyin pa
212b4('dul ba): dag stsol cing /bsod nams dag bgyid par ci ga nang /rgyal pos smras po/khyim bdag gal te de lta na gnang dgras ci dgar sbyin pa dag byin cig/bsod nams
212b5('dul ba): drug gyis shig/de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis/sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig du bcug ste/sbyin pa'i zhal te bai mi brkos nas smras pa/shes ldan dag gal
212b6('dul ba): te 'dir sngon ma byung ba'i rtags dang /cha lugs can gyi dge sbyong ngam/bram ze'i ma/gzhan dag 'ongs par gyur na kho bo la sbron cig/ji tsam na lho lam nas drang
212b7('dul ba): srong lnga brgya tsam yul dbus su 'phags pa de dag mthar gyis lam du 'dong ban/dpon 'i lam du phyin nas/de dag dpon po'i nang du son pa na/chu zad nas de dag
213a1('dul ba): chu dang bral ba skom gyi gdungs nas/dgon pa'i lam der phan tshun byul bar brtsams pa dang /de phan tshun nyul ba de dag gis ha cang thag
213a2('dul ba): mi ring ba na/sing ma sngon mo'i phyogs na/shing ljon pa zhig mthong nas/de na kha cig gis smras pa/shes ldan dag sing ma sngon po'i phyogs 'di ni shing ljon pa zhig snang gis tshur
213a3('dul ba): shegs dang /'di ni chu yod par 'gyur gyis ltar 'dong ngo //gzhan dag gis smras pa/legs kyi de bzhin bya'o zhes de dag der dong ba dang ji tsam na/chu med par mthong
213a4('dul ba): nas/de dag gis gsol ba 'dab par brtsams te/shes ldan dag sa phyogs dang shing ljon pa 'di la lha'am/klu'am/gnod sbyin nam/na mkha'i lding ngam/dri za 'am/
213a5('dul ba): mi'am ci 'am/lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa des bdag cag drang srong lnga brgya skom gyis gdungs pa rnams la chu byin cig ces smras//ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las lag pa
213a6('dul ba): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhig gser gyi ril pa b+hing gar thogs te/byung nas drang srong rnams kyis snyim pas bzed de chu btung bar brtsams nas/ji tsam nA myangs
213a7('dul ba): no chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yin te/bsil ba dang /mngar ba dang /yang ba dang /'jam pa dang /gsal ba dang /dri nga ba med pa dang /'thung ba na mgul li mo
213b1('dul ba): gnod pa dang /'thungs pa na lha min pa yin te/de dag tshims par gyur nas ril ba bkang ste shis pa brjod nas 'phags te dong ba dang /de dag la blo skyes pa shes ldan/
213b2('dul ba): drag bdag cag gis de lta bu'i ya mtshan mthong nas/de la khyod su yin/las gang gis 'dir skyes shes ma dris pa ni bdag cag nyams pa yin gyis/tshur shog phyir log la
213b3('dul ba): dri'o snyam nas/de dag thams cad 'dus te phyir log nas/shing ljon pa de'i drung du 'khod de smras pa/shing ljon pa 'di la lha'am/klu 'am/gnod sbyin na mo/na mkha'
213b4('dul ba): lding ngam/dri za 'am/mi 'am ci'am/lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa gang gis/bdag cag dgon pa'i lam du song ba/gnod pa dang /nyam nga ba mi bde bar gyur cing /'chi
213b5('dul ba): ba'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la/chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas tshim par byas pa des bdag gang yin pa dang /las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smos shig/ji tsam na shing ljon
213b6('dul ba): pa de las tshig byung ba/shes ldan dag 'jam+bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' ba yin pas/kho bo su yin pa dang /las gang gis 'dir skyes pa yid
213b7('dul ba): ches par mi 'gyur bas/ji ltar smra bar bya/drang song rnams kyis smras pa/kye bdag cag gis mngon sum kho nar mthong ni ji ltar yid sme bar mi 'gyur/the tshom mi za ba smos
214a1('dul ba): shig/des smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te de lta na nyon cig dang /kho bo gang yin pa dang /las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smra bar bya'o//
214a2('dul ba): yul ko sa la dag na grong khyer mnyan yod ces bya ba de na/khyim bdeg mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba 'dug pa de'i khyim drung na/kho bo bzang mkhan byed cing 'dug 'dug ste/
214a3('dul ba): de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed pas/yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i slong ma pa dag lhags shing lhags shing kho bo la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi
214a4('dul ba): khyim gang yin pa zhes 'dri nas/kho bos lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/de dag la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim 'di yin no//zhes smras pa dang /de dog gis de
214a5('dul ba): nas lag pa gang ba dang /snod grang ba dang /'byor pa thob pa dang /rnyed pa thob cing 'dong ba de dag kho bos mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba bskyed par byed de/kho bo las des rgyal
214a6('dul ba): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes shing ljon pa 'di la gnas te/de phyir kho bo'i lag pa g.yas pa shin tu lham mi ldan ne lhang der gyur to//de dag gis shis pa
214a7('dul ba): brjod pas bstod de dong ngo //ji tsam ni phyogs gzhan zhig tu phyin nas bza' ba dang ltung ba zad de/de dag bkres pas gdungs shing skom pas gdungs nas/kun tu brtag pa//
214b1('dul ba): brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na ha cang thag mi ring ba zhig na/shing ljon pa chen po lo ma sngo zhing snum pa zhig snang nas de dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag shing ljon pa chen po lo ma sngo
214b2('dul ba): zhing snum pa 'di lta bu snang ste/sngar yang bdag cag gis/shing ldan pa 'di lta bu kho na las chu grub kyis 'dir 'dong ngo //gal te na chung zad 'grub par 'gyur zhes de dag der dong ste
214b3('dul ba): gsol ba gdab par brtsams pa/shes ldan dag sa phyogs dang /shing ljon pa 'di la lha 'am/klu 'am/gnod sbyin nam/na mkha' lding ngam/dri za 'amu mi 'am ci 'am/lto 'phye
214b4('dul ba): chen po gang gnas pa des/bdag cag drang srong lnga brgya bkres pas gdungs pa dang /skom pas gdungs pa rnams lo zas dang skom byin cig ces smraso//ji tsam na shing ljon pa de la tshig
214b5('dul ba): byung ba/shes ldan dag deng shig dang 'di na se ta cing mi ring ba na rdzing bu zhig yod pa de'i 'gram na/shing ljon pa zhig yod po de'i drung na/'bras chan gyi bre bo gang zhig 'dug pa de
214b6('dul ba): las zos shing 'thungs nas/bza' ba dang btung ba ci 'dod pa khyer cig/de dag dong ba dang /ji tsam na rdzing bu bya dang ngang pa dang /ka ran da ba dang /ngur pas mdzes par byas pa
214b7('dul ba): zhig 'dug pa de'i 'gram na/shing ljon pa zhig 'dug pa de'i drung na//'bras chan tshod ma sna tshogs dang bcas pas gang zhing 'dug pa mthong nas/de dag gis der khrus
215a1('dul ba): byas te zos shing chu 'thungs nas/ril ba chus bkang ste bza' ba dang btung ba ci 'dod pa khyer nas shis pa brjod de dong ba dang /de dag la blo skyes
215a2('dul ba): pa shes ldan dag/bdag cag gis de lta bu'i ya mtshan mthong nas/de la khyod su yin/las gang gis 'dir skyes shes/ma dris pa ni bdag cag nyams pa yin gyis
215a3('dul ba): tshur sheg phyir log la dri'o snyam nas/de dag thams cad 'dus te phyir log nas/shing ljon pa de'i drung du 'khod de smras pa/shing ljon pa 'di la lha 'am klu'am/gnod
215a4('dul ba): sbyin nam/na mkha' lding ngam/dri za 'am/mi 'am ci'am/lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa gang gis/bdag cag dgon pa'i lam du song ba/gnod pa dang /nyams
215a5('dul ba): ngo dang /mi bde bar gyur cing /'chi ba'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang /zas kyi tshim par byas pa des/bdag gang yin pa dang /las gang gis
215a6('dul ba): 'dir skyes pa smros shig/ji tsam na shing ljon pa de la tshig byung ba/shes ldan dag 'jom+bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' ba yin pas/kho bo su yin pa dang las
215a7('dul ba): gang gis 'dir skyes pa/yid ches par mi 'gyur bas/ji ltar smra bar bya/drang srong rnams kyis smras pa/kye bdag cag gis mngon sum kho nar mthong nas/ji ltar yid
215b1('dul ba): ches par mi 'gyur//the tsom ma za bar smros shig/des smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te de lta na nyon cig dang /kho bo gang yin pa dang /las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smra bar bya'o//
215b2('dul ba): yul ko sa la dag na grong khyer mnyan yod ces bya ba de ni/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin por byed nas ri brags
215b3('dul ba): shig na bram ze zhig 'dug po longs spyod sab nas dre bsam+ba ga/bo nyan ldon khyim bdag mgon mAmra sbyin 'dug pa de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed kyis de'i gan du song ba na de las chung zad
215b4('dul ba): 'grub par 'gyuraro snyam nas de de'i gan du song ba dang /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang /sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol bar 'dod nas/
215b5('dul ba): rgyal byed tshal du 'phags pa na/des de mthong nas smras pa/khyim bdag bdag la zos kyi mgron gyis shig des de la smras pa/bram ze tshur shog/rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'dod la
215b6('dul ba): der zo shig/de de dang lhan cig 'phags pa dang /ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi lam kar zho'i bum po zhig rnyed nas/des de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa/bram
215b7('dul ba): zes zho'i bum pa 'di dge 'dun la rims shig/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bsod pas tshim par byas pa dang
216a1('dul ba): bram ze des kyang zho'i bum pa de dge 'dun la brim so//khyim de dag mgon med zas sbyin gyi sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshor
216a2('dul ba): gsol nas/khyim bdag zas sbyin par brtsams te/des khyim pa gzhan dgo la ni zas bsod pa byin/bram ze de la ni ngan pa byin pa dang /des de la smras pa/khyim bdag
216a3('dul ba): rab tu byung ba rnams ni bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa yin pas/re zhig 'di dag la ni bsod pa sbyin par rigs na/bdag tsog khyim pa bslab pa yang dag par ma blangs
216a4('dul ba): par 'dra na ci'i phyir khyim gzhan dag la ni zas gsod pa sbyin la/bdag li na zan ngan pa sbyin/des de la smras pa/bram ze khyim pa 'di dag kyang bslab pa yang dag par
216a5('dul ba): blangs pa yin te/'di dag gis kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangaso//des de la smras pa/khyim bdag gal te bdag gis kyang yan lag brgyad dang
216a6('dul ba): ldan pa'i gasngo sbyong len na/bdag la yang zas bsod pa sbyin nam/des de la smras pa sbyin no//des yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa dang /de nas khyim
216a7('dul ba): bdag mgon medo bas sbyin gyis/da zas bsod pas tshim por byas nas/des zos te 'phags pa dang /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/bram ze yod
216b1('dul ba): dudu 'phrul 'i rje sa rdzu 'gaso sbyong ngas zhes bya bar shes so/'dus pa
217a1('dul ba): rnam par 'byed pa/bam po don gsum pa//drang srong de dag mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/shes ldan dag bdag cag drang srong rnams kyis dus 'di
217a2('dul ba): srid du brtul zhugs la gnas pas kyang /'di'i 'bras bu tsir 'gyur mi shes na/lha'i bu gso sbyong rol pa 'dis/bram zer gyur pa na yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso
217a3('dul ba): sbyong blangs shing /de bral na yang 'di rgyal chen bzhi'i ros kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes kyis/bdag cag kyang gang du 'dis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa
217a4('dul ba): dor 'dong ngo //de ltar bya'o zhes de dag gis gos byas te/mnyan yod du 'phags nas/ji tsam na mthar gyis ko'u sham bir phyin pa dang /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis sbyin
217a5('dul ba): pa'i zhal ta byed pa'i mi rnams kyis de dag mthong nas/de dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can la sbran pa/khyim bdag khyod kyis bdag cag la bsgo ba/sngon ma byung ba'i rtags
217a6('dul ba): dang cha lugs can dag mthong na/kho bo la sbron cig ces byung ba de dag lhags te sgo na sdod do//des smras pa/'jug tu chug shig/de dag gis 'jug tu bcug pa dang /
217a7('dul ba): khyim bdag gdas can gyis de dag mthong nas dris pa/shes ldan dag khyed cag gang nas 'ongs/de dag gis smras pa/khyim bdag lho lam nas 'ongs/des smras
217b1('dul ba): pa/shes ldan dag khyed kyis lho lam du ngo mtshar mthong ba dang /thos pa ni yod/de dag gis smras pa/khyim bdag re shig bdag cag gis sngar mthong ba dang thos pa'i ngo
217b2('dul ba): mtshar gzhan dag lto zhig gi de bar mthong ba dang thos pa'i ngo mtshar gang yin pa dag smra bar byas nyon cig/des smras pa/shes ldan dag smros shig dang kho bo ngo mtshar
217b3('dul ba): de dag nyan to//de dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par brjod pa dang /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis thos nas/mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te de
217b4('dul ba): dag zan byin nas smras pa/shes ldan ngag gar dong /de dag gis smras pa/khyim bdag mnyan yod du 'dong ngo //shes ldan dag de ni ci yod khyim bdag lha'i bu gso
217b5('dul ba): sbyong ral gyis gang la rten te/yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa'i khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yod do//des smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te de lta
217b6('dul ba): no kho bo'i yang ma mthong ba'i grogs yin gyis 'di nyid du dbyar gyi mtshan mo gyis la dbyar 'dis nas kho bo dang lhon cig 'dong ngo //de dag nyid du dbyar gyi mtshan mo
217b7('dul ba): gnas te/dbyar 'das nas mnyan yod du 'phags pa dang /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis/bad sa'i rgyal po shar po la smras pa/lha bdag mnyan yod du bgyi bcupa
218a1('dul ba): zhig mchis na gral te lhas gnang na der mchi'o//rgyal pos smras pa/khyim bdag gdangs can gal te de ldan stong la khyod kyis don bsgrub
218a2('dul ba): pa byas nas/myur du phyir shog shig/de rgyal pos gnang nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag dang lhan cig 'phags te mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas bskyed mas
218a3('dul ba): tshal na sdud cing 'dug go//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis khyim bdag gdangs can 'dir 'ongs te bskyed mos tshal na sdod cig 'dugo zhe so thos//thos nas
218a4('dul ba): kyang des bsams pa bdag gis khyim bdag gdangs can mtshor po kho nar gnas su 'jug du bzhug pa ni/bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin gyis/bkur bsti
218a5('dul ba): chen pos 'jug tu gzhugro snyam nas/des de bkur bsti chen pos 'jug tu bcug ste lam gyi dub pa'i ngal bsos nas zan byino//de nas drang srong de dag lhags
218a6('dul ba): nas/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'ongs pa ligaso zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad de smras pa/shes ldan dag khyed cag gi las 'ongs/'dir ci la
218a7('dul ba): 'ongs/de dag gis smras pa/khyi mo bdag khyod kyis/lha'i bu gso sbyong ral la/gang byin pa de bdag cag la yang byin cing /des smras pa/shes
218b1('dul ba): ldan mi dran//khyim bdag bdag cag gis khyod la dran par bya'o//shes ldan dag leg so//de dag gi dran par byab sgra des smras pa/shre ldan dag ci kho bo las len tA ma 'on te bcom ldan
218b2('dul ba): 'das las len/khyim bdag khyod kyi su las blangs/shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das la so//khyim bdag gal te de lta na bdag cag kyang de kho na las len to//shes ldan dag
218b3('dul ba): legs kyis de ltar gyis shig ces des de dag khrid de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo //de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na chos ston cing
218b4('dul ba): bzhug so//bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin thag ring po kho na nas gzig so//gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dgra khyed kyis khyim
218b5('dul ba): bdag mgan med zas sbyin thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong ngo //dge slong dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di skyes dang bcas pas 'ongs te/de bzhin
218b6('dul ba): gshegs pa'i skyes ni 'di ltar gdul ba'i skyes lta bu gzhan med do//de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin drang srong lnga rgyu'i 'khor dang bcas pas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
218b7('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dugo//mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol te/
219a1('dul ba): btsun pa drang srong lnga brgya po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong len par 'tshal na de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das
219a2('dul ba): kyis 'di dag ci nas kyang sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi ba dang /dge bsnyen nyid du 'chal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu chos bstan du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das
219a3('dul ba): kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gi bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/gad thos nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis phyir mi 'ongs pa'i
219a4('dul ba): 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtog par byed pa'i chos bstan par mdzad do//de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/bcom
219a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te gsol pa/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong
219a6('dul ba): gi dngos po 'thob cing /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chang par spyad par spyod do//bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces pas rab tu dbyung gis/dge slong tshur
219a7('dul ba): sheg/tshang par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /de dog bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i mjug kho nar skra byi ba dang /snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/skra dang kha spu zhig/
219b1('dul ba): bdun skyes pa tsam dang lag pa lhung bzed dang /bya ma bum gyis brel ba dang /dge slong rdzogs par bsnyen nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bu gnas par gyur to//yang smras pa/
219b2('dul ba): de bzhin gshegs pas chur shog bka' stsal pas/skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus
219b3('dul ba): gzugs bkab par gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag le gdam ngag byin nas/de dag gi spro ba dang /'bad pa dang /brtsal ba dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
219b4('dul ba): pas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing /dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/nam mkha' dang lag
219b5('dul ba): 'thil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan+dan bzhag pa lta bu/rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /rig pa dang //mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par
219b6('dul ba): rig pa thob pa dang /srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /bkur bsti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /rjed
219b7('dul ba): par bya ba dang /mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to//de nas khyim bdag gdangs can bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
220a1('dul ba): bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu 'dug go//mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag gdangs can la chos dang ldan pa'i ga'
220a2('dul ba): mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'dzud par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad cing /sangs
220a3('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byi dus sngar mdzad pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid gang yin pa 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i bka' mchid dang /tshul khrims kyi bka' mchid dang /
220a4('dul ba): mtho ris kyi bka' mchid dang /'dod pa rnams kyi ro myang ba'i nyes dmigs dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /nges par 'byung ba dang /rab tu dben pa'i
220a5('dul ba): phan yon dang /rnam par byang ba'i phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos dag rgya cher ston par mdzad//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sems rangs pa dang /sems nyams bde ba dang
220a6('dul ba): semra dga' ba dang semal sgrib pa med pa dang /yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa kun shes pa'i skal pa dang ldan zhing mthu yod par gzigs pa de'i tshe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
220a7('dul ba): 'das rnams kyis yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po//sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam
220b1('dul ba): dag rgya cher ston par mdzad//'di lta ste/dper na gos dag pa nag nog med pa kha bsgyur du rung ba/tshon du bcug na/tshon legs par 'dzin par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/khyim bdag
220b2('dul ba): gdangs can gyis kyang bstan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam mngon par rtog
220b3('dul ba): par gyur to//de nas khyim bdag gdangs can chos mthong ba dang /chos thos pa dang /chos rag pa dang /chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /som nyi las rgal ba dang /the tsom lus
220b4('dul ba): rgal ba dang /ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /gzhan gyis mi bkri zhing chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas/stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig
220b5('dul ba): tu byas nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lag so//
220b6('dul ba): btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/btsun po bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /chos dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi yis/bdag dge bsnyen du
220b7('dul ba): 'dzung du gsol/deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas/mngon par dad pas skyabasu mchi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can laM ngi
221a1('dul ba): stsal pa/khyim bdag khyod ming ci/btsun pa bdag nor bzangs shes bgyi ba las/rgyal po shar pas bdag gdangs can las btsal ba las/de'i slad du bdag
221a2('dul ba): skye bo dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can zhes bgyi ba 'tshal to//bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham bir gshegs par gsol/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge
221a3('dul ba): 'dun dang bcas pa la/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang bsod snyoms dang /gnas mal dang sbyang ba'i rkyen dang /sman gyi yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur 'tshalo//khyim bdag
221a4('dul ba): ko'u sham bi na/gtsug leg khang yod dam/btsun pa ma mchiso//khyim bdag dge slong dag ni gang na gtsug lag khang yod pa der bgrod pa dang /'gro ba dang gnas glang
221a5('dul ba): sems so//bcom ldan 'das gshegasu gsol dang /bdag gi ji ltar ko'u sham bi ni/gtsug lag khang mchis par 'gyur pa dang /dge slong rnams kyang bgrod pa dang
221a6('dul ba): mchi ba dang /gnas par sems par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas khyim bdag gdangs
221a7('dul ba): can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhangs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
221b1('dul ba): nas song nas/de la mnyan yod na bya ba'am/byed pa ci yod pa de thams cad byas shing bsgrubs nas yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
221b2('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la grogs dge slong 'ga' zhig stsol cig dang /bdag gis de dang
221b3('dul ba): lhan cig/bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khung rtsig tu stsal bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can 'khor dang bcas pa dang /ke'u sha ma be na gnas
221b4('dul ba): pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag/dge slong gang gi 'dul ba yin snyam du dgongs na/dge slong skul byed chen po'i gdul ba yin par gzigs nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
221b5('dul ba): ldan po skul byed chen po la bka' stsal pa//skul byed khyim bdag gdangs can 'khor dang bcwa pa dang /ko'u sham bi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la soms shig/tshe dang
221b6('dul ba): ldan pa skul byed chen pos bcom ldan 'das las cang mi smra bas dang du blangaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/snga dro shram thabs bgos/ltung
221b7('dul ba): bzed dang tshe so gos thogs te/mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugaso//mnyan yod du bsod snyoms brgyus nas/zas kyi bya ba byas te/phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir
222a1('dul ba): log pas ji ltar longs spyod pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste/lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas khyim bdag gdangs can dang 'grogs te/
222a2('dul ba): ko'u sham bi ra ga la ba de log su song nas/mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/ko'u sham bir phyin te//de nas khyim bdag gdangs can ko'u sham bir ma zhugs pa kho nar/kun
222a3('dul ba): dga' ra ba nas kun dga'i ra bar/bskyed mos tshal nas bskyed mos chel du/gol bar song ste/gang du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu
222a4('dul ba): gzhug pa'i sa phyogs/ko'u shram bi nes ha cang yang mi rong /ha cang yang mI nye ba nyin mo rgyun lugs nyung zhing blag cor chung ga mtshan mo sgro chung zhing ngur sgra chung ba/sha sbrang
222a5('dul ba): dang /sbrang bu dang /rlung dang /nyi ma dang /sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung ba de lta bu ci yod ces bi tsa la na/khyim bdag gdangs can gyis rang gi kun dga' ra ba ke'u sham bi nas
222a6('dul ba): ha cang yang mi ring /ha cang yang mi nye ba nyin mo rgyun lugs nyung zhing brag car chung ba/mtshan mo sgra chung zhing 'ur sgra chung ba/sha sbrang dang /sbrang bu dang /rlung dang /nyi ma dang
222a7('dul ba): sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung bar mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/sa phyogs 'di bzang gis/'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig
222b1('dul ba): tu gzhugo snyam//de nas khyim bdag gdangs can dang /tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos bskyed mos tshal der/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/gtsug lag khang rta babs
222b2('dul ba): mthon pa dang ldan pa skar khung dang dkar khung zlum po dang /lan kan gyis brgyan po gcig rtsig tu bcu go/de nas gtsug lag khang byas shing zin nas/khyim bdag gdangs can
222b3('dul ba): gyis/tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po la 'di skad ces smraso//'phags pa bcom ldan 'das shul du gshegs pa'i dgongs kyi tshod ji tsam/khyim bdag 'di lta ste/dper na
222b4('dul ba): 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang 'dra'o//'phags pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i ji tsam/khyim bdag 'khor los phyung ba'i rgyal po lamo du 'gro ba'i dgongs lam ni rgyud
222b5('dul ba): grags bcu'o//khyimo bdag gdangs can gyis rgyang grags bcu bcur gshegs dgongs dag shom du bcug nas/bcom ljon 'das kyi spyan sder pho nya btang ste/bcom
222b6('dul ba): ldan 'das ko'u shom bir gsheg su gsol/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang /bsod snyoms dang gnas
222b7('dul ba): mal dang sbyang ba'i rkyen dang /sman gyi yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur bgyi'o zhes gsol to//pho nyes kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sder song ste gsol to//de nas bcom ldan
223a1('dul ba): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dgra bcom ldan 'das bad sa dag tu/ljongs
223a2('dul ba): rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang /de bzhin gshegs pa dang /thabs gcig tu bdas dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des/chos gos dag long shig ces
223a3('dul ba): sgo shig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' zhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la/tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das bdas dag tu
223a4('dul ba): ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo'o//de
223a5('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das dul po 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/dbugs phyin pa/'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan
223a6('dul ba): pa/thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/mdzes pa
223a7('dul ba): 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/sing ge ltar mche ba
223b1('dul ba): can gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/bram ze ltar slob ma'i cho
223b2('dul ba): kyis yongasu bskor ba/sman pa mkhas pa ltar nud pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshe Da
223b3('dul ba): kyis yongasu bskor ba/ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/tshong pa ltar 'khor gyis tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tsho
223b4('dul ba): kyis yongasu bskor ba/'khor lo sgyur ba ltar bu skyong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/zla ba ltar rgyu skur gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskur ba/nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs
223b5('dul ba): kyis yongasu bskor ba/yul 'khor srung ba ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskur ba/'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/mig mi bzangs ltar klu'i tsho
223b6('dul ba): kyis yongasu bskor bya/gnod sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor pa/thag bzongs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/brgya byin ltar sum cu
223b7('dul ba): nga'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/tshang pa ltar chang ris kyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/dbang po rnams shin tu dul ba/spyod lam dang spyod pa mi 'khrugs po/chu gtor ltar
224a1('dul ba): ting nge ba/sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs
224a2('dul ba): par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par mdzes pa/'od 'dom gang gos gzugs can brgyan po/nyi mo stong pas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/rin po che'i ri bo
224a3('dul ba): 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba/stobs bcu dang me 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum dang /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya
224a4('dul ba): dang /rlangs pa dang /ming chen dang /ma 'gags pa dang /shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu dang /'od srung dang /kun dga' bo dang /nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos tshon
224a5('dul ba): po dag dang gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos bskor te/ko'u sham bai ga la ba der rgyu zheng gshegs nas/mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ko'u sham bir
224a6('dul ba): byon to//de nas khyim bdag gdas can gyis gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa de/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul nas/'di
224a7('dul ba): ltar gnas bston dag gis kyang /bcom ldan 'das ko'u sha mo bin gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so zhes mdo sde'i mtha' nye bar sbyar to//de nas khyim bdag
224b1('dul ba): gdangs can bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la gtsug lag khang phul nas/dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/rang gi khyim du song ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa
224b2('dul ba): skul byed chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshalo ti mtha' gcig tu 'dug/mtha' gcig tu 'dug
224b3('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsel to//btsun pa gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa/rgyu ba'am/
224b4('dul ba): gnas pa'am/nyal ba'am/mnyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba/rdzas
224b5('dul ba): las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba phan yon che ba/snang ba che ba/rgyas pa che ba/gdag su rung ngam/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/
224b6('dul ba): skul byed rung ste/bskul byed bdun po 'di dag ni/gang dag dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba dang /gnas pa'am/nyal ba'am/mi nyal ba
224b7('dul ba): las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /bsod nasas 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba/rdzas sas byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin
225a1('dul ba): tu 'bras bu che ba phan yon che ba snang ba che ba rgyas pa che bdag yin te/bdun gang zhe na/skul byed 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas
225a2('dul ba): phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun pa kun dga'i ra ba 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni/skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa/rgyu ba
225a3('dul ba): 'am/gnas pa'am/nyal ba'am/mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang /bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba/
225a4('dul ba): rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba phan yon che ba snang ba che ba rgyas pa che ba dang po yi no//skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi
225a5('dul ba): bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/kun dga'i ra ba de nyid du/gtsug lag khang rtsig tu 'jug pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba
225a6('dul ba): 'am/gnas pa'am/nyal ba 'am/mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par/bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang /bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar
225a7('dul ba): skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba phan yon che ba/snang ba che ba rgyas pa che ba gnyis pa yino//skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am
225b1('dul ba): rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/gtsug lag khang de nyid du gnas mal 'di lta ste/khri dang khri'u dang /stan nang tshang can dang la ba dang /sngas dang gor bu dag 'bul bar byed pa 'di
225b2('dul ba): ni/skal byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan parku ba 'am gnas pa'am/nyal ba'am mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba'
225b3('dul ba): shig mngon par 'phel ba dang /bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba/rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'das bu che bo phan yon che ba/snang ba che ba rgyas pa che
225b4('dul ba): ba gsum pa yino//skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa/gtsug lag khang de nyid du gtan gyi rkyen rigs rje su 'thun pa'i mchod sngon 'bul
225b5('dul ba): ba byed pa 'di ni skal byed gang dong ldan na rigs ki bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgya ba'am/gnas pa'am/nyal ba 'am/mi nyal ba las rtog tu rgyan mi 'chad por bsod
225b6('dul ba): nams 'bang zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rjes las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba phan yon che ba snang ba che ba rgyas
225b7('dul ba): pa che ba bzhi pa yino//skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /'gro bar ches pa la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa 'di ni//
226a1('dul ba): skul byed gang dang ldan na//rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo drud pa dang ldan pa/rgyu ba'am gnas pa 'am/nyal ba'am/mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'cha
226a2('dul ba): par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon phyir 'phel ba dang /bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che bi phan yon tshe
226a3('dul ba): ba snang ba che ba rgyas pa che ba lnga pa yin no//skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/nad pa dang nad g.yog la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa 'di na
226a4('dul ba): sgra'i byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa/rgyu ba'am gnas pa'am/nyal ba'am mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams
226a5('dul ba): 'ba'o zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzus las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba phan yon che ba snang ba che ba
226a6('dul ba): rgyas pa che ba drug pa yino//skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/rlung longs pa'am/yul ngan byung ba'am/char bab pa 'am/lhag
226a7('dul ba): babyung ba gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i rlung langs pa'am/yul ngan byung ba'am char bab pa'am/lhags pa byung ba'i tshe/dge 'dun la 'bras can dag gam/skyo ma dag
226b1('dul ba): gram/thug pa'i gtung ba dag skyal te/'dris 'phags pa 'di dag lus mi rlan pa 'am/chos gos mi gsher ba dang /longs spyod na bde ba la reg par 'gyuraro snyam pas 'bul bar
226b2('dul ba): byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am gnas pa'am/nyal ba'am mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyu ni ma 'chad par bsod
226b3('dul ba): nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang /bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba phrin yon che ba/snang ba che
226b4('dul ba): ba/rgyas pa che ba bdun pa yin no//skul byed rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i bsod
226b5('dul ba): nams sam/bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am/bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus te/'di ltar bsod nams
226b6('dul ba): mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'o//skul byed 'di lta ste dper na gang du chu klung chen po lnga po 'di lta ste/gang+gA dang /ya mun dang /sa ra
226b7('dul ba): yu dang gnas can dang ma hi zhes bya ba tha ma dad par 'bab par 'gyur ba/de l-i ni chu'am/chu'i bum pa'am/chu'i bum pa brgya phrag ga mi/chu'i bum pa stong phrag gam/
227a1('dul ba): chu'i bum pa 'bum phrag gam+ba/chu'i bum pa 'bum phrag 'di snyed yod do zhes chu'i chud bzung bar mi nuso//srul byed de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am
227a2('dul ba): rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa/rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i bsod nams somabasod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/
227a3('dul ba): bsod nams kyi 'bras bu nem myur sbyin pa yang 'di tsa mo zhes bsod nams kyi tsha ga zung bar ma nus te/'di ltar bskyod nams mang ba'i phyir bskyod nams kyi
227a4('dul ba): chen po zhes bya ba'i glengasu 'gro'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa gang dang
227a5('dul ba): ldan na/rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa/rgyu ba'am/gnas pa'am/nyal ba'i ma mo nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chud par bsod nams
227a6('dul ba): 'be' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang /bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i ma lags pa'i bsod nams b+hA ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba
227a7('dul ba): paphan yon che ba snang ba che ba rgyas pa che ba gdag su rung ngam/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/skul byed rung ste/srul byed bdun po 'di dag ni gang dang ldan na//
227b1('dul ba): sa kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bla mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am glanas pa'am nyal ba'am mA N+Dal bA lAs rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phol ba dang /
227b2('dul ba): bsod nams 'bar shig bar skye bad+d+has las byung bam+b+ha yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i grwazhi shin+da tu 'bras bu che bu bAn yon che ba snang ba che ba rgyus pa ba dag yin te bdud
227b3('dul ba): grang zhe na/skul byed 'di la rigs kyi thu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/de bzhin gshigs pa'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos grong tshigs ga ge mo zhi ga
227b4('dul ba): nanye bar brten rnying po zhugs pa zlos shong thos nas kyang dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang
227b5('dul ba): ldan na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am gnas pa'am nyalta ba'am mi nyal ba lngas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'bo'i shig mngon par 'phel ba
227b6('dul ba): da /bsod+ma nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye/rjes las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams kyu ba'i gAzhi shi y-i m+b+hi snang chen rgyas pa che ba dang po yino//sbrul byed
227b7('dul ba): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa deng ldan pas/de bzhin gshegs pa'amo/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ni thos de nyid tshur gshegs par rtsol bar thos ni rje
228a1('dul ba): thos nas kyang dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni/skul byed gang dang ldan na/
228a2('dul ba): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am gnas pa'am nyal ba 'am mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba
228a3('dul ba): dang /bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzus las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba phan yon che ba snang ba che ba rgyas pa che ba gnyis pa yino//
228a4('dul ba): skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/de bzhin gshegs pa'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid shul du zhugs pa thos shing
228a5('dul ba): thos nas kyang dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni/skul byed gang dang ldan ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
228a6('dul ba): dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/gnas pa 'am nyal ba'am mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /bsod nams 'ba' zhig
228a7('dul ba): nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba phan yon che ba snang ba che ba/rgyas pa che ba gsum pa yi no//skul byed gzhan yang rigs
228b1('dul ba): skyemam rigs kyi bum da da ldan pas/de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/da na gshegs pa'i nyan thos da gang tshigs de du ston par zas shang zas nas kyang dga' ba dang /
228b2('dul ba): mchog tu dga' ba chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa zab par byed pa 'di ni/sul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/gnas pa
228b3('dul ba): ma/nyal ba'am mi nyal ba rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad per bsod nams 'bra' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang /bsod nams 'ba' zhig hi bar skye brda se las byung ba ma yin pa'i
228b4('dul ba): bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba phan yon che ba/snang ba che ba/rgyas pa che ba bzhi pa yin//skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan
228b5('dul ba): pas/de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro zhing /mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang /mchog tu
228b6('dul ba): dpa' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa zab par byed pa 'di ni/skul byed gang du nga ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am//rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am//gnas pa ma/
228b7('dul ba): nyal ba'am mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba'i zhag mngon par 'phel ba dang /bsod nams 'ba' zhig nyo bar skye ba/rjes la sa byung ba ma yin pa
229a1('dul ba): bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba phan yon che 'u/snang ba che ba/rgyus pa che ba lnga pa yino//skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am ri
229a2('dul ba): kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/de bzhin gshegs pa'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid kyi drung nas/chos tshangs par spyod pa/thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/
229a3('dul ba): mar dge ba/do ni bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/yongasu rdzogs pa/yongasu dag pa/yong su byang ba/yang dag par rab tu ston pa nyan cing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang /
229a4('dul ba): mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa/thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/
229a5('dul ba): gnas pa'am nyal ba'am mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye ba skye ba/rdzas las
229a6('dul ba): byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba phan yon che ba snang ba che ba/rgyas pa che ba drug pa yino//skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
229a7('dul ba): kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/de bzhin gshegs pa'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid kyi drung nas/chos thos nas sangs rgyas la skyabasu 'gro/chos dang dge
229b1('dul ba): 'dun la skyab su 'gro zhing bslab pa'i gzhi dgra len par byed pa 'di ni/skul byed rigs kyi 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am gnas pa'am nyal bya 'am/mi ny+dza lA ba lngas rtag
229b2('dul ba): tu rgyun mo 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba/rjes las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu
229b3('dul ba): 'bras bu che ba phan yon che ba snang ba che ba/rgyas pa che ba bdun pa yino//skul byed rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu
229b4('dul ba): 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni 'di tsa mo zhes bsod nams kyi tshad bzung
229b5('dul ba): bA mi nus te/'di ltar bsod nams meng pa'i phyir/bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'o//skul byed 'di lta ste dper ni/gang du chu klung chen po lnga po 'di lta ste gAm ga/
229b6('dul ba): dang /ya mun dang sa ra yu dang gnas can dang /ma hi zhes bya ba dag tha mi dad par 'bab par 'gyur pa de la nI/chu 'am chu'i bum pa'am/chu'i bum pa brgya phreg gam/chu'i bum
229b7('dul ba): pa stong phrag gam/chu'i bum pa 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhes chu'i tshad bzung bar mi nus te/'di ltar chu mang ba'i phyir chu'i phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'o//
230a1('dul ba): skul byed de bzhin du rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan
230a2('dul ba): pa'i bsod nams sam/bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am/bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang 'di tsa mo zhes tshad bzung bar mi nus te/'di ltar bsod nams
230a3('dul ba): mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grang su 'gro'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te//bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsung nas/ston
230a4('dul ba): pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//mi dang ri dgas tshegs kyi bsten pa yi//chu klung tha dad 'bab par gyur pa dag/mtsho mchog bkra shis gtsang ma dogs bdi
230a5('dul ba): ba//rin chen 'byung gnas rgya mtshor 'bab pa ltar//de bzhin bsod nam sa rgyun kyang rnam kun tu//sbyin bdag gos sbyin zas sbyin skom sbyin pa dang //mel cha stan dang
230a6('dul ba): gding sbyin mi la 'bab//chu klung chu 'bab rgya mtsho ra ji bzhi no//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ce so bka' stsal naso//tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po/bcom ldan
230a7('dul ba): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//de nas khyim bdag mdangs can ni dad pa dang ldan la/de'i 'khor ni ma dad nas des bsams pa bdag gi 'khor 'di ma dad/
230b1('dul ba): na bdag gi gtsug lag khang du ji ltar spyod pa brtag go snyam nas/des cha lugs mi mngon par byas te sham thabs dma' bar bgos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste/tshigasu bcad
230b2('dul ba): pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tsho lnga nas//gtsug lag khang du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /rgan zhugs shig sgo khang na 'dug nas/des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te
230b3('dul ba): smras pa/'phags pa gtsug lag khang snying dang mig 'phrog par bgyid pa/mtho ris kyi them ska su gyur pa 'di su'i lags/des smras pa/khyim bdag gdongs can gyi'o//
230b4('dul ba): 'phags pa ci 'di gtsug lag khang legs sam 'on te/phongs pa lags/bzhin bzangs gtsug lag khang ni ji lta bu phongs pa ni ji lta bu 'phags pa gang na yo byad phun
230b5('dul ba): sum tshogs pa ni gtsug lag khang lag la/gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni phongs pa lagaso//bzhin bzangs 'di phongs pa yin no//ji ltar gyur khyim bdag de ni dad pa dang
230b6('dul ba): ldan pa yin na/de'i 'khor ma dad pas mkho ba mi stobaso//'di ltar khyim bdag de la bu mo mngag zhugs ma mgu byed ces bya ba dad pa dang ldan zhing bzod la dge ba'i bsam pa
230b7('dul ba): can zhig yod na/'on kyang de khyim de na dbang med de gal te de la dbang yod par gyur na/de dge slong rnams la mkho ba stobs par byed pas 'di gtsug lag khang du 'gyur ro//khyim
231a1('dul ba): bdag gdangs can gyis bsams pa/da ltar bdag gson pa nyid na yang bdag gi btsug lag khang na dge slong rnams kyi gnas skabs 'di 'dra na/
231a2('dul ba): bdag shi na ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam du rig nas dge slong de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/rung gi khyim du song nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/khyed cag las grang sangs rgyas la sogs
231a3('dul ba): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par spro ba des tshul bzhi ni long shig/de'i tshe na mgu byed bum pa thogs te chu bcu pa'i phyir byung ba dang /des der ras ma zhig rnyed nas//
231a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyang de la phan gradags po'i slad du phyogs der gshegs pa dang /des bcom ldan 'das la brtag par brtsamaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis na
231a5('dul ba): bza' chos gos kyi grwa rdol bar de la bstan pA la/des bsams pa/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi rus ma 'di bzhe su gnang na/bdag gis 'dri bcom ldan 'das
231a6('dul ba): la dbulo snyam//bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/mgu byed gal te khyod kyi yongasu btang na phul cig/des bcom ldan 'das
231a7('dul ba): la sems mngon par dad par byas nas gus pa bskyed de phu'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de de nyid kyi mdun du na bza' chos gos grA klan te/
231b1('dul ba): btsems pa dang kha dog 'thun par gyur to//de dud pa skyes nas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dran mor ma gyur cig/dbul bar ma
231b2('dul ba): gyur cig ces smras nas bum pa chus bkang ste/khyim du song //khyim bdag gdangs can gyis nang mi la tshul bzhin brims pa dang /mgu byed kyis smras pa/khyim bdag 'di
231b3('dul ba): ci lags/gdangs can gyis smras pa/mgu byed khyed cag lasau gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dren la bsnyen bkur byed par spro ba des tshul shing long shig
231b4('dul ba): dang /kho bo la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod do//des myur ba myur bar chu'i bum pa bzhag ste/tshul shing blangs nas smras pa/bdag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
231b5('dul ba): skyong gi dge 'dun la bstod bkur bgyidra par spro ste/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi yis//
231b6('dul ba): khyod thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig ces des/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs te gus par bsnyen bkur bya bar
231b7('dul ba): brtsamaso//khyim bdag gdangs can gyis yang cha lugs mi mngon par byas te/sham thabs dma' bar bgos nas/gtsug lag khang du song ste/tshigasu bcad pa'i
232a1('dul ba): dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas/gtsug lag khang du mjug par brtsams pa dang /yang rgan zhugs gzhan zhig sgo khang 'dug nas//
232a2('dul ba): des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smos pa/'phags pa gtsug lag khang snying dang mig 'phrog par bgyid pas mtho ris kyi them skasu gyur pa 'di su'i lags/des smras pa/
232a3('dul ba): khyim bdag gdangs can gyi'o//'phags pa ci 'di gtsug lag khang lags sam/'on te phongs pa lags/bzhin bzangs gtsug lag khang ni ji lta bu/phongs pa ni ji
232a4('dul ba): lto bu/'phags pa gang na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni gtsug lag khang lags la/gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni phongs pa lagaso//bzhin bzangs 'di sngon ni poras
232a5('dul ba): pAr gyur pa lags/da ni gtsug lag khang du gyur to//ji ltar gyur/bzhin bzangs khyim bdag gdangs can la bu mo mngag zhug ma mgu byed ces bya ba dad pa dang ldan
232a6('dul ba): zhing bzang laM dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig yod pa/de khyim bdag des 'drir la su bskos te/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
232a7('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs shig ces bsgo nas/da ltar de sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bcur
232b1('dul ba): byed pas des nA/'di gtsug lag khang yin te phongs pa ma yino//khyim bdag gadrangs can gyis zos nas/shin tu dga' ste khyim du sod nas/des bu mo mgu byed kyi lag tu
232b2('dul ba): ldi mig dang lde mig kyog po gtad nas/nang mi rnams la smras pa/khyed cig mgu byed kyis ci byin pa des gan+d+ha b+hA gyis shig/ko'u shom bi ni gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyang
232b3('dul ba): bsdus te smras pa/shes ldan dag kho bos bu mo mgu byed 'di bran mo las byung ste/khyim gyi bdag mor bcugo zhes bsgrag so//dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas the tsom thams cad
232b4('dul ba): gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa khyim bdag gdangs can rgyal po shar pas gdangs las 'tshal ba la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
232b5('dul ba): stsal pa/dge slong drag da ltar du ma zad de/'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang /khyim bdag gdangs can 'di rgyal po shar pas gdangs las shes par gyur te nyon cig/dge slong
232b6('dul ba): dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA ra Na si na/rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa/skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/thab mo dang 'thab pa dang /phyi
232b7('dul ba): dgra dang nang 'khrug rab tu zhi ba/chom rkun dang /mu gau dang nad dang bral ba/sa lu dang /bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /bo lang dang /ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste/chos
233a1('dul ba): dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcugo/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ltas pa dag gis lo bcu gnyi su chur mi 'bab par lung
233a2('dul ba): bstan nas/rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis rang gi yul du dril bsgrag pa byed du bcug ste/phyogasu bsgo ba/de'i yul na gnas pa dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi dag nyon cig/ltas
233a3('dul ba): pa dag gis lo bcu gnyi su tshor mi 'bab par lung bstan gyis/de'i phyir khyed cag las gang dag la lo bcu gnyis kyi zan bdog pa de dag gis ni 'khod par bya'o//gang dag
233a4('dul ba): la mi bdog pa de dag gis ni gzhan du 'dong bar bya zhing lo bcu gnyis 'das nas phyir 'ong bar bya'o//de'i tshe na bA ra na se na/khyim bdag gzungs byed ces bya ba phyug pa/nor
233a5('dul ba): mang ba longs spyod che ba/yongasu bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba zhig 'dug pa des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/kA'e nang rje mdzod pa kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi
233a6('dul ba): zan yod dam/des smras pa/jo bo mchi so//sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang bkren pa la rjesu snying brtse ba/bas mtha'i gnas mal la
233a7('dul ba): dga' ba/bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnasu gyur pa dag 'jig rtenA du byung //ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na/bA ra Na sir
233b1('dul ba): phyin nas de dag khyim bdag gzung byed kyi gan du dong du phyin nas/smras pa/khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la lo bcu gnyisu mkho ba stobs par nus sam//des
233b2('dul ba): smras pa/'phags pa dag ji mdzod pa la rmas te/slad kyis gsol zhes/des mdzad pa pos te smras pa/kwa'e'i nang rje mdzad pa/kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /rab tu byung ba lnga
233b3('dul ba): brgya po 'di dag gi lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/des smras pa/jo bo mchi so//khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa/'phags pa dag
233b4('dul ba): mchis kyis bzhugs shig dang gsol lo//de dag der 'khod do//ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas gzhan lnga brgya ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na/bA ra Na ser phyin nas de dag kyang khyim
233b5('dul ba): bdag gzungs byed kyi gan du dong ste phyin nas smras pa/khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la lo bcu gnyi su mkho bas stobs par nus sam des smras po/
233b6('dul ba): 'phags pa dag khyed la gsol logs na/ci'i slad du yang sgrub par mdzad/khyim bdag de dag kyang gzhan kho bo cag kyang gzhano//'phags pa dag je mdzod pa la rmas te/
233b7('dul ba): slad kyis gsol lo zhes des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /rab tu byung ba stong go lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/des smras pa jo
234a1('dul ba): bo mchis so//khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa/'phags pa dag mchis kyis bzhugs shig dang gsol//de
234a2('dul ba): dag kyang der 'khod do//khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis sbyin pa'i khang po brtsig tu bcug ste/sbyin pa'i zhal tA pa'i mi dag dang spyan 'dren bskos nas/spyan 'dren des nyi ma re re zhing
234a3('dul ba): song ste/gdugs tshod la 'bod par byed do//spyan 'dren des khyi zhig gsos pa de nyi ma re re zhing spyan 'dren de dang lhan cig 'phro bar byed do//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na spyan
234a4('dul ba): 'dren de la brel ba zhig byung nas/de ji 'di bsgrubs te phyis spyan drang bar bya'o snyam nas de gzhon du song ba dang khyi des de ma rnyed nas/sngon goms pas rang sangs rgyas rnams
234a5('dul ba): kyi gan du song ba dang /der yang de ma mthong nas des skad phyung ngo //rang sangs rgyas de dag gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gang yin pa des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag spyan
234a6('dul ba): 'dren dus las yol nas phyi 'dis spyan drangs kyis tshur spyon bzhud do//de ltar bgyi'o zhes de dag 'phags pa dang /sman 'dren 'ongs te khyi des de mthong nas skad dbyung bar
234a7('dul ba): brtsams pa dang /spyan 'dren gyis bsams pa/'dis 'di dag spyan drangs pas des na bdag nyid chen po 'di dag byon gor ma chag snyam du rig nas smras pa/'phags pa
234b1('dul ba): dag khyed sus spyan drangs/de dag gis smras pa/bzhin bzangs khyi 'di so//des smras pa/'phags pa dag ma nongs kyis kyang gang gi tshe bdag brel ba 'ga' zhig byung ba de'i tshe na 'di
234b2('dul ba): nyid khyed spyan 'dren par 'gyur gyis khyed cag gshegasu gsol/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gzungs byed gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yino//de'i tshe de'i dus na mdzod pa
234b3('dul ba): gang yin po de ni khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yino//de'i tshe de'i dus na spyan 'dren pa gang yin pa de ni bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa yin//de'i tshe de'i dus na khyi gang yin pa de ni khyim
234b4('dul ba): bdag gdangs can yin te/khyim bdag gdangos can 'di de'i tshe yang rgyal po shar bas gdangs las shes par gyur la/da ltar yang 'di des gdangs las sheso//rgyal po
234b5('dul ba): gzugs can snying po'i gan du mi stong thub cing 'ongs nas/rgyal pos de la smras pa/kwa'e nang rje khyod su yin/des smras pa/lha bdag stong thub la gso rgyal pos blon po rnams la
234b6('dul ba): bsgo ba/shes ldan dag stong thub la 'tsho ba byin cig/de dag gis de la 'tsho ba byin no//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mu ga d+har byung ba'i rgyal po gzo skye sa gzugs can
234b7('dul ba): snying po lha brgyad khri dang /ma ge d+ha pa'i bram zo dang /'bum dag 'bum phrag du ma dog lhan cig bden pa dag la bzhag pa de'i tshe na//des rgyal po'i khab tu dril bsgrag pa byed
235a1('dul ba): du bcug ste bsgob/rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye ba'i tshogs shes ldan dag nyon
235a2('dul ba): cig/'i yul du sus kyang rkun mi mi bya'o//nga'i yul du gang rkun mo byed pa de/ngas yul med par bya zhing brkus pa rnams kyi nor ni/rang gi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin zhes bska
235a3('dul ba): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kau sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsol rgyal gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdos btul ba de'i tshe na/des kyang mnyan yod du dril bsgrag po byed du bcug
235a4('dul ba): ste bsgo ba/nga'i yul du sus kyang rkun mo mi bya'o//nga'i yul du rkun po byed pa de ngas bsad par bya zhing brkus pa rnams kyi nor ni nga rang gi mdzod dang bde ba nas sbyin zhes
235a5('dul ba): bsgo'o//bar du yul ma gau d+hi na gnas pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang /yul ko sa la na gnas pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa de dag mtshams kyis par
235a6('dul ba): du dong cing 'khod cing /yul ma ga d+ha nas don 'thun gang drag 'ong ba de dag kyang 'joms par byed/yul ko sa la nas don 'thun gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyang 'joms
235a7('dul ba): bar byed nas/thams cad du yul ma ga d+ha na 'khod pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang /yul ko sa la na 'khod pa'i tshem rkun pa gang dag yin pa de dag mtshan
235b1('dul ba): kyi bar du dong ste/'khod cing don 'thun 'joms par byed pas/don 'thun 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rgyun chud de/rgyal po'i dpyang dang lo thang mi 'dra'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i sgra grags par gyur/
235b2('dul ba): ta//rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de thos nas/ru gaM cig btang na de becom zhing rab tu btsom te phyir 'ongs//de bzhin du ru gnyis pa dang ru gsum pa btang na dro yang bcom
235b3('dul ba): zhing rab tu bcom ste phyir 'ongs//ji tsam na yul ma ga d+ha nas don 'thun ko sa lar 'phags pa de chom rkun las 'jigs pas rgyal po ni khab tu zhugs te/sel ba tshol
235b4('dul ba): bar byed nas/blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/lha stong thub 'di lha'i 'tsho bas 'tshan/ci'i slad du de na 'thun gyi bsel mi bgyid /rgyal pos smras pa/de 'gro la
235b5('dul ba): ngag go tho shig/blon po rnams kyis de bos te smras pa/kA'e nang rje khyed rgyal po'i 'tsho bas 'tsho ba ci'i phyir rgyal po'i bka' bzhin mi byed des smras pa//khyed kyis bsgo ba gang
235b6('dul ba): zhig kho bos ma byis na de skad du spyo bar byed/de dag gis smras pa/don 'thun 'di yul ko sa lar 'gros 'di'i byasel gyis shig des smras pa/ma nyos kyis de ltar bya'o//
235b7('dul ba): zhes des mda' lnga brgya pa'i dong pa gnyis thogs te shing rtar zhugs nas don 'thun gyi mdun du 'phogaso//chom rkun pa rnams kyis/de don 'thun gyi mdun nas 'ong ba
236a1('dul ba): thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas de la pho nya btang ste bsgo ba/chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon na re/shing rta phyir zlog shig/gnod pa thob par gyur ta
236a2('dul ba): re zhes ze'o//des smras pa/dpa' bo la dpa' bos yongasu spang ba byin cig/chom rkun pa'i pho nyas smras pa/ci khyod gcig pu dpa' bo yin nam/kho bo cag kyang dpa'
236a3('dul ba): bo yin gyis phyir log shig/de nas phan tshun mda' kha dgye bar brtsams nas/des chom rkun pa'i pho nya'o//gan du bskum nas de'i phyir logo//de bzhin du chom
236a4('dul ba): rkun pa gnyis dang /bzhi dang /brgyad dang /bcu drug dang /sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /drug cu rtsa bzhi nas/tshim rkun pa lnga brgya'i bar dag lhags nas/des de dag
236a5('dul ba): g+ha gnang du bsnun nas de dag phyir log/chom rkun pa gzhan lnga brgya lhags nas des de dag la smras pa/des khyod kyi chom rkun pa lnga brgya bsad nas khyed cag kyang
236a6('dul ba): srog gis 'gebs par mi 'dod dam ci'i phyir log shig/chom rkun pa rnams kyis smras pa/nged kyis gcig kyang ma sod na ci'i phyir nged phyir ldog khyod kyang
236a7('dul ba): rung nged kyang rung //des smras pa/gal te khyod cag yid mi ches na/gang dag ngas bstan pa de dag gi go phud cig/de dag gis go dpung par brtsams pa dang /gang
236b1('dul ba): gos d+mo sbya ga 'byung 'di de ltar dus la thub nas/chom rgan pa de dag mo 'di na gnod sbyin zhig zhes byung de dong ngo //stong thub mtshams kyi bar na 'dug cing /de don 'thun
236b2('dul ba): yul ko sa~M la nas ring ba gang yin pa de'i bsil yang byed/yul mA ga d+ha nas 'a bri gong min pa de'i bsil yang byed de//des bsams pa bdag gis ci'i phyir pa 'gro
236b3('dul ba): dzA k+sha Sh+Ta di nyid du 'dug bar+ya stem nas sa khyim brtsigs kyi/dug nas don 'thun ga nyi ga de hU~M sman sa spyi gyur k+She zlog na gnas pa yin pa so/
236b4('dul ba): ga nas 'brog gnas zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to///dul ba rnam par 'byed pa//bram po den bzhi pa/'brog gnasu don 'thun dag lhags nas/
236b5('dul ba): kha cig gis ni 'bras btsongs par brtsams so//kha cig gis ni phye btsong par byartsams/kha ci go gis ni be reg/kha cig gis ni khukha cig gis ni lu btsong bar brtsam
236b6('dul ba): go/rmA tshad dag kyis kyang chang 'tshang bar brtsams te/nyid du 'khod nas der tshud dus chags par gyur te//'dug gnas kyis rgyal po glazugs can snang ba phyin mig
236b7('dul ba): bdag gis 'dir tshong 'dus btsugs kyis/lhas 'dir zhal lta bting ba'i rigaso zhes spring //rgyal pos bsems pa/gang du bdag gi ru gsum bcom zhing rab tu bcom
237a1('dul ba): zhing 'ongs pa der des tshong 'dus btsugs pas de ni de nyid kyir gyur cig snyam nas des de la phrin yig ngas tshong dus de khyod la byin gyis der dpya dang
237a2('dul ba): lo thang ci 'du ba de dag khyod nyid ci dgar spyod cig ces spring ngo //'brog gan su tshong 'dus btsugs nas/'brog gnas 'brog gnas shes bya ba'i ming du gyur to//'brog gnas
237a3('dul ba): na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bsams pa/shes ldan dag bdag cag gang cung zad bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa de thams cad 'brog gnas kyi mthu yin pas
237a4('dul ba): bdag cag gis 'di la phan pa cung zad bya gor ma chag snyamo//de na kha cig gis smras pa/ma nyes kyis de bzhin bya'o//ci zhig bya/da na kha cig gis smras pa/bdag cag las gang
237a5('dul ba): su yang rung ba bag ma gtong ba'am/bag ma len pa des de 'khor dang bcas pa zan sbyin zhing gos phrags re yang skon par bya'o//ma nyes kyis de ltar bya'o zhes de dag las gang
237a6('dul ba): bag ma gtong ba'am/bag ma len pa des 'brog gnas 'khor dang bcas pa zan sbyin zhing gros phrugs re skon par byed do//ji tsam na mi dbul po zhagri bog ma len du nye nas de 'di
237a7('dul ba): snyam du sems te//bdag la 'brog gnas 'khor dang bcas pa la zon sbyin zhing gos phrugs re skon po'i 'byor pa ga la yod kyis 'di ltar bdag gis bag mad
237b1('dul ba): blangs nas dang po kho nar 'brog gnas la dga' dgur spyod du phu lo//des dga' dgur spyad par bya'o snyam du rig nas/de 'brog gnas kyi gan du song ste mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/
237b2('dul ba): grong dpon bdag bag ma len du nye na/bdag la khyed 'khor dang bcas pa bshos gsol zhing na bza' phrugs raM gsol ba'i 'byor pa ma mchis kyis/'di ltar bdag gis bag ma de
237b3('dul ba): blangs nas/dang po kho nar khyod la dag dgur spyod du 'bul gyis/khyod kyis dga' dgur spyad nas de'i 'og tu bdag gis spyad par bgyi'o//'brog gnas kyis smras pa/kwa'e nang rje
237b4('dul ba): gang yang rung ba bag ma len pa'am/bag ma gtong ba de thams cad kyis kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa zan sbyin zhing gos phrugs re skon mi dgos kyis khyod bdag song la/bag yongasu
237b5('dul ba): ngag ma long shig/gong dpon de lta lags mod kyi 'on kyang bdag 'di ltar dgas dang du bzhes shig/bude mod kyi yul ni debang po rnams 'phrog cing don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba yin
237b6('dul ba): pas 'brog gnas kyis dang du blangs//des kyang bag ma blangs nas dang po kho nar 'brog gnas la phul nas des kyang dga' dgur spyad do//'brog gnas 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis
237b7('dul ba): lhag par chags pas/mi de la byams par bya bar brtsam so//gzhan zhig gis de la smras pa/kwa'e nang rje khyod la 'brog gnas te bor byams par gyur pa 'di la rgyu ci yod//des
238a1('dul ba): ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /des kyang de bzhin bya bar brtsam so//gzhan zhig gis de la dris pa dang /des kyang dem ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang des kyang de bzhin bya
238a2('dul ba): bar brtsamamo//gzhan zhig gis kyang de la dris pa dang /des kyang de la ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa nas/des kyang de bzhin bya bar brtsams te/de lta bu'i tshul gyis den dam pa ma yin pa'i chos
238a3('dul ba): 'phel bar gyur to//'brog gnas kyi tshong 'dus der lha khang brtsig tu bcug nas de na gang yang rung bas bag ma blangs pa des bu mo de lha khang de bskor du bcug nas 'brog gnas kyi
238a4('dul ba): gan du gtong zhing /'breg gnas kyis de dang por dga' dgur spyod pa byed do//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gzhin nu ma chen mo zhig bya'o snyam nas/des ji tsam nas phyogs
238a5('dul ba): shig tu skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa de/log su kha ltas te sgren mor byung nas gci na rgyud byas pa dang /skya bo bral po che'i tshogs kyis de mthong nas
238a6('dul ba): de dag mo dga' bar sems par gyur te smras pa/bu mo de tshe dang //khrel med pa skye bo phal po che'i tshogs la mdun gyis phyogs te sgron mor byung nas gcin rgyang byed pa 'di su'i
238a7('dul ba): bu mo das de mthong nas smras pa/khyod cig kyang po yin nam/'o na nged cag ci yin/khyed cag pho ma yin gyi 'breg gnas 'ba'o zhig pho yin pas/des khyod kyis chung rma
238b1('dul ba): blo mo cog dang dga' dkur spyad de/khyed cag de'i mi gtsang ba 'khru bar byed do//de dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag 'dis bdag cag gnas su spyos na/'di la bdag cag gis ji ltar
238b2('dul ba): bsgrub par bye/de ni kha cig gis smras pa/'di la gzhan bsgrubs de ci yad 'brog gnas bsad par bya'o//gzhan dag gis smras pa/de ji ltar bsad par bya ba dpyad par bya'o zhes de
238b3('dul ba): dag de ltar gos byed pa na/khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis rdzing bu 'bul nye bar gyur nas/de dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gis rdzing bu 'bul bar nye
238b4('dul ba): bar gyur pas/der de mgron du bos pa'i tshe gsad par bya'o//ji tsam na khyim bdag des rdzing bu 'bul ba'i tshe mgon du nges pa dang dos kyang dang du sa so//rgyal po gzur can snying pos dril
238b5('dul ba): bsgrag pa byed du bcug ste/phyogasu bsgo ba nga'i yul du dge slong glang la lo zhig 'ong bar gyur na de gal te nga'i mdzod dang khyim na bza' ba dang btung ba yod na/zan sbyin par bya'o//
238b6('dul ba): gal te myong ni lus mthong ba rang gi byin cig dang /phyis bsnyen pa nyis gyur du byon zhes btsigs yig tu yang bris te bzhogo//bar du tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi
238b7('dul ba): bu chen po gnyis ma ga d+ha dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong pa na/'breg gnas su phyin to//tshong dpon 'brog gnas kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis
239a1('dul ba): ma ga d+ha dag tu rgyu zhing 'dong pa na/'brog gan su phyin ces thos so//thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/rgyal po gzugs can snying po de bsod
239a2('dul ba): nams dag gis ngoms mi myong bas sbyin pa dag sbyin bsod nams dag byed na/bdag gis kyang ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi byin/bsod nams dag mi bya snyam du rig nas/
239a3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgol gyi bu chen po gnyis ga la bo der song ste phyin nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du
239a4('dul ba): 'dug/de gnyis kyis de la chos bstan nas/des de gnyis bsod snyoms la bos te zan byin//khyim bdag des 'brog gnas g.yar 'dren gyis bos pa dang /des yon
239a5('dul ba): bshad pa ma mnyan pa kho nar rdzing bu 'bul bar song ngo //'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang brda byas te mtshon thogs nas/der dong de dag gis 'brog
239a6('dul ba): gnas rdzing bur zhugs pa dang /skra bkru'o//zhes 'gyur byed tsha ba mgor blugs nas mig chu 'dzag par gyur te/cung zad kyang mthong ba dang de nas de'i steng du 'khor lo dang /
239a7('dul ba): rdo rje rtse gcig dang /mda' bo dang /mtshon rtse gcig po la sogs pa'i mtshon dag 'phang bar brtsams te de gsad par bshams pa na/des smras pa/shes ldan dag
239b1('dul ba): kho bos khyed la nyes pa ci byas/de dag gis smras pa/khyod kyis kho ba cag gi bag mA dang por dga' dgur spyad cing phyis kha bo cag gis spyod//des smras pa/khyed cag nyid kyis
239b2('dul ba): dam pa mo yin pa'i chos 'di phyung bas 'di la kho bos ci nyes ma gsang bar thong shig/de dag gis de ltar sha gas 'debs bzhin du bsad par brtsams pa dang /des srog dang
239b3('dul ba): 'bral khar gnad 'chad ka dang /tshigs 'grol kar sems bskyed de smon lam btab pa/bdag gis 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po lha dang mis mchod
239b4('dul ba): pa gnyis la bsod snyoms phul ba'i dge ba'i rtse ba des bdag gang du 'di dag gsod par 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig ces bta'o//chos nyid kyi na mar 'dro ba'i dus kyi tshe na/
239b5('dul ba): smon lam ldog pa btab pa de ni myur du 'grub pa yin pa des smon lam log pa btab ste/shi zhing dus lo bab nas gnod sbyin gdug pa rnams kyi nang du skye so//de nas de gnas 'dod
239b6('dul ba): par rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i gan du song ste smras pa/bzod ldan bdag la gnas stsol cig/des smras pa 'brog gnas khyod kyi gnas 'brog gi nus de nyid yin gyis
239b7('dul ba): song shig/de 'brog gan su 'ongs nas mi des byung ste/skye bo mang po shi bar gyur nas/khri dang khrir 'dom par byaso//'brog gnos na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis lus pa
240a1('dul ba): dag bkug ste dris pa/shes ldan dag gang gi phyir 'di lta bu'i yams byung bar gyur pa 'di la rgyu ci yod de dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag khyed kyis
240a2('dul ba): 'brog gnas gsad pa gang yin pa des smon lam btab pas/gnod sbyin gdug pa rnams kyi nang du skyes te/des 'di lta bu'i yams phyung //de dag gis shing rta dang bcas te
240a3('dul ba): 'bros par brtsams pa dang /des kyang 'jigs pa dang /'jig su rung ba chen por bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas 'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'bros pa'i
240a4('dul ba): mdun du 'dug ste smras pa/gar 'dod der deng khyed thams cad bza'o//de dag kun tu skrag par gyur te smras pa/grong dpon bdag cag sdig pa byed pa rnams la bzod pa
240a5('dul ba): mdzod cig/des smras pa/dam tshig gis bzod par bya ste/gal te nga la nyi ma raM re zhing mi stong stong 'bul na bzod do//de dag gis smras pa/grong dpon gal te khyod la
240a6('dul ba): nyi ma re re bzhin mi stong stong phul na ring por mi thogs par 'brog gnas mi snang bar 'gyur gyis/dang na dus 'di thong la bdag cag phyag 'tshal ba rnams la bzod pa
240a7('dul ba): mdzod cig/des smras pa shes ldan dag kho bo yun ring po nas smon pa/kye ma 'brog ga nas 'di mi snang par gyur cig sngam mod kyi/'on kyang kho bo la nyi ma re re zhing mi lnga
240b1('dul ba): brgya phul cig dang bzod par bya'o//de dag gis yang de bzhin gsol nas/des kyang mi nyis brgya lnga bcu dang brgya'i bar du phul cig ces smra so//de dag gis smras pa/glong dpon de
240b2('dul ba): lta na yang bdag cag nyams par gyur gyis/mang po'i ci bya/bdag cag gis khyod la nyi ma re re zhing ba lang dug dang ldan pa'i shing rta zas kyi bkang ba dang /de khrid pa'i mi gcig
240b3('dul ba): dbul gyis bzod par mdzod cig/des smras pa/de rung gis 'di ltar khyed kyis ngu ba dag gis dbul bar mi bya bar bro dang glu dang sil spyan gyi sgras dbul bar bya'o//de dag gis
240b4('dul ba): kyang khas blang so//de nas 'brog na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad 'dus te gros byas par brtsams pa/shes ldan dge gnod sbyin gyi bdag cag gnas skabs de ltar byas
240b5('dul ba): na 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/de na kha cig gis smras pa/res kyi res kyis dbul bar bya'o//kha cig gis smras pa/gang la res bab par gyur pa de la brjod pa na/'khrug
240b6('dul ba): ba skye bar 'gyur gyis/'di ltar khyim byang bris te rdza mar bcug la/gang gi khyim byang byung ba de 'gro bar bya ste/des kyang mi tshal za dag mi btang bar bdag nyid 'gro bar bya ba
240b7('dul ba): 'am/bu btang bar bya'o//gang la bral ba byung ste mi 'dus pa de la bab na de'i khyim du khyim byang dpyid ste bo zhig/de'i tshe na 'brog gnas na khyim bdag zhag 'dug pa de la bu
241a1('dul ba): med nas yun ring po nas/ mya bdag la du yod par gyur cig ces smyon nas/sgras dbang gis de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to//dmA dA
241a2('dul ba): bcing ba'i dus kyi tshe khyim bdag de bya ba zhig la phyi rol tu byung ba dang /de'i nyon mo de la gnid sbyin la gtor ma sbyin pa'i khyim byad byung nas/des ras sbron par bskos pa'i rtse
241a3('dul ba): dag gis de'i khyim sgor dpyangs te bzhago/skabs dor chung med bcas pa las khye'u zhig byung //ji tsam na khyim po dag de phyir 'ongs pa dang /des khyim du 'jug khar khyim byang
241a4('dul ba): des nga mthong nas/de sdug bsngal zhing yang mi bde bar gyur te/khyim du zhugs nas cang mi smra bar 'du'o//chung mas de la smras pa/rje'i sras dgyes pa bskyed cig khyod kyi sras
241a5('dul ba): blta mo//de lta na yang cing mi smra ba kho nar 'dug/chung ma des lan gsum gyis bar du de skad smras kyang cing mi smra ba kho nar 'dug nas yang chung mas smras pa/rje'i sras khyod yun
241a6('dul ba): ring po nas kye ma bdag la bu yid par gyur cig ces smon pa gang lags bya de da be man ci'i slad du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs mchog tu dgyes pa bskyed cig/des smras pa
241a7('dul ba): bzang mo 'di ni skyes na kho bo ni ma skyes/kau rje'i sras ci nings/bzang mo gnod sbyin la gtor ma de ngul ba'i phyir khyim byed 'angs//'i sras gal te de ston khyod kyi sras
