319b4('dul ba): nA/de sa na/ud tsam zhig 'chag phyisak+Sh+ma yA m+b+ha rtag cig ra//sbrul bdug pa myur du khyab par byud pangs pa sems hUM/ 'dag le 'cha'i semams
319b5('dul ba): des k+She ng+ya te drug/dzi ts+tshamAn yang du smras chog cing khri m+bu cag drug myur nas/des de'i du la po ba rlung ste/spyod la de nyid kyis shi zhing dus lnga baban ste/
319b6('dul ba): bam bya sku'i bang po rnam sbyin du Sh+TAswA//de kA shAm drug lkugasan ste/dus tshul gyidan b+h+ri na nas/de dge sbyi nga blo
319b7('dul ba): gni du dang skye smras pa/sgra 'di ni mye'i bu skyes nas ring po ma la gis pa zhig skyel mi klung bcas te mchis nas/bdage tso de'i drung du mchis pa dang /des se gam gyi skyes
320a1('dul ba): /bdag cag slar bzlog go/brgya byin gyis smras pa/lha mo dag de ni mngon dge slong yin gyis/de'i mdun du me long zungs sh+log dang dran pa rnyed par
320a2('dul ba): 'gyuraro//de dag gi de'i mdun du me long gzungs pa dang /des bdag nyid dpung brgyan dang /rna cha gdub kir dang /phreng ba rgyu dang /rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par mthong nas/
320a3('dul ba): des dran pa rnyed//de nas des de dag 'dod par brtsams pa dang /de dag gis smras pa/bzod ldan bdag cag de bzhin du bsnyen bkur mi byed de/gang lha'i dbang po brgya
320a4('dul ba): byin la phyag 'tshal ba de la bdag cag bsnyen bkur byed do//des bsams pa/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i dri nga ba med pa la phyag byas nas/da ji lta skya'i dbang
320a5('dul ba): brgya byin 'dod pa'i longs spyod can la phyag 'tshal snyam du rig nas smras pa/sring mo drag gang gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la phyag 'tshol bA mi byed pa de lta bu'i thabs
320a6('dul ba): 'ga' yod dam/bzod ldan yod de gang na lha'i drang srong dgra ni ngas par spyad pa spyod cing /'khod pa de dag gi nang du gang tshangs par spyod pa spyod par byed pa de ni/lha'i
320a7('dul ba): dbang po brgya byin la phyag ma 'tshal te/lha'i dbang po brgya byi de la phyog 'tsho lo//de dag gi nang du zhugs pa dang /lha'i dbang po'i rgyu byin gyis/ji ltar de lha'i
320b1('dul ba): drang srong gi nang du zhugs te/tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa thos nas/lha'i dbang po brgya byin de'i gan du song ste phyin nas/rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song ngo //de nas sngon dge slong
320b2('dul ba): lho'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/gang gi phyir bdag yongasu gnas pa bsten te/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya bri phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdug gi tshul dang
320b3('dul ba): 'thun pa ma yin gyis/bdag yongasu gnas pa ma sten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la belta ba dang /bskyon bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyamo de nas sngon dge slong lha
320b4('dul ba): bu rna cha gdub 'khor g.yo zhing dri ma med pa thogs te/do shal dang sen mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dag
320b5('dul ba): gis thu ba bkang ste/kha dog shin tu 'das pas/mtshan mo la bab pa dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis
320b6('dul ba): mngon par gtor te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /'di ltar sngon dge slong lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus
320b7('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to//de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bus bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/
321a1('dul ba): rmongs pa zhes bkyi tshal de ni//lha mo'i tshogs kyis kun bsgrags pa//sh+tsa za mo bzhin yongs bskor ba//ji ltar 'chi ba 'byung bar 'gyur//bcom
321a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/drung po zhes bya'i lam de nas//'jigs med phyogs shes bya ba daM raM//sgra med ces bya'i shing d+ha ni//chos kyi rtogs pas skyod gyur pa//de'i
321a3('dul ba): dmigs pa ngo tsha shes//dran pa de'i 'khor yin te//kha lo sgyur ba shes rab yin//sna 'dren yang dag lta zhes bya//skyes pa'am bud med gang la'ang rung //bzhon pa 'di 'dra
321a4('dul ba): yod gyur cing //de 'dra'i bzhon pa zhon gyur na//de ni 'jigs mid phyogasu 'gro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge sbyong lha'i bu'i bsamu pa dang /bag la nyal dang /
321a5('dul ba): khams dang /rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/gang thos nas dge slong lha'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes
321a6('dul ba): kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtog par byed pa'i chos bstan pa
321a7('dul ba): mdzad do//des bden pa mthong nas/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal blo
321b1('dul ba): kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma 'gyis//sngon gyis pha mes dag gAkyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gyis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang /rtswa lud du
321b2('dul ba): tshogs kyis kyang mi bgyis te/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams//rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgra dag ni phye//sems
321b3('dul ba): can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do//yang smras pa/khyod mthus
321b4('dul ba): rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i//ngan song shul bkag bsod na mas rab ldan pa'i//mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni//mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur//shin tu rnam
321b5('dul ba): dag khyed brten bdag gis ni//de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing //go 'phags zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyur/'gro ba lta
321b6('dul ba): min mo dang lhas mchod pa//skye dang rga dong nA 'chi bral ba po//srid pa stong du mthong ba rab dkon pa//thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis//de nas gdung byas do shal reb 'byung
321b7('dul ba): bas//zhabs la phyag 'tshalo rangs pa skyes gyur nas/dgra thul g.yas nas yongasu bskor byas te//lha'i 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song //de nas sngon dge slong
322a1('dul ba): lha'i bu/tshong pa khe phobs rnyed pa lta bu dang /zhing pa la thog 'byor pa sa bu dang /dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /nad pa nad thams
322a2('dul ba): cad las yongasu thar pa lta bur gyur te/cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi skyon sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu song ngo //ji tsam ni mtshan mo nam
322a3('dul ba): nangs nas/khang skyong gis sgo phye ste/phyugs ma thogs nas sgro khang phyug par brtsa mos pa dang /skyil mo dkrung gis 'dug pa mthong nas/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa long
322a4('dul ba): shig/ci khyod kyang sngar bas mo gtan byed pa yin nam/des tshig mi smra nas/des de'i lag pa gnyis nas gzung ste/bskul bar brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na dus la bab
322a5('dul ba): par mthong ngo //des 'di ci zhig gis dus la bab ces brtag par brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na khri 'og na sprul dug myur du khyab par byed pa 'dug pa mthong nas des spangs
322a6('dul ba): te/dge slong rnams kyi gan du song ste smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong sgo khang du nyal ba gang yin pa de/rA la dug myur du khyab pa ro byed pas bzung ste dus la bab bo//nga
322a7('dul ba): slong rnams kyis de dur khrod du bskyal te/sreg nas phyir b+hU/b+h+rUM skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis ba rjes la gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba
322b1('dul ba): thams cad dge slong dag khri dma' ba la mal 'cha' zhing de'i mdun du rkang pa gnyis 'khru ba las gyur pa yi no snyam du dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/de lta bsta na dge slong gis khring
322b2('dul ba): ba la mal bca' bar mi bya zhing /khri'i mdun du rkang pa gnyis bkru bar mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi khri dma' ba la mal bca' bar mi bya zhing khri'i mdun du
322b3('dul ba): rkang pa gnyis bkru bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/dge slong gzhan dag la mchil lha me mi bdog pa de dag gnod par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
322b4('dul ba): gang dag mchil lham mi bdog pa de dag gis mgo logs dang rkang pa'i logasu rkang pa gnyis bkru bar bya ste/'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//drug sde dag gis dge slong khri dma'
322b5('dul ba): ba la nyul ba sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pas zin te/dub la bab nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khri dmA ba la ma la bca' bar mi bya'o zhes bkag pa thos nas de
322b6('dul ba): drag gi khri rkang pa khru bcu gnyis pa btsas te/ya gad mthon por btsugs pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag tso khyod cag byar byed dam/de dag
322b7('dul ba): gis smras pa/su zhig byer byed/khyed kyis dge slong sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pas zin te/dus la bab pa ma mthong ngam ci/khyod drug sde dog kyang sgrol dug myur du khyab
323a1('dul ba): khyod pas bzung stongs su ba brjod/khabad shAdzaT sa byud dag bstod par 'dod dum/dge slong ngan ltung ngu dang N+Da'abyor dge slong rnams kyis bzlog pa dang /
323a2('dul ba): dang de skad zer zhes spyod par byed/byur khaM gtod par byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung
323a3('dul ba): 'di dang /gleng gzhi 'di dngos sa 'di la dge slong go dge 'dun bsdu bo mdzad zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhino//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmo
323a4('dul ba): par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcomo ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas po/dge slong dag khyod dge slong rnams kyis bzlog pa
323a5('dul ba): na/de dang de skad zer po bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshu le ma yin pa/rjesu 'thun pa ma yin pa//rlung ba ma yin pa/chu
323a6('dul ba): dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mes rnam par spyad nas/dge slong rnams
323a7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na bon yon bcu yang dge bar gzigs pas/'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya bre laM so/
323b1('dul ba): AmA zhin no//de'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bsgrub pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi khyi 'am khri'u khyod du 'jug na/rtsa ba bde bar du
323b2('dul ba): pa'i sor brgyad kyi tshad du gzhug par bya'o//de las lhag pa byed du 'jug nA/bcad nas ltung byed zhes/bcom ldan 'dres kyis 'dul bya l-i ny+tsin thos rnams kyi bsgrub pa'i glan
323b3('dul ba): de ltar bca'o ba mdzad do///tshe dang ldan pa'i char ko tshod las shin tu 'das pa yin pas/de'i bus mye gnyis gos skal rog pa'i skabs de/dge sbyong rnams kyis
323b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gyi/dri lta bas bu gar bzhug pa ma gtog so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab po 'dod pa dang /
323b5('dul ba): bslab pa la gus pa dang /bslab pa la yo byad ba skyengs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/dge slong rnams la de dang 'thun pa dang /de'i shas che ba dang de dang 'tshams pa'i chos
323b6('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i bka' mched mdzod nas/dge slong sbrul bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lA bas nA s+t+wa ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni rje su gnang ba yin te/nga'i nyan thos
323b7('dul ba): rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi khri'am khri'u byed du 'jug na/rtsa ba bu gar gzhug pa ma gtogs par bde bar
324a1('dul ba): rgyu nags rna sa kun du byung du zug+sa tA b+h+ya)//dos sa//ga khyong du jug na b+has+yA nus m+b+ha //da slong gis shes byu ban chos 'ang
324a2('dul ba): so//dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyil//khri'om zhes bya ba ni khri nyid kyi'o//khri'u zhes bya ba yang khyi'u nyid do//byed du
324a3('dul ba): 'jug na zhes bya ba ni bdog nyid kyis sam gzhano//rtsa ba bu gar gzhugs par ma gtogs par zhes bya ba ni rdza ba bu gar gzhug pa bzhagu ste'o//bde bar gshegs
324a4('dul ba): po'i sor brgyad kyi ched du byed du gajug par bya'o zhes bya ba la/bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o//de'i ser brgyad gang dag yin pa de la ni/tshad dang
324a5('dul ba): ldan pa'i khru gong ngo //de la sa lta ga par byed du 'jug no zhes bya ba ni de las gong ma'o//bcad nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de bcad nas/ltung byed kyi ltung ba bsha
324a6('dul ba): ber bya'o//ltung bye zhes bya ba ni sems tson dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas ngan song dang /ngan 'gro dang log par lhung ba dag tu sreg par byed 'tshod par byed ltung bar
324a7('dul ba): byed pa'o//gzhan yang ji srid du lhung ba de ma bshogs shing so sor ma bshags na/dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/des na ltung byed do zhes gsungaso//
324b1('dul ba): la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge 'dun gyi khri'u rtsa ba bu gar gzhug pa ma gtogs par bde bar gshegs pa'i sor brgyad kyi tshad las lhag pa byed
324b2('dul ba): du 'jug na/thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyu ro//gang gi mdun du 'chags par byed pa des khyod kyis dngos po de bcad dam zhes dri bar bya'o//ma dris par 'chags pa dang du lon
324b3('dul ba): bair byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//lcang po de yang ma bshags pa yin pas yod bshugs par bya'o//las dang po pa dang /smyos pa dang /sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor ba dag
324b4('dul ba): gis nyen pa la lhung ba med do//khri rkang pa 'chos pa'i ltung byed de brgyad cu lnga pa rdzogaso////sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
324b5('dul ba): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bA na bzhug so//nye dga' gsar bu yin pas de'i khri thob po cog ches rgan pas phrogs shing gnas mal sgo ba'i dus la yang bab nas/dris bsams
324b6('dul ba): pa/gong gis bdag bI khI mi 'phrogs pa'i thabs de lta bu ci yod snyam pa dang /des bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shing bal dag kyang blangs nas/de la blo skyes pa shing bal gyis bdal te/
324b7('dul ba): bzhago snyam nas des khre'i steng du shing bal bdal te bzhago//ji tsam na dge slong chos rgan pa zhig 'ongs nas/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa'i da su'i/nye dgas smras pa/khro
325a1('dul ba): po'i shing b.lo//de na dge slong zhig 'dug pa des smras pa/nye dga' ji skad zer ba de bzhin te/shing bal ni nye dga'i yino//'di ltar khri ni dge 'dun
325a2('dul ba): gyi yino//de skad ces smras pa dang /nye dga' khros nas des shing bal khyer te/khri de'i steng du shing ngal chung zad bdal te bzhago//dge slong des so sor ma btags pa
325a3('dul ba): nyid du der nyal nas/mtshan mo nam nangs te langs pa dang /gos thams cad shing bral gyis skye bor gyur nas/dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/ci khyod g.yul gyi
325a4('dul ba): gzhi re nyal lam/des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir/dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi khri 'am/khri'u lnga shing pal bdel te/'dzag par
325a5('dul ba): byed ces smod par byed/phyar kaM gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das le gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba
325a6('dul ba): 'dra dang /gleng gzho 'di dang skabs 'di la/dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad zhes bya bya la sogs pa snga me bzhi no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen
325a7('dul ba): bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' la rmas pa/nye dga' khyod dge
325b1('dul ba): 'dun gyi khril shing bal bdal te 'jog pa bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/rje su mthun pa ma yin pa/rung du ma yin pa/
325b2('dul ba): tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yino zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par skud nas/dge slong rnams la
325b3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma
325b4('dul ba): bzhi no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi khri 'am/khri'u la shing bral bdul lam/bdal du
325b5('dul ba): 'jug nu bsdus nas lhung byed//yang dge slong grang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dgu' 'am/gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o//dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan
325b6('dul ba): thos kyis dge 'dun gyi'o//khwa 'am zhes bya ba ni khri nyid//khri'u li zhes bya ba ni yang khri'u nyid la'o//shing bal zhes bya ba ni lnga po/shal ma li'i dang /arka'i dang /ka sha'i dang /
325b7('dul ba): du ka'i dang /i re ka'i shing bal dge los gang yang rung ba'o//bdal lam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyiso//bdal du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni gzha no//bsdus nas ltung bye zhes bya ba ni
326a1('dul ba): dngos po de bsdus nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba'o//ltung byedo zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang yi dgas ngan song dang /ngan 'gro///
326a2('dul ba): dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/'tshod par byed/ltung bar byed pa'o//gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de mi bshags shing so sor ma bshags na/dge ba'i chos
326a3('dul ba): rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byedo zhes gsungs//de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong gis tho tsam cung zad dge 'dun gyi khri'am/khri'u la shing bal
326a4('dul ba): bdal 'am/bdul du 'jug na thams cod ltung byed du 'gyur ro//gang gi mdun du 'chags par byed pa des/khyod kyi dngos po de bsdus sam zhes dri bar bya'o//ma dris par
326a5('dul ba): 'chag pa dang du len par byed na/nyes bya su 'gyuraro//ltung ba de yang bshags pa ma yin pas/yang bshags par bya'o//las dang po pa dang /smos pa dang /sems
326a6('dul ba): 'khrugs pa dang /tshor bo dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba medo//shing bal gyis spro bar byed pa'i ltung byed de brgyad cu drug po rdzogaso////sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
326a7('dul ba): mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi gdings pa byed du gzhu go zhes bka' stsal nas/
326b1('dul ba): dge slong dag tshad las ha cang lhag par byed du 'jug nas/dge slong don nyung ngu dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi gding ba byed du gzhug nas bka' stsal na/ci'i phyir dge slong
326b2('dul ba): tshad las hA cung lkug par byed du 'jug ce sa/skrod par byed t+ta ka gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom
326b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /gling bzhi 'di dang skyabs 'odi la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzod zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhi no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
326b4('dul ba): mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/dge slong dag ngas dge slong gi gding
326b5('dul ba): pa byed du gzhug zhes bka' stsal na/khyod cag tshad las ha cang lhag pa byed du 'jug po bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang /
326b6('dul ba): cho ga mi shes pa dang /gso dka' ba dang dgang dka' ba dang /rnam par smad pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa chung ba dang /chog shes pa dang /gso bla ba dang /
326b7('dul ba): dgang zla ba dang /phri ba dang /yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /mdzes pa dang /drod rig pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod nas/dge slong rnams la bka'
327a1('dul ba): stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/zhes
327a2('dul ba): bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhi no//nga'i nyen thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gden par bya ste/dge slong gi gding ba byed du 'jug na/tshod bzhin du byed
327a3('dul ba): du chug shig/de la gding ba'i tshed ni 'di yin te/srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho do//zheng du mtho phyed dang do'o//de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na/bcad
327a4('dul ba): nas ltung byedado zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyani thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do////tshe dang ldan pa 'tsha kha lus ha cang lhag pas
327a5('dul ba): de'i gding pa des mi chog nas/des gnas mal bsrang ba'i phyir rkang pa'i mtha' logs lo ma'i rgyan po dag bzhu go/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'tsho zhing bzhugs
327a6('dul ba): la/gson zhing bzhes pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni/gdul bar gyur pa'i skye bo la rje su brtse bas/dus dang du su sems can dmyal ba rgyur gshegs pa dang /dud 'gro rgyu ba
327a7('dul ba): dang /yi dgas rgyu ba dang /lha rgyu ba dang /ljongs rgyu ba dang /chu klung rgyu ba dang /ri rgyu ba dang /dur khrod rgyu ba dang /gtsug lag khong rgyur gshegs pas don 'dir ni sengs
327b1('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang rgyur gshegs par bzhed nas/bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i gtsug lag khang ga la ba der gshegaso//bcom ldan
327b2('dul ba): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i rkang pa'i mtha' logs nas/lo ma'i chun po dag bzhag pa gzig so//gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
327b3('dul ba): kun dga' bo 'di su'i mal/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha'i 'o//'o na ci'i phyir rkang pa'i mtha' log su lo ma'i chun po dag bzhag/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis
327b4('dul ba): dge slong gi gding ba byed du 'jug ni/tshad bzhin du byed du chug shig/de la gdong ba'i tshad ni 'di yin te/srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho do//zheng du mtho phyed
327b5('dul ba): dadang de'o//de las lhog pa byed du 'jug na bcad nas ltung byed do zhes 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pI ga zhi de ltar btsa' bar mdzad nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha tshod
327b6('dul ba): las ha cang lhag pas de'i gding ba des mi 'tshal nas/des gnas mal bsrung ba'i slad du sug pa'i mtha' logasu lo ma'i chun po dag bzhago/kun dga' bo de lta bas na
327b7('dul ba): srid du mtho gang gis srings shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /bslab pa la gus pa dang /bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/
328a1('dul ba): dge slong rnams la de dang 'thun pa dang /de'i shAs chu ba dang /de dang 'tshams pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
328a2('dul ba): pa/dge slong dag de lta bas ni/snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/'di ni rje su gnang ba yin te/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par byaste/
328a3('dul ba): dge slong gi gdang ba byed du 'jug na/tshad bzhin du byed du rmugs shig/de la gding ba'i tshad ni 'di yin te/srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho do//zheng du mtho byed
328a4('dul ba): dang dro'o//srid du mtho gang srings shig/de las lkog pa byed du 'jug na/bcad nas ltung byed//dge slong gi shes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so//gding ba zhes bya ba ni/steng rim
328a5('dul ba): du gding ba'o//byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni//bdag nyid kyis sam gzha no//tshad bzhin du byed du chug shig ces bya ba ni/gding ba'i tshad gang yin pa de bzhin du'o//de la
328a6('dul ba): gdeng ba'i tshad na 'di yin te/srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho //zheng du mtho phyi dang de zhes bya ba la srid du zhes bya ba ni chu ro//bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni
328a7('dul ba): ston pa'o//de'i mthong mtho gang yin pa de ni/tshe dang ldan pa'i khru gsu mo//zhing du zhes bya ba ni rgya ro//mtho phyed dang do zhes bya ba la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho phyed dang /
328b1('dul ba): do gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru do dang /sor dugo/srid du mtho gang gis gasrings shig/ces bya ba ni mi chog na/srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gis bsring ste/
328b2('dul ba): bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gang yin pa de la ni/tshad dang ldan pa'i khru phyed dang ngo ste/des na gding ba'i srid kyi tshad ni ched dang ldan pa'i khru phyed dang lnga'o//de las lhag pa
328b3('dul ba): byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni/de las gong ma'o//bcad nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de bcad nas/ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o//ltung byedo zhes bya ba ni sems
328b4('dul ba): can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang yi dgas dran song dang ngan 'gro dang /log par lhung ba dag tu sreg par byed/'tshod par byed/ltung bar byed pa'o//gzhan yod ltung ba de ma
328b5('dul ba): bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/des na ltung byed zhes gsungs//de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad
328b6('dul ba): gding ba srid du khru phyed dang lnga/zheng du khru do dang sor drug las lhag pa byed du 'jug na/thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyu ro//gong gi mdun du 'chags par byed pa des khyod
328b7('dul ba): kyi dngos po de bcad dam zhes dri bar bya'o//ma dris par 'chags pa dang du len par byed na nyes byasu 'gyuraro//ltung ba de yang ma bshags pa yin pas/yang bshags par
329a1('dul ba): rna///las dang po bya dang /smyos pa dang //snyoms pa byugs pa dang /tshor bya dag gis nyonu pa lnga ltung ba med//gding ba las gyur pa'i ltung byed de brgyan/
329a2('dul ba): cu bdun pa rdzog so////sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal byed kyi tshal mngon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//bcom ldan 'das
329a3('dul ba): kyis dge slong gis g.yan pa dgab pa byed du gzhugo zhes bka' stsal pa/dge slong dog tshod las hu cang lhag par byed du 'jug nas/dge slong don nyung ngu dag bcom ldan
329a4('dul ba): 'das kyis/dge slong gis g.yan pa dgab pa byed du gzhugo zhes bka' stsal nas/dge slong dag ci'i phyir tshad las hi cang lhag pa byed du 'jug ces smod par byed/phyer
329a5('dul ba): ka gtong bar byed/kha zer por byed pa'i skabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang
329a6('dul ba): skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhi no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes
329a7('dul ba): bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/dge slong dag ngas dge slong gis g.yon pa dgab pa byed du gzhug
329b1('dul ba): shes bka' stsal na/khyod cag tshad las ha cang lhag pa byed du 'jug pa bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang /chog mi shes pa dang /
329b2('dul ba): gso dka' ba dang /dgang dka' ba rnam par smad pa mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa chung ba dang /tshig shes pa dang /gso zla ba dang /dgang bla ba dang /phri ba dang /
329b3('dul ba): yo byad bsrungs pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /mdzes pa dang /dro de rig pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas
329b4('dul ba): na phan yon bcu yang dag por gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhi no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis
329b5('dul ba): 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/dge slong gis g.yan pa dgab pa byed du 'jug no//tshod bzhin du byed du chug shig/de la g.yan pa dgub pa'i tshad ni
329b6('dul ba): 'di yin te/srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho bzhi/zheng du mtho ngo'o//de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na/btsod ni sa ltung byed do//dge slong gis shes bya ba ni chos
329b7('dul ba): 'di pas so//g.yon pa dgra ba pa zhes bya ba ni na ba'i gos so//byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni/bdag nyid kyis bas ma bzhi no//ched bzhin du byed du chug shig/ces bya ba ni
330a1('dul ba): g.yan pa dgab pa'i tshad gang yin pa de bzhin du'o//de la g.yan pa dgrub pa'i tshad ni 'di yin te/srid du brko bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho bzhi//
330a2('dul ba): zheng du mtho dan+ta zhes bya ba la srid du zhes bya ba la srid du zhes bya ba ni chur//bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o//de'i mtho'i bzhi gang yin pa de ni chud nga
330a3('dul ba): ldan pa'i khru drug/nong du zhes bya ba ni rgyur ro//mtho de'i zhes bya ba la/bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho do gang yin pa de la ni/tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gsu mo//de las
330a4('dul ba): lhag pa byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni/de las gong mo'o//bcad nas ltung byedado zhes bya ba ni/dngos po de bcad nas ltung byed kyis ltung ba bshegs par bya'o//ltung byed do/
330a5('dul ba): zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas ngani song dang /ngan 'gro dang log par ltung po dag tu sreg par byed/'tshod par byed/ltung bar
330a6('dul ba): byed pa'o//gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de me bshegs shing so sor ma bshegs na/dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/des na ltung byed do zhes bya ba
330a7('dul ba): gsungs//de la ltung ba ji ltar 'i gyur zhe na/dge slong gis ji tsam chung zad g.yan pa dgab pa srid du khwa drug/zhing du khro gsum las lhag pa byed du 'jug na/thaMd
330b1('dul ba): du ltung byed du 'gyur ro//gang gi mdun du 'chags par byed pa des khyod kyis dngos po de bcad dam zhes dri bar bya'o//ma dris par 'chags pa dang du len par byed na nyes bya su 'gyur/
330b2('dul ba): lhung po de yang bshegs pa ma yin pas yang bshogs par bya'o//las dang po pa dang /smyos pa dang /sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do//
330b3('dul ba): g.yen pa dgab pa las gyur pa'i ltung byed de brgyad du brgyud po rdzogs so////sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
330b4('dul ba): dga' ra ba na bzhug so//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dbyar gyi gros ras chen byed du gzhugo zhes bka' stsal nas/dge slong dag hA cang tshad las lhag po byed du
330b5('dul ba): 'jug nas dge slong don nyung ngu dge/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dbyar gyi gos ras chen byed du gzhug zhes bka' stsal na/ci'i phyir dge slong dag ha tsang tshang lnga
330b6('dul ba): lha ga pa byed du 'jug ces smod par byed/phya re ka gtong bar byed/kha zer bar byed pa'i skyabs do/dge slong rnams kyis bac+doM m+bi ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan
330b7('dul ba): 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhi no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
331a1('dul ba): mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la smras pa/dge slong
331a2('dul ba): dag ngas dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen byed du gzhugo zhes bka' stsal na/khyed tshad las ha cang lhag pa byed du 'jug pa bden nam/btsun pa med do//sangs rgyas
331a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang /cho ga mi shes pa dang /gso dka' ba dang /dgang dka' ba rnam par smad pa mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa chung ba
331a4('dul ba): dang /tshig shes pa dang /gso bla ba dang /dgang bla ba dang /phri ba dang /yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /mdzes pa dang /drod rig pa nyid kyi bsngags pa
331a5('dul ba): brjod nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dang /de lta bran yin bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya
331a6('dul ba): ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhi no//nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/dge slong gi dbyar gyi gos ras chen byed du 'jug no tshad bzhin
331a7('dul ba): du byed du chug shig/de la dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyi tshad ni 'di yin te/srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho drug/zhing du mtho phyed dang gsum//de las lhag pa byed
331b1('dul ba): du 'jug na bcad nas ltung bye//dge slong gis shes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so//dbyar gyi gos ras chen zhes bya ba ni/chur pa skyob pa'i gos so//byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis
331b2('dul ba): sum gzhan//tshad bzhin du byed du chug shig ces bya ba ni/dbyar gyi go so ras chen gyi tshad gang yin pa de bzhin du'o//de la dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyi chad na 'di yin te/srid du
331b3('dul ba): badre bar gshegs pa'i mtha'i mtho drug/mtho phyed dang gsum zhes bya ba la srid du zhus pa ni chu ro//bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o//de'i mtho'i mtho drug gang yin par
331b4('dul ba): la ni/chad dang ldan pa'i khru dgu'o//zhing du zhes bya ba ni rgyu ro//mtho phyed dang gsum zhes bya ba la/bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho phyed dang gsum gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i//
331b5('dul ba): khru gsum dang sor bco brgyad//de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni/dri las gong ma'o//bcad nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni/dngos po de bcad nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bsha
331b6('dul ba): par byed pa'o//ltung byedo zhes bya ba ni/sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang yi dgas ngan song dang /ngan 'gro dang leg par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/'tshed par byed/ltung
331b7('dul ba): bar byed pa'o//gzhon yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na/dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/des na ltung byed do zhes gsung so//de la ltung
332a1('dul ba): ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyi srid du khru dgu dang /zheng du khru gsum dang sor bco brgyad las lhag
332a2('dul ba): pa byed du 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyuraro//gang gi mdun du 'chags par byed pa des/khyod kyis dngos po de bcad dam/dri bar bya'o//ma dris par 'tshogs pa dang
332a3('dul ba): du len par byed na nyes byas 'gyuraro//lhung ba de yang ma bshags pa yin pas yang bshags par bya'o//las dang po pa dang /smyos pa dang /sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor ba
332a4('dul ba): dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba medo//dbyar gyi ras chen las gyur pa'i ltung byed du brgyad cu dgu pa rdzogaso////sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal byed kyi tshal

332b7('dul ba): pa snga ma bzhi no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis

333a7('dul ba): na ltung byed do zhes 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas lhag pa byed du bcug nas/dge slong don nyu dge/

333b6('dul ba): bcu zheng du mtho drug ste/de la 'di ni badre bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad do//yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin
333b7('dul ba): pa'o//bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o//de'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi zhes bya ba ni bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad gang yin pa de'i'o//chos gos
334a1('dul ba): shes bya ba ni bdun po bral gos dang /shana'i gros dang /zung ma'i goHdang /kau& tatum nga'i gos dang /dru gu la'i gos dang /ras bal rgyu gos drug

335a1('dul ba): ldan pa/ud pa la'i ze 'bru'i mdog 'dra ba zhig byung //de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas/zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsos pa'i bcos ston
335a2('dul ba): rgya cher byas nas/bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags shes de'i ming 'dogs par byed do//nye du dag gis smras pa/gang gi phyir bu mo 'di mig ud pa la 'dra la/ud pa la'i dri dang

335a7('dul ba): dgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma la dus gzhan zhig na sems can zhugs par gyur nas/de zla ba brgyad da mi/dgu 'das te btsas pa las khye'u zhig byung nas de yang
335b1('dul ba): gos dun pa maung na smras nas/dang zlas shong nga du chen pa m+b+ha //sgra gathun nags/ m+b+hak+Sha ng+yas smra ba nas/du phan numarnam pan nan
335b2('dul ba): nga gis khyim bdag de'i khyim du phyin pa dang /khyim padag des m+b+ha m+b+ha p+na/bu khA sa khyim b+ha ga tshig ma T+wAMg ga/ kyai phyugar/dus lci bab 'o//du khyod kyi mags

335b6('dul ba): dri'am ci drug 'dagu gnas pa dang /rgyu'i sbyar bas zasna dang gos bzang po dag gis rgyas pisgra nyon mongs pa dag glus gnod par brnams pa dang /des bsems pa/gas

336a3('dul ba): zhugs par gyur cing /de btsa' ba'i dus la bab nas des/bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/bu mo songs la yum bos shig/de song ba dang ji tsam na de dmag pa dang

336a6('dul ba): yum dang khyim thabs nad med par gyur cig/des smras pa/des ci nyes de ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /des smras pa/bu mo khyod kho mo'i ma dang /khyim zab lo skur

336b1('dul ba): len cing 'dug pa dang /ji tsam na de gnyis dben par 'dug par gyur nas/des myur ba myur bar song ste/ud pa la'i mdo ba la smras pa/tshur spyon da gzigs shig/de yang myur

336b5('dul ba): 'dril nas sgo'i them par lhung ste glad pa zhom mo//u pa la'i mdog mgo g.yogs te khyim nas byung ba dang /ji tsam na don 'thun bcom brlag tu 'phags pa mthong nas de dang

337a1('dul ba): rin khyer te/phyir rdo 'jog du 'ongs pa dang /de na tshong pa de dag phan tshun khyim gzhan du mgron du bos te/ston mo byed pa na ded dpon des 'ga' yang zan

337a3('dul ba): skyon mo byed mod/kho bo la ni gang bsnyen bkur byed pa 'ga' yang med pas kho bos ji ltar zan sbyin/dri dag gis smras pa/gal te de ltar nA ci'i slad du bu mo mi tshul des smras pa/

337b1('dul ba): nas bor te dong ngo //mi 'dor ro//gal tA de ltan sbyin//de dag gis de blangs nas/ded dpon gyis bag mar drang //de nas tshong ba de dag gi rdo sbyar te /bang rin khyer nus yang bcom bslag du/

337b3('dul ba): shig dang bcom brlag tu song ba dang /ud pa la'i mdog gis byon pa legaso zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad de smras pa/ded dpon bde bar byon tam/des smras pa/bzang

337b7('dul ba): ze ro//des smras pa de de ltar phun sum tshogs shing 'ongs pa de ltar sngon 'ga' yang phun sum tshogs shing ma 'ongs pas des khyod brid do//shed 'thun gtam byos shig/
338a1('dul ba): gtam gzhan ci zhig bya des rdo 'jog nas sa 'dzin ma 'di lta bu zhig khrid de 'ongs pas/khyod de'i rkang pa gnyis 'khru bar yang mi rung ngo //shed 'thun de bden

338a4('dul ba): shes thos kyis du 'di nyid du khrid de spyon cig/gang gi gnas gnyi su 'god par 'gyur ba de'i longs spyod dag ni srabs pa nyid dang /yongasu zad pa dang /yongasu mthar thug par

338b1('dul ba): zhes des de khrid de 'ongs pa dang /des de mthong nas rjesu chags pa skyeso//dus gzhan zhig na ud pa la'i mdog gis/bu mo de'i sgra bya bar brnams pa dang /mgo la sgros yod par
338b2('dul ba): mthong ngo //mthong nas byung dris pa bu mo 'di ci nyes des smras pa/bdag gis kyang ma 'tshal te/bdag gi phyi mo'i mchod nas/khyod kyi ma'i mchid nus/khyod kyi ma pha la khros
338b3('dul ba): bas khyod 'phangs pas sgo'i thim par ltung ste/der spros 'di byung //zhes mchi'o//khyod kyi phyi mo tsi/ming che gyo mo zhigo/khyod kyi maci ud pa la'i mdogo//des bsams pa/
338b4('dul ba): bdag der ni ma dang chen chun du gyur la/'din bu mo dang chen tshun du gyur gyis rnam pa pa 'gro bya bya'o snyam nas/de mgo g.yogs te khyim nas byung ba dang /ji tsam na dron 'thun yul yangs pa can du

338b7('dul ba): gcig gis smras pa/de dag gis sa 'dzin ma 'di lta la zhig khrid de 'ongs pas bdag cag de'i rkang pa gnyis 'khro bar yang mi nus pas/ci'i phyir de dag bdag cag
339a1('dul ba): lhan cig rtse ba dang dga' ba dang dga' dgur spyod par nyams myong bar byed/tshogs can mde dag 'dus te/ud pa la'i mdog gi gan du dong nas smras pa/
339a2('dul ba): sa 'dzin ma khyod kho mo cag gi 'tsho bas/'tsho bar byed na/ci'i phyir kho mo cag gi nang du mi 'jug/des mgo g.yogs pa bshus te smras pa/bdag deng phyin cad khyed cag
339a3('dul ba): gi nang du 'jug/zhes de de dag gi gan du zhug so//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/tshogs can ma de dag chang gal du tshogs shing gtam zer ba na/smras pa/bdog cag las
339a4('dul ba): gang gis tshong ba gang nor ji tsam dang bral bar byas/de nas gcig gis smras pa/kho mos tshong pa che ge mo zhig nor 'di tsam dang bral bar byas//gzhan dag gis smras pa/

339a6('dul ba): yangs pa can na spros 'tshong gi khye'u mi sdug pa thob pa zhig 'dug pa de tshogs can ma 'gas kyang rjesu 'jug pa ma byas nas/tshogs can ma de dag gis smras pa/bdag cig
